story:
High Efficiency Filtration

Layers of Science, Added Safety

THE DESIGN

What We Have To Offer

A cool and stylish respirator mask that is washable and has replaceable filters. It will make your everyday life more beautiful and give you that extra protection.

You protect yourself and your surrounding people, you look sensational and you're sure to put a smile on the face of others.

Choose from any of the designs after the campaign ends:

SUMMER BREEZE

 

MANEKI NEKO

 

KEEP SMILE

 

BLACK BEAUTY

 

GOOD FEELING

 

KEEP CALM

 

TOGETHER

Have your own Custom Design printed on the mask;

We are independently creating these masks, so we won't be taking medical staff's masks away from the clinic, and by supporting us they can continue to work.

Risks & Challenges

We work with some of the most reliable vendors, ensuring each piece is manufactured to our high standard. However, production and delivery issues are always a risk, but care will be taken to ensure the same quality is maintained as production ramps up.

Other Ways You Can Help

We would also like to donate masks to those who cannot buy any. We firmly believe that there is much more team spirit than you might think and we would like to set a record with every single one of you. Together we are strong - Together against Corona.

story:
Short Summary

Bitchmaster was born to be an agressive brand, styled combination of smart casual mixed with street wear style mostly used by youth people today.

The word bitch comes from "bitching", and the word master is based on the power you have to do whatever you want, when do you want, the time you want, you decide your limit.

We pride in targeting multiple audiences with something for everyone from different fits to different styles.

Our aim as a brand is only to expand and our goal is to become more than just a brand but a lifestyle. We want to create a movement, a movement of youth culture who are out there being active, living the life as you want, enjoying, partying, travelling, reaching all the dreams you have because there is no limit in this world.

We do what we want, we don´t give a f*ck! We are BITCHMASTER!

 

What We Need & What You Get

 

The funding total will go towards the cost to manufacture Protection Masks, T-shirts, Sweatshirts, Hoodies, Snapbacks and Tracksuits in the debut product supplies.

We want to reach the value so we can start with the bulk order for the new collection, we have the new designs coming. After the bulk order is done we will start selling the new products on our website and also in some local stores so we can export for other countries later with other budget.

 

Perks

 

1€ - "Feel free to help"
You will receive a private e-mail with pictures of the new collection and a lot of thanks!

 

4€ - "Feel happy to help"
You will receive a private e-mail with pictures of the new collection and a lot of thanks and also a code with 10% discount on our future website.

 

10€ - "Protection Mask"
You will receive a private e-mail with pictures of the new collection, a lot of thanks and also a code with 10% discount on our future website, a protection mask will arrive soon at your place so you can use it during this difficult times. You can choose the sentences of the masks.

14€ "Snapback BM"
You will receive a private e-mail with pictures of the new collection, a lot of thanks and also a code with 10% discount on our future website, a snapback will arrive soon at your place so you can use and abuse. Only black colour available.

 

19€ "T-shirt or Tank Top BM"
You will receive a private e-mail with pictures of the new collection, a lot of thanks and also a code with 10% discount on our future website, a t-shirt or tank top will arrive soon at your place so you can use and abuse. You can choose t-shirt or tank top, colours and sizes.

 

 

 

24€ "Sweatshirt BM"
You will receive a private e-mail with pictures of the new collection, a lot of thanks and also a code with 10% discount on our future website, a sweatshirt will arrive soon at your place so you can use and abuse. You can choose the colour and the size. (The colours red, green and ocean blue are also available)

 

29€ - "Hoodie BM"
You will receive a private e-mail with pictures of the new collection, a lot of thanks and also a code with 10% discount on our future website, a hoodie will arrive soon at your place so you can use and abuse. You can choose the colour and the size. (The colours red, green, ocean blue and pink are also available)


45€ - "Pack Sweatshirt + T-shirt BM"
You will receive a private e-mail with pictures of the new collection, a lot of thanks and also a code with 10% discount on our future website, a hoodie and a t-shirt will arrive soon at your place so you can use and abuse. You can choose the colour and the size. (The colours red, green, ocean blue and pink are also available)

 

56€ - "Pack Sweatshirt + T-shirt + Snapback BM"
You will receive a private e-mail with pictures of the new collection, a lot of thanks and also a code with 10% discount on our future website, a hoodie, a t-shirt and a snapback will arrive soon at your place so you can use and abuse. You can choose the colour and the size. (The colours red, green, ocean blue and pink are also available)

 

THANK YOU FOR THE HELP

story:
We are a 90´s inspired style clothing brand
 

But its not only about selling, Right? When we all started Útopy we only had one goal in mind: to create a clothing store in the image and likeness of Instagram community, in which anyone, anywhere and anytime could take part of

ÚTOPY is an idea that arose spontaneously from the market itself, from its demands. Observing the internet, its needs, tendencies and its people, and following with naturality the way of our society in this internet era we soon understood that people do demanded new clothes and styles, but in a different way

 

World changes, market changes,

the consumer changes and companies as well must do so. We understand that nowadays a clothing store can not just promote clothes and send it into a box, but also cultivate a community to contribute something to the consumer besides the mere product. As informing you about global styles at real time, meeting you with people of similar tastes, or even alowing you to monetize your time on social media with your own products or collections (more below)

 

In response to the lack of brands disposed to adapt to new audiovisual media, the UTOPY project took a step forward to integrate itself into social networks as just another user. Environments intended for people such as Facebook or Instagram have gone from having a clean atmosphere to becoming invasive and direct advertising spaces for companies that have not renewed their ways of treating people 

We believe that there are other ways and we refuse to enter the game of traditional advertising media, Our utopian objective, only possible in the century of the commercial revolution, can not be more than one: to change the world of fashion and to create community by a social way by listening to our people and formenting interactions between our own clients

 

Neon is light, youth and the symbol of our 90's generation,

Útopy is multi-style, however there are things that we not debate: Youthful style, energetic and lively. To please the senses without obeying canons. Chaos within an order. Ordered chaos. Emphasis on colors pleasing aesthetically through the atmosphere

ÚTOPY is a labyrinth of designs and trends where we show the most commented and trendy clothes in every country at real time. If you know ÚTOPY, you know the prevailing style in social media, always with our youthful and colorful aesthetic bet, we do not just keep up appearances moving in a generic spectrum of style

Some of our FOR HIM collection.

Some of our FOR HER collection.

 

 

Finally monetize instagram influence!,

In ÚTOPY there are permanent and seasonal collections, awesome designs, trendy products but ... as ÚTOPY was Made in Instagram and for Instagram ÚTOPY is a mirror of it: it is molded in the likeness of its medium and will allow you (influencer or private) to open your own collection or present your own design with which, as with the photos on your profile, try to convince friends, acquaintances and strangers, or maybe, to the whole world! With ÚTOPY you choose whether to be the client, the designer or the intermediary ... or all of them!

"There are a lot of stores already" you might think. But this aint normal!,

Marketing based on collaboration between humans. Each one will be free to give visibility or promote their collection or designs and thanks to the 50-50 commission of each sale they will be able to monetize their time and interactions in their preferred social app

 

 

We value the world in which we live, and we are aware that we must take care of it. We do not live outside the concerns of out there. With your help we want to:

  • To vote Each month in our creative assembly (Watch perks) where to allocate 5% of our profits. (Diferent options ptions related to oceans clean-up, human rights, specific charitable causes or fight against food shortages will be proposed each month)
  • Contribute monthly to the rainforest reforestation with our "Rainforest" collection (20% of the income of it will be directly devoted to planting trees in Zimbabwe and Brazil. Available from March 3.)

 

 

Congratulations! As a visitor to our pre-launch crowdfunding campaign, you are one of the first people to discover us. Did you like the project? You can still get involved, contribute ideas, make decisions and grow with us!

Open your own collection or create your own product (Watch perks) or if you prefer, get in touch with us and we will inform you directly:

>>>>    utopy.clothing@gmail.com    <<<<

 

From the very first concept and sketch to what is now ÚTOPY almost 3 years have elapsed. 3 years of learning, successes, mistakes, nuances ... in which the project has been our life. Day after day we tied things together, defining terms and polishing ideas not with few failed attempts on the road, but always believing in what we did and renewing our spirits as the project progressed

 

Initially the project started calling 90's Republic, we also had the intention, under the same scheme, to sell sneakers, but soon we realized that what more international and elementary product than the shirt to spread our vision and style around the world

 

After 2 and a half years, 2 clothing designers, 1 social media manager, 1 kickstarter campaign, a lot of enthusiasm, effort and hope we present our project to you today with the desire that you like it and that you want to collaborate with us to do it possible

 

 

The clothing and fashion sector is very broad, however, our project was not born as a nuance or with the ambition of just being one more brand. In our project we have the conviction to revolutionize the world of marketing and clothing from within, and this is shown by our ethical and policy code:

  •  vs. OPTIMIZATION: Many brands and companies often resort to processes of obsessive optimization of their resources, minimizing expenses by risking the minimum at the cost of betraying their style and their clientele. We say f *** *** to optimization. We want to play, we want to risk

  • vs. IMPERSONALITY: Both new brands and affluent brands end up joining the common canons for fear of not satisfying everyone, incurring impersonality in their designs. A block of big brands acting together imposing styles and fashions. Útopy aspires to serve as an echo to social networks to respect the tendencies and demands of the people
  •  VS. SELFISH PROJECTS: most clothing brands are companies isolated from people with a barrier between owners, workers and consumers. They enrich themselves. Útopy allows you to monetize your Instagram to any person in the world, in a way that aims to enrich the societies or countries in which we interact
  •  vs. JUST SELLING: Nowadays most of the promotions are 100% focused on the product and not on events, social awareness or interactions between users, everything derive on a sale. Before sellers we have been consumers and with ÚTOPY we want to build an active community with each other
  •  vs. UNSOCIAL STORES: The human being is social, buying is a social act. In the stores of the big brands there are only clothes, dependents and spaces dedicated to consumption, not to interaction, in ÚTOPY we believe in other types of stores, with large common spaces for customers and non-customers
  •  vs. INTRUSISM: Many brands refuse to specialize to hoard market. This almost monopolistic practice is very damaging because it cuts the wings to small or medium specialized companies. We abolish this practice, we specialize in shirts and sweatshirts
  •  vs. MARKETING ABUSE: Too much announcement in these times, and very little mental ecology. We renounce traditional marketing and we condition our growth to the growth of our community

story:
Thank you in advance for checking out our IndieGogo page, we appreciate all the support.

What's with NOTSEW APPAREL?

Our team sought out to create NOTSEW APPAREL because of our passion for high-quality fashion and desire to cut out the brand inflation and retail markup of popular name brands. We got frustrated paying top dollar for name brand T-Shirts, knowing they only cost a fraction of the price to make.  We have spent the past year working with leaders in the industry to come up with a luxury-grade, affordable T-Shirt collection that we know everyone will love.

When designing this T-Shirt collection, we made sure of THREE details:

  • A perfectly tailored look that could be worn in a casual or professional setting
  • The highest quality fabrics. 
  • Offering the T-Shirts at a price less than half what our competitor's cost

 

 

The NOTSEW APPAREL Collection

White Basic T-Shirt

Black Basic T-Shirt

Navy Basic T-Shirt

Black Simple Pocket T-Shirt

Navy Simple Pocket T-Shirt

White Simple Pocket T-Shirt

NOTSEW APPAREL is also backed with a warranty.

We are so confident with the quality and durability of our T-Shirts, that if you aren't pleased with how it fits & feels on your first wear, we hope you will send it back to us.

Where is NOTSEW APPAREL headed?

We want a full line of different types and styles of luxury-grade clothes that stay at an AFFORDABLE cost.  Join with us on this journey and be apart of it every step of the way.  We will send out several updates throughout the entire process making sure our backers are up-to-date on any important information.  We want to create a bond with our backers because ultimately you are the ones turning our dream into a reality. We are excited to grow and see what the future has in store for us.

Who is the team and how did it all start?

Started by young entrepreneurs and apparel afficionados, Nick and Justin sought to cut out the brand inflation and retail markup of popular name brands. They have been obsessed with clothes their entire lives and got fed up paying for overpriced name brand T-Shirts. They started as friends, became roommates, and are now hoping to become business partners.

Details & Care

  • Crewneck 
  • Short sleeves
  • Pulls over
  • 100% organic cotton
  • Machine wash
  • Made in USA

Size Chart

Now we're here, on IndieGogo, with a prototype that looks amazing. We just need one more thing... your support!

 

We Need Your Support!

In order to turn this dream of ours into a reality, we need your support. Not only does this mean pledging for one of our awesome T-Shirts, but sharing the story with a friend.

We are going to do everything we can to spread the word in a variety of ways.  We hope through the use of social media and blogs we can drive enough outside traffic to our page which will result in us reaching our funding goal.  If you could do something as simple as tweeting about our page, or just liking our Facebook page, it can really go a long way. Simply click the Facebook and Twitter tabs at the top ^ of the page, right below the video.

If funded, how will you fulfill the orders?

We've finalized our designs, constructed a pattern and selected a manufacturer that has a great reputation in the industry. Once Indiegogo releases the funds, we can pay the initial deposit to begin production.  Production time takes roughly 30 days depending on the quantity of the order.  Our team will then ship the orders to our awesome backers!

Risks and challenges

The challenges of NOTSEW APPAREL will be getting the word out and convincing IndieGogos to participate. With so many great projects to choose from, we hope ours will stand apart from the rest. To reach as many people as possible, we are asking friends, families, and various blogs to help spread the word.

Once the funding is in place, the challenge will be producing on a large scale. We have established a solid relationship with a manufacturer and have a lot of confidence in them.

story:
STORY

Hi there! I'm Lorenda. I came up with the idea for the Ella Dane diaper bag during my search for the perfect fashionable diaper bag while expecting my first child. I wanted something unique, functional and affordable so this inspired me to start work on my own design. 

Within a year, I created the very first design which I decided to sell on etsy in small quantities. My customers loved this bag and it soon became popular among some mom groups. However, through my experience as a mom, I realized it needed more functional features, so I decided to improve  the design.

After 3 years of constant improvements, driven by market research and feedback from moms, I've arrived at the perfect design. A durable, stylish and lightweight leather diaper bag that meets the needs of moms on the go. The original version has evolved into something I know you'll love! This bag’s versatility makes it much more than a diaper bag. It’s perfect for anyone!

Demand for this bag continues to increase and in order to produce the new edition of the bag at a higher volume, we need to reach our campaign goal. With your help and contribution, we can manufacture the next batch of these amazing bags.

Your support and contribution is greatly appreciated!

 

FEATURES AND DETAILS

 

DIMENSIONS

  • 15" wide x 14" high x 6”deep
  • 20" adjustable backpack straps (at shortest length)
  • 48" adjustable shoulder strap (at longest length)
  • Weight: 4 lbs all with accessories packed. 3.5lbs empty

MATERIALS

  • 100% durable Vegan Leather
  • Wipeable exterior and nylon interior lining pulls out for easy cleaning
  • Metal feet on the bottom so the bag never touches the ground
  • Premium durable, custom gold hardware

​ FEATURES

  • Wearable 3 ways: backpack, cross-body, or handbag
  • High quality dual separating zipper
  • Detachable vegan leather tassel on the body
  • Multi-purpose exterior slip pockets for small laptops, books or changing clutch
  • 13 functional pockets with one fully insulated to keep bottles warm
  • 2 velcro stroller clips for attaching bag onto the stroller
  • Wipeable changing clutch which holds wipes and diapers for quick grab-and-go baby changing
  • And the best part is it is stylish and goes with everything!

 

EXTERIOR

 

INTERIOR

 

WEARABLE 3 WAYS (BACKPACK, CROSS BODY AND HANDBAG)

 

TESTIMONIALS 

 

GOALS

My goal for this project is to raise $25,000 to fund production on a larger scale.

Your pledge will help raise enough funds to produce the latest edition of the Ella Dane diaper bag and make this goal a reality.

We're excited to share this journey with you as we continue to innovate the bag and make it more readily available on the market.

Your support will make all the difference!

STRETCH GOAL

The stretch goal for this project is $45,000. If we're able to reach this amount at the end of the campaign, we'll add an option for the bag in BLUSH. All backers who have pledged on a reward tier will be automatically eligible for this new option if the stretch goal is met. I'd love to hit this stretch goal of $45,000 to be able to offer this additional option so tell your friends, family, and coworkers.

Let’s keep the Ella Dane movement going!!

 

TIMELINE

 

 

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

The biggest challenge at the moment is unforeseen events, as I currently work with an overseas manufacturer. I plan to bring production to the States as volume continues to grow. In the meantime, I’ll work closely with the manufacturer during production to ensure an on-time delivery.

 

Other Ways You Can Help:

Want to support Ella Dane even if you don't purchase a bag? There’re other ways to chip in:

  • Help us meet our goals and unlock cool features by spreading the word about the diaper bag. Tell your friends, share online, and more!
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!

Special thanks to:

Videograpy and Lifestyle Photos by: Amanda Avalos (Instagram - @bondibluefilms)

Website (http://www.bondibluefilms.com/)

 

FAQs

Will the diaper bag be available after the IndieGoGo campaign?
Yes! We plan on having the diaper bag available for purchase on elladane.com in October for $130. 

What is vegan leather?
Our vegan leather is made of polyurethane that is water based and solvent free.

Why did you chose to make the bag out of vegan leather?

We chose vegan leather in order to keep the weight of the bag light (no mama needs a heavier diaper bag!) and so the bag exterior will not stain like traditional non-vegan leather.

Can the side pockets fit a 40oz Hydro Flask?

No, but they are large enough accommodate your favorite insulated water bottle up to 32 oz!

Are the side pockets insulated?
No, but there's an insulated zippered pocket inside the bag that can hold up to a 10 oz bottle.

When will my credit card be charged?
Your card will be charged when you pre-order. However, if we do not meet our funding goal all contributions will be refunded.

How do I update my shipping address if I've moved?
You will receive an email survey to confirm your shipping address a few weeks before we ship your order.

story:
We always make trade-offs when we buy girls dresses, either we buy expensive designer dresses made of expensive material for special occasions that we don’t want the kids running around in or playing outside while wearing or we buy them low cost clothing which usually isn’t pretty enough to wear to special occasions.

At Maya Montero - Toronto we don't like those choices, so we provide designer dresses for women and their little angels, made from the finest materials, with the newest design trends for a reasonable price.

 

FEATURES

Made of Luxurious High Quality Engineered Satin Main

Fully Lined with Luxurious High Quality Engineered Taffeta

Hand Sewn Pearl Applique

Printed Atelier Designs

YKK Brand Hidden Zipper

Hand Sewn 3D Applique

1” Sewn Bottom Hem

Knee Length

Luxurious Pleats

Atelier Designed Neck Lines

Satin Anti-Scratch Tags Standard In English, French and Spanish Languages

Girls Sizes 2T-6, Women's Sizes 6-14.

 

From Sketch to Success

 

PRODUCT PHOTOS & DETAILS

1. Let’s Get Magical – A true favorite design inspired from every child’s dream animal the famous Unicorn. This dress is offered in a beautiful bridal satin main fabric with a full taffeta lining, flawless digitally printed unicorn art with 3D gold sequin stars, all accompanied with shirring pleats, hand sewn pearls and all tied together with a YKK brand hidden zipper.

 

2. Maple Falling Love Dress – A true autumn/winter design inspired from the falling Maple leaves during the foliage season just before a snow covered northern winter. This dress is offered in a beautiful bridal satin main fabric with a full taffeta lining, flawless digitally printed maple leafs resembling a falling motion at the end of a season, all accompanied with a box pleat skirt, hand sewn pearls, YKK brand hidden zipper and the option to be a “ Mommy and Me ” matching outfit.

3. Canada Winter Joy Dress – A gorgeous display of a true Canadian winter showcasing the capitol of Canada’s parliament, winter outdoor ice-skating and people truly enjoying all the winter season has to offer. This masterpiece is offered in a smooth bridal satin main with a full taffeta lining, a detailed digital print, a turtleneck collar, with hand sewn 3D poinsettia and pearl applique all tied together with a YKK brand hidden zipper.

4. New York Christmas Love Dress – A high profile design for high profile children that’s what this dress displays. Our unique, one of a kind design of the NYC Rockefeller Christmas tree known all over the world. This dress features soft as a cloud bridal satin main and full taffeta lining fabrics, hand sewn 3D gold sequin & pearl applique, high definition digital prints of the Rockefeller center and Christmas tree during the Christmas holidays with a one of a kind top of a Christmas tree star shaped collar/neckline tied together with a YKK brand hidden zipper.

5. Polar Bear its Cold Out There Dress – The Arctic’s most powerful and graceful animal, the polar bear. Beautiful polar bear digital print walking across the snow covered north pole, featured on a beautiful royal blue bridal satin, with additional features such as a full taffeta lining, 3D white snowflakes & hand sewn pearl applique, box pleat skirt, turtle neck collar and a YKK brand hidden zipper.

6. Hey Blue Jay Dress – One of our favorite designs the Hey Blue Jay was inspired by one of Canada’s most iconic natural birds the Blue Jay. All Canadians feel a sense of pride when someone compliments the beautiful Blue Jay. This dress has many beautiful features such as a luxurious bridal satin main fabric, with a full taffeta lining, flower petal sleeves, beautiful digitally printed Blue Jay art with hand sewn pearls, shirring pleats and a YKK brand hidden zipper and the option to be a “ Mommy and Me ” matching outfit.

7. “Mommy and Me” Hey Blue Jay Dress - MOM - One of our favorite designs the Hey Blue Jay was inspired by one of Canada’s most iconic natural birds the Blue Jay. All Canadians feel a sense of pride when someone compliments the beautiful Blue Jay. This dress has many beautiful features such as a luxurious bridal satin main fabric, with a full taffeta lining, tear drop shape collar/neckline, flower petal sleeves, beautiful digitally printed Blue Jay art with hand sewn pearls, tulip shape skirt with side pleats and a YKK brand hidden zipper.

 

 

8. “Mommy and Me” Maple Falling Love Dress – MOM - A true autumn/winter design inspired from the falling Maple leaves during the foliage season just before a snow covered northern winter. This dress is offered in a beautiful bridal satin main fabric with a full taffeta lining, flawless digitally printed maple leafs resembling a falling motion at the end of a season, all accompanied with a drop v-neckline, puff sleeves with sewn bows, hand sewn pearls and a YKK brand hidden zipper.

 

 

Every one of our dresses feature YKK brand hidden zippers and full taffeta lining.   

YKK Brand Hidden Zipper

Full Taffeta Lining

OUR STORY

It all started back in 1995 when Gracia McEachern and her brother Frank Montero had that entrepreneur mind set since they were kids growing up in Central America, Frank had a great talent for drawing and she had the passion for designing her own dresses, she used his drawings to inspire her dress designs that were chic and unique; together they dreamed to create their own brand one day. Years later after both finished their university degrees, Gracia and her brother were planning to create their fashion brand, the idea came alive again after Gracia and her brother used to go shopping for Frank’s daughters dresses since she was a baby. Gracia was looking for classy dresses at an affordable price to teach her niece to dress chic. They had great difficulty finding the perfect dress designs made with the perfect material for a reasonable price, she either found that the dresses were made with high quality but not reasonably priced or the dresses were not chic or classy and made of poor quality but affordable. While Gracia and Frank were working on the launch of their project Frank was unexpectedly taken from his family. In Frank’s loving memory and in honor of her brother’s greatest love, Gracia and her husband decided to continue with the project and named the fashion house with his 3-year-old daughter’s name. In 2017, “ Maya Montero “ was established in Toronto, Canada.

Maya Montero - Toronto's vision is to bring families together, teach little girls to feel confident, strong, and most importantly feel beautiful with whatever they wear, bringing a smile to their face with each of our designs. Maya Montero – Toronto’s mission is to dress little angels with classy, chic, high quality dresses, inspired by trends and designs that little girls will love, while providing all the same high quality features found in expensive designer clothing. Not only are the dresses affordable for every budget but also the kids will love the dresses and ask to wear them. With Maya Montero – Toronto dressing the kids is fun, fast and stylish.

 

                                        Maya Montero & Gracia McEachern

 

HOW TO GET INVOLVED

  1. Watch Our video, Understand why we are different
  2. Fall in Love With our Dresses
  3. Choose your Level of Reward
  4. Create an account, if this is your first time
  5. Choose your country for the shipping details
  6. Submit your credit card information; officially become a Maya Montero-Toronto backer.
  7. Follow us on social media
  8. After we reach our deadline (Nov.1) your account will be charged for your reward, funds are transferred to us by Indiegogo, we begin the process.
  9. We send you a survey/questionnaire for you to complete with respect to the sizes, style, your shipping address, etc.
  10. We begin the sourcing, manufacturing and production processes.
  11. We start shipping out your rewards and await photos and feedback of your little angels in our fashion designs.

 

GOALS

$30K  - Congratulations! Can’t wait to see all your little angels in their new dresses       

$60K  - We will be asking our backers which new fabric they would like to see used.

We believe that listening to our backers is the best advice a company can use to ensure growth together.

$99K  - We will be asking our backers which new fabric they would like to see used, what seasonal theme and additional item they would like to see us offer next.

$250K – We are very excited to offer our next fashion line for both little girls and little boys with all new “Mommy and Me” and an all new “Daddy and Me” line.

 

SIZE CHARTS

                                        Girls Size 2T-6

 

                                            Women's Size 6-14

ESTIMATED SHIPPING TIMES

We estimate that from the finish date of the campaign we require 2 months for delivery. We do anticipate that we will have the rewards delivered earlier and we are going to try our best to have the rewards delivered for Christmas, however we will be in touch with our backers to keep them updated at all times on the shipping dates. 

YOUR HELP

We are manufacturing all these dresses ourselves, designing the styles, sourcing the material, and employing a cut a sew factory to create our product. The minimum quantity for these dresses is high and your pledge and support will go toward the purchase and production of this one of a kind product for little angels worldwide.

We would like to thank you for taking the time to read about our product, pledging our product and sharing our product with all your friends.

story:
Our Story

 

WITHOUT COMPROMISE.

Created by petites for petites, Her Muse was born out of a need for inclusive sizes without compromising ethics or aesthetics. Made in Canada, we prioritize quality and sustainability so you can look and feel good about your purchase decisions. The idea behind our brand is to foster a culture of inspiration—wherever you may find it.

Be your own muse... Or be hers.

 

Sustainability

Sustainability is at the forefront of our designs. We are conscious about every stage our pieces encounter, from design to delivery. We use eco-friendly materials throughout the entire process, from garment to thank you cards. (photos of hangtags, cards). Our materials are locally sourced whenever possible with the environment in mind. Each piece is tailor-made in a Canadian factory, ensuring the highest quality and ethical practices.

 

Design

Made by petites for petites, our designs are inclusive of all body types. Our timeless pieces make life easier by easily transitioning from day to night. Our unique built-in tummy control minimizes the need for shapewear, thus increasing comfort and maximizing convenience. As firm believers that sustainable should also be aesthetic, our process starts with transforming staple items into powerful and elegant investment pieces you can look and feel good about.

Shortened sleeves for tailored look

Double padded shoulders for structure

Deep pockets to hold your essentials

Soft feel

 

Elastic waistband for comfort

Shortened hems for tailored look

 

 

Built-in tummy control band (on all bottoms)

 

True bodycon fit

Wrinkle resistant

'

Seamless finish

 

Comfort

Look good, feel good—literally. Feel is a cornerstone of our design. Our materials are selected to be soft to the touch and flattering to the figure while meeting your technical needs. Our garments adapt to your body without digging in or slipping off so you have one less thing to worry about.


 

Indiegogo Price

 

Stretch Goals

 

 

Timeline

 

What Will We Do With the Funds?

After a year of research and development, we've designed 6 timeless pieces to meet all the needs of your daily life. All sustainable production materials have been sourced and prototypes are in its final stage. We have partnered with an all-female production team who have the same values to ensure everything is handled with care.

We're launching on Indiegogo as a pre-order with the slow fashion mindset. In order to reduce our carbon footprint, only materials required in production will be ordered. We're excited to embark on our journey of sustainable fashion with you. Select your reward now at the exclusive Indiegogo price!

 

Risks and Challenges

Production: There are a multitude of risks in apparel production. We've partnered with a local manufacturing team to minimize lead times. As two perfectionists, we have strict quality control in place and will not ship out a piece that has not passed our tests. We thank you in advance for your patience and kindness while we work through running a small business, given the current situation. Some delays may arise due to the changing restrictions and regulations, but we will keep you updated on a monthly basis.

Fit: We understand there is a risk to buying clothes online. We've selected materials with stretch to accommodate all body types. 

Sizing: We will gladly accept exchanges for the same pieces in a different size if they are unworn with tags on.
story_txt:
Our Story
 
WITHOUT COMPROMISE.
Created by petites for petites, Her Muse was born out of a need for inclusive sizes without compromising ethics or aesthetics. Made in Canada, we prioritize quality and sustainability so you can look and feel good about your purchase decisions. The idea behind our brand is to foster a culture of inspiration—wherever you may find it.
Be your own muse... Or be hers.

 
Sustainability
Sustainability is at the forefront of our designs. We are conscious about every stage our pieces encounter, from design to delivery. We use eco-friendly materials throughout the entire process, from garment to thank you cards. (photos of hangtags, cards). Our materials are locally sourced whenever possible with the environment in mind. Each piece is tailor-made in a Canadian factory, ensuring the highest quality and ethical practices.

 
Design
Made by petites for petites, our designs are inclusive of all body types. Our timeless pieces make life easier by easily transitioning from day to night. Our unique built-in tummy control minimizes the need for shapewear, thus increasing comfort and maximizing convenience. As firm believers that sustainable should also be aesthetic, our process starts with transforming staple items into powerful and elegant investment pieces you can look and feel good about.


Shortened sleeves for tailored look

Double padded shoulders for structure

Deep pockets to hold your essentials

Soft feel


 



Elastic waistband for comfort

Shortened hems for tailored look
 
 

Built-in tummy control band (on all bottoms)
 


True bodycon fit

Wrinkle resistant


'
Seamless finish



 
Comfort
Look good, feel good—literally. Feel is a cornerstone of our design. Our materials are selected to be soft to the touch and flattering to the figure while meeting your technical needs. Our garments adapt to your body without digging in or slipping off so you have one less thing to worry about.
 
Indiegogo Price

 
Stretch Goals

 
 
Timeline

 
What Will We Do With the Funds?
After a year of research and development, we've designed 6 timeless pieces to meet all the needs of your daily life. All sustainable production materials have been sourced and prototypes are in its final stage. We have partnered with an all-female production team who have the same values to ensure everything is handled with care.We're launching on Indiegogo as a pre-order with the slow fashion mindset. In order to reduce our carbon footprint, only materials required in production will be ordered. We're excited to embark on our journey of sustainable fashion with you. Select your reward now at the exclusive Indiegogo price!
 
Risks and Challenges
Production: There are a multitude of risks in apparel production. We've partnered with a local manufacturing team to minimize lead times. As two perfectionists, we have strict quality control in place and will not ship out a piece that has not passed our tests. We thank you in advance for your patience and kindness while we work through running a small business, given the current situation. Some delays may arise due to the changing restrictions and regulations, but we will keep you updated on a monthly basis.
Fit: We understand there is a risk to buying clothes online. We've selected materials with stretch to accommodate all body types. 
Sizing: We will gladly accept exchanges for the same pieces in a different size if they are unworn with tags on.

story:
This is our very first Cerakote Titanium Automatic Tourbillon watch.  After two years of development, we finally created a titanium case that we're happy with.  We wanted to create a Tourbillon in the best possible and most durable material which is titanium. We also wanted to keep it at a price point that would make it affordable.  We believe we were able to achieve our goals without sacrificing design, quality, and wearability.  Our main objective was to design a better version of a luxury watch and selling it directly to our customers at a lower price.  By doing this, we'll be able to provide a more personalized customer experience and better customer service.

 

For a more personalized touch in the new titanium cases, we decided to offer Cerakote ceramic coating in dynamic patterns.  Since every coating is hand applied, no two watches will be exactly the same thereby making each one unique.  Cerakote is a highly technical process allowing us to color our new titanium cases for this collection.  The more colors you use, the longer the process takes, and the harder it is to execute.  On average each hand finished Cerakote case takes 3 to 4 weeks from start to finish.

 

 

FEATURES of STRUMENTI NAUTICI TITANIUM TOURBILLON

 

  •  Strumenti Nautici Reference:  #SNT
  •  Movement:  Automatic Tourbillon movement, Caliber 3C40E.
  •  Functions:  Hours, minutes, Tourbillon, big date, AM/PM indicator, GMT 24 hours   indicator. 
  •  Features:  Bi-color step dial, solid case back, automatic Tourbillon movement, water   resistance up to 200M.  Final hand assembly and testing in the United States.
  •  Case:  46mm grade 2 Titanium.  Hand applied Cerakote finish in the USA.
  •  Crystal:  Anti-reflective sapphire crystal.
  •  Bracelet:  Canvas strap with leather backing.

     

Choose Your Favorite Strap Color

 

 

HIGHLIGHTS of STRUMENTI NAUTICI TITANIUM TOURBILLON

  • Movement:  Self winding automatic Tourbillon movement, caliber #3C40E.
  • Case:  Grade 2 Titanium case.  Hand applied Cerakote finish in the United States.
  • Functions:  Tourbillon, date, day and night indicator, 24 hour GMT indicator.  
  • Crystal:  Anti-reflective sapphire crystal.
  • Water Resistance:  660 Feet / 200 Meters / 20 Atmospheres
  • Assembly:  Final watch assembly and testing by certified watchmakers in the USA.
  • Warranty:  Limited two year warranty.

 

 

 

 

 

 


Each Strumenti Nautici Tourbillon Automatic watch will be hand assembled, tested, and inspected by our certified watchmakers in the United States.  In addition, our colorful Titanium cases will be Cerakoted and hand finished in the US.

 

ANATOMY of STRUMENTI NAUTICI TITANIUM TOURBILLON 

 

 

MOVEMENT for STRUMENTI NAUTICI TITANIUM TOURBILLON

  • Caliber:  #3C40E
  • Diameter:  Approximately 33mm
  • Height:  Approximately 8.8mm
  • Movement:  Automatic mechanical Tourbillon movement with 26 jewels
  • Functions:  Tourbillon, day/night indicator, GMT dual time indicator, big date
  • Power Reserve:  Approximately 30 - 40 hours, 28,800  oscillations per hour (4Hz)
  • Number of parts:  65 Individual parts in total
  • Hands:  Center mounted hour and minute hands, GMT hand
  • Movement Origin:  China
  • Assembly:  Final watch assembly and testing by certified watchmakers in the USA.
     

 

We tested several different types of Tourbillon movements before choosing the automatic Tourbillon caliber #3C40E.

 

 

The limited edition Strumenti Nautici Automatic Tourbillon will only be available in limited quantities of 100 pieces per color variation.  Each case will be individually numbered.

 

 

 

 

CASE for STRUMENTI NAUTICI TITANIUM TOURBILLON

We chose to use Titanium because it's around 30% stronger and around 40% lighter than steel. Combined with other metals to produce high performance alloys, Titanium is commonly used by the aerospace industry and military for its lightweight strength and ability to withstand extreme temperatures.
 

 

  • Diameter:  Approximately 46mm  
  • Height:  Approximately 15mm
  • Material:  Grade 2 Titanium with Cerakote coating finish
  • Crown:  Double crown seal
  • Crystal:  Flat sapphire glass coated with anti-glare.
  • Date Setter:  Quick change date setter located on the right side of the case around the 2 o'clock position.  3D printed pusher included.  The pusher is 3D printed in the United States.
  • Water Resistance:  Up to 20ATM / 200M / 660FT
     

 

 

CERAKOTE for STRUMENTI NAUTICI TITANIUM TOURBILLON

Cerakote is a process using ceramic and a polymer to create a coating that allows us to achieve the dynamic colors on our Titanium cases.  You'll have the option to choose between a single solid color or a two color combination of the shown examples in this project.

  • Solid grade 2 Titanium Cerakote engraved case back
  • Screw down case back
  • Individually numbered case back
     

 

 

 

 

 

WATER RESISTANCE of STRUMENTI NAUTICI TITANIUM TOURBILLON

The Strumenti Nautici Tourbillon is rated up to 20 ATM / 200 M / 660 FT which allows you to enjoy a variety of outdoor activities and water sports.
 

 

 

 

 

 

The Titanium Strumenti Nautici Automatic Tourbillon features a date setter on the right side of the case located around the 2 o'clock position.  This is great for quick changing the date without having to turn the hands for a full 24 hours until you reach the desired date.  We created and tested pin pushers in various lengths.  We found the short pin pushers work the best.  We 3D print our pin pushers in the United States and only print as many as we need.  Our unconventional pin pushers are more expensive and take longer to receive, however it allows us to cut down on waste.  It takes approximately 3 to 4 weeks to 3D print our pin pushers.
 

 

 

 

REWARDS with YOUR STRUMENTI NAUTICI TITANIUM TOURBILLON

Your color choice of either a solid Cerakote colored case or a two colored Cerakote case - red and black, black and white, yellow and white, blue and white.  You also have an option of titanium only without Cerakote.  Choose your case color at the end of the project.  Choose the strap color you want for your watch - red, black, or grey.


PRODUCTION and DELIVERY SCHEDULE
 

  • Late May 2020 - Campaign ends.
  • The next 20 days - Wait for the Indiegogo funds to clear.
  • Mid June 2020 - Schedule production and order materials.
  • Mid July 2020 - Production begins.
  • Mid November 2020 - Receive the components from the manufacturers.
  • First week of December 2020 - Inspection process.
  • Second week of December 2020 - Start assembly.
  • End of December 2020 - Indiegogoers should begin to receive and enjoy their new Strumenti Nautici Tourbillon.

 

 

 

 

Risks and challenges
 

We are very confident in the design and very happy with the team we chose.  The prototype versions we made have been tested and function as expected.  Changes might be made to the final version if necessary. 

 

Challenges
 

We need your support to successfully fund this project.  We will start the production promptly to ensure that we can fulfill all the orders within our estimated time frame.  Our schedule is allowing for some disruption due to the current events around the world.  There are always risks in life, but this project should be fairly straight forward.  We believe we have allowed plenty of time for the watches to be built and shipped out to you.  We believe communication is key so you will be kept updated with the progress of the project.

story:
SUBDELTA Periscope 39 & 42

You can now back the SUBDELTA 2016 Limited Edition: the Periscope. A 24-hour one-hand automatic watch. Rarely seen before! Handbuilt in the Netherlands. You can roughly tell the time, but can't boil an agg accurately. Who cares. Is it bonkers? Is it brilliant? You decide!

Press

  • Fratello Watches
  • Horloge.info (Dutch)
  • The Crowdfunding Centre
  • Disciples of  the Watch
  • Watch and Worn
  • Watchonista
  • Classy Life (Dutch)
  • Cory Grabow via Twitter
  • Divingstyle
  • Get Prismatic

Who's it for?

Get your hands on one of the very few Periscopes. It's our 2nd, handbuilt grade 5 titanium mechanical wristwatch and we will issue the Periscope as a 39 mm and 42 mm version. For him & her, for small & large wrists. It's a proper conversation starter and something completely different than you've had so far. Worldwide free shipping and 0% Dutch VAT for non-EU backers & EU companies.

About the Periscope

The Periscope derives from Holland's submarine heritage. Sailors aboard a Walrus submarine can't tell the difference between 4 o'clock in the morning and 4 o'clock in the afternoon. There's no daylight :-) They need to be able to read the time at a glance.

The single hand of the Periscope revolves only once a day and tells the time by the quarter of an hour. It takes no time at all to get used to this dial layout. This is a rather special watch, since there are few 24-hour watches on the market, let alone with only one hand and crosshair dial.

Who is SUBDELTA?

SUBDELTA handbuilt Dutch watches is Holland's latest microbrand. We are extremely passionate about wristwatches in general and in handcrafting them in very small numbers for watch lovers in particular. All is done manually by our watchmaker and strapmaker. We will fit only the very best materials, such as twin sapphire crystals w/ AR coating (front and back) and top-shelf automatic movements.

Former project: P1lot One

Some of you may know us from our previous watch, the non-profit P1lot One. This is a titanium handwound mechanical WW2 remake with a huge crown on the left side and topshelf specs. Only 52 copies were issues for Hollands' largest watchforum Horlogeforum.nl. One of the original P1lot One team members is now starting SUBDELTA, supplied by two other team members.

Our mission

What's our mission? Not to issue mainstream watches and/or style copies of famous watches. Why would be bother? We'll never equal them! No, we want to add something special to the watch industry. We only issue a maximum of 100 handbuilt titanium watches annually. They are very exclusive and can be personalised with initials in the leather strap and a special date engraved in the case (between the lower lugs).

Speclist Periscope 39 (42)

Dimensions: 39 (42) x 13 (14) mm
Lug sizes: lug-to-lug 49 (51) mm, 22 mm lug width (39 & 42 mm)
Main material: bead-blasted grade 5 titanium
Personalizations: initials in leather strap & personal date laser-engraved between the lower lugs
Movement: SUB 2624-1 (heavily modified Petrodvorets 2624) 24-hour one-hand, display caseback (screwed in), automatic and handwinding (bidirectional), 40 hours power reserve, 24 jewels ("rubis"), 18,000 revs/hour (5/second), -10+30 seconds/day (tested @ 6 positions).
Modifications: disabled minute and second axles, Côtes de Geneve, "dorage noir" (graphite finish), engraved and painted SUBDELTA logo on rotor
Dial: sandwich dial w/ DIN 30640 Grotesk numerals, indices (15/30/60 minutes) and crosshair, all filled with Swiss SuperLuminova
Crystals: synthetic sapphire crystal (front and back), 2 mm double-domed (front), 1.5 mm flat (back), AR coating on inside (front and back)
Crown: 10 x 4 mm, signed, screw-in type
Water resistance: 6 ATM (60 m)
Strap 1: handmade black leather strap by 7T2Straps.com (w/ 3 initials stamped in keeper) w/ grade 5 titanium buckle, in 3 sizes (image is brown prototype)


Strap 2: orange Isofrane "1968" w/ Retro Sicuro buckle, 1 size fits all

Strap changing tool: Bergeon 6767F
Packaging: black Nanuk 903 (IP67 rated waterproof) w/ laser-cutted custom foam interior

3D PDF

Please click here for our 3D PDF, you can rotate on your hard drive.

Planning

Designs: April 2015
Crowdfunding: May 15th - June 15th 2015
Technical drawings & production: June - November 2015
Quality control and testing: November 2015
Shipping: before Christmas 2015

2016 Limited Edition

We will annually make a maximum of 100 copies of stunning wristmachines like the Periscope. See also our Principles. Since we need all funds to buy the many pieces with a MOQ (Minimum Order Quantity), we won't make a physical prototype, but you can see our work with the P1lot One all over the interweb. You can trust us: we really know what we're doing and mean business. Just look at the predecessor, the P1lot One (www.p1lotone.nl).

Perks

We will list 80 copies of the Periscope (40 pieces of both the 39 mm and 42 mm versions) on this platform and the remaining 20 copies in our own webshop. For these 80 copies we need € 50,000 to get started. Both versions are available with EARLY BIRDS discounts in very limited numbers, so get yours now!

Our experience

Since we've made these kind of watches last year - the P1lot One - (and media and buyers are really happy with them), we're no new kids on the block at all.

Our watchmaker mr. Jan Binnendijk is a very experienced titanium wizard and has an eye for details. Our strapmaker mr. Remie Beijer is no novice too. He stitches all straps by hand and personalizes them with your initials. You've never seen handmade straps like this. Being experienced in issuing limited editions, we have been working very closely with our suppliers for some time now. Planning these kind of projects is not new to us.

Warranty

We offer a 2-year international warranty on all our watches and order 5% of the final production number extra in parts in case of valid warranty requests.

We need you!

Become one of the very few owners of a 39 or 42 mm SUBDELTA Periscope by backing this project. Only you can make it happen as part of an exclusive crowd. Thanks for backing, supporting & sharing!

We can't wait to get crackin'.

Note: pease select the right perk: we have a couple for EU and non-EU clients. This is very important, as 21% Dutch VAT is included (EU) or there is 0% VAT (non-EU).

Kind regards,

SUBDELTA handbuilt Dutch Watches

Hans de Ree - founder

Become one of the very few owners of a 39 or 42 mm SUBDELTA Periscope by backing this project. Only you can make it happen as part of an exclusive crowd. Thanks for backing, supporting & sharing!
We can't wait to get crackin'.
Note: pease select the right perk: we have a couple for EU and non-EU clients. This is very important, as 21% Dutch VAT is included (EU) or there is 0% VAT (non-EU).
Kind regards,
SUBDELTA handbuilt Dutch Watches
Hans de Ree - founder

story:
"Hello world, I am here and I am on my way to you!"  (by WO-FI)

Hi everyone, we are       

        Jure                  and Rok.      
      

As for the movie goes: "Dammit Jim, I am an engineer, not an actor!"

We are two young engineers from Slovenia, each specialised in its own field of study (Rok studied chemical engineering, and Jure studied geology). Our combined knowledge was enough to get us through most of the obstacles in the field and in the laboratory.

We would like to introduce our idea, in which we are trying to produce a 3D printing filament, that would have a high percentage of wood in it and would consist of only one wood type.

Nowadays, 3D printing is already knocking on your own front doors, it has become affordable to almost anybody. The eye to hand coordination is no longer needed, you don’t have to excel in sculpture or in carpentry. You only need to know how to get your idea from your head on to a computer, and 3D printing capabilities to extract it from your computer into reality. 

But (this may sound old to you) there is a catch. The filaments for the 3D printers are very expensive, the special hybrid ones in particular, but NOT WO-FI. It will be affordable for everyone. 

WO-FI (as we like to call it), stands for wood filament and is a new type of filament for 3D printing. It has the highest percentage of wood content on the world market, it is made entirely of one wood type (example: pine, spruce, beech) It is biodegradable, recyclable and above all, environmental friendly!


FEATURES 

(Why should you choose WO-FI?)


Highest wood % on the market

Biodegradable

Recyclable


Different wood types are used (would you like some pine with that oak, Sir?)


Different colour according to the printing temperature


(Note that the colours on the Chart are not the ones you get during printing)

No odour



IN DEPTH ANALYSIS

(get to know WO-FI quite a bit better)


WOOD CONTENT

Our goal was to create a filament for 3D printing with high percentage of wood content. As you know, the highest nowadays wood filaments made by others have reached a good 38 % of wood content. But our formula is better – we have reached a 50% wood content! The other half consist of a mixture of biopolymers.

TESTING PROCEDURE

When trying to come up with a new mixture for 3D printing filament, a lot of different parameters were had to be taken into consideration. 

Step by step, we established a testing protocol, which every wood type had and will have to pass in order to be even considered for a later test extrusion. 

We tested the temperature responsiveness of wood types themselves, the interaction of wood, the lignin inside the wood, and the added bio adhesives, all according to different temperature changes. Than we tested the wood type’s interaction with PLA and other bio polymers as a function of temperature, and the material’s durability was tested before and after each test. 

BIODEGRADABLE

Those biopolymers are 100% biodegradable, naturally that goes for the wooden part of the filament as well. The tests of biodegradability and recyclability were conducted in controlled laboratory environment - respirometer (controlled air temperature, humidity and atmospheric pressure) under changing boundary conditions. The product will decay in 60-90 days when exposed to the right outdoor conditions. So don’t make any support beams for your shed with it, or you may find your roof on the ground in a month or so. 

COLOUR CHANGE/TEMPERATURE

When doing our lab experiments, we were already aware, that certain types of filament change their colour due to temperature of printing. We were however surprised, when we found out, that this mixture of biopolymers and wood reacts consistently with the right temperature.

In other words, the colour stays the same when the extruder head’s temperature does not deviate too much. So, want to print in different colour with the same filament? Choose WO-FI!

COMPATIBILITY

The mixture that is latter used in our filament was carefully chosen, so that the characteristics of the filament would not differ too much from the existing ones on the market. We wanted to create something new, but still compatible with most 3D printers – meaning, that the diameter will be set at 1,75 mm, and that the printing temperatures will be set at 170° C to 210°C. The filament will come in 0,5 kg and 1 kg variety, so that you can test it first completely before moving on and buying a larger filament more suitable for you needs. The first prototype was tested on multiple 3D printers, and the results were encouraging.

      

NO ODOUR

Due to the biopolymers non existing smell, the only odour during printing is the wood’s one. So, remember those pine tree air-fresheners you like to keep in your car? Did you like something like that? Choose WO-FI!

FIRST TESTED PRODUCT

The first product is out now, and it is currently on its way to get the CE certification approval. The first tree, that contributed its wood to our research, was a spruce. We have successfully merged the spruce’s pre-grinded saw dust with the biopolymers, and the results are in front of you:


The filament is 1, 75 mm in diameter, so it can be used on variety of 3D printers on the market. Its operating temperature is between 170-210°. 


WHAT DO WE NEED? vs WHAT DO YOU GET?

 

At this moment, the only thing we require is an industrial extruder, with a double mixing input option, with which we can start to mass produce our filament. Such extruder is essential for our needs, because it will provide us with the capability of precise control of the mixing procedure. 

Ofcourse some of the founding will be spent on the transport costs for the extruder to get to us, and the installation procedure, but overall, no additional cost are predicted for the raw materials needed for the filament, for we already have those at our disposal. 

What are you going to get from our venture?

Nothing more and nothing less than a complete 3D printing experience. Sure, you need a 3D printer for this, and some basic knowledge on how to operate it, but as for the filament goes, leave that to us.

Our perks consist mainly of huge discounts when buying our filament, but don't miss out on the cool promotional material too.

Examples - Keyring with logo 

          

or a T shirt with logo (there will be more colours available later on, check for updates):


We are predicting issues with the new types of filament, which has never before been tested, but we have succeeded with one wood type, so we are very optimistic on tackling the next challenge. Our team consist of engineers from every branch needed to cope with any problems thrown our way. 

What ever problems we had with the first one, we already know how to overcome them, so there shouldn't be any major setbacks heading our way. 

We have the know how, the raw resources needed and the will do go on a larger scale production, there is just this one piece of equipment missing. Please help us get it and allow us to share this wonderful new product with you.  

Similar products?

We know there are more similar products on the market, and some will say that WO-FI is not a new product, and we’d like to clarify this. 

WO-FI may not be a NEW IDEA of a product, but it is an ENHANCED one! The wood content in other filaments is way lover than in WO-FI. So, would you like to print with PLA plastic that looks like wood, or do you want to print with wood, which uses plastic as “mortar”? 


WISH TO HELP OUT IN OTHER WAYS?

If you like our project but you can't contribute, please consider sharing it via E-Mail, Facebook or other social media with your friends and family. This will help us a lot to spread the word!

Thank you in advance!

WHO IS TALKING ABOUT US?


Shipping cost (Regular international post): Pay with your contribution to receive your items:

Rank 1:

  • Internal shipping in Slovenia: 5 EUR
  • European countries inside the European union : 19 EUR
  • European countries outside the EU:  20 EUR
  • USA & Canada: 40 EUR
  • Other countries: 40 EUR
Rank 2:
  • Internal shipping in Slovenia: 7 EUR
  • European  countries inside the European union: 28 EUR
  • European countries outside the EU:  30 EUR
  • USA & Canada: 50 EUR
  • Other countries: 50 EUR
Rank 3:
  • Internal shipping in Slovenia: 11 EUR
  • European Countries inside the European union: 40 EUR
  • European countries outside the EU:  42 EUR
  • USA & Canada: 60 EUR
  • Other countries: 60 EUR
Tracking of shipment is possible, contact us via e-mail for the tracking code!
Important tips:
Be advised, in some countries you may be subjected to customs inspection and payment of additional tax. Contact your customs administration to check if your package could get submitted to examination. 
For people donating via Paypal we would like to make clear, that we will not be able to deliver the perks within the 30 days deadline as per usual on Paypal. Our estimated dates of delivery are listed with the perks themselves.
We have decided to send shipments via regular post, due to the nature of this campaign and the unlimited shelf time of our product. Later on, we will send packages via UPS, DHL and TNT regularly.

Need more information?

If you have any question or concern, please contact us on email at hnr.wofi@gmail.com and we will answer as soon as possible!


"Give wood a second chance!"


Your H'nR Team

story:
The bag you have needed your whole life!

How many times have you wished you could bring lunch or a snack to an unrefrigerated situation like work, school, business meeting, running errands, kid’s sports practice or all day event... the list goes on. Bringing an extra insulated lunch bag is not only inconvenient, but it is also not very fashionable!!

Problem solved:

ISOLARÉ bags are high quality, fashion-forward handbags that all have a secret insulated compartment where you can stash your healthy snacks so that no matter where you end up in your day, you will be prepared. You can truly grab and go, avoid the blood sugar melt-down, stay focused, stay on your diet, or even sneak your treats into the movie theatre! Not only is the compartment insulated, it is completely isolated so you can store items that you don’t want to co-mingle with the rest of your purse contents:

  • Isolate your makeup and cosmetics from the rest of your purse
  • Prevent candy or protein bars that are covered in chocolate from melting
  • Take your leftovers from the restaurant without worrying about spilling in your purse or having to “carry the box”
  • Grab a snack or meal for later when you are in a place where you won’t have a chance to buy food
  • Bring healthy choices to the movie theatre
  • Stick to your diet by making it easy to pack food from home
  • A place to stick your kid’s (or your own) retainer or another gross thing that you don’t want in your purse!
  • Cut down on one of the many bags you need for your day!

A perk for each style:

We have picked 10 trending designs that run the gamut from satchels, back packs, and totes. Help us understand what styles you like the best. Vote with your perk selection!

NATASHA SATCHEL
Available in 2 colors. Click to see more views, dimensions, and materials

GABRIELE CROSSBODY
Available in 3 colors. Click to see more views, dimensions, and materials

SIENNA SATCHEL
Available in 3 colors. Click to see more views, dimensions, and materials

MIA HOBO

Available in Ivory. Click to see more views, dimensions, and materials

JULIET SATCHEL
Available in 2 colors. Click to see more views, dimensions, and materials

LUCA TOTE
Available in 2 colors. Click to see more views, dimensions, and materials

GIA BACKPACK
Available in black. Click to see more views, dimensions, and materials

BEATRIX BACKPACK
Available in 3 colors. Click to see more views, dimensions, and materials

CAMILLA SATCHEL
Available in black. Click to see more views, dimensions, and materials

SOPHIA BACKPACK
Available in 2 colors. Click to see more views, dimensions, and materials

Giving back:

5% of each bag we sell will go toward a cause that enriches the community. Our current recipient is Eastside Academy, a non-profit, alternative high school who’s mission is inspiring change in the lives of at-risk youth through high school education, counseling, recovery, housing, and life skills programs.

A note from Dave on why this cause is so important to us:

I have been serving as a mentor for Eastside Academy since 2014. In this time I have had the pleasure to meet 2 amazing kids. One young man has already gone off to college and one is about to make that journey. Without this program, I am not sure this future would have been their reality. Having seen the transforming power of this school, I decided this past year to also join the board to ensure the schools' trajectory, to never deny a student access to the programs and to plant new schools. Eastside Academy is making the marginalized count and with your purchase you will be part of that success!

Manufacturing Compliance:

A note from Dave - I have been supervising production in China now for 11 years. I have perfected the art of “21 questions” to get to the truth. I will be personally inspecting the manufacturing of these bags to achieve the highest quality and to also make sure they are produced in a safe environment for the workers and that they are paid according to the law. Social responsibility and factory compliance requirements are very important to me and Liz and we will do our best to deliver a high quality and socially responsible product to our customers.

Our business goals:

  • Our ecommerce website is up and ready to go. You contribution will be helping us build out distribution channels so that we can manage online orders and accommodate larger orders through retail channels.
  • Brand awareness and other marketing recourses
  • New designs and development. This is the tip of the iceberg for styles. We have big plans to grow the line into many more styles, and product offerings

About Us

Dave Mason – Operations, Procurement, Compliance

After 10 years working with software, I was bored. I took a break, got my MBA, and decided I wanted to learn how to make things, all sorts of things…from Starbucks aprons, to FDA approved medical devices, to tablet computers…and that’s just what I did. The next 11 years, I experienced countless visits to China and other countries around the world (all while eating things you couldn’t imagine!), sourcing safe and reliable factories and manufacturers for major brands, discovering my passion. I love making products for people that you can touch, test, smell and fall in love with.

The next step in this evolution, was to find partners to make my own products instead of doing it for the big boys. Fortunately, I found Liz, who complements me in the things I lack. I will be making these purses with the highest quality in mind and done in a safe working environment. I know this because I will be there on the line when we make these purses. I hope you enjoy them as much as I love making them, and I hope to hear from you.

Liz Fitzwater – Design, Marketing, Product Development

Before college I worked in retail. I loved everything about the signage, merchandising, the products and the shopping experience. So much so, that I went to school for graphic design so that I could be a part of the retail industry. I went on to create, products, packaging, promotions and displays, for major brands like Starbucks, Microsoft, Unilever and many more. After 13 years I started my own design business that focuses on all things retail.

Much like Dave, I am passionate about bringing great products to the hands of consumers. When we came together to pursue this idea, I knew instantly this will be a big hit and can’t wait to get these purses in the hands of women everywhere. We can take this brand to so many cool places and can’t wait to continue to grow.

Other Ways You Can Help:

Even if you can't contribute we would appreciate if you would help us tell the worlds about our products! We know there is someone in your life who you have thought this would be a perfect fit for.

We are also welcoming any feedback on what you think of the idea, the style offerings, the price points, etc. If you have a moment click here to submit your feedback.

WE CAN'T THANK YOU ENOUGH!

story:
Pet tags are one piece of technology that has not kept up with the times. Decades ago, we were carving our pets’ names and our addresses into pieces of metal and hanging them on loops, and here in the year 2017, not much has changed. Now, however, our team is ready to give this technology a modern touch and make it more powerful than ever before.


It’s called the MoPet Pet Locator. Using QR codes, NFC or Website, anyone can locate a pet by simply scanning the MoPet Pet Locator with a smartphone. This way, you never need to worry about the words on the tag being scratched off or wearing away with time. The MoPet Pet Locator is a reliable and economic method for keeping track of your pet worldwide anywhere any time, incorporating smart technology with a classic concept, ready for weather conditions like water resistant. The video explains it all.

 

 

One advantage of MoPet devices is that, in case of loss of your pet, the person will find several alternatives to access all contact information and alert you that they found your dog or any other animal.

For example, if you have a Smartphone you can access it by scanning the QR code or NFC. Another advantage is that by the time someone access to that information, and before who found it to contact you, you will receive a message with the exact place where your pet is. Impressed by the speed with which it works and, above all, precision geolocation system.

The Pendant in different colours Pink, Blue, Brown, Orange and Green

 

 

The Back of the package!

 

Right now, we have come to you on Indiegogo, for help raising $45,000. These funds will cover the costs of manufacturing, marketing, and distributing the initial run of MoPet Pet Locators. As a thank-you, we plan on selling the first run of MoPet Pet Locators at a discount to everyone who contributes to this campaign. We donate $2.50 of every sale to an animal charity. Find out more about MoPet.

We donate $2.50 of every sale to an animal charity.

The MoPet Pet Locator is going to dramatically reduce the amount of time that people spend on locating their missing pets and prevent the types of tragic situations that come about when traditional pet tags fail to do what they have been designed to do. This is a pet tag with all the benefits on smart, 21st-century technology.

We take very seriously the responsibility of getting this product right. Knowing that people will be relying on the MoPet Pet Locator WORLDWIDE to keep track of their beloved animals, we are taking our time developing this product so that everything is functioning perfectly when the time comes to launch. Whatever challenges may arise, we are prepared to face them and see that this tag lives up to the expectations before it.

In addition to making a monetary contribution, you can help us by sharing our campaign with all your friends and family. Go ahead and post the campaign URL on Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest, and any other social media platforms you use. The more people know about this campaign, especially people who own pets, the smoother the launch will go.
We appreciate all contributions, monetary and otherwise, and we thank you sincerely for your time.
