story:
SUPERGEAR Brand Boxers "pack a punch" through innovative designs, graphic styles, and through the SUPER movement.  Grab your pair today!



SUPERGEAR Brand Boxers is a men's premium underwear brand that features all over prints, stylish and fashion forward patterns as well as classic, timeless basics. You'll look awesome in our prints and feel comfortable every day in a pair of SUPERGEAR's. These boxers are form fitting, and are made from the best and classic materials.  The campaign will also feature a series of men's and women's logo t-shirts, and our conceptual design collection called VISION by SUPERGEAR.

Every purchase packs a punch as a portion of each sale will be donated to select charitable organizations that bring awareness to men’s health issues, depression, fight cancers below the waist, and punch out global poverty.  We encourage everyone to Be One Be SUPER!


SUPERGEAR has collaborated with a lovable character Sam Smashington, to bring you a series of boxers inspired by his sartorial style. These boxers feature "smashing" designs that are sure to give any wardrobe some much-needed pizzazz! Sam Smashington x SUPERGEAR designs will be available for voting and are limited to this campaign!



SUPERGEAR Boxers "pack a punch" through our Be One Be SUPER movement!  For every pair sold we will donate 10% of profits to select charitable organizations.  SUPERGEAR is proud to support great organizations, such as Movember, Canadian Men's Health Foundation and their Don't Chance Much social movement, Save the Children, and Feed the Children.
 
Follow and share the movement @supergearbrand #supergearbrand #BeOneBeSUPER #SupergearAndChill


Everyone is welcome to take our pre-poll to vote on the top themes available to all backers.  Campaign backers will get to unlock the final boxers designs and styles (to be revealed below) that get crafted and shipped in the New Year.  Everyone will receive an awesome pair of boxers no matter what styles are chosen.
Featured styles: solid colors, stripes, camo, galaxy prints, geometrics and more!  The default boxers design will be our signature red colorway in stripes.










It will take approx. 2-3 months to make and ship all boxers and t-shirts.  They will arrive in the New Year.  Those who only purchase t-shirts can receive their items much earlier than the boxers' expected shipping date.  We are closely working with select suppliers to achieve a great product.

Stretch Goals “ranges” depend on the voted style and our production methods. For the solid designs, we will be using a fabric dying method, which requires a higher production quantity, while our more graphic styles can utilize a screen printing process.  The designs will decide the production method that would be most suitable and efficient without losing quality.  

We will need to develop shipping and/or product packaging for the boxers and t-shirts, which is another reason for the stretch goals “ranges” as packaging designs can vary in price.

We currently ship designer fashion and accessories across the globe (Canada, USA, South America, Mexico, Europe, parts of Asia, Australia and New Zealand) and have an excellent relationship with Canada Post.  We may utilize an external shipping and logistics company if it's a feasible option.

Together with your help and support we will be able to bring this project to life, craft and ship awesome boxers and t-shirts, and help change many lives.


• Continue to support and donate to a variety of charitable organizations that fight cancers below the waist, and change the lives of children in need.  #BeOneBeSUPER

• Become a complete brand with more styles and expand into other categories, but in the meantime we’re all about boxers!

• Take on and collaborate with other designers (especially amazing local and upcoming talent) for future seasons.

• Host a boxers design contest and feature your designs in our upcoming collections!


How will the voting process work?

The “Themes and Styles Poll” is open to all visitors of Indiegogo (and will be on for about 10 days).  You can make your decision based on what you like visually or what sounds cool to you!  There will only be a few themes and collections to choose from but each theme has several designs and colorways to be voted on by campaign backers!  This process allows us to focus on the top themes and reveal the best designs within them.


What happens after the theme voting ends?

You can vote on your favourite styles! (Poll is exclusive to campaign backers and will be active for 20-30 days until we announce the final styles in our Stretch Goals section).


How will the Stretch Goals work?

Our Stretch Goals will feature the top styles voted by you and would remain unlocked until we can reach each target.  We would love to unlock as many styles as possible, as long as there's enough demand for each style.  Everyone will receive an awesome pair of boxers no matter what styles are chosen.

The main campaign goal would cover everything from the first style unlock, manufacturing costs for boxers and t-shirts, freight, customs, packaging, tags, labels, Indie and PayPal fees.


What other products or goodies will be shipped as the Stretch Goals are unlocked?

We are looking into branded product packaging and shipping packaging, clothing tags, stickers and other free stuff to ship with your boxers and tees!  We’ll update the campaign page as we go along.


How can I customize my order (e.g.: order more than one EARLY BIRD pair?)

We have included additional rewards for three, four, five and seven pairs.  See additional details " * " for adding a pair of boxers or t-shirt.  

Please note that our minimum for Free Shipping within Canada and USA is $75 (CAD).  If your custom order exceeds $75 but your perk automatically adds shipping, simply add the difference for the items you wish to purchase.

You can message us to arrange a more customized order but use the available rewards if possible.  Reach us at contact@supergearbrand.com with the subject "Custom order".  

Early Bird perks are limited so be sure to act fast!


How do I choose my size, color or style?  When will our boxers and t-shirts see production and manufacturing?  

Once the campaign ends, we will have order forms ready for you to input your shipping information, shout-out info (if your perk includes a bonus!), style selection, and your underwear/t-shirt size.

Once all the forms have been submitted, we can start creating your boxers and tees!


When will I receive my boxers and t-shirts?

It will take approx. 2-3 months to make and ship all boxers and t-shirts.  Those who only purchase t-shirts can receive their items much earlier than the boxers' expected shipping date

What is the underlying message of "Be One Be SUPER"?

The SUPERGEAR brand encompasses the core values of being Supportive, Understanding, Present (and Persistent) Empowering and Respectful.

Be SUPER!


I may not be able to contribute right now but I love the SUPERGEAR brand. How can I help out?

We really appreciate your love and support for SUPERGEAR.  Any help in getting the word out about the brand will be much appreciated.  You can tweet about the campaign, share the campaign link with friends and family, pin our t-shirt designs on Pinterest, like, share and subscribe to our YouTube channel, and use the Indiegogo share tools!


Big thanks to SUPERGEAR's brand shapers and influencers! 

Geoff Major, Vincenzo, Genius Bones, Focal Essence


Be sure to follow us and share our crowdfunding campaign!

Twitter @supergearbrand  |  YouTube @SUPERGEAR BRAND

#SupergearBrand #BeOneBeSUPER #BeSUPER #SupergearAndChill


Discover the brand on www.supergearbrand.com

View all current collections on SUPERGEAR Brand Clothing

Find your name on our SUPER WALL!

SUPERGEAR Themes and Styles Poll is open to all visitors of Indiegogo.  Vote now!

story:
The TC-9 Diver is a divers watch that is built to last and is seriously robust.   It has a unique curved case back that is designed to fit the curve of your wrist and make the watch more comfortable to wear and less likely to hang off the end of your wrists.     This watch is $150 for this campaign, and that must make it the best value Divers watch ever if you consider what you get...

Seiko NH35a Automatic Movement.  Rated to last 20 years before it needs a service and a virtually bullet proof time instrument that will not let you down and is powered  by your own movement.

A 42mm case, with curved case back, forged from 316L stainless steel.  This case is beautiful and is so tough even its own nightmares are scared of it.

1000 feet water resistance.   This watch will go as deep as you can dive in the water with no problems.

Armoured saphire crystal.   As hard as a rock and almost impossible to scratch with a double layer of Anti Reflective coating to make sure its always legible.

Super luminious dial that burns bright well after the sun goes down

Very high quality Shark Mesh strap that looks in 316 stainless steel

2 bezel inserts.  one classic and one GMT.

1 year international warranty

Free Rubber strap







second fee bezel insert 



And here is the side view of the case.   Much slimer and more elegant than its rivals with a beautiful curved shape that allows the watch to wrap round your wrist and makes it fit like a glove.   This is a very comfortable watch for such a robust instrument. We dont think you will find another case as refined as this in this price bracket.



some more photos




the free rubber strap


free rubber bracelet



Most Micro branded watches using the seiko nh35a movement retail at $350 to  $500.   The launch price on indiegogo for the TC-9 Diver is $150!   if the project is successful it will retail at $400 and will never be available at this price again.

also included is a free gift of a rubber vintage style divers strap worth $30.

TC-9 watches is an independent watch business based in Basel, Switzerland, the home of watchmaking.  We strive to bring new watch designs to market that offer unique design features and incredible value.  Our watches, once launched, are all available for sale in a store fronted Watchmakers in Basel and can be viewed there.  Our quality control and warranty is all undertaken by a Swiss Master Watchmaker.  Please view are website and facebook page to see all our creations.

story:
In the market for a Good Looking Sneaker?

CALL OFF THE SEARCH, here comes POZ.

A plant-based, cruelty free sneaker, that is ultra-light – light on your feet and light on the planet.   

 

 

We are Po-Zu and we make sustainable ethical footwear. POZ is our greatest sneaker yet. Why? Because it is made from Cactus and Sugarcane, two renewable resources, grown organically in abundance, and processed without chemicals and nasties, no fossil fuels required. Our sneakers are plant based, 100% vegan and 100% solvent free. 

 

 

Cactus leather represents a phenomenal breakthrough for the fashion industry. Until now, alternatives to leather contained large amounts of plastic, to make them durable and increase their strength and wearability. To make them behave more like real leather. Cactus leather is a cruelty-free sustainable alternative, without any toxic chemicals, phthalates or PVC and contains only a small amount of recycled plastic within its formula.  

 

 

Our sole is made from an innovative bio based EVA resin, derived from Sugarcane, a fully renewable resource that grows quickly, and removes CO2 from the air, reducing greenhouse gas emissions and naturally cleansing our environment. Along with these attractive sustainability credentials, a key characteristic of bio-EVA is it’s lightness, and the ability to be flexible and resistant.

 

 

Until now, athletic shoes have been made using petroleum based EVA (ethylene vinyl acetate) which will eventually end up in landfill, and can take up to 1,000 years to decompose. This bio-based EVA is a significant advance for the industry, and the world’s first carbon negative EVA polymer.

 

HELP US MAKE THE CHANGE.  Let’s swap out carbon positive materials for carbon negative. Let’s go plant based. Cactus and Sugarcane never looked so good!

 

 

Options?  We have colour options! 

Our POZ Sneaker is available in off white or black with the pause symbol embroidered on the tongue and heel, in a select number of colours for added pop. Choose your 'PAUSE' colour  - available in Off White, Yellow, Green, Black, Silver, Pink, Blue, and Sand on the Off White sneaker and available in Off White or Black on the Black sneaker and boot style.  

 

 

Pre-order today to secure your discount, and take your time to decide on the size and colour. We will email you after the campaign ends to collect your choices, several weeks before shipping.  These colours come at no extra cost and are available to all campaign backers, and each pair of sneakers comes with an additional pair of printed laces. 

 

 

We also have a LIMITED EDITION POZ sneaker with an embroidered green cactus on the side, and matching pause symbols in green on the tongue and heel.    

 

WE NEED YOUR HELP! To take this project to the next level. 

Why POZ matters. Why you need this!

We have been making sustainable footwear for 14 years. When we started out we were pioneering, learning from the ground up. Well, we are still learning and advancing because sustainability is an on-going journey. We have proven that it is possible to make great shoes, that are stylish and comfortable, while showing love for our planet and its people.  

 

Change is inevitable and now, necessary.

While the threat of climate change marches on, we cannot continue to do things the way they’ve always been done. As renewable materials evolve, and techniques and processes improve, we can look to the natural world, and choose plant based options over fossil fuelled ones, and reduce our carbon footprint, reduce water waste, pollution and the use of toxic chemicals and pesticides. We can make everything better, every step of the way.

 

Exceptional Performance From The Natural World

Natural Insoles - Our insoles are made from Natural Latex and Cork, truly natural and renewable resources, that are low impact. Cork has excellent insulation and shock absorbing properties and is grown locally to our factory in Portugal.

Cotton Laces - Our laces are made from GOTS certified Organic Cotton that is hard wearing and low maintenance. Even the aglets are biodegradable and 100% vegan. Each pair of POZ sneakers comes with x2 pairs of laces, one plain, one printed.

Water-Based Adhesive - As a company we have a strict solvent-free policy and only work with water-based adhesives. Not only strong and hardwearing, they are sustainable and kind to the environment and the factory workers. To provide greater durability, the shoes are also stitched to the soles.

Ethical Manufacturing - Our POZ sneaker and boots are made in Portugal in a small family owned factory that we have worked with for many years. We only work with manufacturers that adhere to our Supplier Code of Practice, outlining the expectations for each supplier regarding labour and human rights, health and safety, environmental protection, ethics and management practices.  Our factory in Portugal is committed to ethical manufacturing, has a strict non-toxic policy, and recycles any waste products, including fabric off-cuts and water.

Eco Friendly Packaging - Our shoeboxes are made from FSC certified recycled material, and are fully recyclable.

 

 

Be part of the solution, and step forward with us.

Back our project and wear POZ as a symbol of hope and all that is possible. Take pride in the knowledge that through your commitment to these shoes, the unique material composition and manufacturing choices made, you have respected both the people and the planet, and contributed towards sustainable advancement.

 

We are proud to support Fashion Revolution.

Fashion Revolution is a global movement of fashion industry people campaigning for positive change and transparency. We will donate £5 GBP ($6.50 US$/ €5.50 EUR) from the sale of every pair of POZ sneakers and boots to the Fashion Revolution Foundation, to help them drive Cultural, Industry and Policy Change within the fashion industry.

 

 

How to FIND THE RIGHT SIZE?

Let's talk SHIPPING

Where we ship - We are able to ship worldwide. Please see perks for details on the shipping cost that applies to you.

When we ship - We plan to ship in March 2021. We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order.

Why order now? - By backing the campaign now, you will save money. You’ll also own one of the very first pairs off the production line, plus the chance to provide valuable feedback that will shape future generations of the product.

 

Let's talk RETURN/REFUND POLICY

We offer a 30 Day Money Back Guarantee on our footwear. Please note that the sneakers/boots have to be unworn and in an original state and the return shipping cost is paid by the customer. We do not offer returns on any other perks, only footwear.

You can request a refund from Indiegogo within 10 days of placing your order, while the campaign is still running. Eligible refund requests are handled directly by Indiegogo and can be requested through your confirmation email. During the campaign: please refer to Indiegogo's policy HERE.

If you want to request a return or refund after the campaign has ended, but before your shoes are delivered, please contact us directly at contact@po-zu.com and we will assist you. 

Let's talk TIMELINE 

WE NEED YOUR HELP to spread the word 

So if you like what you're seeing, will you help us? Just 30 seconds of your time could make the difference in growing the community. Follow us on Twitter and Instagram @timetopoz, and tag your family, friends, or co-workers who you think need these. The more people who know about us, the larger our community will become! And the larger the community, the better we will be able to make the product!
story_txt: In the market for a Good Looking Sneaker?CALL OFF THE SEARCH, here comes POZ.A plant-based, cruelty free sneaker, that is ultra-light – light on your feet and light on the planet.     We are Po-Zu and we make sustainable ethical footwear. POZ is our greatest sneaker yet. Why? Because it is made from Cactus and Sugarcane, two renewable resources, grown organically in abundance, and processed without chemicals and nasties, no fossil fuels required. Our sneakers are plant based, 100% vegan and 100% solvent free.   Cactus leather represents a phenomenal breakthrough for the fashion industry. Until now, alternatives to leather contained large amounts of plastic, to make them durable and increase their strength and wearability. To make them behave more like real leather. Cactus leather is a cruelty-free sustainable alternative, without any toxic chemicals, phthalates or PVC and contains only a small amount of recycled plastic within its formula.    Our sole is made from an innovative bio based EVA resin, derived from Sugarcane, a fully renewable resource that grows quickly, and removes CO2 from the air, reducing greenhouse gas emissions and naturally cleansing our environment. Along with these attractive sustainability credentials, a key characteristic of bio-EVA is it’s lightness, and the ability to be flexible and resistant.  Until now, athletic shoes have been made using petroleum based EVA (ethylene vinyl acetate) which will eventually end up in landfill, and can take up to 1,000 years to decompose. This bio-based EVA is a significant advance for the industry, and the world’s first carbon negative EVA polymer. HELP US MAKE THE CHANGE.  Let’s swap out carbon positive materials for carbon negative. Let’s go plant based. Cactus and Sugarcane never looked so good!  Options?  We have colour options! Our POZ Sneaker is available in off white or black with the pause symbol embroidered on the tongue and heel, in a select number of colours for added pop. Choose your 'PAUSE' colour  - available in Off White, Yellow, Green, Black, Silver, Pink, Blue, and Sand on the Off White sneaker and available in Off White or Black on the Black sneaker and boot style.    Pre-order today to secure your discount, and take your time to decide on the size and colour. We will email you after the campaign ends to collect your choices, several weeks before shipping.  These colours come at no extra cost and are available to all campaign backers, and each pair of sneakers comes with an additional pair of printed laces.   We also have a LIMITED EDITION POZ sneaker with an embroidered green cactus on the side, and matching pause symbols in green on the tongue and heel.     WE NEED YOUR HELP! To take this project to the next level. Why POZ matters. Why you need this!We have been making sustainable footwear for 14 years. When we started out we were pioneering, learning from the ground up. Well, we are still learning and advancing because sustainability is an on-going journey. We have proven that it is possible to make great shoes, that are stylish and comfortable, while showing love for our planet and its people.   Change is inevitable and now, necessary.While the threat of climate change marches on, we cannot continue to do things the way they’ve always been done. As renewable materials evolve, and techniques and processes improve, we can look to the natural world, and choose plant based options over fossil fuelled ones, and reduce our carbon footprint, reduce water waste, pollution and the use of toxic chemicals and pesticides. We can make everything better, every step of the way. Exceptional Performance From The Natural World Natural Insoles - Our insoles are made from Natural Latex and Cork, truly natural and renewable resources, that are low impact. Cork has excellent insulation and shock absorbing properties and is grown locally to our factory in Portugal.Cotton Laces - Our laces are made from GOTS certified Organic Cotton that is hard wearing and low maintenance. Even the aglets are biodegradable and 100% vegan. Each pair of POZ sneakers comes with x2 pairs of laces, one plain, one printed.Water-Based Adhesive - As a company we have a strict solvent-free policy and only work with water-based adhesives. Not only strong and hardwearing, they are sustainable and kind to the environment and the factory workers. To provide greater durability, the shoes are also stitched to the soles.Ethical Manufacturing - Our POZ sneaker and boots are made in Portugal in a small family owned factory that we have worked with for many years. We only work with manufacturers that adhere to our Supplier Code of Practice, outlining the expectations for each supplier regarding labour and human rights, health and safety, environmental protection, ethics and management practices.  Our factory in Portugal is committed to ethical manufacturing, has a strict non-toxic policy, and recycles any waste products, including fabric off-cuts and water.Eco Friendly Packaging - Our shoeboxes are made from FSC certified recycled material, and are fully recyclable.  Be part of the solution, and step forward with us.Back our project and wear POZ as a symbol of hope and all that is possible. Take pride in the knowledge that through your commitment to these shoes, the unique material composition and manufacturing choices made, you have respected both the people and the planet, and contributed towards sustainable advancement. We are proud to support Fashion Revolution. Fashion Revolution is a global movement of fashion industry people campaigning for positive change and transparency. We will donate £5 GBP ($6.50 US$/ €5.50 EUR) from the sale of every pair of POZ sneakers and boots to the Fashion Revolution Foundation, to help them drive Cultural, Industry and Policy Change within the fashion industry.  How to FIND THE RIGHT SIZE?Let's talk SHIPPINGWhere we ship - We are able to ship worldwide. Please see perks for details on the shipping cost that applies to you.When we ship - We plan to ship in March 2021. We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order.Why order now? - By backing the campaign now, you will save money. You’ll also own one of the very first pairs off the production line, plus the chance to provide valuable feedback that will shape future generations of the product. Let's talk RETURN/REFUND POLICYWe offer a 30 Day Money Back Guarantee on our footwear. Please note that the sneakers/boots have to be unworn and in an original state and the return shipping cost is paid by the customer. We do not offer returns on any other perks, only footwear.You can request a refund from Indiegogo within 10 days of placing your order, while the campaign is still running. Eligible refund requests are handled directly by Indiegogo and can be requested through your confirmation email. During the campaign: please refer to Indiegogo's policy HERE.If you want to request a return or refund after the campaign has ended, but before your shoes are delivered, please contact us directly at contact@po-zu.com and we will assist you. Let's talk TIMELINE WE NEED YOUR HELP to spread the word So if you like what you're seeing, will you help us? Just 30 seconds of your time could make the difference in growing the community. Follow us on Twitter and Instagram @timetopoz, and tag your family, friends, or co-workers who you think need these. The more people who know about us, the larger our community will become! And the larger the community, the better we will be able to make the product!

story:
With nearly 50 years of experience as a watchmaker, Yonger & Bresson has tirelessly thrived to elaborate elegant and affordable mechanical timepieces for watch aficionados.

Today, we partner with Franck Muller's Design Team to create stunning, high-quality affordable timepieces available for all. Combining Swiss creativity and French watchmaking craftsmanship to unveil this new collection of stylish French Swiss skeleton watches.

 

 

Le SINGULIER collection transcends the world of dress watches by displaying the intricacies of an automatic movement while keeping its Parisian chic.

 

 

When partnering up with Gabriele Guidi from Franck Muller's Design Team, we wanted to create elegant timepieces with the modern avant-garde twist given to it by Franck Muller in its signature designs. Named LE SINGULIER which means unique in French, this Collection is the embodiment of all of Gabriele’s vast experience in luxury watch design.

 

 

The Singulier Collection is composed of 3 models. Click on each model below to get more details and pictures:

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The skeleton dial offers a completely open vision of the intricacies of the automatic movement, beautifully decorated by Industrial Art Deco inspired gears in a delicate and elegant steel pattern. The refined hands are tinted with a special heating technique to ensure flawless aesthetics and longevity. No aspect of the dial has been overlooked and every tiny detail has been considered up to the sweeping hand's being decorated with the forged crown of Yonger & Bresson.  


 

 

The 316L steel tonneau-shaped case harmoniously highlights the dial while offering comfort and elegance. Its unique slightly curved shape adapts perfectly to the wrist. The vertical brushed case finishing and the engraved crown highlights the refined aesthetics of Le SINGULIER.

 

 

Smooth, curvaceous and highly scratch-resistant, the K1 mineral crystal protecting the dial is usually found in high-end watches because of the construction complexity of its two convex faces. Its curved appearance elegantly follows the curves as the tonneau case and provides a 180 degrees view of all components sitting on the dial, the watch hands and the apparent mechanical movement.

 

A 20mm sporty yet elegant silicone strap or a retro chic leather strap are proposed for perfect versatility. The straps come with a refined steel deployment clasp to hold your timepiece securely on your wrist yet with style.

An ingenious Quick Release Spring Bars patented system designed by Gabriele Guidi allows you to exchange straps. Now you can change the style of your watch depending on occasion, mood and personal preference in just a few seconds!

 

 

 


A reliable and accurate Japanese automatic skeleton movement from Citizen has been chosen to power these unique timepieces.  

Beating at 21 600 A/h and with a 42h power reserve, the 21 jewels MIYOTA 8N24 is carefully regulated at -20/+20 sec/day by our watchmakers at our Morteau workshops.

 

 


1975: The Louzon brothers, two watch aficionados based in Paris, launch their own watchmaking brand: Yonger & Bresson.

 

"Yonger" was meant to symbolize youth and energy while "Bresson" is the name of the famous French photographer Henri Cartier-Bresson who pioneered the genre of street photography and one of the founding members of Magnum Photos in 1947. The brand's name evokes French artistic creativity, uniqueness, quality and watchmaking savoir-faire.

 

Located in the emblematic Temple Street within the trendy Parisian Marais district (home of renowned designers and brands), Yonger & Bresson draws inspiration from this neighborhood's Artsy vibe, a favorite place of many artists throughout French history.

 

 

 

Today, Yonger & Bresson has evolved into a Swiss-French brand:   

 

Timepieces are designed by Franck Muller design team led by Gabriele Guidi, a Swiss watch designer well-known in the luxury watchmaking world who has designed countless famous high-end collections for Longines, Tissot, Bulova and Universal Geneve, while assembling is carefully being taken care by expert watchmakers of the Ambre Group (major luxury group of French watch brands like YEMA) in the small town of Morteau located in the French Jura mountains, the cradle of French watchmaking.

 

 

Renowned for its expert craftsmanship that goes back for more than six hundred years the Franche-Comté French Region where Ambre workshops are located is just a few miles away from Switzerland creating a real savoir-faire exchange between the two countries. To perpetuate and showcase this unique craftsmanship, production is carefully taken care of by experienced French watchmakers.

Your SINGULIER will come with a silicon strap or a retro-chic leather strap and a specifically designed bracelet-changing tool within a matte black watch case.

 

Your SINGULIER will come with a silicon strap or a retro-chic leather strap and a specifically designed bracelet-changing tool within a matte black watch case.

 

 

 

Indiegogo is a great platform to reward our fans with great deals. The watches will ship free-of-charge from our France workshops, European Union (EU) backers will be charged 20% VAT when choosing their country within each Reward.

 

You will choose the watch model and bracelet after November 1st. We’ll send you an email to confirm your pledge and request your choices.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

PRESS KIT

Are you a journalist or a blogger? Click here to feature this project on your media

story:
All moms are superheroes for their kids! 

The moment when i realised that i am one of them, was when she started to behave like me: try on my clothes, wear my shoes, use the same gestures and even to copy my hairstyle. She was the one that inspired me to create unique design for mom and daughter and i wanted it to be different from all typical matching pajamas. It had to be special and attractive for my husband too :)  

Soo.. no more boring pajamas for us! 

 

Introducing MOM & ME pajamas! 

We can give you a million reasons why you have to throw away your old, boring pajamas and to choose ours, but we’ll come up with the most important ones:

 

Premium French Lace

 

 

High quality fabrics

 ORGANIC SILK

 

 

Our logo is embroidered carefully on the fabric by high standard embroidery machine. The threads we use are also natural, so you will not feel it on the skin. 

 

 

You don't have to take it off. We created the pajamas you can wear all day long! 

Choose the color you like!

We offer the possibility to choose the color you like for your pajamas. You can choose two different colors for mother and daughter! 

 

The campaign! 

Our mission is to deliver more beautiful clothing sets for mothers and daughters, in order to make them look special and become closer! 

This campaign will help us to create a new collection of apparel, to create a website and start selling online, so we can deliver it worldwide and sure for buying new sewing machines and materials for our studio! 

 

Choose your REWARD!

Molly

Mary

Elissa

 

 

Remember

Every pajama is hand tailored individually for you! 

 

 

 

Thank you for support! 

Spread the Word

Please help us get more contributors!

story:
About Noire Garment Co.

We are passionate about fashion and the beauty of creativity. We have a great respect for the many designers that are currently making an impact and paving the way for new creators seeking to answer the call. However in our Journey we have noticed that the voice of Alkebulan and the children of the sun have been lacking representation in the industry. We believe diversity is what enhances field of Fashion and with that understanding we wanted to create a fashion line that was inspired by Alkebulan. We seek to display the elegance and beauty of the culture from the motherland and introduce this to the world. With this in mind Oheen & Sekai Imara created a T-shirt company titled Noire Garment Co., which they hope, will embody the true essence of Alkebulan. At this time they are seeking to expand the current clothing line and create a number of designs that will truly encompass the fire, Radiance, and Beauty of Alkebulan as well the cultures that exist on the continent. If you believe in the beauty of diversity and fashion then we welcome you to the Evolution.

Our Goals 

Our goal is to increase our capabilities, enhance our clothing line & create diversity in what we will be able to offer. Our interests go beyond the production of t-shirts, we seek to expand our abilities by creating an official fall collection, official spring collection & footwear. In order to make these goals a reality, funding is required for hiring seamstresses, storing products & equipment safely as well as equipment:

  • (2) Surface Pro Desktops at $4,000 each
  • (1) Anajet RI 6000 Direct To Garment Printer at 20,000
  • Fabrics: Faux Leather, Silk, Cotton at about $13,000
  • Prototype for shoe at $2,000
  • Buying wholesale shoe designs at $10,000
  • Contract Employees (Seamstress) at $7,000

Impact

Noire Garment Co. seeks to develop an atmosphere of fashion excellence that embraces diversity while promoting the beauty of Alkebulan and its culture.  We seek to present designs crafted from the finest fabrics with an emphasis on quality and authenticity.  With a contribution to the Noire Garment Co. campaign you will forever be a key part of this fashion movement and your name remembered on our donation list. 

We believe the Noire Garment Co. campaign will be a valuable component in encouraging the appreciation and acceptance of Alkebulan culture.  We believe it will inspire a more culturally diverse fashion movement and give a voice to the essence of the motherland.  

During this campaign we seek to develop a strong and positive relationship with our contributors. In the interest of remaining transparent we seek to release video updates on our progress on all of our social media sites (Twitter: @noiregarments, Facebook: Noire Garment Co., Instagram: @noiregarments) as well as our Indiegogo page. Please feel free as a contributor to check in on our progress at any time.

Risks & Challenges

Noire Garment Co. understands that embarking on a campaign like this can face some challenges.  Of course any new business and even an established business will face some challenges.  Below we have listed a few things that have been seen as possible challenges in this venture:

                    1) How do we compete with established brands?

                    2) Will we be able to supply the demand that may exist for our product?

                    3) The cost of maintaining materials and equipment.

Initially we held these concerns but with the launch of our website (www.noiregarments.com) we were able to develop some strong relationships with other businesses who have demonstrated they can supply our needs for materials and ensure that our products are available as needed.    

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that everyone will not be able to make a monetary contribution but that does not mean we would not welcome your support in other ways.  You can definitely show support by: 

  • Getting the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!

Use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Eco Shorts - first of all a fabric with antibacterial, hypoallergenic and antimicrobial effects. 100% environmentally friendly hemp fabric, produced without harming to the environment ❤❤❤ 

Eco Shorts with built-in solar panel  - an environmentally friendly product. And devices, built-in shorts, work as a compact solar power storage (SPS). SPS is made of eco-plastic, which are biodegradable materials.

Your support very important for us!

Solar power storage can charged only from the sun and will always be at your fingertips. And what is the most important, SPS can help you out at any time if you need to recharge any gadget.

Eco Shorts are sewn in the only one color "Royal Blue", which perfectly blends with the surface of solar panels.

Eco Shorts are suitable for all occasions

Eco Shorts are perfect for going for a walk, for travelling, running or just relaxing outside. If you are planning a romantic evening and you need stricter outfit - Eco Shorts will cope with this task!

The advantage for travelers in our Eco Shorts is the Solar Power Storage. It doesn't matter where you go and for how long, there will always be a rechargeable source of power with you.

Why Eco Shorts?

The initial goal was to create shorts with environmentally friendly material, which is produced without harming to the environment. Our choice has become a hemp fabric, made from agricultural industrial hemp.

Its useful to note - hemp is not weed. Hemp is more likely marijuana’s friend which does not contain cannabis cells, that makes it absolutely legal throughout the world.

Few people know that, for many centuries, people have used hemp for the production of various products, because it has incredible features of a medicinal plant! And on the basis of its seeds, many healthy food products and just things are produced all over the world.

Eco fabric is 100% natural

Clothing made from hemp - is primarily a natural environmentally friendly product. Cannabis stems consist of two parts - fiber and pulp. It is from fiber made the fabric for all types of clothing. And most importantly - all the useful properties of hemp saved when processing it into fabric.

Durability & Hypoallergenic

Hemp material is soft and very durable, absorbs moisture quickly and is hypoallergenic. It has healing effects on the human body (calms the nervous system and has an antiseptic effect and UV protection), and with prolonged use they increase. For good reason manufacturers of children's goods are gradually introduce hemp into children's hygiene items.

Using hemp fabric constantly, it is activated and maintains the ability to neutralize toxins, preventing development of pathogenic microbes, does not create obstacles for the metabolic processes in the skin.

Hygienic

Hygienic provides natural membrane: natural fabric does not create a "greenhouse" effect on the surface of the body under clothing which allows the skin to breathe freely. And what is the most interesting thing that hemp fabric eliminates overheating of the body in hot weather and hypothermia in the cold time of the year.

100% Pure Hemp

Our country, like many others around the world, included in the list of countries prohibited to grow hemp, but only from the Canabis family. We use technical hemp varieties for the production of fabrics.

It should be noted, if you look at the history of 400 years ago, you can make sure that technical hemp varieties were mandatory for growing. The fabric of these varieties was considered the most durable and useful for the skin.

Usefulness in all areas of life

Hemp is used in construction: decoration, plaster and insulation. Also medicine from cancer related diseases develops on the base of hemp. Specifically, hemp oil is actively used as the main ingredient in cosmetics and cooking.

Our shorts are sewn exclusively from 100% hemp fiber, without adding additional threads and other materials. You can make sure in declared quality - supporting us and our project.

Every detail of EcoShorts is unique

Useful properties of EcoShorts

  • The fabric of technical varieties of hemp fibers differs in durability.
  • Endurance of material is supported by the special structure of hemp fibers from which the fabric is made. It is resistant to external influences, does not deform and does not deteriorate in the washing machine.
  • Wash at 40°C. Washing at a higher temperature can slightly settle fabric.
  • Eco fabric from hemp is ideal for sensitive skin and for allergy. It is breathable, soft and hardwearing. It doesn’t irritate the skin and has an antimicrobial effect.
  • It warms in the cold and cools in the heat.
  • Does not get bobbles and does not need special care.
  • It wrinkles like all natural fabrics, as it is not treated with caustic soda against creasing. Caustic soda is prohibited by BIO certificates.
  • It is pleasant to wear and easy to care.
  • Organic natural dye is certified by the GOTs standard, free of heavy metals and harmful substances. The fabric doesn’t change its view with proper care for many years.
  • Eco Shorts have the property of protection against ultraviolet rays. The fabric filters most of the spectrum of ultraviolet rays. In particular, UV-B rays that affect premature skin aging and may be carcinogenic.

Therapeutic and prophylactic qualities of hemp fabric

  • Hypoallergenic. It is achieved due to the absence of toxic chemicals in plant materials used to control weeds, pests and diseases of cultivated plants.
  • Hygiene. It is provided by the features of a natural membrane. Natural tissue doesn’t create a “greenhouse” effect on the body surface under clothing, which allows the skin to breathe freely.
  • Protection. It is installed with the help the barrier properties of hemp as a medicinal plant. The fabric protects the skin from the harmful effects of the external environment (heavy metal salts, unfavorable combination of temperature and humidity, damaging effect of excessive ultraviolet radiation).

  • Additional benefits: refreshing and softening action of living tissue, which beneficially affects the body's work during the day; lack of irritation on the skin; general tonic effect at constant wear.

Ecological culture

Hemp is a completely ecological culture. It is grown without the use of chemistry, which guarantees high-quality fibers without toxic residues. After all, toxic residues are a source of allergies and skin irritations.

Pricing policy for hemp fabric

Due to the fact that hemp fabric produces a fairly small percentage of companies around the world, its prices are higher than other fabrics. We would like to make prices more affordable for you, but unfortunately it is not easy :(

Compact Solar Power Storage

During our creating the layout of the solar power storage we examined a lot of plastic materials and choose eco-plastic. It is produced without the addition of chemical elements. It is biodegradable and doesn’t harm the environment at all.

Eco Plastic

Natural raw materials in the composition of eco-plastic allow it to be used for various purposes without threat to human health as it is non-toxic. During its manufacture, carbon dioxide emissions into the atmosphere are significantly reduced comparing to the manufacture of "petroleum" polymers. The use of fossil resources is reduced by a third and the use of solvents is not required at all.

We wanted to minimize in our project everything that has a negative impact on nature. To be honest, using eco-plastic as a material for solar power storage can shorten its life. But with careful handling, this can be avoided for several years.

Operability Solar Power Storage

We would like to note that we have not just taken any power bank with a solar panel as the basis for our project, dismantled it and did something similar. NO! :) We have independently developed the concept of our solar power storage and tested it for several months.

For this reason, we can guarantee the operability of this device. The solar power storage does not have the ability to recharge from the network, in contrast to existing power banks of this kind.

    Wireless charging module. You can charge your gadget, which supports the wireless charging function, by leaning it against the back cover of the solar power storage.

    Benefits of Solar Power Storage

    Male version of shorts:

    • Amorphous solar panels
    • The ability to charge in any weather
    • Flexibility - easily takes the shape of a foot
    • Water resistant - protective film coating
    • Convenient location in a special pocket made of eco leather
    • No mains charging

    Female version of shorts:

    • Polycrystalline Solar Panel
    • Compact design
    • Convenient mount
    • Faster solar charging
    • Wireless charging module
    • Doesn’t charge from the network

    Solar Power Storage in work. First prototype.

    Available Size

    Risks and challenges

    We made every effort to minimize the risks associated with the project. We don't exclude the fact that in the process of delivering our products to you we may encounter any difficulties. But, we can guarantee that each order will be delivered to its Backers. We know how to deliver fast and efficiently. All shipments will be fully tracked. All of your pledges and support are greatly appreciated.

And devices, built-in shorts, work as a compact solar power storage (SPS). SPS is made of eco-plastic, which are biodegradable materials.Your support very important for us!Solar power storage can charged only from the sun and will always be at your fingertips. And what is the most important, SPS can help you out at any time if you need to recharge any gadget.Eco Shorts are sewn in the only one color "Royal Blue", which perfectly blends with the surface of solar panels.Eco Shorts are suitable for all occasionsEco Shorts are perfect for going for a walk, for travelling, running or just relaxing outside. If you are planning a romantic evening and you need stricter outfit - Eco Shorts will cope with this task!The advantage for travelers in our Eco Shorts is the Solar Power Storage. It doesn't matter where you go and for how long, there will always be a rechargeable source of power with you.Why Eco Shorts?The initial goal was to create shorts with environmentally friendly material, which is produced without harming to the environment. Our choice has become a hemp fabric, made from agricultural industrial hemp.Its useful to note - hemp is not weed. Hemp is more likely marijuana’s friend which does not contain cannabis cells, that makes it absolutely legal throughout the world.Few people know that, for many centuries, people have used hemp for the production of various products, because it has incredible features of a medicinal plant! And on the basis of its seeds, many healthy food products and just things are produced all over the world.Eco fabric is 100% naturalClothing made from hemp - is primarily a natural environmentally friendly product. Cannabis stems consist of two parts - fiber and pulp. It is from fiber made the fabric for all types of clothing. story:
Buying VISUAL ASSISTANT (VA/VA glasses) provides you with not only a prescription-ready eyewear frame, but a choice of a variety of interchangeable polarized sunscreen filters as well as a filter for bad weather conditions.  

 

 

 
If you broke or lost any parts of your system - you can easily order any part you need from our online store as well as any additional new clip-ons. 
All new clip-on filters will always be compatible with our one universal VA frame!
 
 
 
 
90% of all the information that our senses deliver to us is picked up via our eyesight. More interestingly, 60% of people wear glasses, contact lenses or both.
 
 
FACT: More than 1 million car accidents occur each year in the United States alone - with poor eyesight being identified as the sole cause for nearly 20% of all auto accidents. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
VA glasses use strong magnets to easily attach clip-on filters that provide perfect high definition vision, protection from the sun and most importantly - increased perception of your surroundings on the road in bad weather conditions. 
 
 

 
VA glasses are prescription-ready. Just take them into your optometrist and they will be able to add prescription lenses into your VA frame for you (read our FAQs). 
 
 
 
 
In the frame and clip-on filters are embedded small but strong magnets that provide an instant, convenient and reliable attachment of the clip-on filter onto the VA frame. 
 
 
 

VISUAL ASSISTANT will instantly attach the clip-on and can be changed with a single hand in order to ensure your attention is always on the road. 

 

Entering a tunnel or a parking garage? Quickly remove your clip-on to regain the appropriate vision necessary for whatever environment you may be in!

 

(VA glasses do use magnets. If you have any condition that precludes using magnets near your head or body, you should talk to your doctor)

 

 

 

We all know what it's like to drive with obstructed vision due to extreme weather conditions. 

VISUAL ASSISTANT eliminates this type of dangerous and distracted driving that claims the lives of so many people each year.

 

 

Our versatile optic frame can be instantly customized via polarized magnetic clip-ons that are used to adapt it to any environment you may find yourself in.

 

 

 

 

 

VISUAL ASSISTANT offers several unique filters created for different weather environments.

 

 

As stated above, the filters can quickly be swapped out with each other with a single hand.

 

Unlike competitors, VA’s filters fit the single frame, eliminating the need to purchase additional frame shapes and sizes. 

 

VISUAL ASSISTANT features a universal black squared frame with a bridge in the form of a keyhole that fits virtually every customer. 

Just take an eye exam and order lenses with your prescription to fit the VA frame.

 

While it is true that the VA frame is available in one universal style, the variety of magnetic & polarized clip-ons available to be installed makes VISUAL ASSISTANT one of the most customizable pair of sunglasses ever to hit the market. 

Each filter is unique in terms of both color and the degree of dimming that it offers. As different environments & individual preferences call for different filters, these clip-ons allow VISUAL ASSISTANT to be the only versatile sunglasses you’ll ever need.

 

 

We are also working on expanding the list of clip-on filters!

All new filters will be compatible with the VA frame and will be available for purchase separately. 

 

The following 6 colors will be available for VA glasses at launch (expected)*: 

 

 With the exception of those clip-ons made for smog and bad weather conditions.

 

The smog & bad weather clip-on (the yellow lens tint) makes your environment appear brighter and is commonly used in low-light conditions. These lens’ tint block blue light, reduce glare, enhance contrast and depth perception, which make them helpful for overcast, hazy and foggy conditions. 

 

(*The colors could be different from the picture. Final color schemes will be provided in updates. Your colors of clip-on lenses will be selected in a survey that will be sent out at the end of the campaign.) 

 

VISUAL ASSISTANT features a universal black squared frame with a bridge in the form of a keyhole that fits virtually every customer. 

 

Poly-carbonate lenses are the perfect choice for driving, cycling and sports activities. They are valued for exceptional durability, lightness, optical transparency and large tolerance of high temperatures. They offer 100% protection from UV rays. 

 

Polarized lenses are the most high-tech type of lens product that allow you to equip your eyes with maximum protection from excessive sunlight and reflected light.

Despite all of the known benefits we receive from the sun, its light can still cause serious vision problems. Sunlight reflecting off of smooth water, snow or flat roads can create glare which is not only annoying but can often be dangerous. Blinding sun glare can cause accidents, snow blindness and can even give your eyes sunburn.  

 

 

Polarized lenses effectively block glare resulting from light reflecting from flat and smooth surfaces. Consequently, they provide increased transparency of vision. 

Polarized sunglasses can be helpful for driving, because they reduce glare-causing reflections from flat surfaces, such as the hood of the car or the road's surface.

 

 

One of the main advantages of polarizing lenses is the effect of reducing eye strain. Since most harmful rays of light are blocked, the eyes strain less and their fatigue decreases.  Eye strain often leads to headaches and a general deterioration of well-being.

 

Whether you spend your time driving or jogging, in-line skating or mountain biking - polarized sunglasses are the right choice to help you enjoy your life outdoors.

In terms of comfort, polarizing lenses are superior to ordinary sunglasses, which, although they protect the eyes from bright sunlight, do not remove the interfering glitter.

 

Only the most high-quality, lightweight and safe materials are used for the production of VA Glasses, ensuring maximum comfort for long periods of wear. There are no hooks or other heavy constructions to the frame. 

VISUAL ASSISTANT is made of ULTEM® (Polyetherimide Plastic) - an extremely light and durable material that offers exceptional thermal-resistance, stiffness and resistance to chemicals. This material is Eco-friendly, light, and flexible.

 

You will never have to overpay for bundles with filters you don’t need to replace your current one.  

Each filter is unique in terms of both color and the degree of dimming that it offers. As different environments  & individual preferences call for different filters, these clip-ons allow VISUAL ASSISTANT to be the only versatile sunglasses you’ll ever need.   

 

Do you want to try a new lens color? 

Broke the frame or lost your favorite clip-on filter? 

With VA Glasses it's not a problem!

 

 

 We are still working on the final list of clip-on color tints. Any additional color in the future will be compatible to VA frame and can be purchased separately from VISUAL ASSISTANT online store. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We have new ideas with both frame shapes and clip-ons. We understand that every person has different preferences like warm or cold, dark or light tints or just different color tastes.

We are working on new tints which will be available on our online store and compatible with the  VA frame.

 

Questions about this project? Check out the FAQ!

story:
Short Summary

Kodi just released her original folk album "Midnight Ramblings" on Spotify and iTunes! Yay! Now, to celebrate, Kodi gathered the best female illustrators she knows and together they created Midnight Merch! A one of a kind collection of buttons, totes, prints, and postcards with original designs by Grace S. Ro, Natalie Crawford, and Sam Giuliano. Kodi sent the artists each the same album cover photo and asked for their own artistic interpretations. This was the Frankenart creation we used to inspire our line of lady boss driven products. 

What We Need & What You Get

We have $500 worth of prototype products for purchase. This money will be used to support these 4 insanely talented female artists, as well as, start-up for another line of Midnight Merch.  If you would like to get a piece of this limited time offer, go to our perks section, and claim any of our  button, totes, prints, or postcards perks. Supplies are limited! 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you would like to help, but don't see any merch that peaks your interest, feel free to share our items on social media! Tag @heythereitskodi @gracesro @samgiulianoart @heynoots!

story:
WHAT ARE THESE LIFE SAVING T-SHIRTS?

1. For every donation made and every t-shirt sold we will be donating a meal for a person as well as a street animal. 

2. This campaign will help us to make our own AGE-LESS, super soft, all weather, comfortable and pocket friendly t-shirts. 

3. Manufactured in India, we will be providing jobs to a lot of females who are in need of work. India is still a place where Eunuchs are not treated well. Getting this project started will also help them to get a daily wage job to help them grow in their life. 

4. The donation of a 1000 t-shirts will be made to ROBINHOOD ARMY in Mumbai. 

https://robinhoodarmy.com/

5. A high quality product- The t-shirts are made with a 100% cotton with double stitch which makes the t-shirts ageless, super comfortable and breathable for any weather and always in fashion. 

6. We are in the T-shirt manufacturing industry for the 2 years. Seeing the condition all we wanted was to help,  thus we took up this initiative to get India on a better path. 

 

 

                   NOW ALL WE NEED IS YOU. 

Here's how it works:-

1. $5 Funding/donation that you make will help a home-less person and a stray animal get 1 time meal.                                                                                                                                                                  FACTS-  Statistically every 1 out of 15 people die in India due to hunger and every 1 out of 19 dogs die in India due to starvation and dehydration. 

So with every dollar that you donate us a mouth will be fed and you will be blessed. 

 

                            Donate $1 dollar and help feed a hungry mouth

                                      

2. Every $10 dollar you donate 1 home-less child will be given a pair of t-shirt and jeans to wear.                                                                                                                                                                                     FACT-  Due to poverty not only do they not have food but children in India also don't have ample clothing to cover them selves up. Which not only forces them to wear same dirty clothes day after day effecting their hygiene but also cannot protect them rain, sun and winter. 

  •                                       Donate $10 a help save a child's life.

3. Every $15 that you donate will be funded and used in educating the street children of Mumbai.  The study campaign will be carried out by Dr. Seema Lamba and the entire funding will be used to buy stationary for the street children. 

               Dr. Seema Lamba PHD in Hindi and Sanskrit. Contact- +91 9869208920

 

Fact- Due to poverty none of these street children can afford schooling. With the help of your donation and with the help of Dr. Seema Lamba we will be providing books, education and stationary and  to the street children. 

 

4.Donate $25 and help us make a Women Independent. 

Fact- India is still one of those countries where a women is not allowed to work. Help us to raise strong and Independent Women and break the barriers of sexism. 

Your valuable $25 will help us raise funds for machines that will provide work for these women all over India. 

 

 

5.  Donate $50 and get 3 plain t-shirts of your choice. 

After the Campaign is over we will be sending across a survey to you in which you will be able to choose the size and the color of the product that you want. 

 

They say, " A Nation is built by it's people." So help us raise these needy people who will bless you for life. DO GOOD, FEEL GOOD, BE BLESSED.

These are all the reason that why we at GDcreatives have started this campaign at the first place. You will be sent a newletter of the progress and the work 3 months after the campaign is over. 

GD creatives weblink- http://www.gdcreatives.in

GD creatives Instagram- @gdcreatives  / https://www.instagram.com/gdcreatives/

GD creatives facebook- https://www.facebook.com/gdcreatives/

story:
Have you ever felt that you knew someone’s character by just looking at their shoes?

Footwear is a symbol of identity that reveals a vast part of our personalities. At Zulus Republic we do not just aim at producing a product that becomes simply a fashion trend, but rather a shoe  with a historical significance.

 

The birth of Zulus Republic all started with my love for shoes, creating my own designs with brilliant patterns and my passion about the African & Spanish culture and making our environment sustainable.

Born in Edo state, Nigeria where colors represent not just our clothes but culture, music,and simply everything that we are.

Each design is inspired by a different location in Nigeria and some other cities in Africa  showcasing the essence of our culture, customs & cities through our PATTERNS!
A great example is the below Lagos Model,  the multi-colors pattern on the solid black demonstrates the  peaceful coexistence of over 20 million vibrant and forward-looking people of diverse culture, race, tribe, religion and social status living together in harmony. 

 

 

 

 

Unique: A great example of Globalization,  a fusion of two cultures, the Spanish traditional espadrilles and Nigerian cultural textiles.  They are handcrafted and made with a lot of love and attention; therefore, each pair is unique, as you will not find two identical pairs. Moreover,each pair can be customized by the client's choice. 

Be Eco-friendly:  Made with Natural elements. The manufacturing process of espadrilles takes place without the application of any chemicals, which is not detrimental to the environment. Soles made from recycled tires, this way you help in keeping our planet safe. They are responsible manufacturing.

Extraordinary grip. The soles have an extraordinary resistance to wear and great grip on any type of surface and they are light weight.

Comfortable, adaptable & fresh: Fabric is 100% cotton and the insole is made of jute fiber. It's a natural product, therefore it breathes easily, and it allows your feet to be comfortable & fresh and it prevents allergies. With stepping on the jute you are able to connect to the earth, in a magnetic way, which is part of our biology.

Durable & Trendy: In order to increase durability, the jute sole is finished in vulcanized recycled tires. Take them with you anywhere, it's enormous versatility, you get the possibility to combine with almost any type of look. 

 

    You can customize your own design, by choosing from the below fabrics(I - XVI), e.g choosing to have just the sides, front or whole pair made of African fabric, while the other a plain color or as you desire.

     

     

     

    All fabrics are limited, should in case we are out of your chosen fabric,you would be able to choose a different fabric or we would replace it for a very similar pattern.

     

    MODELS:

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

    Hmmm! a basket  handbag what can be inside or held in it? A bag full of tricks!!!!
    Made of natural materials
    Handmade by artisans in Northern Nigeria.

    A must have  for the summer! 


     

    Selection of raw materials is done meticulously to offer high quality footwear and a means to support local manufactures.

    We use high quality African textiles, which are durable and 100% cotton like:

    • Adire, cloth from the Yoruba of SW Nigeria
    • Daviva, Indigo cloth from the Yoruba of SW Nigeria 
    • Kente,Woven appliqued cloth from the Asante and Ewe of Ghana 
    • Andinkra,Stamp printed cloth from the Asante of Ghana 

     

    They are manually sewed and we use first grade quality materials, hereditary techniques and tools that have been transmitted from generation to generation using "Punta de Ojal", the Spanish traditional technic, with natural materials and this way the Espadrilles last for a very long time. 

     

     

    Our concern & awareness of the environmental problems was the key of using rubber soles made from used TIRES, this way you can look COOL and do your bit for the environment at the same time :)

    • They are Eco-friendly,
    •  Sole made from recycled TIRES, this way you help in keeping our planet safe, 
    •  Tire soles are  resistant to water 
    •  They are light weight.

     

    We recommend that you use your shoe size number. In case you are in between 2 sizes, or  not sure of the exact size, we advise that you chose your normal shoe size, because the Espadrilles will expand and adapt to your feet.

    Choose your preferred design/color, after the campaign ends, we will send you an email with the sizing chart & color options.

     

    Elleanor Roosevelt, once said some people are going to leave a mark in this world, but others would leave a STAIN and I ask you, what colorful step are you going to leave behind?  

     

    A lot of challenges has come along the way, especially being a sole proprietor, but working on this project for close to a year, I have been able to foreseen most of the challenges which can be avoided with your support to this project. 1) High cost of textiles and import duties from Africa;  therefore, to reduce cost of production, we need to purchase the textil in large quantity. The same applies with the recycled tire soles. 

    Making an Espadrilles is more complex and time consuming than making normal shoes because it is sewed by hands, by manually stitching it to the soles with the needle and thread. 2) With your support we would be able to hire extra hands, more handy tools, rent a big workshop (as we are currently working from our basement) develop new designs and enable us have your Zulus Espadrilles on time and ready for immediate dispatch 

    With your support on this project we would be able to support local African fabric companies and give awareness of their brilliant patterns to the World. 

    Our Mission is to symbolize the relations, cultures and interdependencies between Africa and the World.

     

     

    We have taken precautions; however, we know there will be unforeseen challenges along the way. But by planning properly, designating roles, working with new trends, spending wisely and acting quickly, it's possible to ensure that our team is ready to handle anything and that the project succeeds, no matter what comes it's way.

     

    Please help us share our project with your friends, families, on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, Snapchat and all social networks.

    Use the  Indiegogo share tools to help us share our dream to the world! 

    To enable this project come to Live and avoid delays we hope to get your support to enable us commence to work immediately!

     

    ******************THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT********************

story:
Hi! My name is Ash and I am the nerd behind DarkDeviL's Designs. I love creating unique gifts and have recently dabbled in apparel. Given the huge popularity of ITA bags I wanted to bring something a little different. Something that was more suitable for everyday use, capable of showing off pins and patches AND or just storing whatever bits you need.

What I Need & What You Get

  • I realize this is a big goal so I want to be as clear as possible. Almost 90% of this goals funding is for the actual bags.
  • 5% will be for the indiegogo fees and the rest will cover and any additional costs such as packaging/tax etc.
  • I have a bag sample [pictured below] to show the quality and style.

 

Bag Specifications 

  • 13x16x6CM.
  • Removable strap.
  • Ball section is actually a pocket too!
  • 4 pockets.
 
I am not sure what most people put in a bag but I have tried to include a variety that I myself would! As you can see, even though it is small it can fit in a good amount of items! 
 

Perks 

Contributing to this campaign is a huge support and in return I have the following perks planned;

Crossbody Bag & Crossbody Bag + Pin

Each bag will come with a patch or random washi tape* and the second option for an additional pin will come with that AND the exclusive pin.

Crossbody Bag Gift Set

This set will come with prints, washi tape AND a patch* along with the EXCLUSIVE pin.

I thought I would include the silly sketch I made of the bag along with my ideas for the EXCLUSIVE campaign pin designs.

I will be aiming to get BOTH pin designs made and included for backers. They will be EXCLUSIVE to this campaign and not available to buy. Finished design MAY differ to what is shown above so please be aware but I will be posting updates and the finished designs ASAP.

Other Ways You Can Help

Pledging will not only ensure that the bags get produced, but it will get you the lowest prices possible. I know some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help! Some of the things you can do to support the project is;

  • Ask others to get the word out and make some noise about my campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

Follow me on social media to not only support me but stay updated.

Insta

Facebook

Etsy

Patreon

Risks & Challenges

Delays with manufacturing beyond my control and color variations are always a possibility. Any delays will be communicated via updates.

*Subject to availability. Goods may not be as shown in the picture and may be substituted.

**No Magikarp or Pokemon were harmed in the making of this campaign.

***I accept no responsibility for any addiction to my store. Shop at your own risk.

story:
We are a proud licensee of PopSockets! With a quick-turn connector that's built-in, the PopTime watch module works with most of your favorite PopSockets products!

Starting your day on the right note can greatly help you stay efficient and productive. Unlike traditional alarm clocks or alarms from a smartphone, PopTime wakes you up with a gentle vibration on your wrist.

You are an early bird and you don't want to wake up your loved one. Kudos to you, we get it!

PopTime can also transform into a Smartwatch so you can stay notified on the go.

It turns into your workout companion, with the provided clip-on, you can easily attach it to your gym clothes and control music with ease without having to take your phone out of the bag.

PopTime comes with everything you need to make the most out of your super fresh smartwatch experience.

A complete PopTime set comes with:

  • PopTime Device Module
  • Watchband
  • Clip-on for Gym & Workout Sessions
  • PopTime Charger

Make sure to select add-on perks produced by PopSockets to make your collection complete!

Everybody loves PopSockets! We agree with that and therefore made PopTime compatible with some of their most popular products (we are a licensee of PopSockets). As our backer, you can enjoy a nice discount on these great PopSockets products as add-on perks to PopTime - all compatible with the watch module :)

 

Sean is an MBA student at the University of Chicago Booth School of Business. This is his first venture where Sean gets to apply what he's learned from school to the real world. The top priority of our company is to have a thorough understanding of customers and in turn deliver a product that's original and adds value to supporters in our community. 

John works at GE Healthcare and is a seasoned veteran in operations, manufacturing, and project management. He is also Sean's stepdad. John taught Sean how to speak English when Sean came to the US as a little kid. Going down memory line, they used to read the Catcher in the Rye together line by line! Now it's time for the father and son to work on a project together!

You might've noticed, the main character from the video's name is also Naomi. That's because we named her after our lovely marketing director! Naomi is also Sean's better half. The two of them got married last summer. Guess what? Their honeymoon was spent visiting suppliers for PopTime! You can imagine the sacrifice Naomi made for her husband and for this project to work out :)

 

Risks and challenges

We have set our funding goal to be fixed. That means if we don't meet this goal amount by the end of the campaign, all backers will get a refund within 5-7 business days from Indiegogo. But if we are lucky enough to meet our goal, the raised capital will cover production costs and getting PopTime delivered to you :) We sincerely appreciate your support along the way and your time spent checking out this campaign. It's our wish that you can join us in bringing this product to life.
