story:
SORRY THIS CAMPAIGN IS CANCELLED

 

 

 

getfacemask.org

 

 

(Blocks out 97% and has a secure seal patent-pending)

The inventor, Tami Harrison came up with this idea years ago when she worked in the construction industry, but realized it was very necessary to pursue during the pandemic we are going through. After wearing bulky masks that you can get hot in, especially living in the south in the summer and working outside it is extremely difficult. She realized that a new more modern mask was needed for today's time that can effectively help prevent viruses, pollution, etc. from getting in, but also gives the user comfort and was easy to use.

This mask provides substantial improvements in weight, breathability and tolerability for users to wear. The Innoclee (TM) See Me Masks is made for kids or adults and made with semi-transparent and other fabrics with a high efficacy rate of blocking out contaminants made with microfibers non-woven material with adhesive P42, blocks out 97% of contaminants. No residue is left on face- medical grade sensitive adhesive that is water resistant. We will begin FDA testing after successful.

Choose color- blue, white or green or no color semi-transparent.

Easy to remove- leaves no residue and doesn't hurt.
 

 

(Only mask he wants to wear and 8 year old says, “not hard to breathe in”)

A light weight, thin, non skin irritating, easy to install, comfortable filter face-piece mask because of the smaller size and ease of use and will remain in the proper position while the wearer continues his daily activities without worrying if the mask is secure or if it has moved out of place. This mask will provide a respiratory nostril and mouth filter mask that is covering the needed areas of mouth and nose only, lightweight, easy to wear, breathable, and not covering a large part of user's face for a more comfortable experience.

According to recent guidance provided by the Center for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC), Masks help people with increased risks such as: older people, racial and ethnic minority groups, etc should take extra precautions and health care facilities suggested everyone should now wear a mask in public if social distancing is not possible.

Innoclee face mask helps protect against the spread of larger respiratory droplets, germ particles, and splashes.

Comfortable to wear, soft to the face and very light-weight

Face-piece design covers the nose and mouth only without straps (P42) to ensure the mask stays in place.

Good airflow and breathability.

Simple P42 Innoclee (TM) See Me Mask. Feel like yourself while being safe. P42 is placed on with an adhesive that is medical grade sensitive that lasts all day.

You will receive style on image in perks.)

 

 

Ladies shirt

You don't have to worry about bulky masks,  or charging, or wearing heavy plastics. Easy to use. Soft on your skin. You can wear all day. Wear and go. We also will offer you a portable hand wand to clean mask on the go.

Soft, flexible, mask- white, choose white, blue, green, hot pink or semi-transparent.

 

 

Trudy, Tami, Toya and Snehal works on this project to bring Innoclee masks to life. Some of us worked in the construction industry as well and wanted a better alternative mask to help us from getting too hot while still protecting us from contaminants.

We are a driven and hard working team that values safety and high standards for high-quality and well-developed products, with a strong network of partners in the US and globally. We want to provide an easy, sleek thin and useful mask that can be used for everyone to stay safe.

Tami is the inventor and founder of company and has 3 patents issued for other products view image:

Are you tired of the big bulky masks that make you feel hot very fast? We have the answer with a new lightweight breathable and easy to use mask. Besides people wearing masks incorrectly with nose still visible, or it keeps sliding down or gaps on the side of the mask. Innoclee P42 is thin and light-weight, will help block out contaminants and has a secure seal around the peripheral edges. We knew there was a better way and started the process to make Innoclee. Comes in different shapes.

Without strap P42

  

                                                              

 
 
TIMELINE: Idea 2010 then in 2019 began to work on the prototypes

We are raising funds to bring this project to life. The funding will help allow us to manufacture these masks and test and develop other mask styles with nano or micro transparent material  to help more people want to wear masks because it will be so easy. We are collaborating with scientists for the best materials. Our goal was to have the smallest mask for your face to keep you cool and seen and safe from contaminants.

(Please help us spread the word  thank-you:)

We’re aiming to help people get these masks to change their lives and also we are donating masks to schools when we begin to ship out in October if the schools are re-opened. We will also donate our masks to vulnerable communities that are having hard times in accessing masks.

Our goal is to raise $20,000 to fund the production and delivery of the masks and to donate to people in need. Let's all support public health measures to help stop the spread of the Coronavirus.

Sizes:  Adult: Small size 3.75" W X 3.5" H

                          Medium size: 3.75" X 4.25" H

                           Large size: 4" H X 6" W

Kid sizes are: Extra small 3.5" W X 3"H

                       Small 4" W X 3.25" H

How to clean masks:

Place wand over mask for 30 seconds each side. Clean your mask easily.

http://getfacemask.org/

*These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. These products are not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.
story_txt:
SORRY THIS CAMPAIGN IS CANCELLED
 
 
 
getfacemask.org
 
 

(Blocks out 97% and has a secure seal patent-pending)
The inventor, Tami Harrison came up with this idea years ago when she worked in the construction industry, but realized it was very necessary to pursue during the pandemic we are going through. After wearing bulky masks that you can get hot in, especially living in the south in the summer and working outside it is extremely difficult. She realized that a new more modern mask was needed for today's time that can effectively help prevent viruses, pollution, etc. from getting in, but also gives the user comfort and was easy to use.
This mask provides substantial improvements in weight, breathability and tolerability for users to wear. The Innoclee (TM) See Me Masks is made for kids or adults and made with semi-transparent and other fabrics with a high efficacy rate of blocking out contaminants made with microfibers non-woven material with adhesive P42, blocks out 97% of contaminants. No residue is left on face- medical grade sensitive adhesive that is water resistant. We will begin FDA testing after successful.
Choose color- blue, white or green or no color semi-transparent.

Easy to remove- leaves no residue and doesn't hurt.

story:
PHASE WATCHES

Thank you in advance for checking out our Indiegogo page, we truly appreciate your support.

Our Story

PHASE Watches was created by young individuals passionate about watches and frustrated with the high price points and lack of customization traditional watches typically offered in the market. 

We’re inspired by, and enjoy wearing high-quality watches, but at a reasonable cost. We also found that wearing the same watch day in and day out felt boring and wanted interchangeable bands similar to a modern digital watch, but for a traditional analog watch. 

Generally, an interchangeable band adds cost where there doesn’t need to be. The watch industry is filled with high retail markups for low-quality watches, so we set out to find a solution. 

Over the past year and a half, we’ve built relationships with leaders in the watch industry to refine our exciting custom-made collection, and curated it specifically for you. With our stylish and affordable watch collection, we focused on three core details: 

  • The highest quality materials producing a very stylish and minimal design
  • Giving you the power to further design your watch with interchangeable bands
  • Offering high-quality watches at an affordable cost

Our Products

PHASE delivers premium minimalist watches designed at our headquarters in San Francisco, California. Our flagship Phase 1 model is designed with the following: 

3 Watch Face Colors:

  • White
  • Black with White
  • Matte Black on Black

5 Band Combinations: 

  • Black Leather
  • Olive Green Leather
  • Brown Leather
  • Black Stainless Steel Mesh
  • Silver Stainless Steel Mesh

 

The PHASE Watch Collection 

 

            

Social

PHASE is more than just quality watches and bands - we’re a community.

          

With PHASE Watches, the power is yours to choose what adventure you want with our diverse selection of luxury watches. We simply want to be a guide to help inspire and empower you with this choice.

Never settle. A new PHASE of stylish, high-quality, affordable watches is here. A timeless selection that we know you will enjoy for a lifetime.

Come join us as we venture through life. 

 

PHASE is BACKED with a warranty.

We are so confident with our watch's quality and durability that if something were to happen within the first year, we hope you will send it back to us. The warranty includes all internal parts of the watch.

What the warranty does not cover:

The life of the battery 

Wear and tear and aging (e.g. scratched crystal; alteration of the color and/or material of nonmetallic straps and chains, such as leather, textile, rubber; peeling of the plating) 

Any damage on any part of the watch resulting from abnormal/abusive use, lack of care, negligence, accidents (nicks, dents, crushing, broken crystal, etc.)

 

What’s the next PHASE?

We want to create MORE! We want to develop a full line of watches of various styles that don’t cost a fortune. Between the interchangeable bands and having different styled faces we want you to be able to customize the watch you're wearing every day of the week for the price of a mainstream brand but look better doing it.

 

  So come with us on this journey!     

     

 

We want to create a community with our backers. Ultimately it’s your help that will bring PHASE to life. We are excited about what the future holds and eager to grow with you. 

Now we're here, on Indiegogo, with a fully functional prototype that looks amazing. We just need one more thing...your support!

 

Watch Details 

Watch Specs

story:
Introduction:

 

Introducing the MOST environmentally friendly, stylish and durable shoes on the planet.

 

Your footwear doesn't have to kill the environment.

Introducing eco-friendly, comfortable, durable and stylish shoes made with hemp, cactus and recycled tires from Malkry Footwear.

No matter what your style is, we've got something for you with our durable unisex sneakers or chukka boots!

 

 

What people are saying about us:

 

 

 

Our 3 Signature Styles:

 

 

 

All Malkry shoes have the following features:

 

Breathe in - Breathe out …. that's what our shoes do all the time. Allowing your feet to breathe while keeping you fresh like a daisy!

 

 

We all know shoes come in and out of style. One thing that never goes out of style is being cruelty free. Malkry shoes are made with vegan materials, such as cactus and hemp, which are better for the environment. 

 

 

We didn't want you to have polka dot shoes or wet socks when an unexpected drizzle came around. So we made them water resistant.

 

Hemp sneakers will keep your feet from smelling, no matter how many times you wear them on account of Hemp being antimicrobial.

 

 

Say goodbye to scorching summer heat and the dry winter chill with our durable Hemp Footwear. Hemp is a natural temperature regulator meaning it will keep you cool in the summer and warm in the winter making it the perfect everyday shoe. It also makes for a stylish look.

 

Nobody wants to put on a pair of sneakers and have their feet feel raw and rub against the canvas. With a breathable, soft Polyester Felt lining that feels just like a baby’s skin, this sneaker will always feel like the first time when you wear it without socks.

 

 

Imagine never worrying about snow or salt again.

Our Cactus shoes are resistant to weather, snow, and salt. The Cactus Leather provides durability, natural elasticity, and is soft enough to keep your feet comfortable all day. From our chukka boots to our sneakers, we've got you covered for winter.

 

 

Our cactus leather line is stain resistant. Simply wipe them with a damp cloth and they’ll be good as new.

 

Malkry hemp sneakers are equipped with a polyester felt lining which wicks moisture and keeps your feet dry all day everyday.

 

Malkry shoes feel  light and will not weigh you down. No more heavy shoes that drop due to their own weight. Travel light!

 

 

 

The Materials:

 

 

 

 

Cactus Leather Chukka Boot: 

 

Decorate your feet with beautiful boots made with cactus leather and recycled tires. No other type of material will last longer than our Cactus Leather.

 

 

Cactus Leather Sneaker:

 

Have you seen these cool white sneakers? They are perfect for spring and fall! They are made from cactus leather and have a cork and memory foam insole. We have men's and women's versions for you to choose from.

 

 

Hemp Sneaker:

 

Your new go-to shoe has arrived! The Unisex Hemp Sneaker offers light weight durability while keeping things eco friendly.

With their soft feel and easy slip on design, it's hard not to fall in love with these shoes from the get go.

 

Sizing:

 

Free 30 Day Return Policy:

If your sizing does not fit when you get the shoe or if you are unhappy in any way, we offer FREE returns, no questions asked within 30 days. 

 

 

Timeline & Shipping: 

 

Shipping will be charged separately in a survey after the campaign is over. 

 

Estimated Shipping charges:

USA: USD $10

Canada: USD $6

Rest of the World: USD $25 (1 Pair) , USD 40 (2 Pairs)

 

Free 30 Day Return Policy:

If your sizing does not fit when you get the shoe or if you are unhappy with the shoes in any way, we offer FREE returns, no questions asked within 30 days. 

 

 

What People are Saying About Us :

 

 

 

Why Crowdfunding:

 

We need you to help us in making Malkry Footwear a reality and give the world another great option for Vegan , environmentally friendly and durable footwear.

Your support helps us get off the ground , fund our inventory and warehousing costs and make your feet happy.

We have already funded our design, selection of materials and finalized prototypes and are working with a reputable factory and oversight and are looking for that final push to secure orders and buy raw materials to deliver our shoes to you. The aforementioned reason is why we turned to crowdfunding to make our dream a reality.

 

 

Our Story:

 

Hey everyone, we’re Faizan and Neha, husband and wife and the Founders of Malkry Footwear. We’re both originally from Karachi, Pakistan but have made Mississauga, Ontario, Canada as our full time home since August 2018.

One of the reasons we made Canada our full time home is because of our love of Nature and the great outdoors. Both of us are obsessed with shoes and Faizan is a HUGE animal lover so we thought we would combine our two favorite passions into something awesome and that is how Malkry Footwear was born.

Faizan holds a Masters Degree in Operations Management from Cardiff University , UK and Neha holds a Masters in Human Resources from Sheridan College, Mississauga, Canada. Both have extensive experience and complement each other with sound technical and operational knowledge and strong administrative skills which will help immensely in making our project a reality.

The idea began in 2018 with using recycled tire rubber for making the shoe outsoles. When we did some research , we found that almost no one was using recycled tires to make shoes. We aimed to change that. Then we discovered materials such as Hemp and Cactus Leather and started with the objective to make durable, stylish Vegan footwear, all using recycled tire rubber for our outsoles. We started work on the idea when the COVID 19 pandemic began in March 2020 and had formed a partnership with a family owned factory in Mexico that had experience of more than 25 years making footwear.

By November 2020, we had our first prototypes. After 4 iterations , in December 2020 , we had the perfect shoes and were ready to begin working on our Launch. Our Kickstarter video was ready in April 2021 and we formally launched in May 2020 and hope to count on your support in making our dream a reality and delivering awesome Vegan shoes you can be proud of by September 2021.

 

Risks and challenges

 

We have spent the last 18 months developing these shoes and our team has been working night and day to nail down and perfect the design, production, and logistics. We have worked closely with our manufacturers to ensure that quality control is met at every step of the production line. We are working with a factory that has more than 25 years experience in footwear manufacturing allowing us to have a well organized operation and ready to confront any situation that may arise. Our team has seen it all. We understand that no campaign comes without challenges. We promise to communicate with transparency and to work around the clock to ensure your expectations are met. The most common risk in manufacturing is production delays. And with COVID 19, the strain on Global supply chains has increased tenfold. However, 90% of our components are made in Mexico including the final shoes so we are relatively protected from potential global shortages. The manufacturing process relies on multiple components coming together at the same time. While we are very well versed in managing production and delivering on-time, there is always the possibility of a slight delay. However, we will be providing updates every step of the way to keep you fully informed.

story:
Short Summary

The Edutape is taking the tape measures to the next level. The width of the tape will be wider than the normal tape used on tape measures and the length starts from 50cm upwards c/w locking function and slow tape return .This surface allows to print information and pictures on the tape and stored in a robust compacted body.
Some idea for the Edutape :
Education -  Kids information within there age groups such as pictures, numbers and alphabets will be flashed before there eyes several times a minuet as the enjoy the motion of opening the tape.
Baking and Cooking - Recipes and measurements .
Company business card - Give more company information and technical info.
Ad space - Product information and brand awareness.
Emergency - First aid and emergency information.
There are hundred other ideas but hope you get the picture.
Hi I'm Dean, married to Sharon, we have a daughter Danya and two boys Jon and James. My technical background and creative mind keeps me awake many nights with ideas constantly bouncing around my head.

Often when busy in my workshop, my boys were always digging around in my tools and I noticed they were obsessed with my tape measures. They played with them non stop, they carried them around the house and I could never find them. Then one day the idea hit me, this could be used as great learning tool for children.

It's been a dream for several years to manufacture the Edutape and see kids from all different tribes and tongues enjoying fun learning. Quality and safety are top of priority. It is compacted, robust and can just about go anywhere. 

I am looking for US$ 100000.00 to get the Edutape into the commercial market. The spending breakdown is as follows;

  • $20 000 for six month overheads 
  • $ 5 000 for graphic design and mould design.
  • $10 000 for travel and hotels to manufactures.
  • $30 000 for moulds manufacture and raw materials.
  • $10 000 for marketing
  • $10 000 packaging shipping and handling.
  • $ 5 000 I have a provisional patent and would like to strengthen my protection. 
  • $10 000 for unexpected costs.
Perks of investing in Edutape?  A once off special limited design set that will be produced specially for investors during the selected time frame. The collectors set will have my personal signature. Once the limit is reached the mould will never be used again. My belief is that this will increase the value as it will be a collectors item/limited edition.
If we don't reach your entire goal we have opted to raise funds after the deadline until we can for-full our contributors investments and see our dream realised. The deadline may have to be extended .
We have books, flash cards and electronic learning products and believe there a massive market for Edutape. It is a simple and fun educational toy. The basic units don't need a power source and they are robust and compact.

We have many ideas for the Edutape beyond children's toys, for example; train time tables, emergency information, distances and direction and many more. 

It is a totally new concept and easy to copy, therefore we want to hit the industry by storm .
In solving these challenges we would look at getting stronger patent protection, work with cutting edge manufacturers and getting distribution contracts signed internationally. We have the services of graphic design company and accountant on board ready to assist. 
Any contributions large or small will be a major blessing. Please help us spead the word about Edutape so that we can make this great concept a reality. 
Regards Dean
story_txt:
Short Summary
The Edutape is taking the tape measures to the next level. The width of the tape will be wider than the normal tape used on tape measures and the length starts from 50cm upwards c/w locking function and slow tape return .This surface allows to print information and pictures on the tape and stored in a robust compacted body.
Some idea for the Edutape :

Education -  Kids information within there age groups such as pictures, numbers and alphabets will be flashed before there eyes several times a minuet as the enjoy the motion of opening the tape.

Baking and Cooking - Recipes and measurements .

Company business card - Give more company information and technical info.

Ad space - Product information and brand awareness.

Emergency - First aid and emergency information.
There are hundred other ideas but hope you get the picture. Hi I'm Dean, married to Sharon, we have a daughter Danya and two boys Jon and James. My technical background and creative mind keeps me awake many nights with ideas constantly bouncing around my head.
Often when busy in my workshop, my boys were always digging around in my tools and I noticed they were obsessed with my tape measures. They played with them non stop, they carried them around the house and I could never find them. Then one day the idea hit me, this could be used as great learning tool for children.
It's been a dream for several years to manufacture the Edutape and see kids from all different tribes and tongues enjoying fun learning. Quality and safety are top of priority. It is compacted, robust and can just about go anywhere. 

I am looking for US$ 100000.00 to get the Edutape into the commercial market. The spending breakdown is as follows;


$20 000 for six month overheads 
$ 5 000 for graphic design and mould design.
$10 000 for travel and hotels to manufactures.
$30 000 for moulds manufacture and raw materials.
$10 000 for marketing
$10 000 packaging shipping and handling.
$ 5 000 I have a provisional patent and would like to strengthen my protection. 
$10 000 for unexpected costs.

Perks of investing in Edutape?  A once off special limited design set that will be produced specially for investors during the selected time frame. The collectors set will have my personal signature. Once the limit is reached the mould will never be used again. My belief is that this will increase the value as it will be a collectors item/limited edition.

If we don't reach your entire goal we have opted to raise funds after the deadline until we can for-full our contributors investments and see our dream realised. The deadline may have to be extended .    We have books, flash cards and electronic learning products and believe there a massive market for Edutape. It is a simple and fun educational toy. The basic units don't need a power source and they are robust and compact.

We have many ideas for the Edutape beyond children's toys, for example; train time tables, emergency information, distances and direction and many more. 
It is a totally new concept and easy to copy, therefore we want to hit the industry by storm .



In solving these challenges we would look at getting stronger patent protection, work with cutting edge manufacturers and getting distribution contracts signed internationally. We have the services of graphic design company and accountant on board ready to assist.     Any contributions large or small will be a major blessing. Please help us spead the word about Edutape so that we can make this great concept a reality. 

Regards Dean

story:
Each pair of LOUIS casual shoes is made with full grain calf leather and is crafted by hand. The manual process gives each pair its unique characteristics. Each pair goes through a rigorous inspection to ensure that every shoe is of the highest quality.

 

 

Our manufacturing process is done completely in-house. Each shoe takes great precision and skill to ensure the outcome is impeccable. 

 

When it comes to luxury, no matter how good your shoe looks, comfort is just as important.

LOUIS shoes are flexible, bold and light.

 

Each pair is superbly handcrafted and packed with features.

 

That's why LOUIS shoes:

   Are made from hand-selected full-grain leather.  
   Use a lightweight PV construction outsole that allows for easy, effortless movement. 
   Reduce common pressure points around the heel and mid-foot.
   Are lined with supple calfskin to keep your feet dry and cool.

LOUIS was designed for the modern gentleman looking to step up his style and add a bit of swagger. The LOUIS man is not afraid to be bold in his success.

Since every foot is different, we will send to all our backers a simple chart and ask for 2 measurements (in addition to the request of the usual shoe size): this little check will provide the best fit. All our shoes are true to size and very comfortable (with wide fit).

Once the campaign is funded, we will first send the surveys (style, colour and size) and hope to receive soon them back from all backers in September 2016. So, the faster we get them back, the sooner we start making your shoes, of course!

Approximately, we will procede through production in 8 weeks, and then shipping in 3 weeks (by December 2016 - January 2017)

 

 

We are very experienced in delivering shoes on time! We will do everything in our power to make sure we meet the timeline. 

Good things come to those who wait. At the present time we are able to produce a maximum of 30 pieces per day, so we set the delivery timeline according to this productive capacity. We always put a strong effort in order to satisfy all our customers.

The cost of international shipping & VAT (if applicable) will be charged at the time of the survey once the campaign is over. 

If applicable, duties and local taxes will be charged by the appropriate authority at the destination country. Please determine these charges locally.

 

Risk and challenges

We have a lifetime of experience in luxury footwear manufacturing and logistics. We are well organized and prepared to confront any situation that may arise. We have seen it all.

The most common risk in manufacturing is production delays. The manufacturing process relies on multiple components coming together at the same time. While we are very well versed in managing production and delivering on-time, there is always the possibility of a slight delay. However, we will be providing updates every step of the way to keep you fully informed.

story:
Re-Launch Coming Soon!

This is a great product we know you will enjoy.

Endo Exo 100% original

"Smart Design" Eyewear

by

JuMo Eyewear

 

Endo Exo Eyewear’s unique 100% original construction is smart for many reasons and how this eyewear is built is a completely new technique to build eyeglasses frames.

Its design incorporates the essence of simplicity!

This simplicity yields a functional, reusable, sustainable, comfortable, and very versatile pair of glasses!  

 

    

Over 50 Styles & Growing! 

Get creative, submit your design!

Model - Avan

Model - Avin

Model - Ariba

Model - Ariba Sun

Model - Rexi

 

What You Get

(besides a really really cool pair of glasses & eyewear company)

How it will impact YOU, the wearer, and what you get product wise.

  1. First, Endo’s are light, comfortable, flexible, and can be built in a range of different materials being, Italian Acetate, Carbon Fiber, Genuine Horn, Bone, Wood, Nylon, and the list goes on.
  2. Endo’s are a very DIY design and construction.They are simple to self adjust and ANY part can easily be replaced, anywhere you may be.
  3. Endo’s are convertible/changeable. Our “Kit” allows you to affix sports temples, change out new front shapes, and more.You just need to unscrew, the screw in a screw.We give you lots in your kit if you drop a couple.
  4. Endo’s are cheap and easy to customize!  Bespoke eyewear is very expensive, Endo’s and our unique bespoke services, cut custom costs 65% of what is on the markets currently.
  5. Sunglasses clip ons can be designed into any style.
  6. First quality lens products at very competitive prices.
  7. We are the people designing and building this product ourselves, you deal factory direct and we put you in direct contact with the designer of Endo Exo and his many other brands of eyewear this campaign will help to launch.Endo Exo is the tip of the iceberg.

www.jumoeyewear.com

 

Endo Exo Carbon Fiber Package!

We're ramping things up mid campaign with the the addition of this great material.

If you want something special, grab a JuMo Custom package and select from anything we can build!

 

 

What we need

(and where we are already.)

Our goal of 30K will:

  1. Fine tune site/image.
  2. Add virtual try on functions.
  3. Add a first in the industry “Virtual Eyewear Design” where you can control basic design functions yourself, then submit for us to build.
  4. Add marketing.
  5. Add multi language platform as we are going international, not just US national!
  6. Add initial “budget” selection of eyewear for those in the world that can’t afford much.
  7. Allow us to Incorporate in the US.  We are really excited about this part of the project, our simple low energy consumption set up in China has been tested and proven, Endo Exo is a perfect design to produce in the US! 

We are currently Incorporated in Hong Kong with a 250 meter facility/machinery capable of 3000 pairs monthly located in Mainland China.  Its all in place and a successful campaign will bring on the required work force.  Our main production masters are in place, one happens to be our founder who has built hand made eyewear himself since 1998.

Stripe is all set to our website, and we are pushing for inc. in US and opening of our US Endo Exo production center early to mid 2019.                 

This will bring part of a very refined and effective production method and product from China back to America!  Just wait till you see what we will be building there!  It will not be basic plastics.

We will be highly visible and competing in the same arena as Warby Parker, Coastal, and other big online providers of Rx eyewear, we will have a wider range limited only by ones imagination!

 

Model - Aldo

In Genuine Water Buffalo Horn

Impact

(of Endo Exo design .& JuMo Eyewear Company)

Our unique custom services as a company have great impact. We have formerly built specialized devices in cooperation with ophthalmology centers in the US that specialize in ptosis of the eyelid and other medically related issues that require something built into the frames.  We do this and we do it fast.

We do it very well also as our founder has worked for MD’s and Optometrists (OD) all his 38 year career as an optician. 

A successful campaign will get this part of our production seen and in the hands of people that need these types of services! 

  1. Specialized Devices & Services
  2. The planet – Smarter construction that reduces carbon footprint of eyewear production!
  3. Reliable, sustainable, comfortable, easily self adjusted eyewear.
  4. US based company with eyewear production & lens processing lab.
  5.  
  6. Training of design, machining, and other skills associated.
  7. Custom frames
  8. The company that “if you need something special built for you” we probably can and we do it fast when you need it, not 1 month later company.

This is the short list.  Come find out what really cool companies are all about.

www.jumoeyewear.com

 

Endo Exo is more than meets the eyes!

 

Endo Exo vs. Typical Eyewear Production

Shortlist of machines eliminated by Endo Exo Construction technique!

 

A – This monster is a core sinking machine and what it does is shoves a metal core through the length of the temple/arm.  This metal core has the temple hinge on it already in most cases.

Endo Exo’s have 2 simple holes drilled by small table top drill presses to insert a metal rod in its design.  Drilling these holes takes less time per temple than the complete process of machine A and since the holes are drilled by hand our design is a more hand made product.

B – This monster stands at about 6 feet tall and it is called a front hinge sink machine.  It takes that tiny hinge that is in the frames front piece and sinks it into the plastic using heat.

Endo Exo’s design eliminates this unit as the hinge mount for Endo’s is cut during the initial CNC routing step!

C – Hand Router.  Endo Exo eliminates several types of “hand routers” and there are many in the steps of a pair of eyeglasses.

D – Temple plain.   Not all plastic designs use this but most do.  Once again, another machine our Endo E design eliminates!

E – Temple to front butt angle/miter machine.  This requires greater skill levels.  Endo’s once again, eliminate the need for this machine and the skill required for this process.

F – Glue Cap Machine – A cap gets put on metal hinges on typical designs that then get a 72-hour final tumble.  Endo Exo Eliminates This Lengthy Final Finish Tumble Process!

As mentioned this is the “short list” of machines Endo Exo ELIMINATES!  There are several other smaller machines required that all add to carbon footprint in eyewear production of a handmade product.

 

When we develop new and better ways to produce any given product that reduces energy consumption and lowers carbon footprint in production, we are on the right track!

Endo Exo is the future of sustainable eyewear!

www.jumoeyewear.com

 

Endo Exo Collection is over 50 styles!

See them here!

https://www.jumoeyewear.com/endo-exo-cad-specs

See what's ready to ship here!

https://www.jumoeyewear.com/endo-exo

story:
Short Summary

My name is Angelyn Myers.  I'm married to my high school sweetheart and we have 6 kids!  My innovative patent pending idea was inspired by one of our children.  It's been an exciting journey bringing this product to life that started as an idea! I'm showing my kids you can accomplish anything you set your mind to do. 

What We Need & What You Get

My manufacturer is requiring a minimum order of 300 towels. I funded my first order and have the green frog design in stock! This campaign will fund the 2nd batch of pink flamingos!  This way you are pre-ordering to fulfill the inventory needs!

How you can Help

Some people just can't contribute, and that's ok! You can help by sharing and liking My"Buddy"Towel on all social media platforms!

  • get the word out and make some noise about this campaign!
  • Reminder use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
BoomS - The breakdown

  • Sneakers - Quality built from the inside out, light weight and  comfortable
  • Bluetooth -  Version 2.1  with 30 ft + transmission range (android/iPhone compatible)
  • Speaker - Rechargeable Lithium-ion battery, 3-hour battery life, Mini subwoofer
  • Speaker is located in the tongue of the shoe. 
  • Water resistant

  • Available Color - Black and white

Wheres the Speaker?

At the Skate Park

Who we are

We are sneaker lovers, music lovers, fathers, mothers, sons, and daughters. All working towards one goal, and that's bringing BoomS to life. With the help of friends and family. Input, suggestions and other wacky ideas. We came up with something that's worth talking about. Or something you can just listen to because BoomS sound great.

Who are we working with

We are working with an enthusiastic group of people. It's a great feeling to work with companies that actually believe in you and what you're trying to accomplish.  With the latest in shoe factory equipment, they offer great reliability and suggestions on meeting our quality goals and deadlines. With your help, we could make this all possible.

What can you do with BoomS

Get out there and play. Go with the music. In the 80s they carried boom boxes. Now we got BooMs. You can play soccer, basketball, football, tennis, baseball, and volleyball. Or you can go skating, running, do some yoga, dance or just walk. 

 

Size Chart

 

 

BoomS Unisex T-shirt 

 

Your Impact

Your funding goes toward finalizing designs, creating a production mold, and setting up a production line to create BoomS. Your help will also give us the push we need to get out there in front of the world. 

Song Selection

Due to copyright issues, we could not play many songs in the video. We are working on this. We look forward to playing different songs in update video clips. 

 

Risks & Challenges

Timing is everything, with any production item, you will always have ups and downs. Small or big, they're all time consuming. I know this very well because I have worked in the production business for over 10 years now. 

The best solution is communication, keeping you informed, and up to date. Nobody likes waiting for that package in the mail. We like to know when the product is on the way. To make things easier. We will do just that. Keep you informed, one update at a time until you have the product at your door.

Not only do we want to get it right, we want to make sure it's a product built with quality and stability.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Tell a friend, tell a family member, tell a stranger. Okay, okay, don't talk to strangers.  Just make sure you tell somebody about us. The more people we reach. The higher our odds will be of having a successful campaign. 

Thanks in advance for you support.

Press: moplays@gmail.com

FAQ

Q: How long is the battery life?

Battery life per shoe is up to 3 hours. For a total of 6 hours play time if you play 1 shoe at a time.

Q: Are the BoomS waterproof?

The BoomS will be water resistant. Some sweat and light rain shouldn't do it any harm. Like most electronics, take it easy around water.

Q: What if I have more question?

Contact us at moplays1@gmail.com

Tell a friend, tell a family member, tell a stranger. Okay, okay, don't talk to strangers.  Just make sure you tell somebody about us. The more people we reach. The higher our odds will be of having a successful campaign. 
Thanks in advance for you support.
Press: moplays@gmail.com
FAQ
Q: How long is the battery life?
Battery life per shoe is up to 3 hours. For a total of 6 hours play time if you play 1 shoe at a time.
Q: Are the BoomS waterproof?
The BoomS will be water resistant. Some sweat and light rain shouldn't do it any harm. Like most electronics, take it easy around water.
Q: What if I have more question?
Contact us at moplays1@gmail.com

story:
WER WIR SIND UND WARUM WIR HIER SIND

 

Wir halten uns kurz.

 

Wir sind BojkuWemhoff - drei Freunde aus dem Münsterland, die Euch dabei helfen wollen, gut auszusehen. 

Wir sind ein BWL Student, ein Architektur Student und ein Immobilienkaufmann und zusammen sind wir BojkuWemhoff - oder eben kurz: BW Watches.

Während eines gemeinsamen Shoppingausflugs haben wir gemerkt, dass alle Uhren die uns gefallen haben, entweder unser Budget sprengen oder von jedem Zweiten am Handgelenk getragen werden und somit keine Individualität ausstrahlen. Mit unserem Projekt wollen wir genau das ändern! 

Daher haben wir uns zusammengesetzt und sechs verschiedene Uhren mit eigenen Persönlichkeiten designed und uns Gedanken gemacht, wie wir Euch ein besonderes Erlebnis und eine schöne Zeit mit Eurem neuen Begleiter am Handgelenk bieten können - das Folgende hat sich daraus ergeben:

Die Uhr

Schaut Euch hier unser LookBook für die 1. Collection an.

 

Unsere Uhren fallen auf - sie sind anders.


Sechs Uhren, die den Geschmack aller Leute treffen sollen. Von eleganten und klassischen Uhren, wie der "Samuel", bis hin zu komplett goldenen, wie der "Leonardo".

Samuel

Der Anzug sitzt? Die Schuhe poliert? Die Krawatte gerichtet? Jetzt fehlt nur noch die richtige Uhr. Was ein Zufall, dass wir genau die Richtige haben! Mit der "Samuel" reicht es vielleicht nicht für den "Man of the Year" aber "Man of the Office" bist Du garantiert. Und nach der Arbeit gehst Du mit der süßen Blondine noch etwas essen und am Ende des Abends gehst Du sicher nicht allein nach Hause.

Channing

Die "Channing" besticht durch ihr dezentes Auftreten. Egal wo Du bist - bei der Party, wo Du die hübsche Blondine oder den süßen Typen aus der BiB triffst, im Büro, wo Du durch Leistung überzeugst oder einfach wenn Du mit deinen Freunden unterwegs bist: Mit der "Channing" bist Du immer bestens gerüstet, alles erreichen zu können!

Donna

Du hast alles im Griff und bist einfach umwerfend? Dann haben wir da was für Dich! Roségoldene Farben und ein zeitloses klassisches Design werden Dir auch an regnerischen Tagen ein Lächeln auf die Lippen zaubern. Also: Schnapp Dir Deine Freunde, Lippenstift drauf und mach den Tag zu Deinem Tag oder die Nacht oder Beides, das bleibt Dir überlassen! You rule the world, girl!

Neal

Dein Outfit sitzt zu jeder Tageszeit perfekt? Deine Schuhe sind immer top gepflegt und Du bestichst durch ein tolles Auftreten? Dann solltest Du Dir "Neal" näher anschauen. Klassisches Design und dezente Farben helfen Dir, jedem Deiner Outfits den letzten Schliff zu geben. Worauf wartest Du also noch - "Neal" ist immer bereit, genauso wie Du!

Rachel

Sommerkleid, Eis, Sonnenbrille, Sonne und Deine besten Freunde - was fehlt da noch? Richtig, der letzte Schliff. Das kleine Etwas. Und zufälligerweise haben wir da etwas für Dich. Die "Rachel" komplettiert jedes Outfit und schmeichelt Dir mit ihren sanften, femininen Farben. Worauf wartest Du noch, Süße? Dieser Sommer ist Dein Sommer!

Leonardo

Understatement ist nicht so Dein Ding? Dann bist Du hier genau richtig.  Golden wie der Oscar, aber leichter zu kriegen. Die "Leonardo" fällt einfach auf, egal wo Du Dich bewegst. Von den roten Teppichen vor den Clubs Deiner Stadt oder kombiniert mit einem schlichten Shirt - mit dieser Uhr gehst Du nicht unter. 

Alle unsere Uhren teilen jedoch einiges:

1. Die hohe Qualität.

Alle unsere Uhren haben ein mechanisches Präzisions-uhrwerk, eine Scheibe aus Saphir Glas und sie sind wasserdicht. Wir sind so überzeugt, dass wir Eure Uhren mit einer Garantie liefern. Sollte innerhalb des ersten Jahres das Uhrwerk einen Schaden nehmen, dann bekommt Ihr eine neue Uhr als Ersatz. Ohne Wenn und Aber.

2. Der Preis

Alle unsere Uhren werden zu dem gleichen Preis angeboten. Du musst Dich also nicht bei jeder Uhr fragen, ob sie in Deinem Budget liegt. Liegt eine Uhr in Deinem Budget, hast Du die freie Wahl bei der gesamten Kollektion.

3. Der Versand

"Der Versand sollte schnell und kostenlos sein" - Jesus.

Diesem Wunsch sind wir nachgegangen. Ihr zahlt keinen Cent für den Versand - egal wo Ihr auf der Welt seid. Von Amsterdam bis nach Zypern, Eure neue Uhr kommt schnell und gratis zu Euch.

4. Das Soziale Engagement

Wir wollen die Chance nutzen und den Leuten etwas geben, die es schwerer im Leben haben als Du und ich, also schaffen wir Arbeitsplätze für wundervolle geistig und körperlich beeinträchtigte Menschen.
Unsere Versandpakete werden von sozialen Einrichtungen verpackt und versandt und so können wir Menschen helfen, einen Job zu finden und eine hoffentlich langjährige Beziehung mit uns und unseren Kunden einzugehen. Uns geht es nicht nur um die Zahlen, uns geht es um die Menschen, die wir mit unserer Uhr begeistern und glücklich machen können.

5. Die einzigartige Verpackung

Unsere Uhr kommt in einer massiven, wunderschönen Holzbox, die einmalig in diesem Preissegment ist. Diese schützt die Uhr nicht nur, sondern sieht auch später in deiner Wohnung unglaublich gut aus. Velours-Untergrund und Leder inklusive.

6. Personalisiertes Shopping-Erlebnis

Für uns sind unsere Kunden mehr als nur ein Name im System. Für uns seid Ihr ein Teil der BW Family. Daher liegen jedem Paket ein persönliches Geschenk und ein Anschreiben sowie weitere Extras bei. Generische Anschreiben sind unpersönlich und bedeuten nichts, also haben wir das geändert.

Was Du uns gibst & was Du bekommst

Hier ist es ein einfaches "Geben und Nehmen".

Du bekommst eine tolle Uhr, persönliche Accessoires, eine exklusive Uhrenbox und kostenlosen Versand. Du bist komplett auf der sicheren Seite - wir haben bereits Prototypen der Uhren und haben sie auf Herz und Nieren getestet - und wir sind sehr zufrieden! Zusätzlich haben wir uns verschiedene Meinungen eingeholt und Juweliere gefragt, was diese von unseren Uhren halten. Die Rückmeldungen waren allesamt positiv.

Du investierst in ein nachhaltiges Unternehmen, das sich um seine Mitarbeiter und Mitmenschen kümmert. Du hilfst uns und vielen anderen Menschen und bekommst eine tolle Uhr, es ist also eine Win-Win-Situation. 

Für den späteren Verkauf peilen wir einen Verkaufspreis von 140 € an, hier habt Ihr die Möglichkeit, Euch eine Uhr für 90 € zu sichern - inklusive Versand und gutem Gewissen.
 

Was passierte und was noch kommt

 


Im Dezember 2016 wurde die Idee ins Leben gerufen. Es folgten ein paar Monate, in denen wir die Uhren designed und einen Hersteller gesucht haben. Nach Verhandlungen mit dem Hersteller haben wir unsere Prototypen bestellt. Auf Grund des chinesischen Neujahrs verspätete sich die Lieferung jedoch. Wir sind froh, dass wir solche Schwierigkeiten erlebt haben, bevor wir live gegangen sind, damit Ihr solche Probleme nicht erlebt. Nachdem die Prototypen bestellt wurden, haben wir uns um das ganze Paket gekümmert. Welche Boxen möchten wir nehmen? Welche Zugaben gibt es? Wie machen wir das ganze Shopping-Erlebnis persönlich und ansprechend? Das waren einige Herausforderungen, denen wir uns stellten. Anschließend ging es darum, eine soziale Einrichtung zu finden, die wir unterstützen können und die uns auch helfen kann, den Versand zu bewerkstelligen. 
Nachdem wir unsere Prototyp Uhren erhalten haben, haben wir angefangen, Fotos und Videos zu machen, damit wir unsere sozialen Kanäle und die Website mit Content füllen können. Anschliessend haben wir Blogs geschrieben, Websites erstellt und diese Kampagne geschrieben. Zusätzlich haben wir mit verschiedenen Einzelhändlern gesprochen, um auch physisch in einigen Läden vertreten zu sein.

Sollten wir unser Ziel nicht erreichen können, bekommt Ihr Euer Geld natürlich direkt zurück.
 

Risiken & Herausforderungen

 

In den vergangenen 10 Monaten haben wir definitiv viel gelernt. Wir haben viel über die Schwierigkeiten des Gründens gelernt. Wir haben gelernt, wieviel Bürokratie es ist, wieviel Zeit und Aufwand man investieren muss, doch trotz all der Rückschläge sind wir unglaublich froh, dass wir jetzt da stehen, wo wir sind. Wir haben ein fertiges Produkt, einen funktionierenden Prototyp!

Wir sind zudem eine eingetragene Unternehmung, haben alle Social Media Kanäle erstellt und eine Website designed - und da sind wir mächtig stolz drauf. Wir sind als Team zusammengewachsen, haben viel über uns gelernt und gemerkt, dass wir ein junges & dynamisches Team sind, das viel bewegen kann. Wir sind bereit für etwas Grosses und Anderes, etwas, dass einzigartig und authentisch ist.

Natürlich kann es sein, dass Euch unsere Uhren nicht gefallen oder Ihr nicht warten wollt, vielleicht erreichen wir auch unser Funding Ziel nicht, doch das sind Faktoren, die wir nur bedingt beeinflussen können. Wir haben unser Bestes gegeben, Uhren zu designen und zu produzieren, die Euren Geschmack treffen - jetzt liegt es an Euch!


 

Andere Wege, wie man helfen kann

 

Euch gefällt unsere Idee, aber momentan seid Ihr einfach knapp bei Kasse oder Ihr braucht gerade keine neue Uhr?

Dann folgt uns auf Facebook oder Instagram - jedes Like und jeder Click bringt uns ein Stück näher an unser Ziel. 

Vielleicht kennst Du ja auch jemanden, der eine neue Uhr möchte, dann erzähl ihm doch von uns!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/bojkuwemhoff/

Instagram: https://instagram.com/bojkuwemhoff_watches

Website: http://bojkuwemhoff.de/en

 

Who we are and why we are here.

 

Let's keep it short.


We are BojkuWemhoff - 3 friends from a small town in Germany and we want to help you look stunning.

We are one business student, one architecture student and one real estate business man and together, we are BojkuWemhoff - or shorter: BW Watches.

During a collective shopping trip, we experienced a big problem. Every watch we liked would either kill our budget or it would be worn by every second person we see - and that was really frustrating because we wanted to express our individuality, our personal style and that is why we started this project. We want to change that.

So we got together and created 6 different watches with individul looks and personalities. We were thinking: How can we give You a special shopping experience and a new companion for Your wrist, without making You sell a kidney. That´s what we came up with:

The Watch

Take a look at our first collection on our Lookbook here.

Our watches are different - They will catch everyone´s attention.

6 watches that are made to meet everyone´s taste. From elegant and classy like "Samuel" to complete golden and striking - like our "Leonardo".

 

Samuel

Your suit fits perfectly? Your tie is on point? Now You are only missing the right watch.

What a coincidence that we offer Your new partner in crime. Maybe You will not be "Man of the Year" right away, but You will definitely become "Man of the Office". And at the end of the day, You will take the cute blonde coworker of Yours out for dinner. You will definitely not go home alone. 

Channing

"Channing" comes with an unbeatable elegance.

No matter where You are, You will always look stunning. Whether You are partying and flirting with that blonde girl or that cute boy You like, or in the office, where this watch perfects Your outfit. "Channing" will help You to reach Your goals!

Donna

You are just stunning and never let anything slip? Then we have something just for You. Rose golden colours and a timeless design will make You smile even on the rainiest of days. So: Get together with Your friends, put some lipstick on and make this day Yours. You rule the world, girl!

Neal

Your outfit is always on fleek? Your shoes are perfectly clean and whenever You enter a room, all eyes are on You? Then take a closer look at "Neal".  Classic design and clear colours will make Your outfit perfect.  What are You waiting for - "Neal" is always ready, just like You!

Rachel

Summer dress, ice cream, sunglasses and Your girls - but something is still missing: The last step to perfection. And what a coincidence that we have something for You! Our "Rachel" completes every outfit and adds elegance and joy with her warm, feminine colours. What are you waiting for, Cutie? This summer is Your summer.

Leonardo

You don´t really like understatement? Then do not look further. Golden like the Oscar, but easier to get. Our "Leonardo" will always shine - on the red carpets in front of the clubs in Your city or if You combine it with a plain black T.

But since our watches are one big family, they also share a few aspects:

1. The high quality

All our watches come with a precision movement, saphire glas and they are waterproof. We are so convinced by the quality of our watches that we offer You a 1 year "No Questions Asked" guarantee. If Your watch happens to have a problem within that period, we will replace it.

2. The price

All our watches are offered for the same price. You do not have to check Your budget for every watch. Do it once and You have the free choice.

3. Delivery

"Delivery should be fast and free" - Jesus.

OK Jesus, we heard you. You do not pay any cent extra for fast and worldwide delivery. From Amsterdam to Zimbabwe - Your watch is delivered for free.

4. Social engagement

We wanted to use the chance and give back to the people that have a harder life than You and I - So we found a way to create workplaces for handicapped people. Our packages will be assembled and shipped by a social institution in our hometown that employs handicapped people with whom we hope to establish a long-term relationship. For us it is not only about the numbers - it is about making people happy.

5. The unique packaging

All our watches come in a massive wooden box that is unique in this price segment. It protects the watch during travelling and will definitely earn a top spot in Your room because it just looks incredible.

6. Personalized shopping experience

For us, our customers are more than just a number in the system. You are a part of the BW family. That´s why every box comes with a personalized gift, a letter, directly addressed to You and other extras. Generic was yesterday - we care about You.

What You give and what You get

This is easy - give and be rewarded with Your new best friend.

You receive a great watch, personalized accessories, a great box and free delivery. 
And You are on the safe side - we do already have the watches as prototypes at home and wear, test and love them every day. We went out and got many feedbacks on our watches and they were very positive.

You are also investing in a sustainable company that cares for its people. You are helping many people and receive a watch for a great price. It is a win-win situation.

The retail price will be around 140€- You have the chance to save Yourself a watch for 90€ only - including free delivery and the feeling of having helped many people.
 

How it all started

It all started in December 2016, followed by a few tough months of research and Skype calls until we finally found a producer for our watches and we ordered our prototypes. Due to the Chinese New Year, our delivery was delayed heavily, but we are happy to have made this experience, so You do not have to experience it Yourself. After we had ordered the samples, we took care of the whole package - which extras we will put in the package? Which box will we use? How can we make buying our watch a personalized shopping experience? We tackled those challenges and overcame them all. Now it was time to find a social institution that will help us do good and that will take care of the distribution.

After having received our prototype, we started to take pictures and created videos, so that we can fill our social media channels and websites with content now. Then we wrote blogs, finished our website and wrote the campaign. In addition, we talked to retailers to make the watch also available in physical stores.

Should we not meet our target, of course, You will be refunded your money,

Risks and challenges

 

We have definitely learned a lot in the last 10 months! We learned, what it means to found a company - with all its ups and downs, wins and losses. But now we have the final product and we are very proud and extremely happy with the result.

We are a registered business, filled all our social media channels and designed a website to deliver You the full coverage of what we do and to engage with our customers. We grew as a team and we figured out that we can make an impact! We are ready for something big, something fresh and authentic.

Of course it could happen that You do not like our watches or that You do not want to wait. Maybe we will not reach our funding goal, but we cannot influence those factors. We did everything we could to design and produce watches that will be great for everyone - now it is up to You.
 

Other ways to help

You like our idea, but Your wallet disagrees with You? Maybe You just do not need a watch at the moment. Then follow us on Facebook and Instagram - every like and every click helps us to reach our ambitious goal.

If You know someone that needs a watch, spread the word!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/bojkuwemhoff/

Instagram: https://instagram.com/bojkuwemhoff_watches

Website: http://bojkuwemhoff.de/en

Natürlich kann es sein, dass Euch unsere Uhren nicht gefallen oder Ihr nicht warten wollt, vielleicht erreichen wir auch unser Funding Ziel nicht, doch das sind Faktoren, die wir nur bedingt beeinflussen können. Wir haben unser Bestes gegeben, Uhren zu designen und zu produzieren, die Euren Geschmack treffen - jetzt liegt es an Euch!   
Andere Wege, wie man helfen kann Euch gefällt unsere Idee, aber momentan seid Ihr einfach knapp bei Kasse oder Ihr braucht gerade keine neue Uhr?
Dann folgt uns auf Facebook oder Instagram - jedes Like und jeder Click bringt uns ein Stück näher an unser Ziel. 
Vielleicht kennst Du ja auch jemanden, der eine neue Uhr möchte, dann erzähl ihm doch von uns!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/bojkuwemhoff/
Instagram: https://instagram.com/bojkuwemhoff_watches
Website: http://bojkuwemhoff.de/en Who we are and why we are here. Let's keep it short.
We are BojkuWemhoff - 3 friends from a small town in Germany and we want to help you look stunning.

We are one business student, one architecture student and one real estate business man and together, we are BojkuWemhoff - or shorter: BW Watches.
During a collective shopping trip, we experienced a big problem. Every watch we liked would either kill our budget or it would be worn by every second person we see - and that was really frustrating because we wanted to express our individuality, our personal style and that is why we started this project. We want to change that.
So we got together and created 6 different watches with individul looks and personalities. We were thinking: How can we give You a special shopping experience and a new companion for Your wrist, without making You sell a kidney. That´s what we came up with:
The Watch
Take a look at our first collection on our Lookbook here.

Our watches are different - They will catch everyone´s attention.
6 watches that are made to meet everyone´s taste. From elegant and classy like "Samuel" to complete golden and striking - like our "Leonardo".
 

Samuel
Your suit fits perfectly? Your tie is on point? Now You are only missing the right watch.
What a coincidence that we offer Your new partner in crime. Maybe You will not be "Man of the Year" right away, but You will definitely become "Man of the Office". And at the end of the day, You will take the cute blonde coworker of Yours out for dinner. You will definitely not go home alone. 

Channing
"Channing" comes with an unbeatable elegance.
No matter where You are, You will always look stunning. Whether You are partying and flirting with that blonde girl or that cute boy You like, or in the office, where this watch perfects Your outfit. "Channing" will help You to reach Your goals!

Donna
You are just stunning and never let anything slip? Then we have something just for You. Rose golden colours and a timeless design will make You smile even on the rainiest of days. So: Get together with Your friends, put some lipstick on and make this day Yours. You rule the world, girl!

Neal
Your outfit is always on fleek? Your shoes are perfectly clean and whenever You enter a room, all eyes are on You? Then take a closer look at "Neal".  Classic design and clear colours will make Your outfit perfect.  What are You waiting for - "Neal" is always ready, just like You!

Rachel
Summer dress, ice cream, sunglasses and Your girls - but something is still missing: The last step to perfection. And what a coincidence that we have something for You! Our "Rachel" completes every outfit and adds elegance and joy with her warm, feminine colours. What are you waiting for, Cutie? This summer is Your summer.

Leonardo
You don´t really like understatement? Then do not look further. Golden like the Oscar, but easier to get. Our "Leonardo" will always shine - on the red carpets in front of the clubs in Your city or if You combine it with a plain black T.
But since our watches are one big family, they also share a few aspects:
1. The high quality
All our watches come with a precision movement, saphire glas and they are waterproof. We are so convinced by the quality of our watches that we offer You a 1 year "No Questions Asked" guarantee. If Your watch happens to have a problem within that period, we will replace it.
2. The price
All our watches are offered for the same price. You do not have to check Your budget for every watch. Do it once and You have the free choice.
3. Delivery
"Delivery should be fast and free" - Jesus.
OK Jesus, we heard you. You do not pay any cent extra for fast and worldwide delivery. From Amsterdam to Zimbabwe - Your watch is delivered for free.
4. Social engagement
We wanted to use the chance and give back to the people that have a harder life than You and I - So we found a way to create workplaces for handicapped people. Our packages will be assembled and shipped by a social institution in our hometown that employs handicapped people with whom we hope to establish a long-term relationship. For us it is not only about the numbers - it is about making people happy.
5. The unique packaging
All our watches come in a massive wooden box that is unique in this price segment. It protects the watch during travelling and will definitely earn a top spot in Your room because it just looks incredible.

6. Personalized shopping experience
For us, our customers are more than just a number in the system. You are a part of the BW family. That´s why every box comes with a personalized gift, a letter, directly addressed to You and other extras. Generic was yesterday - we care about You.


What You give and what You get
This is easy - give and be rewarded with Your new best friend.
You receive a great watch, personalized accessories, a great box and free delivery. And You are on the safe side - we do already have the watches as prototypes at home and wear, test and love them every day. We went out and got many feedbacks on our watches and they were very positive.
You are also investing in a sustainable company that cares for its people. You are helping many people and receive a watch for a great price. It is a win-win situation.
The retail price will be around 140€- You have the chance to save Yourself a watch for 90€ only - including free delivery and the feeling of having helped many people.  


How it all started

It all started in December 2016, followed by a few tough months of research and Skype calls until we finally found a producer for our watches and we ordered our prototypes. Due to the Chinese New Year, our delivery was delayed heavily, but we are happy to have made this experience, so You do not have to experience it Yourself. After we had ordered the samples, we took care of the whole package - which extras we will put in the package? Which box will we use? How can we make buying our watch a personalized shopping experience? We tackled those challenges and overcame them all. Now it was time to find a social institution that will help us do good and that will take care of the distribution.
After having received our prototype, we started to take pictures and created videos, so that we can fill our social media channels and websites with content now. Then we wrote blogs, finished our website and wrote the campaign. In addition, we talked to retailers to make the watch also available in physical stores.
Should we not meet our target, of course, You will be refunded your money,


Risks and challenges
 
We have definitely learned a lot in the last 10 months! We learned, what it means to found a company - with all its ups and downs, wins and losses. But now we have the final product and we are very proud and extremely happy with the result.
We are a registered business, filled all our social media channels and designed a website to deliver You the full coverage of what we do and to engage with our customers. We grew as a team and we figured out that we can make an impact! We are ready for something big, something fresh and authentic.Of course it could happen that You do not like our watches or that You do not want to wait. Maybe we will not reach our funding goal, but we cannot influence those factors. We did everything we could to design and produce watches that will be great for everyone - now it is up to You. 

Other ways to help
You like our idea, but Your wallet disagrees with You? Maybe You just do not need a watch at the moment. Then follow us on Facebook and Instagram - every like and every click helps us to reach our ambitious goal.
If You know someone that needs a watch, spread the word!
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/bojkuwemhoff/
Instagram: https://instagram.com/bojkuwemhoff_watches
Website: http://bojkuwemhoff.de/en

story:
Hello my name is Elias and I am the creator of the these green lantern ring replicas. As a long time Green Lantern fan and more importantly a believer in the Green Lantern mythos of willpower and overcoming fear I searched high and low for a true to life green lantern ring that I could wear as an emblem of willpower. I wanted one that had the same, entirely green, look of the comics, but after years of searching the best thing I could find were green lantern rings made out of silver and gold or from that horrible horrible green lantern movie.
   In 2016 I set out to make what I had been searching for all this time out of my own will and imagination. I had a designer make me a digital ring out of a design I sketched and contacted several machinists to milled the rings out of aluminum using the latest technology of 3d printing. The result was the first batch of green lantern rings.

The first batch contained only 50 rings that were size 9.5 but when shared with the internet they created an incredible demand for larger and smaller sizes, and even different corps colors. I had found others that were looking for the same token of willpower.

What Exactly Are These Rings You Speak Of?

 The rings  I created are 3D milled out of a 6061 alluminum, polished by hand, then anodized by hand. This is what gives it a tough green coating. Afterward, depending on the order, I use a crystal clear non yellowing resin to "infuse" the rings with extra bright photo-phosphate glow crystals.The result is an incredible durable green lantern ring that is also lightweight and charges when exposed to UV light (or any white light).

So If Everybody Loves These Rings Why Not Just Make Some More?

"Aye There's the Rub!" while the first batch was an extreme success it was not without its problems which included.

  • 6061 is not an ideal aluminum for anodizing, which means that the color and over polish of the rings are not a beautiful as what is possible with aluminum. 
  • Due to limitations with the machining process only one size could be made per order severely limiting production amount and sizes. I chose size 9.5 as it is the universal male size but have received a huge demand for much larger and smaller sizes.

So whats the solution?

I have worked out a deal with the machining company that made the first batch of rings to produce several sizes in one order. The catch is that  the quantity of rings must be  increased. So instead of making 50 rings that are size 9.5 I will be making a much larger batch with multiple sizes out of a better material!

  • I wish to make the new batch out of a 6063 aluminum which both polishes and anodizes better than 6061. The result will look something like the below image in color and shine

  • The sizes I wish to include are US 6, 8, 10, AND 13 in this next batch.

 

So whats the problem?

In order to produce the rings in the quantity and sizes I want the cost will be almost four times higher than the first batch.

6063 Aluminum is more expensive to mill than 6061 and in order to supply the multiple sizes I need to have a larger quantity which ultimately drives up the cost of the order. Even with the revenue from the previous rings I am $7000 over budget.

This Is Where You Come In!

I am setting up preorders through indiegogo. I hope to raise the $7000 through preorders to produce the entire order or rings. If everyone preordered a ring @ $150 we would only need 47 people to hit our goal. I already have around 20 people lined up for the next batch of rings so if they placed orders we would only need 27 more to hit our goal!

Help me reach my goal and share these great rings with tons of fans everywhere!

If we hit our goal in 30 days I hope to have these rings finished by the end of September, just in time for Comic Con and Halloween!

These rings are more than just costume rings. For me they represent what I love about the Green Lantern mythos- willpower and the  ability to overcome fear. I suceeded the first time but this time am in need of a Corps. Can you come to the call?!

 

Future Plans

All revenue will be used to order more sizes and eventually more colors and corps for the future! I hope to one day offer all corps in all sizes!

story:
At Chubb Scout Clothing, we specialize not only in producing high-quality clothing but in doing it in such a way that we are making a positive impact on the world, Specifically, all the T-Shirts from this campaign will be printed on AllMade Tri-Blend T-Shirts. AllMade pays its Haitian Makers five times the average wage for the same work,  to help them to break the cycle of poverty and child abandonment that is prolific to the small island nation. You can be confident while purchasing and wearing Chubb Scout, as 10% of ALL proceeds go to Global Orphan Project.

Currently the Chubb Scout Clothing team is working hard to produce a line of kids and baby fashion. We have created 5 original Toon-style characters EXCLUSIVELY for our launch, and all tees will be printed on Allmade Tri-Blend. Which are made from 50% recycled plastic bottles and 25% Locally Sourced Organic Cotton.  The line will encompass tees, mugs, onesies, hoodies, backpacks, and other items with Toon designs and patterns all currently available at: ChubbScoutClothing.com. This campaign will also fund the development of Toon Patterned  Dresses, Baby Leggings and Shirts(MAY). 

We are owned and operated by a Disabled Veteran / Stay-at-Home Dad – not a corporation. You can count on us to do the right thing and stand by our promises.

Right now, we have come to you, for help raising $500. These funds will cover the costs of building a Professional Website. As a thank-you, we are offering our products at a steep discount to contributors of this campaign exclusively, just our way of showing how much we appreciate your support.

The Children around the world need our help. They are struggling to get by, and they have been struggling for quite some time now. The average worker in Haiti earns just $3 per day to support a family of 8, and they are at high risk of child abandonment. With efforts like the one we are driving at Chubb Scout Clothing, we can finally take a dent out of the poverty that hangs over these people’s heads.

Beyond making a monetary contribution, you can help out by sharing our campaign with all your friends and family. Go ahead and post the campaign link on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and any other social media platforms you use. The more people that are aware of what we are doing, the smoother this campaign will go. We want Chubb Scout Clothing to become a household name, because the bigger we get, the more lives we can change.

Your contributions are greatly appreciated. Thank you for your time and support!

story:
This is the new normal.

Meet RECO Mask, a wearable air purifier that can provide you high-quality air filtration and a free-breathing experience.

 

RECO Mask’s built-in active airflow module effectively guides your exhaling out of the mask, which allows for high breathability in different occasions. Combined with a replaceable N95 grade filter and a sleek, ergonomic outer skin, RECO Mask can provide you up to months of comfortable protection. 

 

 

We believe that you deserve to breathe better.

In this post quarantine world, masks have become a necessity for people to do just about anything in public from shopping, dining, to socializing. However, the experience of wearing masks has not been so pleasant.

 

 

If you are reading this, chances are that you have felt the stuffiness and moisture when wearing a mask. You have smelled your own bad breath behind the mask, which makes you wonder if others have noticed when you are not wearing one. Your glasses are always foggy no matter how many times you adjust the mask. Why do people have to choose between safety and breathe freely?

 

What is wrong with your current mask?

 

Nothing. Most face masks can effectively filter particles in the air for you, because a mask is essentially multiple layers of fabrics that capture various sizes of particles before they enter your nose or mouth. However, when you exhale, the fabrics block the air from leaving the mask, which creates a high-pressure zone on your face. Without a “proper” way to vent out, this trapped exhaling causes you to feel the stuffiness and moisture.

 

“The New Normal”

RECO Mask was created by a team of like-minded fresh graduates from Boston University, Emerson College, University of Pennsylvania, and many renowned universities. We experienced the discomfort from wearing face masks, and we were inspired to develop a breathable, reusable, and stylish mask that can be incorporated into people's daily lifestyle.

 

As the world reopens, a new normal of human mobility will emerge, and we believe that it is time to introduce “the new normal” of face masks.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Air Module Test Footage
 

RECO is more than a regular mask. It is a wearable air purifier that will change the way you perceive face masks. The moment you press the power button and activate the air module, it will vent out all the hot air and moisture accumulated in the mask, leaving you a refreshing feeling.

 

 

 

One Filter = 10 to 14 Days of Protection

 

 

 

Every curve of RECO Mask is carefully designed and crafted.

 

 

Wearing a mask with style is no longer a dream.

 

 

RECO Mask vs. Other masks

 

 

To make your breathing experience more pleasant, we have designed the scented botanical filters that are infused with natural essential oils. In addition to the original filter, there are three flavors available to unlock as stretch goals: 

  • Lavender
  • Moroccan Mint
  • Green Tea

Support our campaign to unlock these flavors!

 

 

Easy to Wear, and Care

 

Attach the velcro straps together behind your head

 

Machine washable skin

 

Replace and dispose N95 filter

 

 

Charge the air module with Micro USB cable

 

RECO Mask's filter has been tested and certified for SAWS Standard GB2626-2006, which is equivalent to USA NIOSH N95 or EU FFP2 standards. This test confirms that the RECO filter has filtration effiency of over 95% (97% from the test report) for 0.3um particles. 

The air module has received certification of complicance from CE and FCC. The RECO Mask will be able to sustain long-term operation and recharge under suggested temperatures without the risk of fire, shock, or releasing harmful substances. 

Pick the reward option that best suits your need. You will be able to select the color and filter flavors after the campaign finishes!
