story:
Be Bold. Be Sustainable. Be Free.

After 10 months of development, many prototypes, many discussions and opinions, we have developed the 1st modern backpack with an outer material made of 100% hemp.

 

 

 

 

 

A lot of space for the daily lifestyle and beyond. 

The outer material is made of 100% hemp. The inside is fastened with a robust mixed fabric made out of hemp & organic cotton. The accessories, such as the handle and ribbons, are made out of recycled materials. When choosing the fabrics, special attention was paid to quality and ecological footprint.

We have used high quality and durable STS zippers. The shoulder straps and the laptop compartment are both padded.

Our fabrics are also odorless, so they do not smell of Marijuana.   

 

 

Hampley I Rush - Black

No matter what color you choose, turning heads is guaranteed. 

 

 

 

Designed for everyday use, the Hampley Rush, measuring 38.5 x 30 x 11 cm and with a capacity of 13 litres, is ideal for city and country trips.

To create additional storage space, it has an anti-theft pocket on the back, two side pockets and a front pocket with zip. The back compartment measures 20 x 12 cm.

Inside, the backpack also has a laptop compartment that can easily accommodate a 13" laptop.

 

 

 

Polyester and other synthetic materials, such as nylon and artificial leather (polyurethane), are made from crude oil and are therefore pure plastic.  They contribute to the destruction of the environment.

 

 

Plastic damages the environment during production, during and after use.

According to Greenpeace, about 49% of all textiles today are made of polyester, and the trend is rising. Although we now have the ability to recycle old plastic and synthetic textiles, material is only recyclable to a limited extent and this does not solve the problem of microplastics.

 

1 Million Sold Plastic Backpacks

Over 1 million backpacks made of synthetic materials were sold in Germany in 2017. In the backpack industry, almost all backpacks are made of synthetic fibers. Why not save resources and avoid pollution?

 

 

 

 

Since 2016 we have been working on sustainable materials and are convinced that hemp has the greatest chance, as a fiber plant, of replacing synthetic material completely.

 

 

Hemp has almost completely disappeared from the textile industry over the last 100 years, despite hemp fibers being the most sustainable and durable fibers out there.

  • According to the Consumer Initiative Germany, 25% of all pesticides are used in cotton fields. Hemp does not require any environmentally harmful pesticides or herbicides for cultivation. This protects the farmers, protects the groundwater, and prevents bee mortality. 
     
  • Growing hemp saves one of the most important resources on our planet: water. Compared to cotton we can save up to 80% water during the growth phase.
     
  • Hemp is very efficient. It uses sunlight better than almost any other plant. Therefore it grows very fast and we have high yields. Hemp can grow about 4 meters in 100 days.
     
  • Hemp can be grown almost everywhere on the earth. Cotton, on the other hand, can only grow in very warm areas of the earth, i.e. where pests have particularly good climatic conditions and where there is often a shortage of water anyway. 

 

 
 
 

A long way - But we made it.

 

The sourcing of hemp materials has been the biggest challenge for us so far.  Hemp fibers are very robust and resistant. Processing it to become a soft material is very difficult. Due to the low demand for hemp textiles there are very few manufacturers worldwide. We looked at productions from all over the world and in the end we chose the best one. 

The quality of our fabrics is excellent and our production is committed to social responsibility. Employees are treated fairly and in addition to the many certifications, social projects are supported.

After 10 months of development, many prototypes, many discussions and opinions, we have developed the 1st modern backpack made from 100% hemp.

 

 

 

 

 

It is important to us that a sustainable and social supply chain is maintained.Our suppliers are therefore awarded with one of the most important certifications. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

DIFFERENT BACKGROUNDS - ONE GOAL

It is our mission to provide the best sustainable backpacks. We all come from different backgrounds and combine our strengths to make the backpacks of tomorrow.

 

 

 

 

Be part of the movement! 

 

 

This picture was taken during the shooting of our crowdfunding video. A lot of praise and a massive thank you to the founders of "the Gang" - Frankfurt's most creative minds for videos.

https://www.flaticon.com/downloads-limit

https://www.flaticon.com/free-icon/world_291919...

https://www.flaticon.com/free-icon/co2_2424843?...

https://www.flaticon.com/free-icon/save-water_2...

story_txt:
Be Bold. Be Sustainable. Be Free.After 10 months of development, many prototypes, many discussions and opinions, we have developed the 1st modern backpack with an outer material made of 100% hemp.     A lot of space for the daily lifestyle and beyond. The outer material is made of 100% hemp. The inside is fastened with a robust mixed fabric made out of hemp & organic cotton. The accessories, such as the handle and ribbons, are made out of recycled materials. When choosing the fabrics, special attention was paid to quality and ecological footprint.We have used high quality and durable STS zippers. The shoulder straps and the laptop compartment are both padded.Our fabrics are also odorless, so they do not smell of Marijuana.     Hampley I Rush - BlackNo matter what color you choose, turning heads is guaranteed.    Designed for everyday use, the Hampley Rush, measuring 38.5 x 30 x 11 cm and with a capacity of 13 litres, is ideal for city and country trips.To create additional storage space, it has an anti-theft pocket on the back, two side pockets and a front pocket with zip. The back compartment measures 20 x 12 cm.Inside, the backpack also has a laptop compartment that can easily accommodate a 13" laptop.   Polyester and other synthetic materials, such as nylon and artificial leather (polyurethane), are made from crude oil and are therefore pure plastic.  They contribute to the destruction of the environment.  Plastic damages the environment during production, during and after use.According to Greenpeace, about 49% of all textiles today are made of polyester, and the trend is rising. Although we now have the ability to recycle old plastic and synthetic textiles, material is only recyclable to a limited extent and this does not solve the problem of microplastics. 1 Million Sold Plastic BackpacksOver 1 million backpacks made of synthetic materials were sold in Germany in 2017. In the backpack industry, almost all backpacks are made of synthetic fibers. Why not save resources and avoid pollution?    Since 2016 we have been working on sustainable materials and are convinced that hemp has the greatest chance, as a fiber plant, of replacing synthetic material completely.  Hemp has almost completely disappeared from the textile industry over the last 100 years, despite hemp fibers being the most sustainable and durable fibers out there.
According to the Consumer Initiative Germany, 25% of all pesticides are used in cotton fields. Hemp does not require any environmentally harmful pesticides or herbicides for cultivation. This protects the farmers, protects the groundwater, and prevents bee mortality.  
Growing hemp saves one of the most important resources on our planet: water. Compared to cotton we can save up to 80% water during the growth phase. 
Hemp is very efficient. It uses sunlight better than almost any other plant. Therefore it grows very fast and we have high yields. Hemp can grow about 4 meters in 100 days. 
Hemp can be grown almost everywhere on the earth. Cotton, on the other hand, can only grow in very warm areas of the earth, i.e. where pests have particularly good climatic conditions and where there is often a shortage of water anyway. 
 
 
 
 
A long way - But we made it.
 
The sourcing of hemp materials has been the biggest challenge for us so far.  Hemp fibers are very robust and resistant. Processing it to become a soft material is very difficult. Due to the low demand for hemp textiles there are very few manufacturers worldwide. We looked at productions from all over the world and in the end we chose the best one. 
The quality of our fabrics is excellent and our production is committed to social responsibility. Employees are treated fairly and in addition to the many certifications, social projects are supported.
After 10 months of development, many prototypes, many discussions and opinions, we have developed the 1st modern backpack made from 100% hemp.
     It is important to us that a sustainable and social supply chain is maintained.Our suppliers are therefore awarded with one of the most important certifications.               DIFFERENT BACKGROUNDS - ONE GOALIt is our mission to provide the best sustainable backpacks. We all come from different backgrounds and combine our strengths to make the backpacks of tomorrow.    Be part of the movement!   This picture was taken during the shooting of our crowdfunding video. A lot of praise and a massive thank you to the founders of "the Gang" - Frankfurt's most creative minds for videos.    https://www.flaticon.com/free-icon/spray_2427743https://www.flaticon.com/downloads-limithttps://www.flaticon.com/free-icon/world_291919...https://www.flaticon.com/free-icon/co2_2424843?...https://www.flaticon.com/free-icon/save-water_2...https://www.flaticon.com/free-icon/marijuana_27...

story:
Bonjour!

We created our online company Avenue Petit Lou, LLC two years ago. We are an eco-friendly business and our goal is to only use high-quality natural fabrics like organic cotton, bamboo, and hemp.

Anne-Marie Martens and Marjorie Joys are the mother/daughter team behind Avenue Petit Lou, LLC, a collection of organic and natural children’s boutiques that offer clothing, home décor, toys, and baby products. The pair is also the co-authors of the bilingual children’s book The Twins Mia & Mateo: Daddy’s Little Helpers and are currently working on a second and third book that continue these series of adventures.

Anne-Marie is a mother of four and a grandmother; Marjorie is a mom herself. Together, they have a strong background in design, early childhood education, and fashion. Both grew up and lived in Belgium before coming to the U.S., which has delightfully influenced their fashion tastes. 

The clothing line was initially Anne-Marie’s idea. Sewing and fashion design have always been a part of her family heritage, with a grandmother who designed and made ballroom dresses for her six daughters, and her own mother’s children's boutique, selling a variety of chic, stylish, French apparel. Anne-Marie's inspiration began in her childhood, spending her evenings' sewing, knitting, and crocheting. Her dream has always been to design her own clothing line.

Growing our own clothing line is our next step to support parents, children, and the environment. And one that involves families in the process!

 

What We Need...

This exciting concept will feature a woodland theme for all clothes. 

Initially, the first three items we are manufacturing will be:

  • Foxy Overall: The front features ears and a pocket, the back a cute tail.
  • Baby Bunny dress: A bunny figure is sewed in both front and back
  • Owl top with harem pants: This adorable top has an owl-feather back.

All items will be created in an organic fabric - bamboo, 100% organic cotton, or hemp.

You will get to choose your own fabrics and personalize each item through color choices offered on our website. For example, with the Foxy Overall, the pockets, tail, and ears will be optional; you will be able to mix and match different fabrics to your own personalized preference.

 

Children want to be in charge of what they wear and it will be so much easier/faster to get them ready in the morning if they have pieces they have designed themselves to choose from.“Mia & Mateo - Chic * Adorable * Fun” gives children the ability to use their creativity and helps them to design their own clothes.

It’s a fresh, new concept idea – allowing our buyers to be the “fashion designer” and shape their own unique piece.

Can you imagine your child's happiness and pride when they open the package they receive of the clothes they’ve helped design?

While we are starting with four designs, within a year, we plan to have up to 12, and add 4-6 styles every year after that – we are already at work on this process. Sizing will range from 6 months to 8 years of age, with a variety of choices for both boys and girls in each age range.

To get our clothing line successfully sprouting, we’re seeking $95,000 from donors.

 

What Donors Receive...

With our gift packages and your donations, contributing to our funding initially is a win/win – you’ll receive an environmentally supportive gift, and we’ll be on our way toward our manufacturing goal. 

 

Along with the less tangible aspect of supporting a healthy, organic future for our children and our planet, those donating to our manufacturing campaign will receive a variety of gift packages, including perfect-for-all-wardrobes French-style organic T-shirts for the whole family, adorable Lunch Bags for your kids to personalize, earth-friendly cork pouches and pencils made out of recycled newspapers.

Garments translation is located INSIDE each product:

Baby onesie: "Once upon a time... a baby to LOVE!"

Toddler T-shirt: "Kisses, hugs, and chocolate... here I am!"

Mom T-shirt: "An adorable, wonderful and essential mom."

Dad Tshirt: "DAD. Irreplaceable. Brave to face the monsters under the bed. Chauffeur on hand. Best Handyman. Kind-hearted protector."

Blanket: "Goodnight"

 

 

Your Impact!

Through this campaign, we're walking the walk and partnering with groups that make a real difference in our environment.

 

One Tree Planted – Million-tree-challenge: 

One Tree Planted is a 501(c)(3) non-profit founded in Shelburne, Vermont. They work with amazing reforestation organizations around the world that need financial support to help them get more trees in the ground.

They started in 2014 with a mission to make it simple for people to help the environment.“One dollar, one tree.” They plant trees in North America, South America, Asia, and Africa. Most of their projects help with restoration from forest fires and floods, as well as creating jobs, building communities, and protecting habitat for biodiversity.

https://onetreeplanted.org/pages/about-us

https://onetreeplanted.org/pages/million-tree-c...

 

Grow the Rainbow:

We are all affected by bees disappearing which have a huge role in our everyday life.

“Grow the Rainbow” have done the heavy lifting by designing “Seedles” to practically grow themselves. “Seedles” are rainbow bright balls of seed, compost, and clay. They add fun and vibrant colors to your neighborhood while benefitting local pollinators. All you have to do is throw them and grow them.

“Grow the Rainbow” aim to inspire kids to grow one billion wildflowers to bring back the bees and ensure a sustainable food system for our future.

https://growtherainbow.com/pages/about-us

 

Up Front Commitment to the Environment

We put our money – and yours – where our hearts are – helping to create awareness for parents and children of the importance of the environment. We want to stress from the beginning that we’re not just about creating a cool, interactive clothing line – we are supporting and inviting you to support the future for our children. 

When you contribute to our fundraiser, you’ll be supporting what we all stand for:

an earth and health conscious, chemical-free lifestyle for all children, an environmentally sound future that starts with eco-friendly, organic clothing for your children. 

Donating to our clothing manufacturing campaign, you’ll have the opportunity to plant those "Seedles" with your children, and have a teaching moment about the importance of flowers, bees, and bee pollen for a healthy planet. And you’ll be happy to know that your donations helped plant trees.

 

How to Support Us?

Choose the donation amount and package that’s right for you.

If you can only contribute a small amount, please know that we are beyond grateful and will acknowledge any contribution via email and on this site.

Can’t donate at this time? Please help us get the word out about our campaign –

Facebook, Twitter, Emails shares really do help!

Indiegogo share tools make it easy to spread the word!

 

Special Thank You...

To our friends and family who have supported us throughout the production of this campaign!

story:
Our Pink Gloves Rock!

Just when we thought HALTZGLOVES could not get any better, we are proud to introduce the Pink HALTZGLOVES!!!  Why pink???  Our customers asked, so we are creating them for the world!!  

Since 2016, we have created the coolest gloves ever at  HALTZGLOVES.com    

Our customers love love love their HALTZGLOVES and you can read all about it on our Bragging Rights and Testimonials page  here.

HALTZGLOVES crowdfunding campaign is less than 30 days so that we can meet the manufacturing schedule of 90 - 100 days to sourcing the material, to the complete build out, and then our rigorous final inspection before its shipped to our customers.

" I have learned so much about manufacturing, and have a whole new appreciation for every item that is made for consumers" ,says our CEO Deidre Goodwin. 

Once the funds are raised, the manufacture is paid at 100% to start the order. 90 - 100 days later when the gloves arrive in the Port of Savannah, GA., they will be trucked to our warehouse to start the process of packing and sending out your Pink Packages.

 October is a huge month for everyone to wear pink, so we will be packaging and sending day and night to make sure everyone receives their Pink HALTZGLOVES.

 Goo HALTZGLOVES!!!

 

Amazing Features of the Pink Glove!

 

  • The entire glove fits smooth with slight compression
  • Tactile function. Also know as "the thingy so you can use your cell phone " Never again take your gloves off to use your cell phone!
  • The adjustable strap for a custom fit
  • The amazing reflective material so you can be seen at night for over 1000 feet

 

Did you know that HALTZGLOVES comes in Half Glove and a Full Glove? 

 

We are creating the half glove in the following sizes:

  • Super Small Teeny Weenie (small enough for children)
  • Small
  • Medium
  • Large
  • XLarge
  • 2XLarge

We are creating the full glove in the following sizes:

  • Small
  • Medium
  • Large
  • XLarge
  • 2XLarge

 

Which do you prefer?? HALTZGLOVES at night or day


Use the pink glove for 5K walks and runs! Each month organizations around the world walk, run, ride, to raise awareness to many causes. Some walks and runs start really early in the morning.  HALTZGLOVES will be a great addition to any outfit.

Motorcycle riders love love HALTZGLOVES!

 Not only are they cute, but HALTZGLOVES are really safe!  Motorcyclist and Bicyclist use hand signals. The "X" on the palm means stop. The " -> " on back of your hand tells someone if you are going left or right. Let's go riding with our pink gloves!

 

Taking your fur baby for a walk can now be safer!

Are you going for a walk with your favorite pet? Its really dark outside in the morning. The Pink Glove can help drivers to see you and your pet. HALTZGLOVES can be seen when the headlights of cars shine on your hands.

 Real men wear Pink!

 

 Risks & Challenges

    HALTZGLOVES has 2.5 years of manufacturing and delivering our current product to our customers and Distributors. 
    That being said, the risk of this beautiful pink glove not being built is pale pink.

      "Failure is not an option with HALTZGLOVES!" says Deidre the CEO of HALTZGLOVES 
     

    Our manufacturing partner is a  Fortune 1000 Company based here in the great state of Georgia and they are Tickled Pink about this project. 
    The HALTZGLOVES idea was born in Georgia, and our Corporate office is based in Atlanta.

    If there are ever any concerns or questions, you can always reach out to us directly and we will gladly respond.  Sometimes the CEO Deidre Goodwin  answers the switchboard and surprises customers with a personal conversation and a big thank you for supporting HALTZGLOVES!

story:
Powershield™ backpack is  Stylish | Roomy | Bulletproof

Powershield™ has the look and feel of Gabardine, a style made famous by the British military.

 

 

 

Interior includes waterproof pockets for laptop, tablet, files and books plus space for shoes and other gear. Exterior includes a concealed zippered passport pocket, two mesh water bottle pockets and a USB charging port pocket.

 

 

 

Protects against bullets with a liner made of Kevlar®, the material used in bulletproof vests, and the backpack fabrics are fire and water resistant – yet it’s lightweight and folds or rolls easily for storage.

Powershield™ is the world’s first backpack that is both stylish and safe! The fabric is Gabardine, a style made famous by the British military. Plus, Powershield is rainproof, fireproof and bulletproof, made with Kevlar®, the same fabric used in bulletproof vests.

 

 

Multiple pockets inside and out with sealed zippers and seams

 

Magnetic clasps for fast and secure open/close

 

Fabrics and Kevlar® liner protect against fire, water and bullets​

 

Powershield™ has a water bottle mesh pocket and a built-in USB charging port

 

 

 

Powershield™ is loaded with practical features:

  • Safety - Concealed soft bulletproof plate made of DuPont® Kevlar® fiber, the same materials used in bulletproof vests, protects against the impact of guns, and other weapons, and the high temperatures of fires.
     
  • Waterproof - Exterior and interior surfaces are coated for water-resistance. Seams and zippers are sealed for protection.
     
  • Roomy - 16 liters (approx. 985 square inches) of storage capacity.
     
  • Organized - Three internal pockets in the main compartment for laptop, tablet and larger items. Mesh water bottle pocket, a concealed passport zipper pocket and a USB charging port are on the exterior.
     
  • Easy Access - Main compartment uses a magnetic latch for fast, one-handed open/close.

 

 

 

 

 

Powershield™ is the world’s first backpack that is both stylish and safe! The fabric is Gabardine, a style made famous by the British military. Plus, Powershield is rainproof, fireproof and bulletproof, made with Kevlar®, the same fabric used in bulletproof vests.

 

Powershield™ is the world’s first backpack that is both stylish and safe

 

 

Powershield’s protection comes from the same fiber used in bulletproof vests: DuPont™ Kevlar®

 

 

Powershield™ is also super-roomy and lightweight, perfect for travel and everyday use

 

 

 

When you are off to school or the job, Powershield™ protects you with protection plate, made with the proven strength of DuPont® Kevlar®bulletproof fibers.

 

 

Fast and easy access to Powershield’s main compartment pockets

 

It’s fast and easy to open Powershield’s main compartment

 

 

 

Advanced protection for regular ballistic threats for lighter, more affordable or high performing vests

DuPont®  Kevlar®  is a Kevlar® uni-directional product with superior performance than typical Aramid UD 4-ply in the market. It offers advanced protection for regular ballistic threats and it should be considered when conceiving lighter, more affordable or higher performing vests. Kevlar® XD  deliver best in class performance and it can be combined with other materials with reduced number of layers—resulting in the best balance of light-weight, high performance and lower cost soft ballistic solutions.

 

Powershield™ protects you and your valuables from dangers in your environment:

  • Fire protection - DuPont® Kevlar® fabric is bulletproof and fire-resistant
     
  • Water protection - Water-repellent polyester coating inside and out; seams and zippers are sealed to keep out water
     
  • Bullet and flying object protection - Built-in, concealed Kevlar® protection plate

 

 

 

 

  • Weight: 2 kilograms – approx. 4.4 pounds
  • Capacity: Interior capacity is 16 liters – approx. 976 square inches
  • Clasps: FIDLOCK HOOK German magnetic button allows single-handed open/close
  • Pockets: three interior large zippered pockets. 2 exterior concealed zippered pockets, one suitable for passport or ID, the other with a jack for USB charging; side pocket for a water bottle
  • Strap: sturdy, tear-resistant nylon adjustable shoulder straps

 

Our manufacturers trust their testing to HP White, a company that is trusted by governments around the world. Based on the report, Powershield’s Kevlar® lining successfully reduced the impact of gunshots in professional lab tests, including rounds fired by 9mm submachine guns and powerful .44 Magnum handguns

Type III-A (44 Magnum; Submachine Gun 9 mm)

This armor protects against the standard test rounds as defined in section 5.2.4. It also provides protection against most handgun threats as well as the threats mentioned in sections 2.2.1 through 2.2.3.

 

 

 

 

DuPont™  and Kevlar®  are trademarks or registered trademarks of E.I. du Pont de Nemours and Company

 

 

 

 

 

 

We have the experience and commitment to get this done.

The Powershield™ backpack is a development of Powershield Inc., a product development company with a successful track record of creating innovative consumer and business products, including wireless charging technology, and accessories for Apple and other technology companies.

To learn more, please visit us:

http://www.powershieldusa.com/

Disclaimers

  • Kevlar is registered trademarks of the DuPont Corporation. DuPont Corporation is not responsible for failure of its products to prevent harm to individuals.
     
  • Powershield is registered trademarks of Powershield Inc. Powershield makes performance claims regarding resistance to bullets and weapons, fire and water but neither Powershield or its partners, suppliers or agents guarantee its product will prevent bodily harm to an individual or his or her belongings.
     

 

Risks and challenges

 

All commercial enterprises include elements of risks and challenges, but Powershield has done our best to minimize them. Our team includes senior people with experience in cutting-edge consumer products, wireless charging technology, Type-C products and Apple accessories. We completed several iterations of design and pre-production modeling prior to introducing Powershield on Kickstarter, including the manufacture of 000 units as a limited edition. This process allowed us to gather consumer feedback to improve the user experience. The product shown in photos and video is what we offer our Kickstarter supporters: Powershield backpack version 1.2.

We have started mass production and your contribution will help us achieve economies of scale and keep our product costs low. We now have enough materials to produce approximately 1,000 units. The lead time necessary to turn those into products is approximately 2 months. Your support will provide us with the confidence to make bulk raw material orders and start mass production.

With your support, we can bring Powershield’s smart protection to users worldwide.
story_txt:
Powershield™ backpack is  Stylish | Roomy | BulletproofPowershield™ has the look and feel of Gabardine, a style made famous by the British military.   Interior includes waterproof pockets for laptop, tablet, files and books plus space for shoes and other gear. Exterior includes a concealed zippered passport pocket, two mesh water bottle pockets and a USB charging port pocket.   Protects against bullets with a liner made of Kevlar®, the material used in bulletproof vests, and the backpack fabrics are fire and water resistant – yet it’s lightweight and folds or rolls easily for storage.Powershield™ is the world’s first backpack that is both stylish and safe! The fabric is Gabardine, a style made famous by the British military. Plus, Powershield is rainproof, fireproof and bulletproof, made with Kevlar®, the same fabric used in bulletproof vests.  Multiple pockets inside and out with sealed zippers and seams Magnetic clasps for fast and secure open/close Fabrics and Kevlar® liner protect against fire, water and bullets​ Powershield™ has a water bottle mesh pocket and a built-in USB charging port   Powershield™ is loaded with practical features:

Safety - Concealed soft bulletproof plate made of DuPont® Kevlar® fiber, the same materials used in bulletproof vests, protects against the impact of guns, and other weapons, and the high temperatures of fires. 

Waterproof - Exterior and interior surfaces are coated for water-resistance. Seams and zippers are sealed for protection. 

Roomy - 16 liters (approx. 985 square inches) of storage capacity. 

Organized - Three internal pockets in the main compartment for laptop, tablet and larger items. Mesh water bottle pocket, a concealed passport zipper pocket and a USB charging port are on the exterior. 

Easy Access - Main compartment uses a magnetic latch for fast, one-handed open/close.
     Powershield™ is the world’s first backpack that is both stylish and safe! The fabric is Gabardine, a style made famous by the British military. Plus, Powershield is rainproof, fireproof and bulletproof, made with Kevlar®, the same fabric used in bulletproof vests. Powershield™ is the world’s first backpack that is both stylish and safe  Powershield’s protection comes from the same fiber used in bulletproof vests: DuPont™ Kevlar®  Powershield™ is also super-roomy and lightweight, perfect for travel and everyday use   When you are off to school or the job, Powershield™ protects you with protection plate, made with the proven strength of DuPont® Kevlar®bulletproof fibers.  Fast and easy access to Powershield’s main compartment pockets It’s fast and easy to open Powershield’s main compartment   Advanced protection for regular ballistic threats for lighter, more affordable or high performing vestsDuPont®  Kevlar®  is a Kevlar® uni-directional product with superior performance than typical Aramid UD 4-ply in the market. It offers advanced protection for regular ballistic threats and it should be considered when conceiving lighter, more affordable or higher performing vests. Kevlar® XD  deliver best in class performance and it can be combined with other materials with reduced number of layers—resulting in the best balance of light-weight, high performance and lower cost soft ballistic solutions. Powershield™ protects you and your valuables from dangers in your environment:
Fire protection - DuPont® Kevlar® fabric is bulletproof and fire-resistant 
Water protection - Water-repellent polyester coating inside and out; seams and zippers are sealed to keep out water 
Bullet and flying object protection - Built-in, concealed Kevlar® protection plate
    

Weight: 2 kilograms – approx. 4.4 pounds

Capacity: Interior capacity is 16 liters – approx. 976 square inches

Clasps: FIDLOCK HOOK German magnetic button allows single-handed open/close

Pockets: three interior large zippered pockets. 2 exterior concealed zippered pockets, one suitable for passport or ID, the other with a jack for USB charging; side pocket for a water bottle

Strap: sturdy, tear-resistant nylon adjustable shoulder straps

story:
Do you have a Buddy walking with you in your life, going through both the hard times and happy days together with you ?


About the Buddysaurus

Buddysaurus was started as a comic series on Facebook to remind everyone how important our buddies are, and how we can become better buddies. 


The Buddysaurus have a dream:

Their dream is to propel themselves to a higher dimension - from 2D (comics) to 3D (products), to be mass produced and live meaningfully with you, serving you through their unique features while reminding you about your Buddies !


Introducing Long Neck & Spiky in their product forms:

Long Neck can take different types of phones (Apple, Samsung, LG... etc)

The slot is 10.5mm wide, which can accommodate most types of cord and jet :-)



You may add eyes onto them !

Long Neck & Spiky are in "minimalistic" product form, while we will include a set of stickers (of eyes) so that you can have some fun with them, and even custom design their eyes !


Behind the Buddysaurus

Hello, this is YC Chan who drew the Buddysaurus comics and developed them into  products. I am an Industrial Designer and an Inventor, also teaching at the Emily Carr University of Art & Design in Vancouver Canada.

I’m glad that I have someone walking with me in my life, just like the Buddysaurus.

I learned a lot from my buddies, and I want to share with everyone how important our buddies are; through the Buddysaurus products, I also want to bring some inspiration to you so that you can become a better buddy !


Show your Buddies you cherish them, using the Buddysaurus

Your "buddies" may be your best friends, your spouse, your parents, your mentors... show them and tell them they mean so much to you !

Gift them Long Neck & Spiky to remind them about you, and to give thanks to their support through your life !!

We can make this world a better place, by performing an act of kindness at a time, starting with your buddies !


Please back us !

Your support is the key to materialize the Buddysaurus - by adopting Long Neck & Spiky, or pick one or more items from the perk list:


On top of the 4 basic Perks, here are combos for you to choose:

Multiple sets are great as gifts to multiple friends, large families and for retail sales !


Where will your support (the funds) go ?

This Indiegogo campaign actualizes the Buddysaurus by funding for the tooling and manufacturing costs - these diagrams can explain what "tooling" is about:

Your support covers these expensive solid steel tools, and also other items such as the development costs for the electronics (circuit design and tooling for the USB Hub + SD reader in Spiky), and the material + labour costs to manufacture the products, and the printing and set-up fees etc for the storybooks and cards... 

You probably prefer we do not go into detail here.


The most important part of this project is your participation - the Buddysaurus Team cannot do this campaign alone.

We need you ! 

Please tell your Buddies about this project, ask them to support it and spread the Buddysaurus idea: "to remember your Buddies, and to become a better Buddy" !!



About manufacturing: getting it done with quality assurance

We have partnered up a manufacturing company in Hong Kong who has great reputation. They have an experienced engineering team to get everything done to the highest quality - from the bodies of Long Neck & Spiky (injection folded in quality recyclable plastic) to the electronic components of Spiky (which will be supplied from reliable manufacturers).

To assure you our team is capable of putting it through, here are some references - a toy vehicle series, an electronic product YC Chan designed in the past, and of course the development sketches and models / prototypes of the Buddysaurus:


More reference about YC Chan:     

Profile (teaching design):  http://www.ecuad.ca/people/profile/25832

Patents: http://patents.justia.com/inventor/ying-chiu-chan

Class photo of YC Chan + his buddies when they're in the Design School: https://www.facebook.com/photo.php?fbid=158399804342139&set=t.100005163610418&type=3&theater


Thanks you very much for your support, especially taking your time to read it to the end here - please back the Buddysaurus Project now !

Let's change the world  TOGETHER, by performing one act of kindness at a time, starting with your buddies !! 

Every bit of your participation counts !!!


- the Buddysaurus Team -


The Buddysaurus Team

Timothy Yeung - Marketing specialist, Accountant; wants to make this world an even better place.

Kevin Lee - IT & Web expert; enjoy connecting with his Buddies & helping them make their dreams come true.

YC Chan - the Designer & Facilitator of the Buddysaurus Project; cares about his Buddies & love to design things to make life easier.


FAQ Section

Feedbacks will be uploaded when we receive questions form you.

story:
We never thought of that tie can be functional other then attire.It has the space where many things can be done and can be huge beneficiary for all user. This can be fashion statement and also has the functionality. 

Problem observed : Many professional due to busy schedule and over work load they always forget so many work to do during work time. And due to that  many important work remain pending  and gets accumulated  at the end  and creates a huge pressure and tension at the end of the day.

Taking out your phone from your pocket is so irritating and there is always chance of falling down .There is always probability to lose their earphone in their lifetime also.​

It also has been observed that lots of accident happens in road or other place because of mobile phone or earphone. Many peoples they uses their phones while driving , while walking so on so. Many life are not safe due to same reasons. Phone snatching is also found to be major problems. We want to make every persons hand's mobile free.

SO WE THOUGHT OF MAKING TIEKIE  - The smart walkie talkie technology embedded wearable tie that enables you to answer phone calls, (Simply place your tie tip to your ear while speak through the embedded microphone ) send voice message,notes and emails through your tie tip. It can share your business contact card and real time location very easily. . It also revolutionize how we communicate, allowing the user to interact with others in different languages, both locally and over a long distance range. It has ability to translate it into many languages in real time. TIEKIE will also help user to organize their daily profession  day to day activity in ease manner. 

SO WHERE EVER YOU GO , GO WITH TIEKIE AND BE ALWAYS TENSE FREE

We understand the professional look and attitude, that why we specially designed this TIEKIE that make you look awesome and smart professional at every stage. 

TIEKIE can be used in many places with many ways.

Business users: It has never been so easy to manage your office work so easily. Communicating ,texting , mailing , Voice recording ,  talking phone calls , work reminder so many important works when you are out of office. So  Breaking down all those  barriers and strike up new global partnerships with TIEKIE at your side. 

Conference call

Free work time

Imagine you speak and voice message will be sent. you type on tie tip and text will be sent easily.You can take phone calls without taking out your phone. TIEKIE always remind your office work. So it make your daily work so easy. 

We understand the need of professionals, Business delegates and their problems day to day work life. So we tried to cover all those need which feel them tense free

 

Activity Tracking

The TIEKIE  works seamlessly with the TIEKIE app to make your day healthier, more manageable, and organized. 

The app is compatible with iOS and Android smartphone devices.        

 

TIEKIE comes in various sizes as per the need of user. Different user uses different length tie.So we made different size grade.

 

Our team comprises of design visionaries, hardware geeks, marketing gurus, and sourcing experts. We are fascinated by the extend of technology penetration in people’s lives and how the same technology help our lives be a bit better and easier every day. Our mission is to bring simple and unique technology solutions to you that are both beautiful in design and great in functionality.

Here is what CEO & Founder  says about the idea and the product:

“I am product designer and having 10 years of experience in fashion Industries . I have worked with many professionals and travel abroad often, both on business and pleasure occasions. I found peoples always forget the things to do on time especially the professional. Then I thought of product TIEKIE which will solve the problems of many professionals."

We need your valuables support to bring this innovative 
product to reach millions of peoples worldwide. For that
we have done some internal operational breakdown to wisely 
use your contributions.

We would like to let you know we have set very high standards for this project and we will not stop until we are satisfied. We still have some more things to map out, if you will, be we have a team of qualified and dedicated people working on this. We are confident that we will meet our estimated delivery date and we may even be ready before then – if we are, you will be the first to know! We are working hard to follow a well crafted project timeline and we are excited for what’s to come.

We chose to run our campaign on Indiegogo so that our backers could truly help form the future of TIEKIE - we want your honest feedback and will take all of it into account for future versions and updates. We also believe that this is a great opportunity to create an excited community of adopters that share our passion for TIEKIE

Dear Backers, 

We need your love and support to bring this project live. We promised to give our best to full fill the need of every professionals . We understand the importance of work and it's execution on time. 

We would also request you kindly share this project with your dear one so that they could also help to make aware to maximum reach.

So please back us.

Thank you ! 

Tiekie Team

 

We are thankful to all who has supported us through picture , videos and many others things used in this project. 

 

Ask us anything at sunil.niift@gmail.com

THANK YOU

story:
Welcome to Tubes! Here in the Canadian prairies we can have painfully cold winters.

Do you spend countless hours in cold arenas for hockey, or in outdoor football stands - where the football season ends after winter begins? How about trying to enjoy other winter activities or spectator sports, or working outdoors? There are many days where gloves aren't enough to keep away the frigid bite of the cold. Some of us have difficulty wearing, or even finding our gloves. There are just not enough cups of hot chocolate or coffee to keep the pain of cold hands away . We know because we have felt this pain.

We know there are others who share our pain and Tubes can help.

Why Tubes? What makes Tubes unique is Tubes have an INTERIOR POCKET FOR HEAT PACKS, thick thermal layers, and interior tabs for the detachable, adjustable Body Strap for Grab and Go ease. The thick layers of thermal fill help keep hands cozy warm and the interior pocket for heat packs provide extra thermal support when you add a heat pack to your Tube.

Whether you are on the sidelines, in the stands, at the rink, enjoying a walk in the park, time at the ski hill, a teacher at outdoor supervision - Tubes are the answer. Tubes cuddly soft plush interior and thick thermal layers make it the perfect solution to protect cold hands from the elements.

A "Muff" you say? Visually, Vintage Tubes appear to be a twist off a Vintage Muff, hence the name 'Vintage'.  

We had the opportunity to create a Test Prototype collection and hit the streets and fields to introduce Tubes to wonderfully unsuspecting people for feedback. The results were unanimous, from all the oohs, wows, and oh my g......'s we know Tubes are awesome. 

We want to spread the word and Spread the Warmth. As a Backer you can choose from the Sport or Vintage Designs. Whether you, or someone you love are sitting in a cold arena, the stands at the games, or just enjoying a walk in the park Tubes can help provide warmth and protection.

The Sport Tube has a quality water repellent wind resistant nylon exterior shell. Its unique body design with zipper allows to fully open for easy wash, easy dry, and versatility to Custom logo. As a Backer, the Sport Tube is available in Black. 

The Vintage Tube is your fashionable hand warmer accessory made from soft quality Tissavel faux fur. Durable soft leather-like blended detachable Body Strap for grab and go ease with adjustable slide. The Vintage has an exterior zippered pocket to stow away smaller personal items. As a Backer, the Vintage Tube is available in Black, Silver or Brown.

Prototype, Test, and Sample Stages are now complete.  We are sharing our 1st to market Tubes production with you. As a Backer, you will receive your unique Perk prior to Fall 2018. 

*Prototype Vintage Sample Tube Backers will have their Tube shipped Feb 2018 when Campaign completes (***includes set of complimentary heat packs).

Tubes are also the perfect gift for someone you love who may be suffering from a medical condition that may make them  more susceptible to the cold, such as Raynauds, Arthritis and Diabetes.

Risks and Challenges:

We have diligently sourced production facilities that have a solid industry history and we have worked specifically with companies who specialize in working with our materials. 
Our production partners have produced quality samples and we are excited to share production of this unique product with our Backers. We are confident through this process you are likely to receive your Perk sooner, than later.

Our Vintage production partners have a long history working with high end designers.

Our Sport production partners are well known for quality and dependability.

Although there is always room for monkey wrenches, in particular with supply timelines.
We are fully committed to transparency and will be updating our Backers every step of the way.

Thank you for visiting us!

Help us Spread the Warmth: If you like Tubes we are truly thankful for your help in sharing our campaign with others you believe may benefit from Tubes. You can use  Indiegogo Share Tools.

TISSAVEL

FRANCE’S TISSAVEL, A COMPANY WITH 100 YEARS OF HISTORY, HAS ADDED ART TO SKILL WITH THEIR CEASELESS SPIRIT OF CREATIVITY. AS A LEADING BRAND IN LUXURY ALTERNATIVE FUR FABRICS, THEY CONSTANTLY DEVELOP THE FIRST AND GREATEST TECHNOLOGY AND QUALITY.

*USD rates are approximate and based on current exchange rate.

USD Shipping based on exchange $12 CDN / *$9.65 USD

story_txt:
Welcome to Tubes! Here in the Canadian prairies we can have painfully cold winters.
Do you spend countless hours in cold arenas for hockey, or in outdoor football stands - where the football season ends after winter begins? How about trying to enjoy other winter activities or spectator sports, or working outdoors? There are many days where gloves aren't enough to keep away the frigid bite of the cold. Some of us have difficulty wearing, or even finding our gloves. There are just not enough cups of hot chocolate or coffee to keep the pain of cold hands away . We know because we have felt this pain.
We know there are others who share our pain and Tubes can help.

Why Tubes? What makes Tubes unique is Tubes have an INTERIOR POCKET FOR HEAT PACKS, thick thermal layers, and interior tabs for the detachable, adjustable Body Strap for Grab and Go ease. The thick layers of thermal fill help keep hands cozy warm and the interior pocket for heat packs provide extra thermal support when you add a heat pack to your Tube.
Whether you are on the sidelines, in the stands, at the rink, enjoying a walk in the park, time at the ski hill, a teacher at outdoor supervision - Tubes are the answer. Tubes cuddly soft plush interior and thick thermal layers make it the perfect solution to protect cold hands from the elements.
A "Muff" you say? Visually, Vintage Tubes appear to be a twist off a Vintage Muff, hence the name 'Vintage'.  
We had the opportunity to create a Test Prototype collection and hit the streets and fields to introduce Tubes to wonderfully unsuspecting people for feedback. The results were unanimous, from all the oohs, wows, and oh my g......'s we know Tubes are awesome. 
We want to spread the word and Spread the Warmth. As a Backer you can choose from the Sport or Vintage Designs. Whether you, or someone you love are sitting in a cold arena, the stands at the games, or just enjoying a walk in the park Tubes can help provide warmth and protection.
The Sport Tube has a quality water repellent wind resistant nylon exterior shell. Its unique body design with zipper allows to fully open for easy wash, easy dry, and versatility to Custom logo. As a Backer, the Sport Tube is available in Black. 

The Vintage Tube is your fashionable hand warmer accessory made from soft quality Tissavel faux fur. Durable soft leather-like blended detachable Body Strap for grab and go ease with adjustable slide. The Vintage has an exterior zippered pocket to stow away smaller personal items. As a Backer, the Vintage Tube is available in Black, Silver or Brown.

Prototype, Test, and Sample Stages are now complete.  We are sharing our 1st to market Tubes production with you. As a Backer, you will receive your unique Perk prior to Fall 2018. 
*Prototype Vintage Sample Tube Backers will have their Tube shipped Feb 2018 when Campaign completes (***includes set of complimentary heat packs).
Tubes are also the perfect gift for someone you love who may be suffering from a medical condition that may make them  more susceptible to the cold, such as Raynauds, Arthritis and Diabetes.

We have diligently sourced production facilities that have a solid industry history and we have worked specifically with companies who specialize in working with our materials. Our production partners have produced quality samples and we are excited to share production of this unique product with our Backers. story:
Despite the past 15 years of global efforts in improving air quality, the pollution levels still exceeds WHO’s recommendations. In 2016, 92% of the world population lived in places with high concentration of air pollution. Air pollution caused around 6 million premature deaths both indoors and outdoors. 

The most researched primary pollutants are: particulate matter (PM 10 and 2.5), sulfur dioxide, ozone, nitrogen dioxide. Amongst them, PM 10 and PM 2.5 are considered the most hazardous for humans.

The main issue with these particles is that they are so tiny that they can penetrate deep inside the lungs and blood vessels. Not only can they cause irritations, inflammation and asthma during short and long term exposures, but they can also contribute to the risk of developing cardiovascular, respiratory diseases and lung cancer if under chronic exposures, even at a low concentration.

 

Everyday we reflexively cover our nose and wave our hands to clear the air when passing by the bus’ black smog or a sea of motorcycles. Sadly, this will not improve the air quality. There should be a more personal and effective answer. 

We decided to take action by creating a smart anti-pollution mask. With all the choices in the market, it is still very hard to find both very protective and comfortable mask, not to mention the looks of one wearing a mask. Our mask can be worn at anytime and anywhere with confidence and comfort. Breaze attempts to embody a refreshing breeze with every breath you take.

 

- Patent No.: 107202817  -

Breaze mask provide a whole new experience for those who wants to protect themselves from air pollution. The innovative design, smart fan and effective filter have been made to provide the optimal comfort and freshness while breathing.

 

Breaze has a fan to bring in fresh air to assist in easier breathing. The Integrated fan helps you to breathe through the filter and its intelligent learning program which can adjust the air flow in accordance to individuals breathing frequency and depth will provide you with a regular air flow to get rid of humidity that keeps the air fresh and dry.

Breaze equipped with anti PM2.5 filters provides you with a protection against the most harmful and tinest pollution particles. The filter is composed of four layers that filter out harmful allergens, pollen, oxidants, bacteria, and pollutants. 

Breaze is committed to the design of the filter layer technology that can be reused which in both environmental friendly and economical.

 

Filtering Result of PM2.5

Our filters have been passed through the lab test by Nelson Laboratories, the authoritative organization in USA. The average filtration efficiency of the filter in 0.3µm are more than 99.99%. It able to filter out the PM10 and PM2.5 particle as well. 

 

 

Your face is part of your identity. Breaze wants people to recognize you, even while wearing a mask. The middle part of Breaze uses a transparent hard plastic material to display your lovely smile.

The hard plastic creates a three dimensional curved space. This space diminishes the mask from rubbing your face and allows you to speak freely.

 

The part of the mask that touches your face is composed of soft and flexible silicone material, enhancing the wearability. Breaze also has an adjustable strap which allows the mask to be suitable for anyone to wear.

 

For recharging, the mask uses a micro USB port, which is easily available everywhere. Our futuristic innovative design will become part of you fashion style, giving you the most trendy look while wearing a mask.

Unlike other masks, we provide not only a protection from air pollution but also an all new experience of fresh breath. Here is why we different:

 

 

 

After one year of hard work, we have come a long way with breaze mask. Now we need your support to help us to finalize the first round of manufacturing. Help us share our idea so that together we can bring a better breathing experience to the world.

 

We are Minfu, a group of designers, industrial designers and engineers in Taipei. We come from different industries but we are all concerned about the same issue: the air we are currently breathing.

It’s our daily life to cover nose from dust and smoke. So we decided to take action by creating a modern and anti-pollution mask.

We founded Minfu in 2015. It wasn’t easy at the beginning, things became more difficult than we ever imaged. But that didn’t bring us down, we still work hard day by day. Within all team members’ support, we’re able to finish the development. We can’t wait to see the smile of wearing it, not only us but you.

 

Manufacturing this kind product requires a lot of patience since many component and regulation are at hand. That is why we are often making some adjustments to our prototype to be efficient, regulation compliant and have a nice look at the same time which is also our main difficulty.

As a new product in market, finding a manufacturer who can meet our requirements is more challenging than we thought.

However, we are confident in our ability to deliver a high quality product. We finished the mock up version and made our prototype. Now we are ready to take the next step.

If you can’t back us up, you can still help us by sharing our page to friends and people who might be interested.

story:
How important of manicure?

According to the study, the human nails grow  1mm every week, and 1 gram of nail dirt contain  4 billion of germs. How do you feel about the tough fact? How to keep your nails clean? The answer is simple and easy: Keep manicuring  twice a week, it will obviously improve nail hygiene. But with which tool?

How do you clip your nails?

Using an ancient  clipper?
Using  scissors?
Using the so called “ electric nail clipper” actually grinding the nails？ 
Bite your nails?

These are never the best solution, here comes the best answer:

The 1st Electric Nail Clipper

Why electric nail clipper?

You can see electric shaver, you can see electric toothbrush, you can see electric massage chair, but why not Electric Nail Clipper?
Well, It is really a hard job to invent something never exist. 
Every new technology is not easy, it's not easy to make the perfect blade to cut the nail and not injure the skin around. However, we did it, from design to manufacture, we developed a whole new trimming system: Not just clipping the nail, but also trimming and grinding the nail all by one step.

How V1 Change the traditional manicure?

Safe Perfect safe, it will never cut your skin, even if you don’t have good eyesight, or your vision is compromised.

Convenient Easy to carry, you can put it in your bag, and use it in all the occasion. Outdoor, office, home anywhere you have the time.

塑造你的指甲风格  不仅仅是剪裁，而且还可以根据需要塑造指甲风格。越来越多的人想要有所不同，有自己的风格，那么你的风格呢？

Why Choose V1?

Design is our most important asset, from the idea to actually making the product, and the product should not just function well, but with fashion touch and elegance taste. 

Embrace the simplicity, one key to start, one key to stop. Simple function brings the simple pleasant.

All angle all position available. When you want to shape the nail, just put that part of the nail into the Optiframe slot, V1 will take over.

How to Use?

Easy to use as the video shows, install the batteries and it's ready to go, when you finish, clean the storage chamber and put it away.
 

Product details and usage scenario

Children can use our product, but we suggest the children under 8 year old should be trimmed by parents or adults.
Kindly Reminder: The first time you use V1 you may afraid the blade going to cut your finger tip, but actually it's perfectly safe, even for children. 

Fashion It's also a cool gadget for young and fashion people, who loves the innovative item.

More details about V1

 

Unique Blade parts and gear set, keep the whole system high efficiency and excellent quiet. Compact Gear Set, not just make the product small, but also supply stable power.

Beauty of the appearance, our design team dedicate full heart and passion to make V1 practical and beautiful as well.

 

Trimmer Blades including Girale blade and Optiframe. The special customized design and manufacture technology applied to keep all the parts sleek and tight, achieving 360 degree curve surface trimming. 

Rotation speed we get all the data from thousand times of test in our lab. Make the blade sharp enough to cut nails and keep the skin from injury.

Fine crafted after all the carefully design, we choosing the best Eco-friendly material produce the product.

Summary

 

Handbag fashion and sleek design, goes well with all the makeups and stuffs in your hand bag.

Versions:

Colors we have: Magic Black and Jade white 2 version of the V1. Additionally, we make small quantity of Rose Gold as our Collector's Edition, the Rose Gold Edition will goes to the backers choosing Family Pack and Big Family Pack.

Parameter

Supporting us in indiegogo and share with all the people you care!

Risks and challenges

The trimming blades including the Girale trimmer and the Optiframe, are the soul of the product, if we can't make it match, the clipping experience is awful.

If the blade too sharp, it may cause the injury to the user, if the blade is too blunt, it can not cut off the nail.

After thousand times of test in our lab, we've got all the data we need. 
The best angle, the speed and the space between the blades all together to make the perfect trimming blades set.

story:
Short Summary

Dreaming big things need a big heart, and sometimes big hearts join us to make our dream come true. As I runner and Designer I had a passion towards sports and I really loved to design and make some real touchable product. 

THE IDEA : Making Shoes 

Learning the process of shoe designing and making and then working with local cobblers to make a product from scratch, it has been a great experience a big learning curve. In 2017 we prototyped our first running shoes, purely handmade. 

Handmade with passion

In 2017, mass production was begun with the Tracks Series Running Shoes, which was our first product that got into the market and we sold 130 shoes in first week of launch. 

Made out of a single upper fabric, and soled using water based glue solutions Tracks is the perfect runners' shoe. With fewer seams the shoe helps to optimize the experience of running long distances.

 

Now to get the story moving we believe, we need to introduce different designs and styles of shoes, through this campaign you can help us get closer to our dream of making affordable athletic essentials. 

 

 

What We Need & What You Get

To introduce the next series of shoes we need almost Rs 10,00,000 ($15,000) of which 70% would go into production and 20% on marketing and 10% to open our first physical store. 

What you get?

By funding us or buying our Tracks series shoes you will get a 50% discount coupon on any of our next series shoes apart from getting a Track series shoes. 

The Future Vision

Rethinking the cobbler-to-customer pathway, We are working on building a platform where local cobblers can sell their handmade shoes and sandals. Increasing their product margins, the community will be benefited with better employment.

We are also now experimenting a Cork based insole which can be customized to the runners foot profile. This is sketched in 3 dimensions using a 3D pen.

 

Risks & Challenges

We are competing on a highly challenging space with high competition as we see our competitors in Nike, Puma and Adidas. 

Risk of inventory stock. We are experimenting new designs 

Other Ways You Can Help

You can always promote our website on your social pages as well if you have expertise in Product Design and Marketing we will be happy to accept your help.

story:
RubyMoon creates a positive social & environmental impact by providing women with an everyday super-comfortable day bra that's also great for sports and swimming. We've been making ethical & sustainable swim and active wear for 5 years and due to high demand, we are now offering a new high-tech supportive bra called 'Zarina'.

 

   With over 25 years of experience in lingerie/swim design, our team has perfected the art of creating a comfortable and supportive bra, whether it be in the office, the commute home, the pool or the gym.

Please see international size charts in our image gallery

    Using an innovative new fabric with exceptional benefits, the Zarina bra will be brought to life through your help and kind donations – (and you can be the first wear this innovative bra!) We were challenged to bring the very best versatile bra to market, that's both aesthetically and ethically pleasing. Research shows that there is a higher demand for a clean cut bra, smooth bra without the seams, stripes and panels – that’s where Rubymoon’s Zarina bra comes in!

   As a result of the campaign, RubyMoon will be able to launch an entire new collection for Summer 2017! Meaning everyone will be able to enjoy the entire new range of swimwear, leggings & sports gear - proudly made in Europe in a transparent and ethical supply chain with 42% less carbon emissions. 

    And our impact doesn’t end there! We donate all our net profits to women entrepreneurs in 11 developing countries. We chose to help women primarily because they are statistically more likely to invest in the “important things” including nutrition, housing and education. This leads to a two-pronged result: a better quality of life for the children and empowering the women behind them.

   Why did we call this bra Zarina, you ask? As a nice touch, we name all the pieces in our collection after the names of the women we invest in. In this case we are investing in Zarina Bibi whom lives in Pakistan and creates an income for herself by recycling knitwear. You can see her story on the RubyMoon blog (www.rubymoon.org.uk/blog)

Our campaign

  • We aim to raise enough money to manufacture the first production run of 300 bras - delivered to you this July. This will allow RubyMoon to fund our first full collection launch. This will take us, as a company, from the 'ethical edge' to mainstream retailers and beyond!

  • We have an exciting range of perks including the bra itself. RubyMoon have spent a long time researching what makes a  bra desirable- whether it's for swimming, yoga, aerobics- in and out of the water, a kick-boxing session or that you just want a good-looking bra that's completely comfortable and supportive, including for larger women. We will ask you your bra size after the campaign ends- and send you a how to measure tutorial so that you will be confident that you are ordering correctly.

  • If we do not reach our goal we will use the donations to make samples of leggings and swimwear that we will then crowd fund in early summer- we won't give up!

  •  If we do go over our target we will be able to offer a selection of swim bottoms and active leggings to match your bra!  

    RubyMoon are ready to go and can deliver your product by early July. We can't wait to bring this exciting product to market and thank you for your support.

   Our impact is much greater than other apparel companies because we consider people and planet first. As a social enterprise- we believe that the fashion industry can be used by women as consumers, to help other women less fortunate than themselves- and here's how:

  • RubyMoon's products are durable, stylish, and functional and offer a ‘designer’ premium product at an affordable price. 

  • We believe that the fashion industry can change from being the world's second worst polluter (after the oil industry) to the worlds most sustainable industry. With 1 in 6 people globally employed in it (mostly women), this industry needs to change to provide safe and decent employment, because it is possible to make beautiful, quality clothes ethically. Our ethos is based on: how we spend our money can provide positive social and environmental change. 

Customer Testimonials

"I was so happy to find an ethical swimwear company, I love the bright colours and the quality is faultless." Jo Harper

"So awesome to see brands like RubyMoon doing what they do, thank you for enabling me to be a sustainable and positive consumer!" Honor, New Zealand.

"I looooove my RubyMoon costume. The design is clever and beautiful, the suit is comfortable and the quality is fantastic - definitely the best swimwear I've had." Rose-Anna

"My daughter heard of RubyMoon through an ethical blog. She is into ethical clothing and your costumes appealed to me and her!"  Janet

"Very happy with the high quality swimwear that RubyMoon produces. I wear mine all the time!"  Caroline

    Testing: 

       We have been wearer- testing our bras during different activities:  yoga, swimming, Pilates, cycling, aerobics & kick-boxing. This 'Gym to Swim' bra has proven to provide support and comfort - keeping you fresh, dry, comfortable and confident.

    Why we are crowdfunding: 

        Bra production comes with substantial order minimums due to the number of underband/cup size variations- This campaign will provide the much needed capital to fund our first production run that we want to share with the world.

    Risks and challenges: 

     We are confident in our ability to deliver an outstanding product on time. We have worked with our ethical manufacturing partner for years and have set enough time for production and fulfilment: and our team is experienced in production and any problems that might occur. We have also gone through multiple prototypes and testing on the bra and feel confident that the product we are presenting to you is one you will want to re-order!

        The biggest potential challenge comes down to sizing and ensuring our customers select the right size for them and we have wearer tested the product for over one year and on over 50 women of all various cup sizes with a particular focus on small backs and larger cup sizes. We are happy to help guide customers in choosing the correct size for you. If you are unhappy with your purchase for any reason, we want to make it right. Simply let us know what happened and we will happily exchange the bra for a different size, free of charge (shipping charges apply for international orders).  If you are between sizes we recommend you size down. After you order from us we will contact you and guide you to select the right size. We will ask you your bra size after the campaign ends- and send you a how to measure tutorial so that you will be confident that you are ordering correctly.

        We acknowledge that there is a risk that we will not get the minimum number of supporters but we do have 'ethical' and 'eco' customers who have been following our progress, and we do believe we have a winning product that people have been asking for a long time.

      Other Ways You Can Help

      If you can't contribute, that doesn't mean you can't help- if you like what we are doing:

      • Please get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
      • Please use the Indiegogo share tools!


      Thank you!
      Love RubyMoon
story_txt:
RubyMoon creates a positive social & environmental impact by providing women with an everyday super-comfortable day bra that's also great for sports and swimming. We've been making ethical & sustainable swim and active wear for 5 years and due to high demand, we are now offering a new high-tech supportive bra called 'Zarina'.




 

   With over 25 years of experience in lingerie/swim design, our team has perfected the art of creating a comfortable and supportive bra, whether it be in the office, the commute home, the pool or the gym.




Please see international size charts in our image gallery

    Using an innovative new fabric with exceptional benefits, the Zarina bra will be brought to life through your help and kind donations – (and you can be the first wear this innovative bra!) We were challenged to bring the very best versatile bra to market, that's both aesthetically and ethically pleasing. Research shows that there is a higher demand for a clean cut bra, smooth bra without the seams, stripes and panels – that’s where Rubymoon’s Zarina bra comes in!






   As a result of the campaign, RubyMoon will be able to launch an entire new collection for Summer 2017! Meaning everyone will be able to enjoy the entire new range of swimwear, leggings & sports gear - proudly made in Europe in a transparent and ethical supply chain with 42% less carbon emissions. 




    And our impact doesn’t end there! We donate all our net profits to women entrepreneurs in 11 developing countries. We chose to help women primarily because they are statistically more likely to invest in the “important things” including nutrition, housing and education. This leads to a two-pronged result: a better quality of life for the children and empowering the women behind them.



     Why did we call this bra Zarina, you ask? As a nice touch, we name all the pieces in our collection after the names of the women we invest in. In this case we are investing in Zarina Bibi whom lives in Pakistan and creates an income for herself by recycling knitwear. You can see her story on the RubyMoon blog (www.rubymoon.org.uk/blog)
Our campaign
  
We aim to raise enough money to manufacture the first production run of 300 bras - delivered to you this July. This will allow RubyMoon to fund our first full collection launch. This will take us, as a company, from the 'ethical edge' to mainstream retailers and beyond!
 
We have an exciting range of perks including the bra itself. RubyMoon have spent a long time researching what makes a  bra desirable- whether it's for swimming, yoga, aerobics- in and out of the water, a kick-boxing session or that you just want a good-looking bra that's completely comfortable and supportive, including for larger women. We will ask you your bra size after the campaign ends- and send you a how to measure tutorial so that you will be confident that you are ordering correctly.
 
If we do not reach our goal we will use the donations to make samples of leggings and swimwear that we will then crowd fund in early summer- we won't give up!


 If we do go over our target we will be able to offer a selection of swim bottoms and active leggings to match your bra!  


    RubyMoon are ready to go and can deliver your product by early July. We can't wait to bring this exciting product to
 market and thank you for your support.
 





   Our impact is much greater than other apparel companies because we consider people and planet first. As a social enterprise- we believe that the fashion industry can be used by women as consumers, to help other women less fortunate than themselves- and here's how:
  
RubyMoon's products are durable, stylish, and functional and offer a ‘designer’ premium product at an affordable price. 


We believe that the fashion industry can change from being the world's second worst polluter (after the oil industry) to the worlds most sustainable industry. With 1 in 6 people globally employed in it (mostly women), this industry needs to change to provide safe and decent employment, because it is possible to make beautiful, quality clothes ethically. Our ethos is based on: how we spend our money can provide positive social and environmental change. 



Customer Testimonials "I was so happy to find an ethical swimwear company, I love the bright colours and the quality is faultless." Jo Harper
"So awesome to see brands like RubyMoon doing what they do, thank you for enabling me to be a sustainable and positive consumer!" Honor, New Zealand.
 "I looooove my RubyMoon costume. The design is clever and beautiful, the suit is comfortable and the quality is fantastic - definitely the best swimwear I've had." Rose-Anna
"My daughter heard of RubyMoon through an ethical blog. She is into ethical clothing and your costumes appealed to me and her!"  Janet
"Very happy with the high quality swimwear that RubyMoon produces. I wear mine all the time!"  Caroline

Simply let us know what happened and we will happily exchange the bra for a different size, free of charge (shipping charges apply for international orders).  If you are between sizes we recommend you size down. After you order from us we will contact you and guide you to select the right size. We will ask you your bra size after the campaign ends- and send you a how to measure tutorial so that you will be confident that you are ordering correctly.
