story:
About This Project:

The three of us have long been fans of classic styling. Looks and designs which recall eras and fashions of times past, where quality was a standard and things were built to last. 

We love items which are antique yet modern in look, and sophisticated enough to feel at home in today's fashion stakes. We wanted to bring this passion for classic style into developing a range of merchandise that would capture this essence of yesteryear, and over time build a brand and range of products that would be synonymous with timeless styling and quality at an affordable price.

Our starting point is the Camissi Watch which we hope can be the forerunner of a range of highly sort after timepieces and other quality merchandise as we expand and grow. 

The inspiration for the design of the Camissi Watch came from the speedometers of the Indian Motorcycle Co.

Indian Motorcycles were produced from 1901 to 1953 in Springfield, Massachusetts, U.S.A. and during the 1910s, Indian became the largest manufacturer of motorcycles in the world. Their styling was iconic and the deep red colour they started to use in 1904 became their trademark identity.

"Indian Scout 600 cc 1920" by Yesterday’s Antique Motorcycles en Classic Motorcycle Archive

More recently, as dramatized in the 2005 film “The World’s Fasted Indian”, a number of land speed records were set by Burt Munro from New Zealand between 1962 and 1967 using a 1920’s modified Indian Scout. The Indian Motorbike was still able to set the pace 50 years on. Truly timeless! 

We have hoped to capture the essence of what Indian represented in the Camissi Watch : Iconic design, quality components and as relevant now as it was in yesteryear. 

Goals & Challenges:

• Design: This was our first priority. During 2015 we approached different designers and ask them to come up with a range of designs that would give us styling that stood out and presented a family look.

Many designs were considered and rejected after canvassing comments from friends, relatives and acquaintances, as they didn't capture the essence of what we were about. We also looked into practicality of design vs function, as a watch should not only look good, but it should work well as a timepiece.

Finally, drawing on the inspiration of the Indian Motorcycle speedometer design, we came up with four options that we believe will become classics in their own right. 

The Camissi range of Retro Style watches;


• Affordability: We wanted to be able to sell the Camissi Watch at under $US 150. Important in achieving this goal was to find a manufacturer that could deliver top quality at an affordable price. We partnered with a 25 years plus veteran of watch manufacturing to successfully find the right watch manufacturer for the price and quality we wanted to achieve. 

• Practicality: While styling was important, we also wanted a practical timepiece that was usable for everyday wear. It needed to be made from quality components that could withstand the rigours of day to day use, and be more than just a dress watch. We also wanted to have in-built flexibility so that a different look could be achieved simply through a change of the watch band. 

The End Result:

We believe that we have met our challenges and reached our goals with the Camissi Watch. Quality, design and an affordable price.

The watch design echoes the speedometers found on the classic Indian Motorcycles. A choice of 4 different Dial and Leather Band options allows you to select the look that best suits you. 

The Camissi range consists of: 

1. Daytona: Named after the Daytona Beach International Speedway in Florida USA. Used for motor cycle racing in 1964 - 1965.

A speedometer inspired face in black with white in-filled hands and time markings. Numerals are 0800 to 0400. Fitted with a black leather padded band with cream contrast side stitch. Bonus contrast leather band supplied with pin removing tool and two spare pins. 

2. Monza: Named after the Monza Circuit in Italy. Used for motor cycle racing from 1949 - 1987.

A speedometer inspired face in Indian Red and Cream background. Numerals are 0800 to 0400. Cream in-filled hands and black time markings. Fitted with brown leather padded band with cream contrast side stitch. Bonus contrast leather band supplied with pin removing tool and two spare pins.

3. San Marino: Named after the San Marino motorcyle Grand Prix held on the Rimini Coast of Italy since 1981.

A speedometer inspired minimalist face Indian Red and Cream background featuring the numerals 08 to 04. Cream in-filled hands and black time markings. Fitted with a brown leather padded band with cream contrast side stitch. Bonus contrast leather band supplied with pin removing tool. 

4. Indianapolis: Named after the Indianapolis Circuit, which has featured 8 Grand Prix motor cycle races since 2008.

A speedometer inspired face in a Cream background. Numerals are 0800 to 0400. Cream in-filled hands and black time markings. Fitted with brown leather padded band with cream contrast side stitch. Bonus contrast leather band supplied with pin removing tool. 

Common Features on all Models:

All styles will be supplied with a bonus contrast leather band that can be easily changed over using the supplied pin removing tool. The Pin Removing Tool is supplied in a clear pouch with 2 extra band pins. 

The look of each watch can therefore be changed according to the occasion or to fit in with whatever you are wearing. 

For secure transport and future storage to protect your investment, the watches are supplied in a curved retro style black P.U. leather watch case. 

The matte solid stainless steel case is designed to look stylish when used as a dress watch, yet durable enough to handle outdoor or physical activities. The case’s robust qualities are complemented by mineral glass to provide strength in a cost effective material. 

We have chosen the Citizen Miyota Movement to power the watch, as it has proven to be very accurate and built to last for many years. These movements are made with mercury-free batteries and in RoHS compliant facilities. 

The battery is of Japan origin with an expected life of 3 years. Changing the battery in the future is a simple 5 minutes’ exercise. 

Miyota 3 hand Quartz Movement

The watch is also water resistant to 10ATMs or 100 meters. Resistant enough to accompany you to the beach or for general swimming. We do not recommend diving however! 

SPECIFICATIONS:

  • Case Diameter: 44.2 mm Case 
  • Band Material: Genuine Leather Band 
  • Band Width: 22 mm
  • Case Material: Matt Solid Stainless Steel
  • Steel Back Plating: Stainless Steel
  • Clasp: Standard Buckle Clasp 
  • Clasp Material: Stainless Steel
  • Dial Window Material: Mineral Glass 
  • Display: Chronograph Analog
  • Movement: Japanese Miyota (Citizen) 3 Hand Quartz Movement
  • Seconds Function: Yes 
  • Water Resistant: 10 ATM / 100 Meters / 300 Feet 
  • Bonus Leather Watch Band with Pin Removing Tool & 2 extra Band Pins
  • Supplied in curved Retro Style Protective Watch Case. 

Camissi Watch 2 years Warranty:

We believe in the quality of our watches, which is why we will offer a 2 Year Warranty on the watch’s internal parts and workmanship. If anything should happen to your watch within the first 2 years, you can send it back to us for repair or replacement.    

Timeline:

April 2016:   Backers Surveyed by email for Design Choice

May 2016:   Funding Campaign Concludes. Book Production and Order Materials

June 2016:   Production Begins. Stock Shipped to Us for Final QC Inspection.               Early Bird Backers' Watches are Shipped Out.

July 2016:    Balance of First production Shipped Out.


Risks & Challenges

We are confident that we have covered all aspects of the manufacturing process as our chosen manufacturer has a proven history of supplying according to the quality and specification levels set. 
Any non-conforming product will be picked up during the Quality Inspection stage and replaced prior to dispatch. There may be some minor delays in leaving the manufacturing facility should this occur. 
Once production has been completed, and we receive the watches, we will post these out to our backers straight away. 
There may be some postal delays, depending on the postal service, but we will keep a record of what has been sent out and when, so that if there is a delay in receipt, we can follow through to try to locate where the package may be. 
For Camissi in the medium to longer term, the most prominent challenge we will have will be marketing our product and getting the word out there. Individually and collectively we do have extensive marketing experience with other products and brands, so this is something which we can confidently address over time. 

Other Ways You Can Help

To get sufficient backing on this project we need people to know about it. If you like the look of these watches and know someone else who also might, please let them know about Camissi Watches. Pass the word around and you can help us get this off the ground using the Indiegogo share tools or any other way you can make a noise about this.

story:
What We Do

We craft meaningful bangles for strong and creative women. The designs that we make tell different stories about how it is to be a woman in pursuit of her passions. We aim not only to make beautiful jewelry and accessories, but to create bangles that, when worn, inspire women and constantly remind them to embrace life's challenges and adventures. Our crafts are made right in our artist’s home in the Philippines.

The Bangles

Our bangles are made of copper, in shades of rose gold and dark earthy red-brown, which our artist crafts by hand to create different intricate designs. Our artist incorporates different gemstones, natural stones, fused glass art and beadings into the designs to bring more life into the handcrafted bangles.





Part of our ancient Filipino tradition is the practice of using certain stones to aid in both physical and spiritual healing. This is why our shop is named after the “babaylan”, which is the reference used for the female or female-identifying priestess, healer and leader of the ancient Filipino tribe.


The Meaningfulness

Some of our bangles are wishes of love, good health, prosperity and courage. Some of our bangles speak of life’s laughable ironies and challenges, the adventure of self-realization and the romantic life of being true to your one-of-a-kind self. Still, there are many other stories and inspirations to explore in our collection.

With every bangle is a card that tells you of the meaning of that particular design. This makes our bangles great gifts for oneself or for someone special.

As you hold up a cup of coffee to face the rest of your day, we hope that the bold design around your wrist will encourage you to persist and keep on going. We hope for you to wear our bangle to remind you that you are strong, creative and beautiful.

The Team

Our artist, Elaine Orozco, has been crafting these bangles by hand, and excelling in her passion, for more than 10 years.
The campaign manager, Psyche Resus, has been living in San Francisco, U.S. and helping the venture explore a new shore.


What We Need and What You Get


What We Need

We need to make our first shipment to the U.S. Making our first shipment will help us understand the process, the fees, the timeline and the necessary factors involved in shipping overseas. This will be a practical learning experience for a small venture like ours to help us serve our backers and patrons in the best way possible.


What You Get

For supporting this campaign, you will get to keep some of our bangles at the earliest starting price for international shipping.


Classic Bangle Perks:

for $20 - you get 1 Classic Bangle

for $35 - you get the 2 Classic Bangles GIFT SET

for $50 - you get the 4 Classic Bangles GIFT SET - these make wonderful gifts!



Special Bangle Perks:

for $35 - you get 1 Special Bangle - THE FIRST 5 BACKERS for this perk will each get a PATRON'S PASS

for $90 - you get 3 Special Bangles - ALL BACKERS for this perk will each GET A PATRON'S PASS, with PRIVILEGED ACCESS to use towards grabbing another perk!



Dream Cuff Bangle Perks:

for $45 - you get 1 Dream Cuff Bangle

for $80 - you get 2 Dream Cuff Bangles - ALL BACKERS for this perk will each GET A PATRON'S PASS, with PRIVILEGED ACCESS to use towards grabbing another perk!

for $155 - you get 4 Dream Cuff Bangles GIFT SET - ALL BACKERS for this perk will each GET A PATRON'S PASS, with PRIVILEGED ACCESS to use towards grabbing another perk!





What is a PATRON'S PASS?

Be one of our first backers for selected perks to find out.


The Impact

Your contribution will

  • share our much of our Filipino culture and history through crafts, with a contemporary twist
  • the artist will be able hire the help of more talented artists who live in challenging Metro Manila who need another source of income, such stay-at-home moms and working women who want to work 2 jobs and/or gain financial independence and economic stability.
  • Supporting the art and crafts of women artists in developing countries will help these women empower themselves.
  • Support fashion that is meaningful, that is meant to give inspiration .


Risks & Challenges

  • Shipping Time

This will be our first shipment outside of the country, and as with the case of our system in the Philippines, it can be confusing and challenging to determine the actual time it will take to process an international shipment for a small venture like ours. But we're determined to try and learn from the experience in order for us to grow.

We want you to receive our bangles no later than December, in time for the holidays. To make sure of this, we plan to ship by August. This may sound a little over-the-top but we want to allow time for unexpected events that may come up and we want you to be happy with our service. At best, we hope to have the bangles in the U.S. by October.

  • Processing and Shipping Fees

We are about to find out the real costs and fees for processing shipping our kind of product outside the Philippines. For this reason, we are doing a FIXED CAMPAIGN. We want to raise enough funds that will help us pursue the campaign and face the challenges and surprises. Every support you give us will count!


Other Ways You Can Help

  1. Please share our campaign with people whom you think may be interested in our art, fashion and jewelry.
  2. Comments, suggest and question whenever you feel like you've got a bright idea for us or you are intrigued by something. Reach out to us!
  3. Share email addresses of folks with us and we can shoot them a direct invitation to check out our campaign.
  4. Browse through the collections on our website and share them: www.babaylantreasures.com.
  5. Like us on Facebook! www.facebook.com/babaylantreasures.
story_txt:
What We DoWe craft meaningful bangles for strong and creative women. The designs that we make tell different stories about how it is to be a woman in pursuit of her passions. We aim not only to make beautiful jewelry and accessories, but to create bangles that, when worn, inspire women and constantly remind them to embrace life's challenges and adventures. Our crafts are made right in our artist’s home in the Philippines.The BanglesOur bangles are made of copper, in shades of rose gold and dark earthy red-brown, which our artist crafts by hand to create different intricate designs. Our artist incorporates different gemstones, natural stones, fused glass art and beadings into the designs to bring more life into the handcrafted bangles.Part of our ancient Filipino tradition is the practice of using certain stones to aid in both physical and spiritual healing. This is why our shop is named after the “babaylan”, which is the reference used for the female or female-identifying priestess, healer and leader of the ancient Filipino tribe.The MeaningfulnessSome of our bangles are wishes of love, good health, prosperity and courage. Some of our bangles speak of life’s laughable ironies and challenges, the adventure of self-realization and the romantic life of being true to your one-of-a-kind self. Still, there are many other stories and inspirations to explore in our collection.With every bangle is a card that tells you of the meaning of that particular design. This makes our bangles great gifts for oneself or for someone special.As you hold up a cup of coffee to face the rest of your day, we hope that the bold design around your wrist will encourage you to persist and keep on going. We hope for you to wear our bangle to remind you that you are strong, creative and beautiful.The TeamOur artist, Elaine Orozco, has been crafting these bangles by hand, and excelling in her passion, for more than 10 years.The campaign manager, Psyche Resus, has been living in San Francisco, U.S. and helping the venture explore a new shore.
What We Need and What You GetWhat We NeedWe need to make our first shipment to the U.S. Making our first shipment will help us understand the process, the fees, the timeline and the necessary factors involved in shipping overseas. This will be a practical learning experience for a small venture like ours to help us serve our backers and patrons in the best way possible.What You GetFor supporting this campaign, you will get to keep some of our bangles at the earliest starting price for international shipping.Classic Bangle Perks:for $20 - you get 1 Classic Banglefor $35 - you get the 2 Classic Bangles GIFT SETfor $50 - you get the 4 Classic Bangles GIFT SET - these make wonderful gifts!Special Bangle Perks:for $35 - you get 1 Special Bangle - THE FIRST 5 BACKERS for this perk will each get a PATRON'S PASSfor $90 - you get 3 Special Bangles - ALL BACKERS for this perk will each GET A PATRON'S PASS, with PRIVILEGED ACCESS to use towards grabbing another perk!Dream Cuff Bangle Perks:for $45 - you get 1 Dream Cuff Banglefor $80 - you get 2 Dream Cuff Bangles - ALL BACKERS for this perk will each GET A PATRON'S PASS, with PRIVILEGED ACCESS to use towards grabbing another perk!for $155 - you get 4 Dream Cuff Bangles GIFT SET - ALL BACKERS for this perk will each GET A PATRON'S PASS, with PRIVILEGED ACCESS to use towards grabbing another perk!


What is a PATRON'S PASS?Be one of our first backers for selected perks to find out.The Impact
Your contribution will

share our much of our Filipino culture and history through crafts, with a contemporary twist
the artist will be able hire the help of more talented artists who live in challenging Metro Manila who need another source of income, such stay-at-home moms and working women who want to work 2 jobs and/or gain financial independence and economic stability.
Supporting the art and crafts of women artists in developing countries will help these women empower themselves.
Support fashion that is meaningful, that is meant to give inspiration .

Risks & Challenges


Shipping Time
This will be our first shipment outside of the country, and as with the case of our system in the Philippines, it can be confusing and challenging to determine the actual time it will take to process an international shipment for a small venture like ours. But we're determined to try and learn from the experience in order for us to grow.We want you to receive our bangles no later than December, in time for the holidays. To make sure of this, we plan to ship by August. This may sound a little over-the-top but we want to allow time for unexpected events that may come up and we want you to be happy with our service. At best, we hope to have the bangles in the U.S. by October.
Processing and Shipping Fees
We are about to find out the real costs and fees for processing shipping our kind of product outside the Philippines. For this reason, we are doing a FIXED CAMPAIGN. We want to raise enough funds that will help us pursue the campaign and face the challenges and surprises. Every support you give us will count!
Other Ways You Can Help



Please share our campaign with people whom you think may be interested in our art, fashion and jewelry.
Comments, suggest and question whenever you feel like you've got a bright idea for us or you are intrigued by something. Reach out to us!
Share email addresses of folks with us and we can shoot them a direct invitation to check out our campaign.
Browse through the collections on our website and share them: www.babaylantreasures.com.

Like us on Facebook! www.facebook.com/babaylantreasures.

story:
Check us out at www.onesoleinsoles.com

Join us in our journey to make the most affordable high quality custom insoles for everyone, including developing countries where they cannot afford over $10 for shoes 

The Ultimate Customizable Insoles

OneSoles insoles are the highest quality custom insoles in the market and affordable for everyone at just $29/pair. The most unique product features are:

  • Extremely High Durability (with negligible tear propagation) 
  • Washable via washing machine/hand wash (say no to foot odor!)
  • Custom support for High Arch/Flat Foot
  • Custom "Skin-Like" materials for your specific foot needs (US Patent Pending 15/204,353)
  • Wearable with Blisters/Soars/Ulcers
  • Most Efficient Process (Needs 2 Pictures of your foot) 

At OneSoles, we like it simple and feel that insoles doesn't have to be cool looking or high-tech! They should be affordable, last long, easy to maintain, and specifically address YOUR foot problems, not global foot problems!   

Our 3-STEP Process

Our 3-step ordering process uses an App which will take you less than a minute of your time to complete your order:

  1. Take two pictures of your foot (Top and Side View)

    • Attach Third Picture (Bottom View: for Blisters/Sores/Ulcers)

    • Attach Fourth Picture (Foot Stress Map: Wet your foot and step on a white paper) 

  2. Select your foot Size/Add Extra Details 
  3. Order Confirmation and Processing (Less than a day)

We DON'T create complex 3D foot models with 20+ pictures, as its a waste of your and our time! Our inbuilt algorithm with two-pictures gets your foot shape and arch information, that's all we need.

Why OneSoles?

Why should you buy OneSoles when their are so many insole brands and so called "custom insole" brands out there?

What can you Customize?

With OneSoles, you can customize:

  • Foot Shape (Arch)
  • Materials at High Stress Points (Synthetic Skin, US Patent Pending 15/204,353)
  • Blister/Ulcer Isolation (Any size or location, US Patent Pending 62/360,773)
  • Colors

Beta Testing

We have tested our insoles on beta users around the world and this is what they have to say:

 

Media and News

 

Partnerships and Mentors

Design Phases

Manufacturing and Testing

Unlike commonly used complex additive manufacturing processes such as Selective Laser Sintering (SLS) for making custom shoes and insoles, we use a fast and cost effective extrusion based 3D printing process to fabricate OneSoles. The synthetic skin material (US Patent Pending 15/204,353) which can be range from ultra soft to hard, can be dispensed via nozzle attachments at specific sections of our insoles, using our proprietary manufacturing process. The resulting insoles are extremely durable with minimal tear propagation.

Synthetic Skin Technology Used in OneSoles
Tear Test of OneSoles compared to Standard/Custom Foam Based Insoles

Team

OneSoles is based in EDGE at Tuscaloosa, AL. It was co-founded by Arnab Chanda and Trey Robbins. Arnab is a final year PhD student at the Department of Aerospace Engineering at the University of Alabama (UA) and has four provisional patents and has worked previously in USA, China and India. Arnab's area of research is "Biomechanics" and has eight publications and presented in multiple international conferences. Trey is a sophomore at the Department of Mechanical Engineering at UA and has over 8 years of experience in the biomedical industry.

Adam Pluth is a senior at the Department of Computer and Electrical Engineering and has over 5 years of experience in App development and website designing. Piper Daniels is a sophomore at the Department of Aerospace Engineering at UA and is an expert in designing and video editing.    

We as a team are very excited to see where we go from here trying to solve foot problems worldwide.  

Risks and Challenges

We have created multiple working prototypes of OneSoles and tested them on Beta users around the world. We have set conservative dates for delivery, and we are very confident that we can reliably deliver OneSoles to backers within the timelines we have promised.

We have a finalized bill of materials, meaning we know what the fixed costs will be for fabricating the first 1000 pairs of insoles. All of our teammates being college students with limited budget, we would require funding for purchasing multiple 3D printers, silicone based materials, and packaging materials.

In the event of a highly successful campaign with a large volume of orders (internationally), there is a risk of delays in fulfillment as we scale up our manufacturing capacity. In order to address this risk, we have provided conservative timelines for delivery.

Every project has risks. We feel we have done what we can to manage them and are completely confident in our ability to meet our commitments to our backers.

Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)

   1. What if the insole doesn't fit me?

Ans: We will get your feedback and ship you a new one for free in less than a week.

   2. I have heard about three or four other 3D Printed insole brands in the market. How is OneSoles different?

Ans: The novelty of our technology is not just the 3D printing process, but our patent pending "Skin-Like" material. To date, all 3D printing processes use a standard material (hard or flexible). We are the first ones to be able to print soft "Skin-Like" materials just for your foot skin type (any stiffness-ultra soft/soft/medium/hard) and that too at different sections of your insole to ensure effective foot stress reduction. Also, all other 3D printed custom insoles typically come in a price range of $80-$500, which conform to your foot shape, but does no better to your foot than standard insoles due to the use of standard materials. OneSoles are just for $29/pair and designed for your foot with the right structural and material supports.

   3. Why do I need different materials in an insole?

Ans: Every section of your foot (Heel, Mid-foot, Arch, Metatarsals and Toes) goes through different levels of stresses due to your specific daily activities. Incorporating softer materials at high stress sections will provide adequate cushioning and ensure effective pain relief.

   4. How do I know which foot section needs what material support?

Ans: First way is based on your feelings (heel pain or arch pain etc.). Second way is to wet your feet and stand on a sheet of paper which will indicate to the high stress points on your foot. If you communicate this information to us (via picture attachment), we will make your custom insole accordingly.

   5. I don't know what I want out of my insole?

Ans: Let us know your foot problems, and we will send our recommendation for you.

   6. Why not Dr. Scholl's or any other custom insole brand?

Ans: They don't really make custom insoles. They have 4-5 standard options for you, not a specific design for your foot need. Only we have this!

   7. My friend does fine just with the $10 moldable insoles in the market, why do I need OneSoles?

Ans: First, everyone's daily activities and foot needs are different. Thus, an insole which works for one person may not work for another. Second, if you like to buy $ 50- $ 200 shoes every six month to look good, why not invest $29 for a year or two to feel good! 

   8. I have blisters/sores on my foot. Can you make me an insole to wear with that?

Ans: Just share with us the location and size of the blister/sore on your foot as additional information when you order, and we will work with you to get a perfect insole for you.

   9. What after Indiegogo/Kickstarter?

Ans: If we are able to reach our funding goals, we plan to set up an online store to sell our custom insoles. We will also try to further reduce the prices to help people in poor countries, where $29 is still a lot to pay for any shoe or insole. Additionally, we will be looking for partnerships to expand our business in the US and internationally.

   10. Will your App work on an I-Phone?

Ans: Our App is currently available for Android users, and needs further improvements and updates for ios users, which will happen in the next 2 months.

   11. I have diabetic ulcer, will OneSoles work for me?

Ans: For very specific foot conditions such as severe diabetic ulcers and cancerous sores, medical prescriptions may be required before we recommend an insole for you.

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
EARLY BIRD EXCLUSIVE : FREE Magic Flowerpot for backers in India & +10$ outside India.

Tvashtra Minimalist Wallets

Unique - Natural Eco Materials - Minimal & Unisex Design - Durable 

 

Clever Expandable Mechanism

 

Fully Customizable Front, Back & Stitching

FRONT

 

BACK

 

STITCHING

 

 

This is a 100% Risk Free Campaign, as we are already in production stage for this product. Your pledge means 100% Guaranteed delivery of your products by Sep 2018. We are a legally registered Small Business in India since 2011. We consistently provide highest quality products at fair and lucrative prices, and by never compromise on quality at any cost. So back us with confidence, and be one of the first few to get your hands on these beauties, and take a step closer to nature!

 

FAQs

 

Where are you located? Where do you ship to?

We are based out of Mumbai, India. All products are made in India. We ship worldwide.

 

What are the shipping charges & timelines ?

FREE SHIPPING WORLDWIDE. All early bird backers can expect shipment by SEP 2018.

 

My Shipping Address is outside India, but I still want the Magic Flowerpot with my Wallet. How can I get it?

After you pledge to any of the wallet perks, you can select the "Add Magic Flowerpot" Perk for 12$ to get it with your Wallet.

 

I have a special request/requirement, could you comply?

We hate to say no more than you hate to hear it. So throw anything at us, and we'll probably make it happen!

 

I need some help/further information. How can I contact you?

You can mail us at support@blackboxunlimited.com.

story:
Who are we?

The Lyte is a discreet, yet powerful light source that will illuminate the inside of any bag - inspired by the universal experience of watching people struggling to find small items in dark spaces.

 

The idea came to Pete the first time he saw a girl empty her handbag on a table. Several thoughts occurred to him at once; how did she get so much stuff in there, what is all that stuff, why do you need all that stuff and how do you organise it all? Then, (like the model and make of car you bought because it was unique, then you start seeing it everywhere) he started seeing this kind of behaviour played out in subtly different ways. The thought occurred to him at least two decades ago; imagine how a personal illumination device that lived in a handbag would help!

 

The Lyte uses a standard, round CR2032 battery,  that is replaceable. The battery life (when turned on 3 times a day), will last more than 12 months! Replacing the Lyte's battery is easy as..... 1, 2, 3!

 

 

So....how durable is it?

Well, it’s been through a full washing cycle………….

 

 

and survived the Daisy interrogation. What’s the Daisy Interrogation you ask? Being pulled apart by a 32Kg Greyhound.

And IT STILL WORKS!

It has taken us over four years of market-led feedback, two design engineering firms, a lot of patience and a belief in what we’re creating that has gotten us to this point.

The Team

Our team is comprised of our Directors - Vannessa, Peter and Eduard and our wonderful fourth team member Nethmee. 

We needed to come up with something that ticked some fundamental boxes. We have spent the last 4 years talking to an army of potential buyers and proceeded to add more features and parts based on their direct feedback.

The only missing part now is you! We would love to share this amazingly handy product to make everyone's life easier in finding those Knick knacks that always get lost in the depths of your bag.

 

Shipping

Below is a table that represents what our estimated shipping costs for this campaign. These shipping costs are based on our projections of sales amount as well as an average of ranges for shipping costs we've attained, thus these shipping costs are subject to change depending on our final results.

We want to make this process as transparent and accurate as possible, without any false promises or unexpected changes. After your purchase on Indiegogo, we will be sending you a survey which will securely process your address and shipping payment.

 

 

What We Need & What You Get

So here it is folks!

✅ How much are we raising? 20,000 AUD

✅ What will you get? The Lyte, in 2 major releases and a total of 4 fantastic colours and the ability to customise them!

 

✅ Where will the funds go if we don't reach our entire goal?  We're determined to get the Lyte out there! So, we will be using these funds to set up our manufacturing and will keep going until we reach our goal!

 

See what some early users have to say!

 

The Impact 

We made the Lyte to bring ease and convenience to the chaos of everyday life. We are also making this project an opportunity to support some amazing Australian charities;

 

Risks & Challenges

Being first-time founders, we're likely to run into some bumps along the way.

However, our team's expertise runs across areas like risk management, sales, logistics and marketing - making us a heck of a great team, ready to resolve any issue to ensure that the Lyte shines in your bags and backpacks.

If you ever feel like you want to reach out to us, we're more than happy to help! Send us an email on info@originallyte.com and we'll resolve it as soon as possible.

 

Don't want to grab a perk, but still love the Lyte? 

No worries! Contribute $15 (or more) and you'll be able to also help us, AND the folks at Foodbank Australia or Kangaroo Island Wildlife Park.
story_txt: Who are we?The Lyte is a discreet, yet powerful light source that will illuminate the inside of any bag - inspired by the universal experience of watching people struggling to find small items in dark spaces. The idea came to Pete the first time he saw a girl empty her handbag on a table. Several thoughts occurred to him at once; how did she get so much stuff in there, what is all that stuff, why do you need all that stuff and how do you organise it all? Then, (like the model and make of car you bought because it was unique, then you start seeing it everywhere) he started seeing this kind of behaviour played out in subtly different ways. The thought occurred to him at least two decades ago; imagine how a personal illumination device that lived in a handbag would help! The Lyte uses a standard, round CR2032 battery,  that is replaceable. The battery life (when turned on 3 times a day), will last more than 12 months! Replacing the Lyte's battery is easy as..... 1, 2, 3!  So....how durable is it?Well, it’s been through a full washing cycle………….  and survived the Daisy interrogation. What’s the Daisy Interrogation you ask? Being pulled apart by a 32Kg Greyhound.And IT STILL WORKS!It has taken us over four years of market-led feedback, two design engineering firms, a lot of patience and a belief in what we’re creating that has gotten us to this point.The TeamOur team is comprised of our Directors - Vannessa, Peter and Eduard and our wonderful fourth team member Nethmee. We needed to come up with something that ticked some fundamental boxes. We have spent the last 4 years talking to an army of potential buyers and proceeded to add more features and parts based on their direct feedback.The only missing part now is you! We would love to share this amazingly handy product to make everyone's life easier in finding those Knick knacks that always get lost in the depths of your bag. ShippingBelow is a table that represents what our estimated shipping costs for this campaign. These shipping costs are based on our projections of sales amount as well as an average of ranges for shipping costs we've attained, thus these shipping costs are subject to change depending on our final results.We want to make this process as transparent and accurate as possible, without any false promises or unexpected changes. After your purchase on Indiegogo, we will be sending you a survey which will securely process your address and shipping payment.  What We Need & What You GetSo here it is folks!✅ How much are we raising? 20,000 AUD✅ What will you get? The Lyte, in 2 major releases and a total of 4 fantastic colours and the ability to customise them! ✅ Where will the funds go if we don't reach our entire goal?  We're determined to get the Lyte out there! So, we will be using these funds to set up our manufacturing and will keep going until we reach our goal! See what some early users have to say! The Impact We made the Lyte to bring ease and convenience to the chaos of everyday life. We are also making this project an opportunity to support some amazing Australian charities; Risks & ChallengesBeing first-time founders, we're likely to run into some bumps along the way.However, our team's expertise runs across areas like risk management, sales, logistics and marketing - making us a heck of a great team, ready to resolve any issue to ensure that the Lyte shines in your bags and backpacks.If you ever feel like you want to reach out to us, we're more than happy to help! Send us an email on info@originallyte.com and we'll resolve it as soon as possible. Don't want to grab a perk, but still love the Lyte? No worries! Contribute $15 (or more) and you'll be able to also help us, AND the folks at Foodbank Australia or Kangaroo Island Wildlife Park.

story:
HOW IT ALL STARTED

The idea for the Cordless Hair Dryer was sparked when I left my house on a rainy day to go to an important business meeting. I had already woken up 2 hours early, showered, blow dried and styled my hair and was dressed to impress.  The minute I opened my front door and walked to my car, a gust of wind blew my umbrella away, and my hair was done for. Already too late to go back in the house and fix it, I was forced to drive to the meeting with my hair in total disarray. As I was sitting in my car trying to salvage my hairstyle to the best of my ability, I thought. “Wouldn't it be nice if there was a convenient way to dry and style my hair on the go”  Later that day I checked to see if there was already something like this on the market, and could find no options. It was then and there that I decided that I was going the be the person to invent this lifesaver, and the Cordless Hairdryer Brush was born.

 

Media Outlets

Backers of our Project receive the Cordless Hair Dryer Brush for less than 50% of the retail price.

The Cordless Hair Dryer Brush is Portable, Lightweight and Affordable.

Stylish and Sleek, carry the Cordless Hair Dryer brush with you anywhere, anytime.

 The Cordless Hair Dryer Brush easily fits into any purse or backpack.

Water resistant design means that you can fearlessly take the Cordless Hair Dryer brush into wet places.

After we have shipped the Cordless Hair Dryer Brush to our supporters, it will be retailing in stores and on-line for $89.99. For your kindness, backers of our project will receive the Cordless Hair Dryer Brush for less than 50% of the price that it will be selling for in stores!

Choose the color of your Cordless Hair Dryer Brush

Cordless Hair Dryer Brush Diagram

The Cordless Hair Dryer Brush conveniently charges with a micro-usb cable.

Instantly add Style and Volume to your hair whenever, and wherever!

Use the Cordless Hair Dryer Brush at home or on the go.

 

 

Risks and challenges

Manufacturing the Cordless Hair Dryer is a big undertaking that involves a lot of scheduling, and extremely high attention to detail. We’ll be working with a few manufacturers for the different parts of the Cordless Hair Dryer to ensure all parts are arranged properly.

Our challenge includes ensuring each and every Cordless Hair Dryer is manufactured to the quality of workmanship we are promising to backers, as well as delivered to your door in the timeframe. Once the Cordless Hair Dryers are manufactured we will have them delivered to Toronto, where we will ship them to our backers across the world

story:
_____________________________________________________________________________

Short Summary

My name is Luigi, I am a footwear designer. I have been working for important designer labels for twenty years.  So, I have decided to create my brand and sell it around the world with the name Michelangelo.

Thanks to my knowledge in the manufacturing of the leather and shoe goods, I have familiarity with suppliers and craftsmen, who are necessary for the production.

The goal of this campaign is to offer you a leather footwear of top quality, completely handmade.

I have chosen, exclusively for this campaign,four new models of the Collection 2016, in limited edition . The names of the models are: Firenze, Roma, Milano and Venezia.

In this campaign, I would like to suggest you the Michelangelo collection, which is available in two different colors and four models.

Michelangelo is made with finest raw materials: calfskins and lining calfskins, which are powered and tanned in Italy.

The sole is in genuine leather with a rubber and leather heel. The footwear is made with nails in the sole, as only the local and expert craftsmen do.

For my shoes, I have chosen the following colors: Black and Brown. The shoes are sized from 38 to 48 extra large.

Michelangelo Project:


In the picture below, you can see the skin cut models, the soles, the yellow inner liners and the plantars. You can also notice the prototypes for the fit test.

Manufacturing phases:

Cutting: the cutting is made with an auto cad-cam machine, numerically controlled.

Skiving: it consists in the skin thinning, for the following working phases, to assure a perfect donning.

Connecting: it consists in the assembling and sewing the vamp in all its part.

Assembling: it consists in the assembling the vamp to the sole in order to clean and dress the shoe and finish it to have a top quality product. To do this, I will use only raw materials.

In  addition to a top quality footwear, which is completely handmade, you can also choose the sole that you like the most! In fact, you can select the sole and then the model of Milano, Roma, Firenze, Venezia shoes.

Shown below, you can see the three different models of tip:

Round Tip

Sweet Tip

Square Tip




Firenze shoe: lace-ups shoe with elegant handmade finishing, in limited edition. The smooth vamp is interrupted only by the finest stitching. Elegant footwear for special occasions.

Firenze black


Firenze brown



Roma shoe: lace-ups shoe in soft calfskin, enhanced by elegant and tapered features. This footwear has a classic and timeless elegance.

Roma black (sole A)

Roma brown (sole B)



Milano shoe: lace-ups shoe in soft calfskin with in view stitching on the vamp tip. An elegant footwear for a classy and traditional style.

Milano black

Milano brown



Venezia shoe: lace-up shoe in soft calfskin leather with classic contours, enhanced by elegant pierced dovetail decorations on the toes. Unique elegance.

OTHER IMAGES:


This is only an example of the prototypes. You have a wide range of possibilities to choose the model, the sole and the tip.



Each pairs of shoes has its bag, so you can preserve them!



Only the first 50 backers will receive a special gift: two silk ties, completely Made in Italy. Their price has been estimated $ 120 USD. They will give out in random sets, fancy or striped.

In the picture below, there are some useful instructions in order to help you to find the right size!

If you have any doubts in choosing your size, do not worry. Follow the measurement info of the charter and then indicate us your size. So we can create a footwear suitable for you! At the end of this campaign, you can choose the model, the sole and the color of your shoe.

In the gallery, you can see other details of this campaign. 

What We Need & What You Get

I need your help in order to realize my project and to achieve the following goal. I would like to create the Michelangelo’s shoes brand and place it around the world. I know, in fact, how is important to wear a comfortable footwear in order to fight the stress of the daily life. That is why, I have decided to create shoes of the highest quality, made in Italy, with only selected materials in order to prevent allergies. You can wear it also without socks! 

I will use your funds in this way:


With this campaign I have the chance to create my shoes, reduce the costs of the production and  realize other models of the same quality at a very low price.

I will offer you these footwear at the special launch prize of $ 429 USD. The selling price is $ 900 USD. Other brands sell the same shoes at $ 1900 USD.

The Impact

I love very much my work and catch the people with new shapes and models. For this reason, I have decided to create this campaign and I hope to satisfy you with my shoes. The colors are yellow for the sole, which is very elegant for man who loves to distinguish himself. Then, I will produce other stylish footwear in different colors.

Risks & Challenges

There are any kind of risks for your money, because both the craftsmen and the materials are Italian, so I have not the need to import them.

Even if I have chosen the flexible fund, there are any problems concerning the production and the shipping, because I am able to create the pairs of shoes according to the perks.

The production is estimated to 6- 10 pairs of shoes a day. I will give a sets of lots, following the order of the perk’s booking.

The shipping costs are calculated exceptionally for the following countries: 

The shipping costs only for the Reseller pack:

  • Other contries may adopt the shipping costs according to the laws concerning the vat and the customs duties. I have any responsibilities for these costs.


Other Ways You Can Help

If you are not interested in this campaign, you can help us sharing the links with the utilities.

If the campaign achieves the goal of the $60,000, I will create and then present, in a following campaign, other four models for the summer 2016.

story:
Ceramic Heating Elements have highly nonlinear thermal response, so that it becomes extremely resistive above a composition-dependent threshold temperature. This behavior causes the material to act as its own thermostat,since current passes when it is cool, and does not when it is hot.

Thermo Positive Temperature Coefficients are specialized heating elements that enable superior heat transfer in a small space.PTC heaters enable safe, powerful, and energy efficient heat transfer.

BUY AS A GIFT:

Apart from travel and personal use - You can buy 'Dry Me' as a Gift for someone. Let us know that it's a Gift and we'll ship it in an Exclusive Gift Wrap for Free!


Our teammate,coined the word 'Designispiration' as we were inspired by the wings of the Airplane to be included in 'Dry Me' product design.

A glimpse of our Early Engineering 

The design which can be seen mainly in the master video at the top of this page, and the electronics pictured above are one generations behind the current final product. 

Ravi - Serial Entrepreneur with more than 17 years of IT and Industrial Engineering. Managed $500 Million product lifecycle.He enjoys building,breaking and discovering new things and applying his discoveries to real-world value.

Andrea - PPGDMA in Operations Management and Marketing.Alumni of London School of Marketing.She bolsters the smooth functioning of all activities and operations.

Grant - MBA in Marketing and Analytics.Alumni of Santa Clara University.He has a history of devising solutions from analytics standpoint and a metrics buff.

Clara - MBA in Fashion and Design.Clara brings in ton of experience from the fashion industry.She devises solutions which aren’t just aesthetically pleasing,but also functionally delightful.

Our promise is to provide you the best products you can own, period. We need your support from you guys again to make this dream come true.

Not only will your support help production possible, but will also provide the community with more everyday carry products.

Thank you for taking the time to check out our project,it means a lot to have your support.

WHERE ARE WE NOW & WHAT's NEXT

After months of engineering development and testing we now have a highly functional and performing prototype. Currently we're working closely with the factory manufacturers to prepare the production setup, and finalize materials and components for the mass manufacturing.

Your funding will go towards: 

High Quality Materials, Packaging, Production, and Logistics for the Dry Me Set. 

OUR SUPPORTERS

A goal with this level of ambition has more than the immediate core team working behind the curtains. We would like to give a special thanks to so many supporters, motivators, backers, team members, and advisers who helped us get to where we are so quickly.

Music - Bensound.com | Magnetuck | Ravali | Lucky 

REFUNDS & RETURNS

We respect your involvement and support you are offering us. You are entitled to returns or refunds for the product in case:

  • Dry Me has significantly different specs at the time of delivery 
  • Shipment is delayed without prompt reason or is significantly delayed after the original expected date of January 2016.

RISKS & CHALLENGES

We are committed to bringing you a great product, and won't settle for anything less. Thus, during our manufacturing stage, we will actively work with our factory to make sure that everything is up to our standards. 
We recognize that this might result in a delay in our manufacturing process if complications arise, and we find it very important to make sure that these are shipped in a timely matter, but we will prioritize quality. 
Rest assured we will notify everyone of what's going on so there will be no surprises.

CONTACT US

We’ll be happy to answer your specific questions about Dry Me and its technology. Please feel free to mail our support team member - prijesh@dryme.co

story:
Combines a Power Pack, Sync+Charge, & Storage Drive into a Key Ring. 


If you're tired of carrying tangled, bulky cables, or loosing important calls because your battery died, then you will love FLIPMO: The first key ring that lets you sync between phone and laptop at lightning fast speeds, while charging your phone simultaneously and giving you up to 64GB worth of data storage!


APPLE LIGHTNING & USB 2.0  FLASH DRIVE

FLIPMO allows users to conveniently share and transfer files between an iPhone, iPad, PC, and Mac. Without the need for an App or iTunes, you can instantly store valuable photos and videos from your iPhone and iPad onto the FLIPMO and transfer them to your home computer.

SYNC

Tripling up as a sync cable your able to hook your phone into any laptop and pass data between machines, even without the help of iTunes.  How amazing is that!? 

FLIPMO GIVES YOU 30% MORE POWER

With a charge of 1000mAh on hand, FLIPMO gives you the juice your iPhone needs to get you through the day. 

64 GB OF STORAGE

Don’t worry of running out of memory any more. This large memory bank will give you 64GB. If we reach our stretch goal we will offer 128GB.

FLIPMO - ALWAYS THERE FOR YOU

FLIPMO has been designed as a key ring so it’s always ready and handy when you need it. 

As consumers we're always pushing for slimmer phones, better batteries, and more memory space. The constant demand for a super slim phone means one big problem - POWER.  The most common problem we all face with our phones by running countless apps and social media interaction is running out of battery, which could happen during that important call or running out of memory just as you snap the most amazing picture!  FLIPMO offers the perfect solution to these common problems.

The extra charge on the go keeps your phone powered up whenever you need the extra juice and since it charges simultaneously as you use the sync cable it's easy to keep your life going. 

The additional memory is perfect for moving all those non-essential files from your phone to the FLIPMO on the go (again when connected, it will simultaneously charge your phone), making sure you always have room for one more picture/video/song.

FLIPMO FEATURES

  • Li-Polymer Battery Cell
  • 1000mAh capacity aprox half a charge for a standard phone
  • USB charge. Input/Output DC 5V 1A
  • Self charge in 1 hour
  • Over 500 recharge cycles
  • Rubberised coating for a smooth and durable finish
  • Available in Black/White/Slate Grey/Blush Pink
  • CE, FCC, RoHS, UK, UN38.3, MSDS certified
  • Built in protection from short circuit, over charge/discharge, over current and stabilized voltage

YOUR LIFE WITH FLIPMO




CHOOSE YOUR REWARD

Indiegogo backers get a big discount from future retail price! 

STRETCH GOALS

$25K 

We get to make the 128 GB 

$50K We will offer 4 exciting vibrant colors: Bright Green, Bright Red, Bright Blue and Bright Yellow. 

$500K 

we will introduce a 2600 mAh version which can power a full charge for the whole day (size may need to be slightly tweaked, however it’s all possible as we have a strategic partnership with a polymer manufacturer and we would love to get to this stage – you will never need another source to power your day –exciting!!)


FLIPMO OFFICIAL INTRODUCTION



FLIPMO DIMENSIONS





FLIPMO - ALWAYS THERE FOR YOU
FLIPMO has been designed as a keyring so that it’s always ready and there when you need it. Attach it to your key, bag or whatever else it is you keep on your person. Unleash your limitless creativity with the safe knowledge you have extra back up memory, phone charge on hand and the ability to transfer files no messing. 




MULTIPLE CAPACITY

Provide various storage capacities: 16GB, 32GB and 64GB to choose.





We Need YOU!

We already know how amazing this product is and we all use it already here at FLIPMO HQ, now it’s time for the rest of the world to share the same experience we have.  Get behind our campaign, share with your friends and pledge your support so we can get this new FLIPMO device out to the world!  Our CEO has spent a vast amount of $$$ developing this product to it's finally ready to take to market – we now need orders to scale this model and start manufacturing.  Our vision is big and you will see many more FLIPMO’s getting smaller more powerful and packing more features in the years to come!


THE FLIPMO STORY

Over the last 12 months, we've thought about nothing else but creating the best device which can be held in the palm of your hand, and be able to carry power, sync data and store your files. 

We had to do something about this. We thought about applications to carry this device which led us to lean on creating a super slim device for a wallet or a purse but after carrying out months of market research realized that not everyone carried a wallet, some prefer to carry cards and cash in the pocket, so what was the one essential item apart from our phones we all had to keep with us or we weren’t getting in? 

THE KEYS and there it started… the vision of creating a super product sized close to the newer style of car keys, but how were we going to incorporate all the functions we were looking to achieve in a shape which could blend into the keys?

One morning our CEO is sitting there pushing his Zippo lid back and forth and there it was – this set our designer Tom off!!!  Creating countless concepts and working with our Polymer battery and circuit board partners to create a super fit perfectly sized shape to meet our vision.  At this stage we still didn’t know what this super device was going to be called and only as we were creating the story board of the Promo video we thought FLIP MORE which evolved into FLIPMO. Whether it be carrying around more music that your phone memory can’t handle anymore, that extra charge to keep you on that essential phone call before the battery runs out or just the pure usefulness of having an easy to carry and sturdy cable to hand that won’t break. ONE DEVICE INTEGRATED WITH ALL OUR ESSENTIALS is how the team at FLIPMO would best describe this product.


TIMELINE



FAQs

How do i use the keychain charger’s built-in charging connector?

This keychain charger possesses a built-in USB connector and a built-in Lightning connector which are all skillfully concealed in the top cap. Connect the keychain charger to your conmputer or any adaptable wall plug power source with USB out (5V1A). The LED power indicator will flash in green when it is being charged, and will remain steady green when it is completely full.

What are the best methods for charging my keychain charger?

Connect the keychain charger to a power source using built-in USB plug.  The USB cable can be plugged in to your computer or any input 5V1A wall-plug style power source.

Which iPhone/iPad is FLIPMO compatible with?

FLIPMO is compatible with any device that uses the iPhone 4/5 adapters or the micro USB adapter.

How to use the flash memory
Switch the button to “M”.  Connect the keychain charger (via it’s built-in USB 2.0 connector) with the digital device with Lightning connector and PC simultaneously, you can use the flash memory.
How to Sync & Charge

Switch the button to “C”.  Connect the keychain charger with the digital device with Lightning connector and PC simultaneously, the mobile devices gets charged automatically and the SYNC function will work.

How to charge the keychain charger

When the button is “M”, the function of charging will work too.

Uncap and connect the keychain charger with your PC or any power source (via it’s built-in USB connector in the cap), it automatically charges itself no matter that the switch is “C” or “M”.  One of the LED indicators flashes green during charging.  The 2 LED indicators will keep steady when it is fully charged.
How to charge your mobile device with the keychain charger
Uncap and connect the keychain charger with your digital devices with Lightning connector to charge your mobile via its built-in connector.  Touch the white circle part with your finger (not your nail) to power on and the LED light will keep steady green.  Touch the white circle for 4 seconds (not the nail) to power it off.  During it’s discharging, the LED light will keep steady green.
Can I charge my device while charging the keychain charger?
Yes.  Your device will stream power from the power source directly.  Your mobile device will be charged prior to the keychain charger.  This device will act as a kaychain cable when it connects to a power source or a computer.
How many charge cycles do you get in the keychain charger?
The keychain charger is rechargeable for over 500 times of full cycles.  Partial cycles don’t count as full.  So, you can charge your keychain charger 10% of the way 10 times before it counts as a complete cycle.  Don’t be afraid to top it up!

Legal Disclaimer

"Delivery of rewards/perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed."

Thank you for backing our campaign.
story_txt:
Combines a Power Pack, Sync+Charge, & Storage Drive into a Key Ring. 



If you're tired of carrying tangled, bulky cables, or loosing important calls because your battery died, then you will love FLIPMO: The first key ring that lets you sync between phone and laptop at lightning fast speeds, while charging your phone simultaneously and giving you up to 64GB worth of data storage!


APPLE LIGHTNING & USB 2.0  FLASH DRIVE
FLIPMO allows users to conveniently share and transfer files between an iPhone, iPad, PC, and Mac. Without the need for an App or iTunes, you can instantly store valuable photos and videos from your iPhone and iPad onto the FLIPMO and transfer them to your home computer.
SYNC
Tripling up as a sync cable your able to hook your phone into any laptop and pass data between machines, even without the help of iTunes.  How amazing is that!? 
FLIPMO GIVES YOU 30% MORE POWER
With a charge of 1000mAh on hand, FLIPMO gives you the juice your iPhone needs to get you through the day. 

64 GB OF STORAGE
Don’t worry of running out of memory any more. This large memory bank will give you 64GB. If we reach our stretch goal we will offer 128GB.
FLIPMO - ALWAYS THERE FOR YOU
FLIPMO has been designed as a key ring so it’s always ready and handy when you need it. 
As consumers we're always pushing for slimmer phones, better batteries, and more memory space. The constant demand for a super slim phone means one big problem - POWER.  The most common problem we all face with our phones by running countless apps and social media interaction is running out of battery, which could happen during that important call or running out of memory just as you snap the most amazing picture!  FLIPMO offers the perfect solution to these common problems.

The extra charge on the go keeps your phone powered up whenever you need the extra juice and since it charges simultaneously as you use the sync cable it's easy to keep your life going. 

The additional memory is perfect for moving all those non-essential files from your phone to the FLIPMO on the go (again when connected, it will simultaneously charge your phone), making sure you always have room for one more picture/video/song.



FLIPMO FEATURES


Li-Polymer Battery Cell


1000mAh capacity aprox half a charge for a standard phone


USB charge. Input/Output DC 5V 1A


Self charge in 1 hour


Over 500 recharge cycles


Rubberised coating for a smooth and durable finish


Available in Black/White/Slate Grey/Blush Pink

CE, FCC, RoHS, UK, UN38.3, MSDS certified
Built in protection from short circuit, over charge/discharge, over current and stabilized voltage

YOUR LIFE WITH FLIPMO


CHOOSE YOUR REWARD
Indiegogo backers get a big discount from future retail price! 



STRETCH GOALS
$25K 
We get to make the 128 GB 
$50K We will offer 4 exciting vibrant colors: Bright Green, Bright Red, Bright Blue and Bright Yellow. 
$500K 
we will introduce a 2600 mAh version which can power a full charge for the whole day (size may need to be slightly tweaked, however it’s all possible as we have a strategic partnership with a polymer manufacturer and we would love to get to this stage – you will never need another source to power your day –exciting!!)

FLIPMO OFFICIAL INTRODUCTION





FLIPMO DIMENSIONS





FLIPMO - ALWAYS THERE FOR YOU

FLIPMO has been designed as a keyring so that it’s always ready and there when you need it. Attach it to your key, bag or whatever else it is you keep on your person. Unleash your limitless creativity with the safe knowledge you have extra back up memory, phone charge on hand and the ability to transfer files no messing. 












MULTIPLE CAPACITY
Provide various storage capacities: 16GB, 32GB and 64GB to choose.

















We Need YOU!
We already know how amazing this product is and we all use it already here at FLIPMO HQ, now it’s time for the rest of the world to share the same experience we have.  Get behind our campaign, share with your friends and pledge your support so we can get this new FLIPMO device out to the world!  Our CEO has spent a vast amount of $$$ developing this product to it's finally ready to take to market – we now need orders to scale this model and start manufacturing.  Our vision is big and you will see many more FLIPMO’s getting smaller more powerful and packing more features in the years to come!



THE FLIPMO STORY

story:
When it comes to your child’s safety and health, you will do whatever it takes to protect your baby. What if a product existed that offered full protection while your child thinks he is just wearing a stylish new tech device offering invisible protection? What is this product was comfortable and offered personality and amazing features in one flexible package?


Meet the Junior Safewatch™ from T.W.I.S.T.

A mind blowing, revolutionary and child friendly wearable device, enhancing your life and those of your children & teens, enabling a maximum of protection, without losing sight of them, no matter how far away they are. WE give new dimension and purpose to smart safety devices.

The Junior Safewatch™ is more than a simple watch. It is the world's most advanced 3G safety-device, specially created for teens and children. Our system includes an instant 2-way call system, Geo-locator, and the ability to receive notifications and run applications.

The Junior Safewatch™ is suitable for any child or teen, however, in some countries the minimum age for wearable devices is 3 years old.

Connecting via Sim, 3G network or WIFI, this device can track your child, make phone calls, receive notifications, run apps and complete numerous other tasks without being paired with your Smartphone.

The Solutions

UV (Ultraviolet) sensor

We have integrated an Ultraviolet Sensor into the Junior safewatch™. Measuring the sun radiance and UV level, the Junior Safewatch™ will immediately trigger an alarm and warn you when your child needs extra sunscreen upon higher readings.
This device is a Skin Cancer prevention system!

Virtual Safety Barrier

With the “virtual Safety barrier” you can mark a safety zone wherein your child can play and run freely. The moment (s)he exceeds this pre-determined zone, you and your child will be notified instantly. This feature is ideal for crowded places, such as shopping malls, beaches, amusement parks, zoos, and playgrounds...

GPS/ Glonass

You will no longer have a trouble locating your hiding child. The Junior Safewatch™ has an integrated geo-locator, allowing you to find your child easily.

Emergency button

Does your child feel threatened? With the Junior Safewatch™, he can warn you and the pre-selected² contacts by simply pressing³ the red button. It only needs a  few seconds to establish a 2-way direct call connection.

² configurable through our secured parenting app or our website

³ Pressing a couple of seconds will establish a direct contact with the pre-defined contact list, in order of priority.

Body Humidity/thermal Sensor

During the summer it is not uncommon for children to run and play until they drop. Unfortunately, they are not worried about thirst and dehydration.
Yet statistics show that every year children are dying due to dehydration! The sensors in the Junior Safewatch™ will measure your child’s body humidity and will notify you, as soon as the value reaches the limits, avoiding any risk of dehydration.


   Ultra-sound Mosquito-repellent

Annoyed by mosquitoes? Enable our integrated Ultra sound (inaudible) mosquito-repellent device to keep them at bay. Our repellent is Chemical and pesticide free,  harmless and child friendly for a better environment and a healthy life.
Chemical and pesticide free,  for a better environment and a healthy life.
Harmless and child friendly.


Instant 2-way call system

Via Sim connection, the Junior Safewatch™ can be used as a regular phone. As discussed above, in case of emergency, your child can press the red emergency button for a couple of seconds and the Junior Safewatch™ will automatically start calling you and the pre-installed contacts

Anti-theft/lost strap

Someone tries to unstrap the watch! The Junior Safewatch™ will trigger an alarm
and will notify you instantly.
An extra protection for your child’s safety


The Specifications

Applications

The Junior Safewatch™ is shockproof and 10m water-resistant

Med-ID™ gives you the liberty to manage and share your child's secured medical information with Paramedics and medical staff.
In a few second, they will be able to check your child's medical background and adjust to the situation more effectively, saving his/her life!

Estimated Safewatch™ Timeline


Our Story

The concept of the Junior Safewatch™ is based on personal experiences.

Our team is composed of enthusiastic professionals, passionate about new technologies. However, most importantly, we are parents. We have dedicated our lives to create all the necessary support with the ultimate protection for our children and teens. This is why we wanted to create a device that could warn, protect, and at the same time, give  parents that extra secure feeling. It took us many years of research, encountering numerous of ups and downs. Today we have reached the point where the Junior Safewatch™ becomes tangible.

The Journey

The path from a simple idea to a full working device is quite cumbersome. We spent many hours, holidays, sleepless nights, and long negotiations together to develop a product we could be proud of.
The biggest challenge was to integrate all of our features in combination with qualitative hardware. We have seen many devices, but none of them compiled all of our requirements. Some looked cheap, others were poor quality and others not suitable for kids. The results were quite disappointing!

There was one crucial question that remained unanswered: “What would be the best device that could, at the same time integrate our features and safe people? A device that could easily be used and worn by kids?”
After our market research in Europe and Asia, the solution was obvious: a Smart-watch…
From that moment on, we started with the concept and design of the Junior Safewatch™, while our engineers worked to integrate all our features into this small device.
Today we are at the final stage to get the Junior Safewatch™ on the world-wide market. Unfortunately, we are missing one important thing, your help...

The Perks

Tomorrowland, the best place on earth for partying. The access is limited, not many people are able to get tickets to this unique event. With our perks we offer you the chance to join us in our business lounge (near main-stage) and to experience Tomorrowland with your own eyes. You can choose out of 2 perks:

1: VIP Package, includes 1 entree at tomorrowland and our Business lounge, on-site. During the event, you can enjoy free drinks and finger food!

+ Extra free gift at arrival!

2: Deluxe Edition, includes 1 flight(return flight from Belgium), pick up at the airport. Transfer to 5* hotel(all-in), transfer to Tomorrowland event, Entree ticket and access to our Business lounge on-site.

+ Extra free gift at arrival!

Meet the pearl of the Orient. Where East meets West. This is a one of a kind Deluxe perk! We offer 1 x return flight to Hong Kong. Pick up at the airport in a luxurious limousine. 7 days Deluxe overnight at one of the most prestigious 5* hotels in the world. Breakfast and gastronomic dinner (evening). Site seeing with an English speaking tour guide. A meet and greet with our team. 2 days trip to the "Asian Las Vegas"(Macao). But also a special Safewatch™ and many other unique surprises


 For the other perks, we offer one of a kind Junior Safewatch™ at a very sharp price! Models and colors of your choice (survey after campaign).
Each perk offers an extra advantage.

What We Need & What You Get

We are determined to bring this project to life. But we still need a financial push to make our dream a reality. Our goal, at this stage, is to finish our prototype and to move the Junior Safewatch™ into mass production. All the key elements and teams are ready to go, we just need the proper funding to make it happen.
We are hoping that with your help we can make your life and those of your children easier and safer.

Why do we need your support ?
We have been working on the Junior Safewatch™ for many years.
Everything is set and ready, all we need is your help to take the final step.
Your support will allow us to start mass producing, offering the world the opportunity to live a safer life!

Frequently Asked Questions

IT LOOKS TOO GOOD TO BE TRUE. IS THIS REAL?
We have an amazing team to make the Junior Safewatch™ a reality! While not everything in the video will be there at launch, the Junior Safewatch™ features described are part of the core feature set. With the rich platform we're building, everything in the video beyond the core features will be possible - and more! With our developer community, we will continue to improve the product and add new  exciting features over time.
WHEN WILL THE JUNIOR SAFEWATCH™ SHIP TO THE BACKERS?

Junior Safewatch™ early bird is scheduled to ship in November 2016

CAN I BACK-UP MY JUNIOR SAFEWATCH™?
The Junior Safewatch™ does not require manual back-up since it is an always-connected device that automatically stores its data in our servers. Only you are able to access your data.
Should your Junior Safewatch™ ever need to be replaced, our server storage will bring your Junior Safewatch™ memories back to life once you connect to your account.

WHERE CAN THE JUNIOR SAFEWATCH™ BE SHIPPED?
The Junior Safewatch™ can be delivered world wide.

WHAT IS THE WARRANTY OF THE JUNIOR SAFEWATCH™?
We offer our Indiegogo backers a warranty of 2 years

IS THE COMPANION APP COMPATIBLE WITH ANDROID AND IOS?
Yes, they are.

DOES THE JUNIOR SAFEWATCH™ WORK WITH IOS AND ANDROID DEVICES OR MY COMPUTER?
Yes. the Junior Safewatch™ will have his own mobile app that is compatible with IOS and Android devices. He has a web interface so you can interact via computer or tablet.

HOW DO I CHARGE THE JUNIOR SAFEWATCH™?
The Junior Safewatch™ standard charging system is wired. But we might be able to offer wireless charging as a stretch goal.

ARE THE STRAPS INTERCHANGEABLE?
Yes, you can change all the Junior Safewatch™ straps and mix them together.

HOW IS MY PRIVACY PROTECTED?
We use the latest encryption standards ensuring a secured data transfer from your device to our servers.

HOW WILL MY PERSONAL DATA BE PROTECTED WITH MED-ID™?
We use the latest encryption standards ensuring a secured data transfer from your device to our servers. The access is restricted and can only be used by a select group of people.

HOW CAN MED-ID™ DATA BE SHARED WITH MEDICAL SERVICES?
Medical services, such as: Doctors, paramedics, Hospitals,... are using our special app. The app is fully secured with a restricted connection/use.
Only medical services will have access to your data.
By simply swiping their tablet or smart-phone with the Junior Safewatch™, they will be able to collect the life saving data.

HOW CAN I MANAGE MY MEDICAL DATA WITH MED-ID™?
During registration of the Junior Safewatch™ a unique encryption code will be granted. With the code, you will be able to access, in a secure and restricted way, our web application, enabling you to manage all your medical data.

I PREORDERED MY JUNIOR SAFEWATCH™, BUT DIDN'T GET A CONFIRMATION EMAIL. HOW CAN I CHECK THE STATUS?
You can refer to this article on the Indiegogo page, for more details:
 "How do I know that my contribution was successful?"

If there is still an issue, you may contact us at orders@twist.eu.com with the subject line: PREORDER CONFIRMATION

CAN SOMEONE ELSE GET ACCESS THE JUNIOR SAFEWATCH™?
There is no way for a remote user to access the Junior Safewatch™. It's user interface makes it very clear to a user when they try to connect. The Junior Safewatch™ will only connect to other devices that have a digital certificate explicitly allowing a secured connection

WHAT LANGUAGES DOES THE JUNIOR SAFEWATCH™ SUPPORT?
Standard language is English, but our team is working hard, so we can offer other languages in the near future

WILL THERE BE APPS AVAILABLE FOR THE JUNIOR SAFEWATCH™?
Yes, you will be able to download extra apps as they are developed by our T.W.I.S.T. team or 3th party developers and become available. The Junior Safewatch™ will come with a number of core features when he is delivered to your home.

WHERE IS MY DATA STORED?
The Junior Safewatch™ periodically uploads your data to our secured servers. The Junior Safewatch™ does not require an additional explicit back-up step. Your data is encrypted while in transit and on the servers to remain secure and private.

HOW DOES THE JUNIOR SAFEWATCH™ AND MED-ID™ RESPECT MY PRIVACY?
A combination of technology and company policies are used to protect users privacy. The Junior Safewatch™ and Med-ID™ complies with the European Bureau of Consumer Protection guidelines including the Children’s Online Privacy and Protection. A company security officer reviews security of all customer data at all phases of use. The Junior Safewatch™ employs industry-standard best practices regarding the way data is stored and transferred. Passwords are stored using cryptographic one-way hash functions. This ensures that nobody, even the company security officer, can ever gain access to a user's password.

IF I STILL HAVE QUESTIONS, HOW CAN I REACH YOUR TEAM?
We would be more than happy to assist you in anyway we can, but we suggest you to read through the FAQ first to find your answer.
We are receiving a lot of special requests and are responding as fast as possible! 
For media inquiries or
questions related to the Indiegogo campaign,
contact us at media@twist.eu.com.
for all other concerns,
please contact info@twist.eu.com
