features into this small device.Today
we are at the final stage to get the Junior Safewatch™ on the
world-wide market. Unfortunately, we are missing one important thing,
your help...

The Perks

Tomorrowland, the best place on earth for partying. The access is limited, not many people are able to get tickets to this unique event. With our perks we offer you the chance to join us in our business lounge (near main-stage) and to experience Tomorrowland with your own eyes. You can choose out of 2 perks:
1: VIP Package, includes 1 entree at tomorrowland and our Business lounge, on-site. During the event, you can enjoy free drinks and finger food!
+ Extra free gift at arrival!
2: Deluxe Edition, includes 1 flight(return flight from Belgium), pick up at the airport. Transfer to 5* hotel(all-in), transfer to Tomorrowland event, Entree ticket and access to our Business lounge on-site.
+ Extra free gift at arrival!


Meet the pearl of the Orient. Where East meets West. This is a one of a kind Deluxe perk! We offer 1 x return flight to Hong Kong. Pick up at the airport in a luxurious limousine. 7 days Deluxe overnight at one of the most prestigious 5* hotels in the world. Breakfast and gastronomic dinner (evening). Site seeing with an English speaking tour guide. A meet and greet with our team. 2 days trip to the "Asian Las Vegas"(Macao). But also a special Safewatch™

 and many other unique surprises For the other perks, we offer one of a kind Junior Safewatch™ at a very sharp price! Models and colors of your choice (survey after campaign).Each perk offers an extra advantage.What We Need & What You Get
We
are determined to bring this project to life. But we still need a
financial push to make our dream a reality. Our goal, at this stage,
is to finish our prototype and to move the Junior Safewatch™ into
mass production. All the key elements and teams are ready to go, we just need the proper funding to make it happen.We are hoping that with your help we can make your life and
those of your children easier and safer.
Why do we need your support ?We
have been working on the Junior Safewatch™ for many years.Everything is set and ready, all we need is your help to take the
final step.Your support will allow us to start mass producing, offering the world the opportunity to live a safer life!

Frequently Asked Questions
IT LOOKS TOO GOOD TO BE TRUE. IS THIS REAL?We have an amazing team to make the Junior Safewatch™ a reality! While not everything in 
the video will be there at launch, the Junior Safewatch™ features described are part of
 the core feature set. With the rich platform we're 
building, everything in the video beyond the core features will be 
possible - and more! With our developer community, we will continue to 
improve the product and add new  exciting features over time.WHEN WILL THE JUNIOR SAFEWATCH™ SHIP TO THE BACKERS?Junior Safewatch™ early bird is scheduled to ship in November 2016
CAN I BACK-UP MY JUNIOR SAFEWATCH™?The Junior Safewatch™ does not require manual back-up since it is an always-connected 
device that automatically stores its data in our servers. Only you 
are able to access your data.Should your Junior Safewatch™ ever need to be replaced, our server storage will 
bring your Junior Safewatch™ memories back to life once you connect to your account.

WHERE CAN THE JUNIOR SAFEWATCH™ BE SHIPPED?The Junior Safewatch™ can be delivered world wide.
WHAT IS THE WARRANTY OF THE JUNIOR SAFEWATCH™?We offer our Indiegogo backers a warranty of 2 years
IS THE COMPANION APP COMPATIBLE WITH ANDROID AND IOS?Yes, they are.
DOES THE JUNIOR SAFEWATCH™ WORK WITH IOS AND ANDROID DEVICES OR MY COMPUTER?Yes. the Junior Safewatch™ will have his own mobile app that is compatible with IOS and 
Android devices. He has a web interface so you can interact via 
computer or tablet.
HOW DO I CHARGE THE JUNIOR SAFEWATCH™?The Junior Safewatch™ standard charging system is wired. But we might be able to offer wireless charging as a stretch goal.
ARE THE STRAPS INTERCHANGEABLE?Yes, you can change all the Junior Safewatch™ straps and mix them together.
HOW IS MY PRIVACY PROTECTED?We use the latest encryption standards ensuring a secured data transfer from your device to our servers.
HOW WILL MY PERSONAL DATA BE PROTECTED WITH MED-ID™?We use the latest encryption standards ensuring a secured data transfer 
from your device to our servers. The access is restricted and can only be used by a select group of people.
HOW CAN MED-ID™ DATA BE SHARED WITH MEDICAL SERVICES?Medical services, such as: Doctors, paramedics, Hospitals,... are using our special app. The app is fully secured with a restricted connection/use.Only medical services will have access to your data.By simply swiping their tablet or smart-phone with the Junior Safewatch™, they will be able to collect the life saving data.
HOW CAN I MANAGE MY MEDICAL DATA WITH MED-ID™?During registration of the Junior Safewatch™ a unique encryption code will be granted. With the code, you will be able to access, in a secure and restricted way, our web application, enabling you to manage all your medical data.
I PREORDERED MY JUNIOR SAFEWATCH™, BUT DIDN'T GET A CONFIRMATION EMAIL. HOW CAN I CHECK THE STATUS?You can refer to this article on the Indiegogo page, for more details: "How do I know that my contribution was successful?"
If there is still an issue, you may contact us at orders@twist.eu.com with the subject line: PREORDER CONFIRMATION
 CAN SOMEONE ELSE GET ACCESS THE JUNIOR SAFEWATCH™?There is no way for a remote user to access the Junior Safewatch™. It's user interface makes it very clear to a user when they try to connect. The Junior Safewatch™ will only connect 
to other devices that have a digital 
certificate explicitly allowing a secured connection
WHAT LANGUAGES DOES THE JUNIOR SAFEWATCH™ SUPPORT?Standard language is English, but our team is working hard, so we can offer other languages in the near future
WILL THERE BE APPS AVAILABLE FOR THE JUNIOR SAFEWATCH™?Yes, you will be able to download extra apps as they are developed by our T.W.I.S.T. team or 3th party developers and become available. The Junior Safewatch™ will come with a number of
 core features when he is delivered to your home. 
WHERE IS MY DATA STORED?The Junior Safewatch™ periodically uploads your data to our secured servers. The Junior Safewatch™ does not require
 an additional explicit back-up step. Your data is encrypted while in 
transit and on the servers to remain secure and private.
HOW DOES THE JUNIOR SAFEWATCH™ AND MED-ID™ RESPECT MY PRIVACY?A combination of technology and company policies are used to protect 
users privacy. The Junior Safewatch™ and Med-ID™ complies with the European Bureau of Consumer Protection 
guidelines including the Children’s Online Privacy and Protection.  A company security officer reviews security of all customer 
data at all phases of use. The Junior Safewatch™ employs industry-standard best 
practices regarding the way data is stored and transferred. Passwords 
are stored using cryptographic one-way hash functions. This ensures that
 nobody, even the company security officer, can ever gain access to a 
user's password.


IF I STILL HAVE QUESTIONS, HOW CAN I REACH YOUR TEAM?We would be more than happy to assist you in anyway we can, but we suggest you to read through the FAQ first to find your answer.We are receiving a lot of special requests and are responding as fast as possible! 

For media inquiries or questions related to the Indiegogo campaign,contact us at media@twist.eu.com.for all other concerns, please contact info@twist.eu.com

story:
JOIN THE T.WALLET THANK YOU PROGRAM

Earn 10% Refunds & Get Your T.WALLET For Free


T. Wallet is a smart card. It combines most benefits of other cards in one T. Wallet card.  Everyone likes to travel and live active, but there is always a challenge – lack of money and lack of time. Our team is working on solving these issues for you!We are sure you will like our idea!

We are happy to present you revolutionary solution, which will allow you to enjoy your trips and spend more time with the people you love!

T. Wallet is one card, few rules, more possibilities, more money and more free time.

Isn’t it great?

Our service will allow you to save money on your trips, payments as well as to get benefits and rewards from your favorite stores by just recommending their goods and services to your friends.

Millions of people travel every day and spend money all over the world. You may benefit you and supply your dreams. Just support our project, get your T. Wallet card and travel more, buy more with your family and friends!

Check this out, how many decisions are there in one T. Wallet card:

As soon you get your T. Wallet card and activate it, it can be filled with your debit or credit card and wire transfers.

And here you are, you can spend your money at any store in the world, make internet purchases, and withdraw cash at any ATM in the world.

It is so simple.

And don’t forget, any time you or your friends make payments with T. Wallet card, you make more money.


You can use your card during your travel all over the globe to buy on The Internet, right form stores or over the phone in more than 34 million stores.

T. Wallet card is not linked to your bank account, so your personal information and bank details are protected from any fraud.

You can easily block your card via a Text Message, if you lose it or it  is stolen.

You can check your balance or make online banking 24/7 online or via a Text Message.

Make your Online Money Transfer with your family and friends by your T. Wallet card.  You can transfer your money easily, safely and cheaply with T. Wallet card.

You don’t need to go to your bank branch anymore. Just send money by T. Wallet.

You want to make wise purchases?

Just use your T. Wallet card and get benefits from many companies onto one card.

You want to buy more?

Recommend goods and services to your friends and the sellers will reward you any time your friends make purchases.


Sellers will reward you any time your friends make purchases by cashback onto your T. Wallet card.  Your T. Wallet friends community will bring cashback to you for all of their purchases.

It is incredible! It is simple! It is profitable!

Just get your T. Wallet card, buy more, recommend T. Wallet to your friends and make more money  for your trips this year.



We have created a reward system for purchases of any of your favorite goods and services all over the globe. It has never been so simple to get benefits! Many benefits all over the globe!  Rewards, sales, cashback, savings etc. 

All of it works for you and your goals!



Our program knows every time you recommend our T. Wallet card or goods and services of our partners.  Every partner of T. Wallet can reward you easily for yours or your friend’s purchases. Just recommend T. Wallet and get rewards onto your T. Wallet card.



You can make The Internet shopping by your T. Wallet card.

Just use your card number and password.

You can book your hotel or rent a car.

You can create different passwords for each of your purchases to protect your card.

You can manage your T. Wallet accounts and make transfers 24/7.

Quick, simple and safe online banking with T. Wallet!

Just use a TXT Message or visit your online back office.




We have prepared a savings system for you to save money for your dream or your next journey. Just set a goal, recommend T. Wallet services, recommend goods and services, save more money and buy more!


We have created a unique business loyalty program which will allow you to increase the number of your clients and increase your profits, using T, Wallet partnership program.  Everyone knows there is no better advertisement than a mouth-to-mouth recommendation. It is simple and cheap, but it is the most effective! In its very essence, it is an advertisement, using a marketing model – pay for the purchase. Only, if the purchase is made, you pay. By doing so, you encourage your buyers to return to you over and over.

Also, it is might be profitable for your business. All of us do not eat at the same spots every time, but if people from your T. Wallet community buy at your partners business, you also get rewarded.



Who makes profit, by joining and using T. Wallet?

For card holders

  • Those, who want to manage their expenses
  • Those, who want to get more benefits while buying goods
  • Those, who want to fulfill their dreams
  • Those, who want to earn while travelling
  • Those, who want to help friends reach the goals
  • Those, who want to make simple and safe transfers all over the globe

  • Those, who want to help social projects

For businesses 

You can get an advertisement and additional profit from your clients purchases at our partners stores.

It can benefit many businesses, such as:

  • Tourism
  • Insurance
  • Shopping malls
  • Internet stores
  • NGO’s
  • Churches
  • etc.

Any organization can use our system to increase the amount of their clients, using its existing clients or for the budget of a social organization or a movement of volunteers. You can cooperate with business partners (restaurants, hotels, sports clubs, etc.) to receive a percentage from the purchases of your supporters when they visit your partners and make purchases.

How are business partners going to reward T. Wallet card holders?

    • 1 - 15% cashback of all your purchases at your partners’ businesses (depending on the agreement),
    • 1 - 15% cashback of all your friends’ purchases at partners businesses (depending on the agreement
    • 1% cashback of your friends’ purchases all over the globe,
    • bonuses for any recommendation of goods and services to your friends, as well for activity of your friends in your T. Wallet circle


Just recommend T. Wallet service to your friends and community and get one more source of profit.

It is simple!

During the process of preparation, our main assignment is to increase the possibilities of T Wallet card and combine the card with different systems of benefits for our customers and businesses.

And it is a great time! But the most interesting is ahead!
We were dreaming and planning 1 year ago, but now we already do tests and see the first results. We have come to an agreement with all of our partners that our product interesting, available and secured for online payments globally from the very start of our project.  In different regions of the world our T Wallet card will be issued as VISA or MASTER CARD by a certified bank-partner.  We are already close to our start, but we need 4-6 months to launch the system  when we have the budget for it.

Why do we need money?

All the money, that will be collected, we are going to use for:

  • technical integration of our system to existing payment system of debit cards VISA and MASTER CARD,
  • technical development  of the processing center to our working processes,
  • obtaining the required standards to launch our card program in co-operation with our bank-partner and VISA/MASTER CARD payment systems,
  • the card design development,
  • the release of the card itself.

How much do we need and what for?
1.  $105000  to launch T Wallet card in EU countries.  It will include all above processes in one card. T Wallet cards will be issued in European countries and could be used globally.
2.  $150000  to launch T Wallet card in EU countries and USA.
It will include all above processes in one card. T Wallet cards will be issued in European countries + USA and could be used globally.

Reward Perks

 $ 11
Thank you for your support. We will supply you with your own T Wallet card.
You will have an access to all the benefits of T Wallet card holder after activation of your T Wallet card. Yearly service fee is NOT INCLUDED. You will need to pay for the card mail delivery additionally.

$ 44
Thank you for your support. We will supply you with your own T Wallet card.
You will have an access to all the benefits of T Wallet card holder after activation of your T Wallet card. Yearly service fee is INCLUDED. You will need to pay for the the card mail delivery additionally.

$ 180
Thank you for your support. We will supply you with your own T Wallet card.
You will have an access to all the benefits of T Wallet card holder after activation of your T Wallet card. Yearly service fee is INCLUDED + you have right to connect business partners at your region. You will need to pay for the card mail delivery additionally.

$ 330
Thank you for your support. We will supply you with your own T Wallet card.
You will have an access to all the benefits of T Wallet card holder after activation of your T Wallet card. Yearly service fee is INCLUDED + you have right to connect business partners Worldwide. You will need to pay for the card mail delivery additionally. 
$ 1375
We will supply you with your own T Wallet card. You will have an access to all the benefits of T Wallet card holder after activation of your T Wallet card. Yearly service fee is INCLUDED + you have the right to connect your business partners WORLDWIDE. + Participation in the VIP Club T.Wallet. Details on email info@gotripwallet.com
How you can support T Wallet? Additional options

Subscribe to our Facebook page. You can support us with your mouth-to-mouth assistance. Simply LIKE and share our Facebook page + share our news and posts on your page. Each share will promote the project. Or JOIN THE T.WALLET THANK YOU PROGRAM

FEES T.WALLET CARD

Card issue Fee  €10/$11

Monthly Service charge €2.5/$2.75

ATM International withdrawal €3.5/$3.85

 Load / Top Up Fees Debit Card, Credit Card, Bank Transfer - €0.4/$0.44+2,8%

POS - €0,50/$0.55

SMS/Internet Card to Card transfer - 1% min €1/$1.1

SMS Balance check, block/unblock, activate per SMS - €0,20/$0.22

International bank transfer form card to bank - €30/$33+1%

story:
Hi there! My name is Alex Kozachenko and I am Ukrainian photographer.  I’m a person of art and my dream is to fill beautiful world with the beautiful things :)

    I think that everyone faced with a problem of searching of good product among the large number of market offers. Quality often means expensive, modern not always is practical. This situation motivated me to create product that is beautiful, modern, practical and inexpensive at the same time!

  

   This is minimalistic wallet, unique handmade product. I designed it with care of people who appreciate comfort and beauty. Wallet is very compact but also has a good capacity. It has three rooms and can hold up to six cards plus cash. Do not worry about safety of your things; thanks to smart design they are perfectly fixed. The wallet is made of the high-quality leather and looks very stylish, modern and elegant.

In addition, I created an exclusive gift-wrap, so the product could be a perfect present for your relatives, friends and people you care about.

 

  Main advantages of minimalistic wallet:

- Elegant design with rounded corners

- Small size 4,13х2,65 inch (105x67,5mm) - wallet will fit into any pocket

- Good capacity (up to six cards + cash)

- Made from high quality leather

- Beautiful and exclusive handmade gift-wrap

- Affordable price

   I hope you will enjoy this minimalistic wallet, and support me in my aim: to buy equipment for creating more lines of elegant and exclusive products such as purses, bags and others, I have so many ideas!

   If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact me:

E-maill: akleatherproject@gmail.com

Facebook: facebook.com/ak.leather.handmade

Instagram: instagram.com/ak.leather/

Twitter: twitter.com/AkLeather

 

Thank you for your support!

story:
Short Summary

Hi Everyone! My name is Timi Komonibo and I'm the founder & Chief Philanthropist at STYLE LOTTERY. Studies show that Americans send 10.5 million tons of clothing to landfills every year. But why should clothes be thrown away when they can be used to empower and connect people? I started STYLE LOTTERY to connect people to their community and fashion to philanthropy. I'm vying for a spot on the Millennial Train  this summer because I want to share the opportunity to "restyle, reuse, and reward (TM)" through fashion.

I am fundraising to be one of the entrepreneurs aboard the Millennial Train this summer. The train will be stopping in 5 cities from August 1-8th. There is a race for the first 30 people to fundraise $5,000 to get aboard the train and I want to be one of them! For me, MTP is a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to be inspired by my fellow entrepreneurs and change agents. Being on this train will allow me to expand STYLE LOTTERY to new cities and spark an important dialogue around fashion and philanthropy. Along this journey, I will get access to mentors, community leaders, as well as funding opportunities to help my team and I develop STYLE LOTTERY into the dynamic fashion philanthropy startup that I know it can be.


The #WearWeShare Tour

For my MTP project, I will be hosting "pay-what-you-can" pop-up swaps in 5 U.S. cities. I invite you to meet up with me in the city closest to you (Pittsburg, Chicago, Kansas City, Alberquerque, or Los Angeles). Bring your lightly used clothing items so you can swap with people in your community. We're adding a fun twist and giving our guests the option to "Pay-What-You-Can" for their items. On the road, we will share the stories of the people we meet under the #wearweshare hashtag

Statistics show that people have a alarming amount of clothing in their closet that they don't wear (i.e. a study showed that 85% of women had clothes in their closets that don't fit.). When I first started swapping, I hosted events where women could swap clothes and purge out their closets. Style Lottery aims to change the way people get rid of clothing they no longer want. We live in a fast-fashion world that follows trends in the fashion world and sends unwanted clothes to landfills. I'm using the #WearWeShare Tour to put an end to that. Throughout my travels, I want to highlight the stories of your favorite clothes--- where you got them, where you've been in them, and where you're taking them next. 

To get our #WearWeShare tour on the road, I need to raise $5K to secure my seat on the train.

  • If this campaign is among the first 30 to reach its $5K goal, all funds raised will go to Millennial Trains Project, which is a 501(c)3 organization. Any donation you make to this campaign is tax-deductible. 
  • Your donation will help cover the costs of the journey and its associated programming, transportation, and hospitality fees. 
  • If I am not among the first 30 applicants to reach my crowdfunding goal, you will not be charged your donation.


The Impact

In 2015, Syracuse University gave Style Lottery the annual Orange Circle Award for our philanthropic work in the community. I have been doing pop-up closet swaps for several years. I have been working closely with community partners, as well as local Universities and charities to increase Style Lottery's reach and impact. By adopting a "pay-what-you-can" model, I am giving everyone a chance to participate at a level where they are comfortable. I believe removing the pressure of a fixed price will create social value and a sense of community. I believe every individual has something they give, as well as much that they can receive. Whether it is their clothes, money, or time, all contributions are welcome and appreciated.

With this MTP journey, we'd be taking Style Lottery on tour and asking strangers to share their closets with one another. What's different about our project is that we're essentially conducting a social experiment. I'm exploring the (monetary and social) value people place on their clothes. I'll also discovering ways to reduce the carbon footprints of our closets. We've tested out our methods in Texas, New York, and D.C. and now I'm looking forward to the opportunity to take Style Lottery on the road to see if we can spread fashion philanthropy to even more cities.

Getting people to give up items from their closets can be a challenge. We've found that once our guests release clothes they no longer wear, they open up room for items and interactions that truly spark joy! I love watching our guests discover new aesthetics and venture into new styles. They meet their neighbors and find hidden gems in their community (not to mention all the inexpensive clothes at their disposal).

But we can't have a pop-up without you! We want to meet as many people as possible so we can swap clothes and stories. This project has the potential to bridge so many gaps and we can only do it with your help.


Other Ways You Can Help

I realize that some of you may not be able to financially support our campaign, but I'd still love your help. Here's how you can help:

  1. HOST A CLOSET SWAP:  I'm in search of a venue to host each swap. If you're open to me using your shop or public space to set-up a walk-in closet, please let me know. Don't worry, I'm a master pop-up artist, and I can set-up and clean up in a flash. We'll be sure to give your location a lot of media attention and social media love. If you're in the area (Pittsburg, Chicago, Kansas City, Albuquerque or Los Angeles) leave me a comment or tweet me @timikomo.
  2. ATTEND A LOCAL EVENT: We might be in your neighborhood this summer and we'd love to have you experience one of our closet swaps! Make sure you like us on our Facebook page to get updates about our pop-up locations for the MTP tour.
  3. TELL YOUR STORY of your favorite clothing item. It only takes 15 seconds.
    4. Upload it to Instagram or Facebook using the hashtag #WearWeShare.
  4. SHARE OUR CAMPAIGN with your friends. Please spread the word to help our campaign get more views. Use the Indiegogo share tools to get started!

How You Can Follow The Journey

On the MTP journey, Style Lottery fans will be able to follow me on the road and see our #WearWeShare updates on our Snapchat (@StyleLottery). I will also be sharing the stories of the people I meet under Style Lottery's hashtag #wearweshare. You can also find me on Twitter and Instagram.

After the journey is completed, I will write a post dedicated to the experience on both my personal blog and Style Lottery's website. I will also share pictures and videos from the journey on my YouTube page.

story:
Short Summary

This campaign is so you can get a beautiful piece of clothing, with the SAM's Apothecary logo on it.

SAM's is truly a place for everyone, and our customers are the best part of it. We are excited to be able to offer the swag that has been asked for over and over!

A wearable logo is an amazing way to show your support, AND you get to tell people about your favorite shoppe.

The more people that are aware of SAM's Apothecary, and visit us (either in person or online) the more successful we will be, and the more will continue to be able to help our community!

What We Need & What You Get

All of the proceeds of this campaign will go to the production cost of the shirts!

You get to pick your shirt style, and size, we do the rest!

The shirts will come in to the shoppe, and you can either pick them up here, or we can ship them to you!

If the entire goal isn't met (but, it will be, so this really isn't a thing) the funds will still go for shirts for those that have ordered them!

Risks & Challenges

We are excited to be able to offer the shirts, and soon we hope to be able to carry them in-shoppe, however that requires a bit of overhead that we don't have right now, so this is the best of both worlds! You get your AMAZING shirt, and we don't have the overhead expense!

Other Ways You Can Help

Share away! Thank you everyone! Namaste

story:
WELCOME TO OUR WORLD - WELCOME TO HAŪT

The pillars upon which HAŪT holds are:

Quality - Spanish Manufacture and Design with the best Italian leathers

Fair Market - Ethical Working Conditions among the Supply Chain

Sustainability -Enough For Everyone Forever

We wanted to bring comfort to reality, but at the same time, creating something stylish, unique and exclusive, so we created a path from a blank sheet, designing entirely every component of our shoes: soles, logo, insoles, shoe lashes, dies…. 

Quality as a driver bearing in mind style. In order to fulfill this principle we customized every detail of our shoes and chose the materials, suppliers and manufacturers that made our ideas come true. We used chromium-free Nobuck leather brought from Italy and a 100% recyclable customized rubber insole.

We consider that in order to offer a high quality, comfortable product, it is not only important to work with first-class materials, but also to use them in a manufacturing process of the same quality. We ensure this quality along the complete process appealing to local and experienced manufacturers. So, our product is 100% Spanish hand-made. In this way, besides having full control of the quality during the process, we promote the local trade and make sure that our product is developed under fair and ethical conditions.

 

Everything we have done, we have done it under our MUST principles of sustainability.

Then, Quality, Design and Sustainability comes together to bring to life The Collection. 

 

 

 

We'll email you a survey after the campaign  ends to collect your shipping address, color and size reference.

 

By 2050 There Will be More Plastic in the Ocean Than Fish

There's something YOU can do about it!

Plastic straws are just one of many single-use plastics which end up in the ocean, polluting the water and harming sea life. Join the movement For A Strawless Ocean and take action against plastic pollution, starting with the plastic straw!

At HAŪT we have already joined the movement and we decided to go one step further. Strawless Ocean is just one of the many ways you can contribute with the reduction of plastics in the environment. In our production processes we DO NOT use any plastic components and DO NOT work with any supplier using them. Our designs, our packaging, our merchandise and even our shipping packing are entire made with biodegradable materials.

We work with Lonely Whale Foundation by donating 1% of the gross income of the company to support the many programs they carry on worldwide. 

 TAKE ACTION AND JOIN THE MOVEMENT!

Check our FAQ at the top of the page or send us an email to contact@haut.es :)

story:
My name is Bert Woodson.  I live on St. Croix in the U.S. Virgin Islands, where Sublime STX Sun Protective Clothing is produced.  

Sublime STX is the result of two years of research, development, and testing.  We are unique in the market.

I have always loved the sun...I grew up in Florida and have lived in the Caribbean and Central America.  As a kid, I could be in the sun for six hours and just tan.  I'm a bit older now and I find that about an hour is all I can handle without starting to cook. 

When I get to the point where I feel that I've had enough sun, I wear our stuff.  It's great for fishing, snorkeling, diving, windsurfing, swimming, sailing, windsurfing, horseback riding, cycling, running--you name it.  I wear a big hat, I use SPF30+ reef-friendly, organic sunscreen, UV blocking sunglasses, and rock on.  No need to cut my day short.

Our clothes dry very quickly.  They provide UPF50+ protection, are moisture wicking, lightweight, and treated with zinc as an antimicrobial to inhibit body odor.

The vibrant images are digitized from original paintings we have licensed, and the artists receive a royalty for each garment sold.  This is what makes us stand out of the crowd.

We have long and short sleeved men's and women's shirts, youth rash guards, shirts for kids and toddlers, buffs, hoodies, hats, and sarongs, all made with UPF50+ fabric.

We also offer fashion-fit beach dresses--great as a bathing suit cover-up or casual occasions.

Our process is called dye-sublimation.  Each garment is dyed individually and is the result of computer-generated prints using special inks and paper.  One for the front, and one for the back.  The garment is placed in a high-pressure heat press, which turns the ink into a vapor.  It permeates the fabric and never fades or wears off.  We offer all-over prints as well as panel prints.

We sell our products online and we are excited to have opened our first retail store in downtown Christiansted on St. Croix on May 5th, featuring "All Things Under The Sun".  Although we opened in the off season, the store has been extremely well received.  The majority of our sales are the result of people seeing our customers wearing our clothing on the beaches, sailing, and out about town.  They "have to" know where to buy our stuff.  We are very pleased about that!

We are under full production and look forward to expanding our markets to include more stores, as well as wholesaling to resort-oriented boutiques.  

We are addressing several needs in the marketplace:

The Skin Cancer Foundation and Mayo Clinic--to name just two of the many respected cancer research organizations--concur that UPF50+ clothing is your first and best defense against Basil Cell and Squamous Cell Carcinomas, as well as Melanoma.  UVA and UVB rays (radiation) are the primary causes of these skin cancers.  Cellular damage is cumulative throughout our lives.  Our fabric blocks 98% of these harmful rays.

Standard sunscreens contain harmful chemicals, some of which are carcinogens.  Considering that your skin is the largest organ on your body, this is cause for concern.  Slathering your skin with these products is harmful.  These chemicals also kill our coral reefs.  For this reason, these products have recently been outlawed in the Hawaiian Islands, Key West, and the Virgin Islands.

For these reasons we highly recommend a reef-safe organic and ayurvedic sunblock.  Our favorite is Pura Veda Sun Protect 30+.  It is actually good for your skin.

And, we have all seen the effects of too much sun on aging...

Finally, there is a real void in the marketplace for great looking sun wear.  Aesthetics seem to be an afterthought.  Our designs are unique and appealing.  Everyone likes to look good.  Our vibrant designs make people happy and it's contagious....

Our target for funding for this campaign is $25,000.  This will pay for production of our perks, as well as increase our production capabilities.  We will also add exciting new products to our line.

Sorry--due to expected volume of orders we will be unable to make perk substitutions, but visit our website for additional stuff.

It's important to get a great start at the gate.  For anyone who joins us as a backer during the first 48 hours of going live, we're throwing in a panel shirt of the painting "Cool Blue" by Brian Sylvester ($58.00 value) on us.  We appreciate your support!  This offer expires at 12:00 PM on August 22nd.

"Cool Blue"

First, we will fulfill our orders for our contributors.  In addition, we will offer our contributors a lifetime 10% discount on our website and free shipping when you register on our site.  We have an exciting selection to choose from and we will be adding new products and designs.

Very importantly, part of the proceeds of this campaign are being donated to the St. Croix Nature Conservancy's Coral Nursery and Reef Restoration Project.  You can read more below about the amazing work they are doing to help save our coral reefs .

If we exceed our target, funds will be used to expand the business into other markets.

If we do not reach our target funding, your contribution will be refunded.  but you can order from our site.  We'll enjoy the extra boost in business and the additional sales generated when your friends see you wearing our clothing.

Your contribution will accomplish several things.

*You'll be helping to protect your skin from cancers and premature aging.

*You'll help to protect and regenerate coral reefs by contributing to coral nurseries and reef restoration.  

*You'll reduce damage to the ocean and estuaries in general by not applying harmful sunscreens.

*You'll be supporting the arts.  Our artists receive a royalty on each garment sold.

*You'll look damn good.  Be prepared for people stopping you to ask where you got your   Sublime STX gear....

Risks and Challenges

Since we are in production, there is no risk to you.  Your contribution will be a welcome augmentation to our existing business, and to expand.  With our fundraising target amount, we will be able to fulfill perk package orders promptly.

If your response exceeds our funding goal, perks will be produced and mailed out in the order received.  If delivery time is longer than expected, will we communicate with you and keep you up to date with production progress.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to contribute, we would be very appreciative of any help you give us making some noise about our campaign!  Indiegogo has some great sharing tools.  Help us blast social media!

Love your skin and look damn good doing it!

****Please note:  Sublime STX is not affiliated with St. Croix Nature Conservancy.  We are acting solely as a donor.

*****************************************************************

St. Croix Nature Conservancy's Coral Nursery and Reef Restoration Project is partnering with leading coral conservation organizations to accelerate scientific understanding of how corals adapt to climate change — from both an evolutionary and ecological standpoint — and to put conservation strategies into action that promote long-term recovery of corals while restoring critical reefs now. 

OUR TEAM:

Bert Woodson, Owner and CEO

Charlie Woodson, Production and PR

Bobbi Corona Jones, Business Manager and Graphics

Lauren Woodson, Retail and Design

"Cool Blue"
First, we will fulfill our orders for our contributors.  In addition, we will offer our contributors a lifetime 10% discount on our website and free shipping when you register on our site.  We have an exciting selection to choose from and we will be adding new products and designs.
Very importantly, part of the proceeds of this campaign are being donated to the St. Croix Nature Conservancy's Coral Nursery and Reef Restoration Project.  You can read more below about the amazing work they are doing to help save our coral reefs .
If we exceed our target, funds will be used to expand the business into other markets.
If we do not reach our target funding, your contribution will be refunded.  but you can order from our site.  We'll enjoy the extra boost in business and the additional sales generated when your friends see you wearing our clothing.
Your contribution will accomplish several things.
*You'll be helping to protect your skin from cancers and premature aging.
*You'll help to protect and regenerate coral reefs by contributing to coral nurseries and reef restoration.  
*You'll reduce damage to the ocean and estuaries in general by not applying harmful sunscreens.
*You'll be supporting the arts.  Our artists receive a royalty on each garment sold.
*You'll look damn good.  Be prepared for people stopping you to ask where you got your   Sublime STX gear....
Risks and Challenges
Since we are in production, there is no risk to you.  Your contribution will be a welcome augmentation to our existing business, and to expand.  With our fundraising target amount, we will be able to fulfill perk package orders promptly.
If your response exceeds our funding goal, perks will be produced and mailed out in the order received.  If delivery time is longer than expected, will we communicate with you and keep you up to date with production progress.
Other Ways You Can Help
If you are unable to contribute, we would be very appreciative of any help you give us making some noise about our campaign!  Indiegogo has some great sharing tools.  Help us blast social media!
Love your skin and look damn good doing it!
****Please note:  Sublime STX is not affiliated with St. Croix Nature Conservancy.  We are acting solely as a donor.
*****************************************************************
St. Croix Nature Conservancy's Coral Nursery and Reef Restoration Project is partnering with leading coral conservation organizations to accelerate scientific understanding of how corals adapt to climate change — from both an evolutionary and ecological standpoint — and to put conservation strategies into action that promote long-term recovery of corals while restoring critical reefs now. 

OUR TEAM:

Bert Woodson, Owner and CEO

Charlie Woodson, Production and PR

Bobbi Corona Jones, Business Manager and Graphics

Lauren Woodson, Retail and Design
campaign_city: U.S. Virgin Islands, United States Minor Outlying Islands

story:
The Sea Hunter is the affordable, classic, and solidly constructed dive watch you have been looking for.  Manufactured with high grade materials for optimal durability while retaining timeless, vintage design cues.  Precise timekeeping and a striking design round out the Sea Hunter's versatility.  Wear it on a swim, a night out, or even in the classroom or office.  This watch is your trusty companion, stylish and comfortable. 

 

 

The Design

Evoking vintage 1960's dive watch styling with our own design focus.  Designed for optimal readability, versitility, and precision.  The Sea Hunter is a high spec dive watch that is just as stylish as it is functional.  The green bezel and off-white accents give this model a unique feel without being gaudy or ostentatious.      

 

 

Don't be fooled by good looks; the Sea Hunter is a fully functionally dive watch.  Suitable for depths as deep as 200M / 660 FT, this watch is ready for swim or service.  A screw-down crown prevents damage from debris, water, or impact.  A bright lume ensures visibility in the dark.  The rotating bezel turns with a satisfying click.  

 

We have carefully considered every inch of the design:  Obelisque hour and minute hands, Breguet seconds hand, easily legible indexes, case and crystal material and shape, a precise movement, and finishing and detailing. . . 

 

 

The result?  A functional, stylish, and rugged everyday watch that accompanies nearly any outfit with elegance while still being perfectly capable of dive duties.  

 

The Case

This is a solid, authentic dive watch.  The Sea Hunter is encased in a surgical-grade stainless steel enclosure, able to withstand the impacts and dings of everyday life and dive service.  The caseback and crown are adorned with our logo of the wing of an Oriental Magpie, the national bird of South Korea whose stunning flight profile inspired our brand.  This watch is strong and ready to go with you nearly everywhere, you'll never need to baby this timepiece.  

 

 

The Sapphire Glass

Despite the higher costs of production, we design all of our watches to feature a sapphire glass.  This is to provide the highest level of protection available.  The crystal is scratch-proof and highly durable.  The Sea hunter's crystal is double domed to reduce optical distortion while providing an interesting aesthetic dimension to the face of the watch.  

 

The Specifics

  • Case: 42mm | Surgical Grade Stainless Steel
  • Movement: Japanese Quartz | Miyota 2115
  • Crystal: Scratch-Resistant Sapphire | Domed
  • Thickness: 13mm
  • Water Resistance: 20 ATM | 660 feet
  • Strap: 22mm | Stainless Steel Bracelet
  • Warranty: Two Years

 

 

The Process

It starts with an idea and a drawing.  Draft after draft, what began as a circle on a piece of paper slowly evolved into a solid impression.  Once the conceptual process was finished, we put our ideas onto software to give us a stronger idea of what the model would actually look like.  More changes were made at this stage as we noticed what will and will not actually work.  

 

 

After this step, prototypes were constructed in order to provide us with the kinds of insight that a drawing or 3D model cannot.  Revisions didn't stop with the prototypes, when the first physical draft is in hand, we made the final design decisions that lead to what eventually became the Sea Hunter.

Finally, our watches are assembled in a dust-free environment by a highly skilled manufacturing firm with over twenty-four years of experience constructing quality timepieces.  

What this means for you is that you can wear a Park & Christian with confidence.  Every single detail of your watch is deliberately considered and thought out.  

 

Sustainability 

Park & Christian watches are built to last, not to be thrown away.  Longevity is one of the paramount virtues to traditional watchmaking, the Sea Hunter will be with you for the long-haul. 

Stainless steel is one of the most recycled materials on the planet.  The steel used for this watch won't be found polluting our precious oceans.  

 

 

 

The Team

Park & Christian was formed by two cousins with roots in South Korea and the United States.  Fueled by a mutual love for watch design we teamed up in Seoul to convert our vision of versatility and availability to reality.  Park & Christian is built on a foundation of honest and transparent values as a watch studio.  This commitment is evident in our decision to attach our names to this project.  No snobbery, no gimmicks, and no platitudes.

E-Mail : parkandchristian@gmail.com

 

 

Risks & Challenges

Delivery time: When manufacturing, the obvious risk is that suppliers may not fulfill our order on time, however we're working closely with a manufacturer that we know and trust. Their productivity has yet to provide any reason to doubt their ability to fulfill our production order. We are set on getting your watch on your wrist on time.  

Please also keep in mind that the COVID-19 pandemic has resulted in worldwide delays in shipping.  

Duty/VAT charges: If you live outside of Korea, you'll be responsible for any applicable duty/VAT charges.

Customs: Sometimes customs can take a while as you'd probably know already. We wish we could fix it but unfortunately we can't, patience is the key. We will be in touch frequently with campaign updates and be sure to be completely transparent in every regard possible. Thanks.

 

 

-------------------------------------------------------

 

  • ​디자인
    - 과거의 다이버 시계들의 빈티지적인 요소와, 현재의 트랜드를 재해석하여 디자인 하였습니다.
     
  • 성능
    - 스크류 용두, 케이스백을 채택하여  200M 방수 기능의 전문적인 성능을 가진 툴 워치 입니다.
    - Superluminova C3 도료를 사용하여 야광 성능을 높였습니다.
    - 돔형 사파이어 크리스탈 렌즈를 채택하여 스크래치나 충격으로부터 보다 자유롭게 사용 가능합니다.
    - 120클릭 단방향 베젤을 채택하였고, 백플레이를 최소화 하였습니다.
     
  • 상세 정보
    - 케이스 : 지름 42MM로 보편적인 사이즈의 시계입니다.
    - 밴드 넓이 : 22MM로 보편적인 사이즈이며, 쉽게 가죽밴드 등 다른 밴드로도 교체하여 사용할 수 있습니다.
    - 무브먼트 : Japanese Quartz | Miyota 2115 (일제 쿼츠/미요타 2115)
    - 두께 : 13MM
    - 보증기간 : 2년
     
  • 제품 제작 및 배송 정보
    - 3월 : 펀딩 종료
    - 4-5월 : 펀딩 목표 달성(100% 이상) 시 제품 제작
    - 5월 : 제품 발송

     

기타 안내사항

안녕하세요. 마이크로브랜드 시계 컴퍼니 Park & Christian 입니다.
저희 시계를 인디고고를 통해 찾아주심에 정말 감사드립니다.
현재 COVID-19로 인해 생산 및 배송관련하여 약간의 딜레이가 발생할 수있으나
저희를 믿고 펀딩해주신 여러분들께  꼭 보답하는 의미로 제대로 발송되고 배송 받으실 수 있도록
보다 열심히 노력하겠습니다.
각종 문의사항은 저희 이메일이나 인스타그램 메시지를 보내주시면 빠르게 답변 해 드리겠습니다.

* 이메일 : parkandchristian@gmail.com
* 인스타그램 : @parkandchristian

감사합니다.

story:
The Story

Hi.  My name is Alejandra.  I am the founder of Monteverde Watches.  I am also a wife, mother and entrepreneur living in Costa Rica, a country in Central America that is small (only 51,100 square kms), peaceful (we have no army) and green (more than 25% of its land is protected forests and reserves and it has 4% of the total estimated species in the world!.)   

 

 

This is me, wearing the second watch prototype.  Natura Collection silver with butterflies, all stainless steel case with mesh stainless steel strap.  

 

Enjoy a new butterfly on your dial every 24 hours!

 

This is my husband, part of our team, wearing the watch prototype of the Natura Collection, Silver with butterflies with tan real leather strap, for Halloween.

 

Our Campaign

As we mentioned before, the story of "Lola", our baby girl´s blue morpho, inspired us to design a watch that could be unisex, that could be worn in a casual or elegant way, and that could must certainly honor the beautiful fauna we have in our country and in the world.    A timepiece that will show you a new species every day and that will also be manufactured with high quality materials such as:

  1. Stainless Steel case and case back
  2. Interchangeable straps so it can be worn with leather or stainless steel straps.
  3. Sapphire glass
  4. 5 ATM water resistant. 
  5. Miyota Japanese movement.   EVERY DAY, YOU WILL SEE A NEW SPECIES ON YOUR DIAL.
  6. All packed in a box that will simply make you say "WOOW" when you unpack your new watch, since you will be transported to the Cloud Forest of Monteverde, where our brand takes its name from.

Our first collection, NATURA, will honor butterflies and beautiful, colorful and poisonous little frogs better know as Dart Frogs.  Everyday you will have a new one on your dial.   The watches will come in two different sizes:  38mm and 41mm.   They will also be available in silver and rose gold.   All of them with the options of leather strap (navy blue, black, dark brown, tan) or stainless steel mesh strap.

  

Every 24 hours, you will see on your dial a new species of either butterflies or dart frogs, depending on the watch you request.  

 

With your support, we will make a difference to the world!

For us, your support is very important since we want to manufacture a watch that is unique and exclusive in the world.   A timepiece that fusions fashion, nature and preservation of beautiful species, some of them endangered.  

You will not only be the owner of a quality, exclusive watch, but you will also be contributing to one of several environmental initiatives such as:

  1.  Payment for Environmental Services (PES).  A program in our country that recognizes the protection of forest, biodiversity, water resources; the mitigation of greenhouse gases, and more.
  2.  Economic support for the preservation of the Cloud Forest of Monteverde, Costa Rica. 
  3.  Economic support for programs that educate and promote junior Park Rangers. 

All of these contributions will be posted on our website alongside the names of all of our backers. 

 

Your Contributions 

In order to accomplish our goals, we need you to help us achieve a total contributions of US$20,000.   With these resources, we will fund the manufacturing of the first batch of watches, the amazing box in which it will be packed, the quality control company, marketing, worldwide shipping, and profit. 

In order to thank you for such contributions, we have made several rewards that you will see in our campaign page.   They consider a super special discount on the expected retail price of our watches.  

 

Risks and challenges

We have been developing this business for several months now.  By now, we have received six different watch prototypes from five different manufacturers.  We have decided which one is the best to meet our goals.   We also have negotiated with the companies that will be in charge of QC (quality control), the package manufacturing and the logistics for order fulfillment.   So basically the only thing we need is your support.
 

Other ways in which you can help us

Please share and ask your friends and family to share our campaign, to help us realize this dream. 

THANK YOU

MONTEVERDE WATCHES

DISCOVER THE NATURE OF TIME

story:
the issue

Your body matters. It allows you to know the world. Yet we constantly equate arbitrary physical ideals with human value. Most body types are sorely underrepresented in the media. A hundred times a day, you are taught the "right" way to look. Now is the time to look like yourself.

the shirt

I created the Gradient shirt to normalize and celebrate physical diversity. Each shirt features a wholly unique, computer-generated design, like these:

On the back, the words What is gradient one? force us to consider how we assign worth to our bodies and the bodies of others. I want to show that there is no "gradient one," no superior way to look or be, just as no single design is somehow better than the rest. You cannot assign quantitative value to something wholly qualitative in nature.

By contributing to this campaign, you can be one of the first people to receive a Gradient shirt, complete with a 100% original (and totally splendiferous) design. Plus, if you're feeling brave, we'll give you a code so you can upload a bio and a picture of yourself to our website. This way, anyone who visits will see a plethora of bodies, not just those represented by the mainstream media. 

Backer on a budget? Still want your own gradient? We also have buttons. :)

the impact

All net proceeds from Gradient will be donated to the Eating Disorder Unit at Children's Hospital Colorado in Denver, where I received intensive treatment for anorexia at the age of fifteen.
story_txt: the issueYour body matters. It allows you to know the world. Yet we constantly equate arbitrary physical ideals with human value. Most body types are sorely underrepresented in the media. A hundred times a day, you are taught the "right" way to look. Now is the time to look like yourself.the shirtI created the Gradient shirt to normalize and celebrate physical diversity. Each shirt features a wholly unique, computer-generated design, like these:On the back, the words What is gradient one? force us to consider how we assign worth to our bodies and the bodies of others. I want to show that there is no "gradient one," no superior way to look or be, just as no single design is somehow better than the rest. You cannot assign quantitative value to something wholly qualitative in nature.By contributing to this campaign, you can be one of the first people to receive a Gradient shirt, complete with a 100% original (and totally splendiferous) design. Plus, if you're feeling brave, we'll give you a code so you can upload a bio and a picture of yourself to our website. This way, anyone who visits will see a plethora of bodies, not just those represented by the mainstream media. Backer on a budget? Still want your own gradient? We also have buttons. :)the impactAll net proceeds from Gradient will be donated to the Eating Disorder Unit at Children's Hospital Colorado in Denver, where I received intensive treatment for anorexia at the age of fifteen.

story:
Lovey’s - it’s like having a nanny in your pocket!

Parents, congratulations!  You now have a human whose life is in your hands.  While this may seem like a daunting responsibility, Lovey’s has your back.  Our voice activated baby monitor talks to you like a real human about the health and well being of your baby.  We even track the behavior and sleeping patterns of your little one(s) so you can sneak in a much deserved nap!

 

To Be Clear

Lovey’s is the ONLY baby monitor in the world that talks to you.  In a world of emails, spreadsheets, and charts, Lovey’s makes life simple.  Whatever you want to know, just ask.

 

Here's How it Works

Meet Chris, Lissa, and their beautiful child Stella; a sparkling Lovey's protected family.

 

COMING SOON!

 

A better kind of smart baby Monitor:

Lovey’s is the world’s first Voice-Activated smart baby monitor, that use Artificial Intelligence and run deep machine learning, to detect anomalies in real time. It also helps parents track their baby’s health through monitoring their child’s behavior and sleeping patterns. 

Unlike other baby monitoring solutions out there, Lovey’s offers not only a baby sensor band to monitor the baby’s status and activity, but also includes a wristband for parents to receive alerts as they happen, a mobile app (for both iOS and Android) that helps parents set alerts for an industry-best range of variables, including skin temperature, breathing, body movement, sleeping position, and even room’s temperature and humidity level, and last but not least, Lovey’s bridge, a voice-activated device that keeps parents updated about their baby’s health, and it is considered the brain of our technology, as it processes the information received, to generate data and health tracking reports. 

On top of all that, there is no charging required with Lovey’s. Thanks to our innovative sensor and wireless technology package, Lovey’s lasts for a long period on a single simple coin battery that can be found at any nearby convenience store, pharmacy, or hardware retailer.

Lovey’s help parents know their baby is healthy and happy, no matter where they are;  even when their child is with a family member or a trusted babysitter.

 

Once parents purchase their Lovey’s package, they attach the sensor to their child’s ankle or wrist. Downloading the mobile application to their phone will allow parents to set the alert threshold levels and receiving alerts from baby’s sensor band. The parent puts on the wristband and synchronizes it with the baby sensor and with their phone. The parent can monitor their baby’s activity via the smartphone app, and then set alerts based on their concerns and needs.

If any variable exceeds parameters set by the parents, or signals that the baby is in danger (such as high temperatures or rolling onto the stomach while sleeping), the parent will receive a notification on the parent smart phone and by voice via Lovey's Bridge. If the parent doesn't respond, the parent’s wristband will start notifying via beep sound. This alert can be dismissed by placing a hand over the wristband, which will be detected by a proximity sensor. 

If the parent still doesn’t respond to the parent’s wrist band alerts, Lovey’s will begin to make outgoing calls or SMS messages to a list of emergency contacts, letting them know that there is an issue and no one has responded, and those number will be saved during the initial setup of the App. 

Lovey's will record all the anomalies to generate reports that will help parents detect health problems, and take appropriate actions when its needed and in a timely manner.

 

Lovey's Baby Bear is our soft, small band that connects to either the wrist or ankle, without restricting baby’s movement. 

 

All of this capability is enabled by low-power, high-reliability Bluetooth Smart technology. All without having to worry about charging.

 

Lovey's Linke, our soft, flexible, trendy and innovative band, allows parents to receive alerts about their baby’s condition, no matter where they are. Many of today’s young parents are attached to their smartphones, but many also don’t want to carry their phone with them from room to room, all the time. You can use the bracelet, use your smartphone, or chat with Lovey's voice-activated bridge to monitor your baby.

If an alert condition arises, the wristband vibrates to notify the parent, and alerts can be dismissed by simply placing a hand over the wristband. A proximity sensor recognizes the gesture and turns the vibration off. Now that the parents know there’s is a potential issue, they can respond as needed.

 

The Lovey's Bridge connects your child's vital signs to you in real time. The Bridge is a unique small box that hosts the machine learning & Artificial Intelligence for the Lovey's system. It connects information from the baby's band to an internet server DATA BASE  internet data base, our web site to set your baby's band.

The range of the Lovey's Bridge is so great it can cover your whole house. 

It also has a digital microphone to detect a crying baby and uses a high quality speaker to translate your baby's event to human voice and notification.

Some additional features include:

  • Notifies the parent, by voice, if the baby's band is off
  • Has speech recognition for parental commands (What is the baby's temperature? Set event temperature to 102°F. How long has the baby been sleeping? Stop monitoring.)
  • Includes proximity buttons to set speaker level and other settings.

 

Functions

  • Advanced and complete baby monitoring solution using the unique technology of Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence.

Coverage

  • Use up to 626ft away to cover the whole house.

Lovey's uses a unique technology which allow a bi-directional communication: 

  • From the baby band into the parent's mobile App. 
  • From the baby band into the parent's bracelet. 
  • Automatic SMS from the band to the registered emergency numbers on the App. 
  • Automatic Calls from the band to the registered emergency numbers on the App. 
  • From the Mobile App into multiple children's bands .
  • From the parents bracelets into multiple children's band.

Number of babies/kids able to monitor 

  • Lovey's App can support to monitor more than one child.

Age Compatibility

  • You can use Lovey's for your child from birth up to 5 years-old. 

Design and Wearability

  • Lovey's can be worn on multiple areas on the body. Arms, wrists or legs.

Connectivity

  • Connectivity to Lovey's devices is easy and guaranteed.

 

Parents often feel like they could use an extra set of hands when negotiating caring for their child, working out, keep up with their job, and getting chores done around the house. They want to focus all their energy on making sure their child is happy and healthy, but it’s just not possible. 

Instead of another set of hands, what about another sense: a parenting sense? Lovey’s is that new parenting sense. Lovey’s helps parents focus on what matters: taking care of themselves, and taking care of their child. 

And by empowering this new parenting sense we can, truly, create happy moms and dads. 

 

We know that most backers won't have the opportunity to experience Lovey’s before pledging, but we are confident that you are going to love Lovey’s. We will reward your faith in us by offering a 30-day money back guarantee. It’s simple. If you don’t think Lovey’s is helping your baby or you, send them back within 30-days for a full refund.  Now wasn’t that easy?

Unlike other baby monitoring solutions out there, Lovey’s offers not only a baby sensor band to monitor the baby’s status and activity, but also includes a wristband for parents to receive

 

 

Don't see what you want? 

Want to add-on more bands, or bridges? 

Simply email us at marketing@loveys.com and we'll create a custom perk just for you!

 

 

Early sketches of Lovey's Bridge.

 

Early sketches of Lovey's Linke.

 

Early sketches of Lovey's Baby Bear.

 

One of our engineers hard at work.

story:
What is this?

Crea Iloa is a young Finnish fashion jewellery and lifestyle design company. Crea stands for creation, and Iloa is Finnish for joy. Our aim is to Create Joy.

  Moikka! in english that is Hello! My name is Tanna.

I am the founder and designer of Crea Iloa. My background is in jewellery design. Crea Iloa was founded in the summer of 2015. We want to make truly unique jewellery that makes people happy. Our jewellery are designed and manufactured with skill and responsibility in Finland. We mainly use ceramics and silver.

Crea Iloa jewellery has a little secret! You can add scent to the back of the jewellery. By adding fragrance to the piece of jewellery, you add your own story and you create your own amulet. Best thing is that you don´t need to add chemicals in fragrances to your skin.

Add fragrance to the back of the ceramic piece of jewellery. Klick the picture to learn more.

The first Crea Iloa jewellery collection was launched in 2015 for the Christmas market. We have developed and expanded our collection. We even designed an ecological jewellery box which is also for jewellery display. We are based in Finland and working in small country means that resources are limited because of the small consumer base. Finland has total of 5.5 million people. That's why we want to tell our story to a wider audience.

You can help us to expand our brand awareness outside of Finland. You can make it possible for us to work towards our goal and give us the opportunity to grow as designers and as a company.

Our goal is to be first international successful and growing Finnish jewellery company by 2020.

We are grateful for all the help we can get. We also welcome feedback, ideas and cooperation proposals. If you have something in your mind, let us know

 

Why we need funding and what special perks you can get?

Now we are looking for funding, which enables us to develop and expand into an international company.

funding will be use to cover

- The cost of manufacturing serial production jewellery molds.

- The cost of development our website more user-friendly.

- The cost of participate with international fashion fairs.

 

32 000 € total is used in the following way

- 10 000 € manufacturing jewellery molds

- 12 000 € development of e-commerce, creation strategy and marketing plan

- 4 950 € participation in Accessories Mastered -program. 10 months Training: learn to respond to the needs of the international market and to network outside Finland.

- 5 050 € participation in international fashion fairs

 

By getting our perks you can participate in and support us.

Only here you can get yourself unique hand-painted Crea Iloa jewellery. The jewellery is truly one of kind. There are a few sets of unique personalized jewellery available. These jewellery cannot be bought. The jewellery includes a certificate of authenticity and a hand-written thank you card.

All perks with a jewellery includes, jewellery according to the perk, instruction of adding scent, felt protective for jewellery. In special perks the package includes also postcards and greetings from Finland. Jewelry is packed with a highly durable jewelry boxes. All perk items are packed in cardboard casings, so that they remain neat and tidy for you.

 

If we cannot collect the required amount of money, we will use the money which we have already collected to develop Crea Iloa website and e-commerce.

Jewelry packaging rethought

Crea Iloa jewelry comes with especially designed packaging. We decided to design an entirely new kind of jewelry box, one that is ecological, affordable, durable and naturally good looking.

The box protects the piece of jewelry during transportation, is part of the jewelry decoration in the store, and can also be used as a small jewelry box at home. Most importantly, the piece of jewelry and its casing is a beautiful gift.

We have developed a durable, interesting and biodegradable jewelry box in cooperation with a Finnish family-run business possessing a wealth of industrial design experience. The casing is made from fully recyclable wood composites. The same material has been used to make e.g. terrace flooring and dish brush handles. The material will not cause oxidation of silver products, as opposed to some cartons. There is no wastage in the manufacturing process of the box, which means that all of the raw material is used. The box is seamless, which improves durability and life span. A durable box will suffer little wear and tear in the store, and therefore retains its decorative features to the joy of the customer. If necessary, you can wipe the box with a moist cloth.

The box is lined with felt, which protects the piece of jewelry. The jewelry chain can easily be placed under the piece of felt. The cover of the box is made from milk glass-like opal acrylic sheet. In the future, the cover will be made using the same process as with the rest of the casing, which will save cutting residue.

What is happening right now

Copenhagen Jewellery and Watch the show chose Crea Iloa as one of the 2016 "Brand New" -jewellery companies in the northern countries. We are involved in competing for the title of Precious Talent 2017 in Stockholm, Sweden. Crea Iloa is also involved in the competition Talent Tendence in Frankfurt.

Crea Iloa is opening a Pop-up shop in Finland's largest airport, Helsinki-Vantaa airport.

We are involved in Finnish export projects, such as the Jewellery Form Finland, in the Swedish market and Koruja Perkele! (Jewelry Goddanmit!) from local markets to International markets.

We want to bring new features to jewellery and to create more joy!

 

We want to take our part of responsibility towards our community.

We cooperate in projects for helping young unemployed people. For now, we have been working with a couple of young people. They have had the opportunity to see what is like be entrepreneur in everyday life. Young people have been part of our real design team. In a small country, creative businesses are few and the opportunity to explore how creative people work is limited. Young people have difficulties to get work experience because jobs are not available enough. Recently, we cooperated with Juuso, who designed and carried out our Look Book. 

Take a look here Crea Iloa Look Book

How does this sound?

Do you want to get involved in something great! If so, just select which perk you want. Spread the word to your friends. Remember indiegogo´s nifty share option.

We are grateful for all the help we can get. We also welcome feedback, ideas and cooperation proposals. If you have something in your mind, let us know.

Want to know more? Visit our website www.creailoa.com or send email to us tanna@creailoa.com

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Who we are:  Elen Rose is a brand that aims to design elegant lingerie for all women while promoting self love, confidence, well-being and girl/woman power because at Elen Rose we believe that “beauty is within” and you should be allowed to express your sexuality regardless of colour, shape or background.

Our vision: Our vision is to interact with our customers through our products, fashion events, our annual galas and networking events both in the UK and Greece, directly and indirectly discussing issues and challenges faced by women and how we can empower ourselves and the younger generation to overcome them and break the negative cycles.

Our mission: Every woman would like a brand that interacts with her and that genuinely embraces individuality, uniqueness and makes her feel that she matters, despite what the media promotes to us. Especially when it comes to lingerie, brands should have an intimate relationship with their customers! Elen Rose is here for that and will aspire to have that as its core mission when dealing with all our "Elen Rose hunnies". 

Elen Rose will interact a lot with its customers by organising and delivering new collection launches and annual events (motivational speeches about self love, well being, female empowerment, domestic violence awareness,etc.) which will be accessible to all our customers.

Your contribution MATTERS: Elen Rose Lingerie is now seeking for your help to become bigger and bring all these to REALITY. We have had this idea for 2 years and now it's time to do something about it. Working alongside an amazing designer we have gracefully put together Elen Rose's Lingerie first collection called "Indulgence".

We want you to indulge in this new era of lingerie approaching in a unique way, that why we ask for your contribution to make this happen. We want you to help us launch our first collection.

Funds: Contributions will be used towards the production of the pieces in our first collection (bras,knickers, robes, accessories), to cover some part of our initial costs for our upcoming fashion show launches in London & Athens, as well as covering the costs to ensure our website captures our amazing designs that will be made available to you. And most importantly apart from becoming our personal hero, together we get to be part of something BIGGER.

We appreciate you: We would like to sincerely thank you for your donations, time and interest shown. We would be sharing loads of updates so please do stay connect with us via our website and social media and you will be definitely be rewarded for this.

Founder and CEO-Eleni Souli

A born Entrepreneur. I was born and raised in Athens, Greece but being of Nigerian origin I basically embrace the best of both worlds and can communicate fluently in Greek, English and Yoruba.

I have experience in fashion retail, customer satisfaction and marketing and  a degree (BA Hons) in PR, Media & Marketing from Canterbury Christ Church University. I currently live and work as a Marketing Executive for a social enterprise in London. 

I have a passion for lingerie and believe that everyone should be able to wear them regardless of whether or not they are "showing them off" to someone. I don't believe in having the "right body" in wearing lingerie but I do believe in having the right attitude and mindset in doing this because real beauty is within and I would really appreciate your help to express this through my brand.

Thanks

story:
"New ECO Easy-to-Carry Foldable Slipper. A perfect slipper for Hotel, Beach, Traveling and  more"

This is the best way to reduce the waste of provided slipper by hotel. You can wear your OWN slipper while you are staying in hotel. It is much more hygienic. The Foldable Slipper is very easy to fit into your back pack or luggage.

Everything is nearly done and ready launch to the market. We are waiting to meet up the minimum quantity to put it on the production line. We promise that what you are pledging on is what you will receive! Please help us to make it happens!

Our Mission

Our mission is to create more innovation product to serve people around the world. We want to create many different types of product in coming future, from the life style to household product.

It is the best way to carry along with your slipper to the beach and enjoy the summer!!

iCOMFY Foldable Slipper is very easy to fit into your back pack

iCOMFY Foldable Slipper is your best thing for you to carry around while your are traveling or going to the beach.  It is very more hygienic than using the slipper that hotel provided. The tooling is done and we waiting for your hlep to fill up the quantity to start the production. Don't wait! Pick your size and pledge to us!!
