story:
The Rebella Story

This project began with my own frustration in finding a beautiful retro watch with all the components and functions for a reasonable price. Other products would spoil    their aesthetic by putting unsightly designs on the face or using poor quality  synth- etic leather. As an Engineer I strive to create, with my team, beautiful but functional products, this led me to believe that I could create and adapt the perfect watch that would tick all the functionality boxes whilst keeping a beautiful design.Our aim was to create a design that was unique, artistic, timeless and elegant. 

From this concept our believe in elegant,artistic and enduring timepieces evolved.


Rebella watches were first designed around a decade ago with comfort and style as the focus. The leather strap is a one-size-fits-all design with a simple but durable snap fastener. The wooden beads and design   accents complement the easy-to-read watch face.

This new watch is inspired by another era, with different aesthetics, but with that same Rebella philosophy: to create affordable watches, inspired by vintage timepi-eces, with a contemporary feel.


The Design Process

Rebella was created for the modern woman who appreciates a timeless look and feel. Designed to be versatile, it can be worn to the office, a sporting event or a cocktail party. The diverse design materials blend well with jeans or dresses, sweats or swimsuits. There are currently 8 different face designs and moulds for each.

The round face is set on alternating strips of woven, twisted and extremely durable and strong singular cowhide which is super gentle on the wrist due to its pampered wrist-facing side. 

Beads decorate the band and a brass charm dangles gently onto the back of the hand. 



The lightweight Rebella easily snaps onto the wrist and immediately commands attention. 


The mix of brushed and polished surfaces creates an interesting play of textures, giving different types of reflections when hit by light.


Stones set around the outside of the watch face give it an added sparkle.


Length-Adjustable up to a Large, Diameter-19mm (inside face) 

We have different case design being considered and are mostly similar to this vintage box

Or a more contemporary leather box/case. We are giving our backers the choice to vote for the perfect box design.

What We Need & What You Get

The project is currently at a good stage with all the samples, prototypes, moulds, packaging and tooling already paid for. The manufacturing team has a clear idea of vision and quality the project team is striving for. So the project is at a really good position in terms of risk, and requires a minimum amount of funds to get it off the ground! The funds will be used to hit help hit the MOQ.

Our goal with Rebella is to raise $2,000 so we can continue creating unique designs at an affordable price. Thank you for your support. Thank you for your belief in our creativity and passion. 

For $39, super early birds get a super gorgeous bracelet watch and a free gift- a smart watch/pedometer/sleep monitoring gadget ($80 value). Yes! It is the reward for being the first to support our vision and back our project. Thanks!

Hurry as there are only 5 available.


Smart Watch*- The smart watch in the perks is quipped with Bluetooth 4.0 and running Android 4.3 or later, and iOS7.0 or later. It has the following features:     Fitness Tracker: Tracks steps, distance, calories burned, progress towards set goals, etc 

Sleep Monitoring:From how long and how well to how deep or light the sleep was. 

Smart Alarm: Wakes you (and not your partner) with a silent alarm and triggers important reminders ( time to take pill, time to exercise,etc). 

Calculates the calories you burn throughout the day

Syncs wirelessly and automatically with your devices (computer, smartphone, or tablet) so that you can view your custom dashboard online or while you move

Comes with multiple device Language settings: English, Spanish, Deutsch, Russian, Hebrew and Chinese.

*Reward brand may be different from the one indicated in the image above

You get one year warranty on any Rebella watch pre-ordered through indiegogo.

The Impact

A part of the money from this project goes to Save the Children International (or a member organization). “Save the Children invests in childhood-every day, in times of crisis and for our future. Around the world, we give children a healthy start, the opportunity to learn and protection from harm. ”-Savethechildren.org

Risks & Challenges

Like all projects that take products from an idea to production there are risks, how-ever, I hope to have reduced these as the fundamentals of this project are already resolved with manufacturing already sourced from multiple manufacturers and quality confirmed - there should be no delivery delays or additional costs. I will be posting regular updates to keep everyone informed on the progress!

We would like to thank every backer for their contribution and assistance towards the realization of this project. For contributors and those who could not contribute at this time, please help spread the word by sharing our project on Facebook and Twitter- we appreciate every help!

Refer as many friends as you can-Share the campaign on Facebook /Twitter and get a free limited-edition Rebella bracelet watch and a free smart watch (as above) as follows:

-When the contributions of everyone you referred total at least $500, you get a free Rebella bracelet watch (yes everything is tracked)

-When the contributions of everyone you referred total at least $1500, you get a free Rebella bracelet watch and a smart watch to go! (yes everything is tracked).

This is super easy if you have a good network of friends on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram and other social media. Thank you for sharing our campaign.

For questions, support or anything else about Rebella, please reach us by email: rebella.team@gmail.com

story:
“ Dress up your earphones “

Spruce up those everyday boring earphones to match your unique style.

Tuby spruces up your everyday earphones in a variety of colors with its luminous (phosphorescent) styling allowing you make a statement about you. It’s tubular construction prevents those annoying tangles you get when you put your earphones in your pocket or bag. 

       Spruce up those everyday boring earphones to match your unique style.

Tuby wasn’t designed to simply dress up your earphones. When we put our earphones away into our pocket or bag, they tend to get tangled, which can lead to damage. We’ve all seen that before. When our earphones start to tear or fray, it’s because of the constant folding and bending that goes on.


Tuby’s phosphorescent construction also allows you to see them in the dark. Show off your fashion whether it’s day or night. 

Also, silicone was chosen to prevent tangling when putting your earphones into your pocket or bag. 

You can even use Tuby to wrap up your charge cables to be visible in the dark. This will also help prevent tearing or fraying as well and keep your cables like new. 


You can cut, tie, wind-up the 70 cm provided Tuby however you like. The lengths can cover the entire earphone, but can also be cut and mix and matched in a huge variety of colors to match your style.

Tuby is constructed from silicone. 

Tuby’s raindrop design allows for easy insertion and removal of your earphone as well as nice 0.1 mm gap between your earphones and the raindrop edge so your earphones won’t be too constricted when inserted into Tuby. Also, silicone was chosen to prevent tangling when putting your earphones into your pocket or bag. 


Choose your length to match your earphones.

Once you set the length, simply wrap up your earphones

With this simple, yet innovative design, make your earphones into a fashion item. 
Change up your Tuby style daily to match your mood. 
Mix and match colors to your liking and make a statement about you. 


Hi,

I'm zioon, the founders of Zioon and the creators of TUBY. 

Through Indiegogo, we're offering 8 color choices for you to choose from. In the future, we plan to provide additional color selections and more features for our products.

Indiegogo Users, please support us !

story:
Conceptual Fashion Flim by Eva.E.Zahar for Adam Liew - The Fashion Artisan

La Vie En Rose, the #newMaxiCollection expresses elements of Empowering Women: confidence, elegance and passion for life.

 

When I started Adam Liew, I only had one goal in mind - to help our clients find the perfect fit.

 

A QUICK INTRODUCTION of myself

Fashion to me is like architecture, but built on a human body instead of the ground up. It takes a lot of understanding to be able to design and make a garment that fits, accentuates and looks good on a human body.

As an independent startup and a one-man show, sustaining a fashion label is no easy feat. But fashion is my one true calling and this is why I am here.

In 2013, I gave up my high-paying job in a 4A advertising firm and travelled to Melbourne, Australia to study fashion design and to learn good craftsmanship. My years of training gave me a strong understanding on how to make a garment that fits, accentuates and looks good on a human body.

Features on International Media

 Promo Magazine, New York

Let’s Travel Magazine, Singapore

The Sun Daily (Malaysia), Media Strike Back (Australia), V Buzz (Astro Malaysia)

 

My design philosophy is based on the versatility and practicality of a woman's lifestyle as she puts on different hats everyday; mother, daughter, friend, wife, sister, career-woman, housewife, etc. Every occasion requires an outfit that matches her emotions - “Because you are beautiful.”

 

With this intention in mind, I am asking for a helping hand in expanding my 4th collection, ‘La Vie En Rose’ into a 12-design capsule collection and to fulfill clients’ orders. 

 

This collection is a declaration of women’s independence, passion, sensuality and empowerment.

This pre-launch features 5 designs and are available in 5 different colours; red, green, navy blue, black and mint green with sizes ranging from UK 6 to UK 18. The special features of this range are :-

  • Easy to wear (Slip-on)
  • Wrinkle-free

Available in different sizes from UK6, up to UK18 (in selected designs)

This design is for the woman who is on a never-ending pursuit of passion - this long alabaster red dress captures both the essence of elegance and empowerment. It is especially designed for those who fully embrace the joys in life.

Available sizes :  UK 6, UK 8, UK 10 & UK 12

  • Fasten Invisible Zipper
  • Japanese Peach Koshibo

For the woman who seeks excitement and adventure; this versatile short dress encapsulates her drive to achieve all that she desires. 
Available sizes : UK 6, UK 8, UK 10 & UK 12

  • Slip on
  • Japanese Peach Koshibo

This one is for a woman who carries herself with modest elegance - the marble black short dress allows her to exude a light touch of sweetness yet embraces her natural curves.

Available sizes : UK 6, UK 8, UK 10, UK 12, UK 14, UK 16 & UK 18

  • Slip on
  • Japanese Peach Koshibo

 

Epitomising whimsical grace and elegance, this green flowy, strappy dress is perfect for women who celebrate all of life’s little pleasures. 

Available sizes : UK 6, UK 8, UK 10 & UK 12

  • Fasten Invisible Zipper
  • Japanese Peach Koshibo
  • Georgette Chiffon

 

For the woman with a love for pure, innocent romance, this mint green creation accentuates her curves and transforms her into a real-life princess.

Available sizes : UK 6, UK 8, UK 10 & UK 12

  • Slip on
  • Japanese Peach Koshibo
  • Georgette Chiffon

The self-fabric selected for this collection:

Japanese Peach Koshibo

The Adam Liew Loyalty Card 

Be a member of Adam Liew and receive exclusive perks:

  • A 10% discount on future purchases, only applicable at www.adamliew.com
  • Exclusive invitations for online private viewings of every new collection 
  • Exclusive invitations to every new collection's fashion parade

The Design Process

At Adam Liew, we help our clients find the perfect fit.

Our production method is very strict and very precise. I work from my atelier, surrounded by mood boards, paper patterns,  inspiration boards and constant research.

I start my design process with these factors in mind :  

  1. How to make women look good on every occasion.
  2. How to accentuate their body shape.
  3. What type of user-friendly fabric that will fit each design.

Garment-making is a very romantic and technical process :

  1. We start by putting together an inspiration/mood board.

     2. And then we start the sketching process.

    3. Then we proceed to do our fabric research.

    4. We then move on to the pattern-making.

    5. Cutting the fabric is a meticulous process.

     6. Then we proceed to the draping process on a mannequin, which is very important because it allows us to make sure that the fit is perfect.

     7. Finally, we sew the fabric together to finish.

Size Chart (sizes indicated are in UK measurements)

 
   

Timeline To Deliver the Fashion Collection

The ‘La Vie En Rose’ designs have been crafted in final production samples and I am ready to take the next step of committing to fabric purchase and placing production orders.

Once the project is fully funded, the production process of cutting, sewing, packing and delivery to your doorstep will be achieved within 50 days. 

I do not foresee any delays, however I will keep you updated if there is any change to the expected delivery date.
story_txt:
Conceptual Fashion Flim by Eva.E.Zahar for Adam Liew - The Fashion ArtisanLa Vie En Rose, the #newMaxiCollection expresses elements of Empowering Women: confidence, elegance and passion for life.

 
When I started Adam Liew, I only had one goal in mind - to help our clients find the perfect fit.
 
A QUICK INTRODUCTION of myselfFashion to me is like architecture, but built on a human body instead of the ground up. It takes a lot of understanding to be able to design and make a garment that fits, accentuates and looks good on a human body.As an independent startup and a one-man show, sustaining a fashion label is no easy feat. But fashion is my one true calling and this is why I am here.In 2013, I gave up my high-paying job in a 4A advertising firm and travelled to Melbourne, Australia to study fashion design and to learn good craftsmanship. My years of training gave me a strong understanding on how to make a garment that fits, accentuates and looks good on a human body.Features on International Media Promo Magazine, New YorkLet’s Travel Magazine, SingaporeThe Sun Daily (Malaysia), Media Strike Back (Australia), V Buzz (Astro Malaysia) My design philosophy is based on the versatility and practicality of a woman's lifestyle as she puts on different hats everyday; mother, daughter, friend, wife, sister, career-woman, housewife, etc. Every occasion requires an outfit that matches her emotions - “Because you are beautiful.” With this intention in mind, I am asking for a helping hand in expanding my 4th collection, ‘La Vie En Rose’ into a 12-design capsule collection and to fulfill clients’ orders.  This collection is a declaration of women’s independence, passion, sensuality and empowerment.This pre-launch features 5 designs and are available in 5 different colours; red, green, navy blue, black and mint green with sizes ranging from UK 6 to UK 18. The special features of this range are :-
Easy to wear (Slip-on)
Wrinkle-free
Available in different sizes from UK6, up to UK18 (in selected designs)This design is for the woman who is on a never-ending pursuit of passion - this long alabaster red dress captures both the essence of elegance and empowerment. story:
Por qué una Escuela Virtual de Zapatería Artística?


Resumen:

Hace 15 años me independizé del consumo del zapato desechable. Decidí construir una marca de Diseño que fuera Diferente, Original y Verdadera.

Desarrollé un innovador proceso asistido por computadora e inventé técnicas avanzadas de personalización artística. Uso materiales de primera calidad y tengo la habilidad de transformarlos en un calzado artístico liviano, confortable y duradero.


Origen de la Marca:

Zawate es un homónimo estilizado de la palabra costarricense 'Saguate o Zaguate' que significa "perro callejero sin pedigrí". Los perros callejeros, como ustedes saben, tienden a mezclarse entre ellos, y de cada combinación nacen diferentes variaciones al igual que nuestros zapatos: por eso son únicos, originales y diferentes. Baso mi trabajo en 3 ejes fundamentales: la Belleza, el Confort y la Calidad. 

Cada uno de nuestros diseños equivalen en promedio a 12 pares de zapatos desechables. El tiempo de vida varía de 3 - 5 años dependiendo del cuido y mantenimiento.

Como Artista Independiente aprendí desde joven a trabajar solo y con muy poco dinero. Con el tiempo adquirí experiencia y diseñé un sistema de trabajo que me permitió ahorrar e invertir, multiplicándo de esta manera mis recursos. Fundé un Studio de Arte Profesional y lancé mi marca a nivel nacional. Desde entonces he creado más de 1000 ejemplares.

Debido al creciente aumento en la demanda de mi producto, necesito abrir una Escuela Virtual de Zapatería Artística que me ayude a formar y capacitar nuevos colaboradores. El objetivo es generar nuevas fuentes de trabajo que me ayuden a satisfacer la demanda mundial del calzado artístico personalizado.



Lo que necesitamos y lo que obtienes

Necesitamos recolectar $9.000.

Con este dinero cubriremos con los costos de producción de las recompensas y la producción general de la Escuela Virtual de Zapatería Artística.

Puedes colaborar de dos maneras:

1 º  Puedes aportar una pequeña contribución de $2, $5 y $10. Esto nos ayuda mucho a motivar a otras personas y nos permite acercarnos un poco más a la meta.

2º Puedes adquirir alguno de nuestros diseños exclusivos - Edición Especial 15 Aniversario. De esta manera no solamente nos ayudas a financiar nuestra Escuela de Arte sino que además puedes adornar tus pies con estos, tus nuevos asombrosos Zawates PeRsoNaLiZaDoS de Lujo.

$40 ZawaBolso Xpress (Puedes elegir el diseño de la Tela)

$70 Elije uno de estos modelos y personalízalo:

$130 / $150 Te diseñaremos unas hermosas Luxury Boots a tu gusto y medida y te enviaremos un link con fotos del proceso


El impacto

1. 1. Gracias a tu aporte económico desarrollaremos nuestra Primera Colección Internacional proyectando nuestra marca alrededor del mundo.

2. Juntos Construiremos una Escuela Virtual de Zapatería Artística para formar nuevos talentos artísticos y mejorar nuestos tiempos de producción.

3. Podrás hacerte de uno de nuestros diseños y unirte a nuestra Gran Familia Zawate.


Riesgos y desafíos

Todos nuestros productos son Hechos a Mano. Una vez que obtengamos los recursos, haremos todo lo posible por cumplir rigurosamente nuestro cronograma de trabajo, sin embargo, no descartamos que puedan ocurrir atrasos en el proceso productivo de las recompensas, esto, para garantizar que tus zapatos sean los mejores del mundo y cuenten con todas las Garantías Zawate.

Así que en caso de que nos atrasemos con tu envío (lo cual, como ya te dijimos anteriormente, trataremos de evitar), sólo te suplicamos un poco de paciencia. Si esto ocurre, nos comprometemos en  comunicarnos contigo para darte una fecha final de entrega en un plazo de tiempo razonable.

Otras formas en las que puedes ayudar

Entendemos que quizás no puedas colaborar en estos momentos, pero eso no impide que nos puedas ayudarnos a crecer.

Ayúdanos a difundir nuestro proyecto! Pégalo en tu muro. Quizás algunos de tus amigos quieran beneficiarse de nuestra marca naciendo así un nuevo Zawate en el Mundo.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Why a Virtual School of Artistic Shoemaking?


Summary:

15 years ago I independized myself from disposable shoes. I decided to build a  different, original and true Brand.

I developed an innovative computer-helped process and invented advanced techniques of artistic customization. I only buy top quality raw materials and have the ability to transform them into a lightweight, comfortable and durable Artistic Footwear.

Origins of the Brand

Zawate is a stylized homonym of the Costa Rican word 'Saguate or Zaguate' which means "stray dog with no pedigree". Stray dogs, as you know, tend to blend between them, and each combination produces different variations like our shoes do: uniques, originals, so differents... I base my work on 3 key areas: Beauty, Comfort and Quality.

Each one of our designs replaces average 12 pairs of disposable shoes. The lifetime varies from 3-5 years depending on care and maintenance.

As Independent Artist learned from young to work alone and almost with no money. Over time I gained experience and designed a work system that allowed me to save and invest, thus multiplying my resources. I started a Professional Art Studio and launched my Brand "Zawate" in Costa Rica. Since then, I have created and sold more than 1,000 pairs.

Due to increasing demand for my product, I need to open an Virtual School of Artistic Shoemaking to help me educate and train new collaborators. The aim is to generate new jobs to help me produce the global demand of Custom Artistic Shoes.



What We Need and What You Get!

We need to raise $ 9,000. This money will cover the production costs of the rewards and the general production of the Virtual School of Artistic Shoemaking.

You can support our project in two ways:

1st  You can make a small contribution $ 2, $ 5 and $ 10. This helps us a lot to motivate others crowdfunders and help us get closer to the main goal.

2nd You can purchase any of our Exclusive 15th Anniversary Special Edition Items. This not only helps you us finance our School of Art but also you can decorate and protect your feet with these, your new Fancy CuStoM Luxury Zawates!

$ 40 ZawaBolso Xpress (You can choose the fabric design)

$70 Custom your Standart Zawate

$130 / $150 We'll make you one pair of our Luxury Boots and we'll send you an exclusive link with photos of the artistic proccess.



The Impact

1. With your economic contribution we'll develop our First International Collection projecting our brand around the world.

2. Together we will build a Virtual School of Artistic Shoemaking to educate new artistic talent and improve our production times.

3. You can Get some art from us and join Zawate's Family.


Risks and Callenges

All our products are handmaded. Once we have the money, we`ll do everything possible to rigorously deliver on time, however, some delays can occur in the production process of the rewards, this, to ensure that your shoes are the best in the world and have all Zawate Qualities.

So if We delays with your submission (which, as I noted earlier, We'll try to avoid), we ask you to be patient. In this case, we promise to contact and give you a final delivery date within a reasonable time.


Another ways you can help

3. PWe understand that you may not be able to donate right now, but anyway you can help us to grow.

Share this project in your Facebook Wall. Perhaps some of your friends wants to create its brand new fancy Artistic Shoes

story:
Over the ages, we have never seen  Class getting out of style. We at believe lifestyle make sure that the products we make are intuitive. Unlike any other brand, we add value and style to our product.

Believe Lifestyle is a clothing startup that makes garments that are functional, sustainable and looks great at the same time.

The t-shirts and denim are engineered to make life easier and making the person who wears them look good every day.

The extra-long Supima fiber produces a yarn that's extremely soft and breathable. It is highly resistant to breaking, which makes it twice as strong as regular cotton.

 

 

  • Supima is inherently softer and more luxurious due to its extra-long staple fiber. The length of the fiber makes for a smoother surface and produces a softer fabric that resists pilling. This means that your products will feel sumptuously soft and only get softer as time passes.

  • Supima is twice as strong as regular cotton, which makes for extraordinarily resilient products. The longer fiber resists pilling, breaking and tearing resulting in fashion and home products that are incredibly resilient and keep their form for a longer-lasting product.

  • Silver interrupts the bacteria cell’s ability to form the chemical bonds essential to its survival. These bonds produce the cell’s physical structure so when bacteria meets silver it literally falls apart. 

 

 

  • Silver fabric is helpful for reducing antibacterial effects on clothing and fashion accessories.

  • Unlike some other metals with antimicrobial properties, Siver is not toxic to humans. Silver nanoparticles have been used to impart antimicrobial activity to cotton fibers.

 

Our product is the perfect combination of style and performance

We have collected data of more than 20000 male body sizes ensuring the perfect fit. T-shirts have been designed precisely to add style to your wardrobe. We have ensured that the t-shirts and denims don't lose their fit even after repeated use therefore adding durability to our product.

 

 T-shirts have been designed precisely to add style to your wardrobe.

 

 

Our t-shirts and Jeans don't lose their original fit even after rusty use.

Every Size is individually designed to achieve a great fit.

 

 

When looking for the best pair of jeans to buy, it is important to focus on the fit and quality. With regard to fit, we want to find something that is comfortable but not too loose, and most importantly, something we feel confident in. We have collected data from around 20000 people via online surveys and finally engineered our apparels for that perfect fit. Because what fits great looks great.

  • All cotton used in the production of Believe Jeans is 100% organic. 

  • Our Jeans will last as long as you are willing to take care of it. We mean, wear and wash with consideration, and mend it when required.

 

 

Conventional cotton production has a series of social and economic risks, especially for small farmers in developing countries.

 

Cotton is only grown on 2.5% of the world’s agricultural land, it consumes 16% of all the insecticides and 6,8% of all herbicides used worldwide. Many small farmers die due to a lack of adequate equipment and knowledge about how to handle pesticides properly.

  

 

Cotton farmers across the world face severe problems. We at Believe Lifestyle have pledged to donate 2% of our profit out of every product we sell, helping to eradicate their problems to some extent.

Every dollar you donate helps us to establish us as a brand and help us in our social cause. So every dollar you donate counts.

story:
Why I do what I do

I want to tell my story. My name is Julia and I'm a designer from Russia. I have experience in a large industrial sewing company. Companie productions are in Russia. After working there for 6 months I started geting sick very often.  In 6 months I wased diagnosed wit bronchial asthma.
This sickness is sensitive lung. I personaly belive that this was body reaction on contamination of the surrounding space. While working there, I saw a huge amount of garbage and paper, which was thrown out daily. I was realy shocked when i realized how much damage they brings to our world.

After leaving, I worked in my own studio, where I sorted the trash. The more I studied the problem, the more I was horrified by the global harm of the garment industry and the fast fashion in our world.

 

Why you should support me

Clothes I have designed are based on two main principles: sustainability and modern design. In the process of creating a product, I take responsibility for:

  • High standard of production
  • Ethical workshops
  • Fair wages
  • Saving the World from garbage dumps 

 I dream about the day when unethical system will break, thanks to people's awareness.
Everything in the world is interconnected. If we only think about the material benefit from selling cheap low-quality products, the world is waiting for a global catastrophe.


I want to create my ethical production in the south of Russia, because there is unemployment problem.

The funds I want to collect will be spent:

  • purchase of some sewing equipment
  • store organization
  • making my  website global
  • team payment

story:
About Us

We are a team of medical students studying in the College of Medicine, University of Lagos, Nigeria. We have always been lovers of ideas that would help make life easier for the common masses and we try to innovate new ideas to help us all work and live better.

About This Campaign

After watching people with leg deformities and disabilities struggle with shoes they wear due to the heavy weight, laces that were not easy for them to tie, or the rigidity of the soles that make walking difficult, we decided to make a shoe that helps not only the disabled, but everyone that wears a shoe be more productive.

We are excited to let everyone out there try out our ultra light, ultra flexible slip-on shoes.

Our dream is to provide 7 billion people with an Aux Fit shoe, starting with you! We would very much love you to be behind this dream of ours.

What We Need & What You Get

We plan to use 10 - 30% of profit from sales of AUX FIT shoes sold to send a kid with disability to school, and also help provide their schools with standard dormitory facilities.

We need a total of $115,000 to manufacture, and warehouse these shoes.

$81,000 goes into;

  • Manufacturing the shoes.
  • Material procurement.
  • Labor fees.

Printing of the material is outsourced and the shoes are sewn together by professional shoe makers and quality control is carried out severally in-house. 

Buying an Aux Fit helps us donate a profit percentage to helping kids with disabilities study an study in a good environment.

What to expect

Aux Fit shoes come in 3 unique colors with the same pattern design inspired by the Nigerian Super Eagle's world cup Home jersey. The 3 different colors have a unique and deep meaning to them.

  • The RED - This is a tribute to lives lost to terrorism in Africa and the world as a whole.
  • The GREEN - This represents the beauty of the earth, a beauty to support going green and conserving mother nature.
  • The BLACK - This represents courage and confidence and universal acceptability.

10% of sales profit of the BLACK AND GREEN AUX FIT helps kids with disabilities study in school while 30% of sales profit from sales of the RED AUX FIT goes into helping kids with disabilities study in a better environment.

In the event that we do not meet up with our campaign goal

We will supply all perks funded, use 30% of the funds left to renovate the dormitories of as many schools for disabled kids as we can, the remaining fund will be used to manufacture AUX FIT shoes and sold via other platforms in order to grow the company.

The Impact

Backing our campaign will not only help us as entrepreneurs to realize ur dreams, but, it will also help a disabled kid out there struggling to feed or have an education that suits them get a decent education in a decent schooling environment. You backing would help these kids enjoy schooling without stigmatization along side people that love them for who they are.

An AUX FIT for you because?

  • It is very light weight.
  • No feet sore.
  • Takes 2 seconds to put on.
  • A perfect fit, no slip-off
  • You can wear it to the gym.
  • You can wear it in the office.
  • It is comfy.
  • Has a sole that can handle any terrain.
  • Keeps your feet warm.
  • Can be worn at the beach.
  • Looks good when worn with a loved one.

Risks & Challenges

Due to the trust issues which arise from dealing with African brands, it might be a bit difficult to get the word out in order to achieve the aim of providing everyone with an Aux Fit.

We promise to be as transparent as we can in all our manufacturing and distribution processes. 

In order to aid transparency, we will send updates regularly to all our backers and keep everyone updated on the day to day activities that occur during production.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Help us get the word out and make some noise about this campaign, use the Indiegogo share tools to help us get the word out faster and easily.

story:
"My current travel beauty obsession - an amazingly compact makeup bag that I’m in love with!"

15 Minute Beauty

"If you need the perfect travel makeup bag, badass Nicki Chestnut created it! Get yours!"

Kaitlin Olson, Actor

"PERFECT for weekend getaways! The Getaway Makeup Clutch is completely hassle free."

Lauren Dimet Waters, Fountain of 30

"The perfect makeup clutch for wanderlusts like me. Designed for traveling with cosmetics, and it’s gorgeous!"

Hannah Simone, Actor/Host

"I highly recommend for anyone who travels - if I could give every woman one I would!"

Prime Beauty Blog

 

What is the Getaway Makeup Clutch?

The Getaway makeup clutch is the first and only product to help you bring smaller amounts of your makeup on the go! Essentially, its a kit with all the tools necessary to divide up cosmetics, which makes it easier to travel with. Why bring a full tube of foundation or your full-sized brushes when you don't have to?

I designed the Getaway makeup clutch because I wanted to keep a separate makeup bag for work or travel but couldn’t afford to buy 2 of everything! After noticing so many people carrying their makeup bags in very messy, overstuffed bags, I realized what I wanted to design was a bag with a better layout and to maximize the space available. How did I propose to do that? By using travel sized versions of items, you can fit even more makeup, which was a win in my book!

What comes in the Getaway Makeup Clutch?

The Getaway Makeup Clutch includes these items, in turn saving  you a ton of space since you no longer need to bring full sizes along:

  • Five travel brushes*
  • Three mini tubes (empty)
  • Mini powder shaker (empty)
  • Travel eyelash curler
  • Deep side pocket
  • Removable snap-in clear pouch

* Of the five travel brushes, three are double-ended. ** The deep side pocket provides plenty of space for storing small palettes, mascara, liners, lipsticks, etc.

How big is the Getaway Makeup Clutch?

6.5inches by 6.5inches, and 2 inches deep when closed. This is the size of a 32 disk CD wallet, which really is the perfect size for throwing in your purse or tote bag!

What can I fit in the Getaway Makeup Clutch?

Way more than you think! Because you are saving so much room without those clunky full sized (brushes, lash curler, tubes, and powder containers), you can fit even more of  your favorite liners, small palettes, lipsticks, etc. People always comment how surprised they are at how much it actually fits for how small it is.

When will I receive my Getaway Makeup Clutch?

In August 2018. I KNOW that seems so far away, but it takes time to be on the cutting edge of beauty! It takes about 3-4 months to produce the quantity we have to order in (5,000). Only with your pre-orders can we make this happen or you will be stuck using your same old regular makeup bag with absolutely no bells and whistles!

What are the tubes for?

Unlike currently available empty tubes at drug stores and such, these are appropriately sized for cosmetics. They are for products with a liquid-cream consistency, such as sunscreens, foundations, moisturizers, liquid concealers, etc. 

What CAN’T be put in the tubes?

Anything that is a straight-up liquid, such as toners, eye drops, liquid foundations etc. Typically as a rule, anything that comes itself in a tube can be transferred to the Getaway mini tubes!

Do I have to use the tubes?

NO! You can customize the Getaway Makeup Clutch to suit your needs.

How do I work this travel eyelash curler?

There is a little plastic lever that pops out on the bottom, voila! You can find it by running your finger alongside the bottom and it will open right up.

What do I do with the little salt shaker jar?

Good question! It is our Getaway powder shaker, Its for your loose powder. After unscrewing the top, pry off the sifter lid, and then fill as much as you want with any type of loose powder, that includes eyeshadows, talc powder, or setting powders!

What if I don’t use loose powder? Can I use the Getaway Powder Shaker for something else?

Yes! If you don’t use loose powder in your routine, you can always use it for thicker cream makeups, such as stick blushes, stick concealers, stick foundations, or even chapstick. If using it for creams, then just leave the sifter lid off and screw the lid on. As with any cream makeups, be careful with heat exposure, it will melt and cause a mess!

 

When I first started this process the goal was to make the product for myself, as a career in Hollywood means wanting to look flawless (but not wanting to carry a giant bag of makeup around town!)  It became evident that the problem wasn't just my own.. most of the women we met either travel regularly or need touch ups on the go.

I've invested a considerable amount of personal funds in creating the perfect makeup bag, including trademarks, patents, and the huge process of finding sustainable and reliable manufacturers.

What this means is Routines en Route is now at the point where the production is reliant on numbers. In order to mass produce the clutch in an economical way, there needs to be a large quantity in order to get through the first run.

I'm confident our products will make your life easier, and would love for you to join us on this journey!

Please back our campaign today, and help launch the Getaway Makeup Clutch, a product designed with busy lives in mind!

story:
1) Quickly and Easily attach to your forearm


2) Use 1 or 2 for Push and Press Exercises

3) Lift Ergonomically and Safely 



  • Recovering from wrist surgery and anxious to get back into the gym sooner than expected (Talk with a medical professional)
  • Previously broke wrist(s) that never fully recovered
  • Weak wrist(s) that prevent you from pushing or pressing more weight
  • New to lifting weights and want to learn to press ergonomically
  • Everyday lifter that wants to prevent possible wrist injury

Essentially, what we did was take the risk, tension, and stress away from the wrist joint to make press and push weight lifting exercises safe and effective for anyone. The combination of durable material and ergonomic design make WristSpotter the ideal solution for weightlifters at any skill level.



"WristSpotter allows patients with a history of a wrist injury to perform standard gym lifts. It shifts the force that would be placed on the wrist joint to the brace."
- Ethan Jordt, Doctor of Physical Therapy

"WristSpotter allows me to maximize my time lifting by being able to to isolate my muscles during press exercises." 
- Derek Noble, Competitive Bodybuilder

"Benchpressing was out of the question according to my doctors, but after he recommended WristSpotter, I could lift without putting pressure on the affected area." 
- Bonnie Kulinski, Recovering Post Wrist Surgery

"I would recommend WristSpotter to weight lifters who struggle with proper form on press movements." 
- Staff Sergeant Ramirez, Competitive Bodybuilder





Since June of 2013, co-founders Alex and Steven have taken WristSpotter from concept to reality by working with CAD technicians and 3-D printing companies. With feedback from over 35 weightlifters, the team developed 20+ prototypes before landing on a final design. Now we need your help to make WristSpotter available for everyone.

Our strong ties with the bodybuilding, weightlifting, and physical therapy communities have given us extensive access to lifters and injured athletes who are all willing to support WristSpotter. Why? Because wrist injuries in these communities are so prevalent and can tragically prevent athletes from getting back on the bench.

This is where we need your help. In order to press forward with industrial production, WristSpotter requires startup funding. We need to pay for molds, materials, minimum orders on parts, strength testing, and shipping costs. This accounts for $30k, the smallest budget we believe is necessary to make WristSpotter a reality. Starting at $25 per unit, WristSpotter will be competitively priced with other wrist injury prevention devices on the market.

But that’s not all. We’re putting the project in the hands of the Indiegogo community because it is the best way to be directly in touch with the users of our product and build this together. If we reach our goal it’ll mean that there is a real need for WristSpotter and you’ll be the signal for that. Thanks in advance for your support.









Risks & Challenges

Every new product project has risks and challenges…

Before starting this Indiegogo campaign, the WristSpotter team spent a large amount of TIME and MONEY on prior research, patents and intellectual property, prototypes, field testing, and start-up stage presentations and marketing to gyms and fitness professionals - all of that is the riskiest part of the project, and we felt that we needed to take that risk ourselves.

As we move towards production and manufacturing, our main challenges are quality assurance and quality control of the final design and integration, marketing, and parts deliveries.

We are confident in our design and the performance benefits that WristSpotter offers. To deliver a premium product, it is sometimes necessary to spend extra time fine-tuning drawing designs, refining processes, or adjusting key strength functioning tolerances.

We are working with testing firms and manufacturers who have years of experience in their respective areas to make sure the material capability and structural integrity of the design is comprehensive.

Testing new design tweaks and materials will sometimes incur longer lead times. We have excellent relationships with these companies and are coordinating closely with them almost every day to ensure that parts arrive ON TIME and with 100% QUALITY.

We are extremely determined to get your WristSpotter devices off the assembly line and onto your hands! However, you will be the first to know if we run into any unexpected delays or backups.



Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Please get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!

Thank you for your support.

Use the Indiegogo share tools!


Thank you for your support.

story:
Lon Chaney “Phantom Of The Opera” Bandanna.

This campaign endeavors to fund a limited production of 22 inch by 22 inch bandannas with Lon Chaney, one of the greatest actors in cinema, as The Phantom of the Opera, his most famous role.

The width of The Phantom's face and eye distance matches the size of that of the average person's face.  When folded in half and worn it replaces the bottom half of one's countenance with Chaney's Phantom of the Opera.

Designed to be worn over a CDC face mask or other bandannas.  Or wear it as a neck gaiter, beanie, pirate rag, sweat band, head band, and more!

If funded, the one sided bandannas will be custom printed in the USA.  The fabric is the easier to clean, non-shrinking polyester and printed with dye sublimation technology, which uses heat to bond the image to the fabric.  The image and fabric stand up to multiple washings.

The proof sample arrived in December and has been worn in public and hand washed multiple times since.  The printing is high quality, durable and attracts attention.

The Campaign

My name is Darren Nemeth and I've run a number of successful crowdfunders.

How To Film Moving Pictures in the 1910's, a book which was funded on Kickstarter successfully in early 2018.

1907 Chicago Projecting Co.'s Entertainer's Supplies Catalog No. 122; Deluxe Edition printed in 2015.

The Great Express Robbery, a reprint of the 1907 pulp novel funded through Kickstarter in June, 2019.

Four Dime Novels From The Old Sleuth funded on Kickstarter in August, 2019.

Lon Chaney - Outside The Law" (1920), a crime novel funded in October 2019.

The House of Mystery (1905) funded on February 10, 2020.

"Fritz To The Front" (1881) and "Dick Turpin" (1904) a crime novel (with movie legend Lon Chaney on the cover!) and a British reader in it's original comic book sized format.  Funded at Kickstarter on April 27, 2020.

RANSOM! The Story of a Lost Child; Intimate Chapters of a Film Star's Life volume one of a lost pulp trash odyssey. Partially funded here at Indiegogo in November 2020.

Funding

The backing goal covers all production costs for the proofs, the limited custom print run, Indigogo's fee and payment processing fee, taxes, shipping materials, and UPS shipping from Printology's facility on the west coast.  The number of bandannas produced depends on the amount of funds raised.  The minimum goal we hope for is 100.

Risks & Challenges

Low risk.  The proofs are in my hands and if funded Printology, the Californian company charged with producing this limited run, is ready to go.  All perks will ship in April if funded.
 

Help Fund This Campaign

Please help get the word out about this limited edition Phantom of the Opera bandanna by word of mouth!  Post the link to this campaign to your social media and relevant internet discussion groups!
story_txt:
Lon Chaney “Phantom Of The Opera” Bandanna.
This campaign endeavors to fund a limited production of 22 inch by 22 inch bandannas with Lon Chaney, one of the greatest actors in cinema, as The Phantom of the Opera, his most famous role.The width of The Phantom's face and eye distance matches the size of that of the average person's face.  When folded in half and worn it replaces the bottom half of one's countenance with Chaney's Phantom of the Opera.Designed to be worn over a CDC face mask or other bandannas.  Or wear it as a neck gaiter, beanie, pirate rag, sweat band, head band, and more!If funded, the one sided bandannas will be custom printed in the USA.  The fabric is the easier to clean, non-shrinking polyester and printed with dye sublimation technology, which uses heat to bond the image to the fabric.  The image and fabric stand up to multiple washings.The proof sample arrived in December and has been worn in public and hand washed multiple times since.  The printing is high quality, durable and attracts attention.
The Campaign
My name is Darren Nemeth and I've run a number of successful crowdfunders.
How To Film Moving Pictures in the 1910's, a book which was funded on Kickstarter successfully in early 2018.
1907 Chicago Projecting Co.'s Entertainer's Supplies Catalog No. 122; Deluxe Edition printed in 2015.
The Great Express Robbery, a reprint of the 1907 pulp novel funded through Kickstarter in June, 2019.
Four Dime Novels From The Old Sleuth funded on Kickstarter in August, 2019.
Lon Chaney - Outside The Law" (1920), a crime novel funded in October 2019.
The House of Mystery (1905) funded on February 10, 2020.
"Fritz To The Front" (1881) and "Dick Turpin" (1904) a crime novel (with movie legend Lon Chaney on the cover!) and a British reader in it's original comic book sized format.  Funded at Kickstarter on April 27, 2020.RANSOM! The Story of a Lost Child; Intimate Chapters of a Film Star's Life volume one of a lost pulp trash odyssey. Partially funded here at Indiegogo in November 2020.

Funding
The backing goal covers all production costs for the proofs, the limited custom print run, Indigogo's fee and payment processing fee, taxes, shipping materials, and UPS shipping from Printology's facility on the west coast.  The number of bandannas produced depends on the amount of funds raised.  The minimum goal we hope for is 100.

Risks & ChallengesLow risk.  The proofs are in my hands and if funded Printology, the Californian company charged with producing this limited run, is ready to go.  All perks will ship in April if funded. 
Help Fund This Campaign
Please help get the word out about this limited edition Phantom of the Opera bandanna by word of mouth!  Post the link to this campaign to your social media and relevant internet discussion groups!

story:
A cowhide briefcase in the US$60 range. Sounds too good to be true?

 

"Cowhide - Really?"

 

It’s true - it’s real cowhide however you look at it.

It’s the price that has made everyone baffled and suspicious. We’ve had customers buy our briefcases, chop them up and test them to see if we were lying, and then come back for repeat purchases. We’d hate to see any more of our bags go to waste like that, so we thought we might show you some cold, hard facts. All our leather has been certified genuine through KC certification by FITI Testing and Research Institute, even before the Electrical Appliances and Consumer Products Safety Control Act amendment made such certification necessary.

 

But aren't cow leather briefcases supposed to be extravagant, price-wise?

 

That’s true. Other cowhide briefcases out in the market cost anywhere between US$200 and US$3000. Sure, they use premium materials, but their prices drive most potential customers away.

● There are numerous uses for briefcases: college students need a way to carry around their laptops and books without making their back sweat.

● People just getting started at their first jobs want to look professional.

● Businessmen who have frequent meetings outside the office need a bag to carry around their personal belongings.

But most people can’t afford the higher-end briefcases on the market, and the more affordable alternatives tend to wear out quickly...

 

“Why can’t a cowhide briefcase be reasonably priced?”

 

Enter nTRES!

Extravagant quality without the exorbitant prices.

By this point, you’re asking yourself, 

“Why and how are these prices possible?”

The secret to providing a genuine leather product at this price point is all in the production and distribution process.

More than 14 years of know-how has allowed us to establish a production environment and designs optimized for large-scale manufacturing. This has helped to drastically reduce product costs. The scale of production - whether we produce 10 bags or 100 bags in a day - is a major determinant of product cost.

In addition, we place mass orders for the materials we use, allowing us to negotiate down prices further. Our products are released in containers, allowing for savings in logistics costs. We don’t advertise unnecessarily, and employ smart sales strategy to reduce distribution margin. All of that adds up to our startlingly low prices.

Of course, more important point is our sales strategy! 

We make less money per unit sold, but sell many units to make up for the small profits. If you thought we would sideline quality for the sake of volume, then you would be wrong. At nTRES, we're finicky about quality. Our goods are produced under strict supervision and management. ☺

Indiegogo is the perfect platform for harnessing our capabilities and strengths. We bet you’re still thinking 'these prices are too good to be true?!'. Well, you can keep thinking that. Because we will present you with better products at lower prices. Keep your eye on us.


 

“Surprised by our prices? 

It's too early to be surprised.

 Wait till you see our product.”
 

 

Let’s explore nTRES briefcases in more detail!

Search online and offline, and you'll find hundreds, even thousands of cowhide briefcases. Most of the established brands have cowhide briefcases as their products. You’d be spoilt for choice, if only the prices weren't so crazy. Forking over so much money for a briefcase, you'll go with a design you won’t get tired of easily, and colors that match with most of the clothes you own. Ultimately, most of us end up with a dull black or brown bag. And the things are so darned heavy, too! Put your laptop and documents inside, and your briefcase becomes a burden not only on your wallet but on your shoulder as well.

Our clothes get lighter in the summer. Our bags should do the same.

You’re lugging around your laptop in the heat of summer, and you can’t bear to stay outside without a cold beverage in your hand. Nothing like a hefty briefcase to weigh you down and make your day even more miserable.

 

nTRES briefcases are made with durable and lightweight materials to reduce weight, making them drastically lighter than any other cowhide briefcases on the market. Period. With our briefcases, the only thing weighing you down in the summer will be the heat.

 

nTRES briefcase in one hand, and your favorite cold beverage in the other, and you’re good to go.

 

So light for a cowhide briefcase!

 

The strap makes a huge difference too.

The strap is what connects your briefcase to your body. Normally, straps are made with nylon - but nTRES straps aren’t. Our straps are lined with leather strips on the outside, giving them a more luxurious look while also allowing for easy length adjustment without slippage. We’ve also added a leather shoulder pad for comfortable wearing and less shoulder fatigue.

 

What you get :

Briefcase

● With separated laptop pouch

● Smart inner pockets for your smartphone, pens, and keys

 

Clutch

● Smart inner pockets for your smartphone, pens, car keys etc

 If you like carrying around your wallet, fine. But you really won’t need to. Take a look at the photo below!

 

 

You know how things never seem to stay where you put them?

You can never find anything when you need it.

Spacious mobile phone pocket in which iPhone 11 Pro Max fits

 

nTRES briefcases feature smart, compartmentalized storage spaces for neat and systematic organization of your items. The detachable laptop case is the perfect size for storing documents as well.

Let's store our items securely.

Slots for your cards, a pocket for your smartphone, and holders for those pens that keep disappearing in your bag. All that, and a holder for the car keys you keep misplacing.

 

A large zipper pocket is also provided for safekeeping of valuables.

Say goodbye to those days when you had to practically empty out your bag to find anything!

 

“We respect everybody’s tastes.”

 

Seven colors to satisfy all tastes. 

nTRES briefcases come in seven different colors. No one-color-fits-all nonsense with us.

Choose the color that works best with you. Mustard? Orange? Conservative? We also have a basic black version.

* The image with the name of the color best represents the actual color.

* The photographs may differ in color from the actual product depending on the user’s monitor specs and brightness.
 


 

“They look good on anyone.”

 

The secret is in the details.

 

Conventional briefcases, with their sharp square corners, only pair well with formal attire. nTRES briefcases are intended to be formal yet casual at the same time, in order to match various styles. The design emphasis was placed on preserving the soft and smooth look of natural cowhide, while also giving our briefcases a proper posture.

 

The handles are designed to fit snugly in the palm and reduce fatigue, and a handle strap has been added to keep the handles from dangling when wearing the briefcase over your shoulder using the strap. A black nickel ornament has been added for extra   flair. The zipper pocket on the back of the bag is perfect for holding frequently used items.

 

A bag is only as good as its zippers. Nobody appreciates a broken zipper. nTRES bags use high-quality YKK zippers exclusively for more pleasant user experience.

 

YKK Zipper detail

 

Furthermore, our briefcases are equipped with double zippers for much easier use. 

 

Smooth opening and closing of zippers

 

And about our clutches,

The high quality of our briefcases carries over into our clutches. They come in all seven colors too!

 

Our clutches have also been made out of natural cowhide, and boast their compartments for smart storage. Don’t let the size fool you - you can fit more in there than you think! Large enough to comfortably fit your iPad, our clutches - like our briefcases - come with smart pockets and compartments for storage. Complete your style with our clutches - and leave everything else at home.


Cards, mobile phones, pens, car keys (or AirPods) can be neatly organized in the clutch.

iPad Pro fits perfectly in the clutch.

A standard size book fits in as well!

 

Card Wallets

* Reminder : You will receive more benefit if you make a contribution to a SET.

Just like the briefcases and clutches, our card wallets are natural cowhide products. They also come in 7 colors.

 

Card Wallet 001

This is our basic type card wallet. It includes 2 card slots and a pocket in the middle where such items like coins can be stored.

 

Card Wallet 001 - Orange

 

Card Wallet 002

You can use this card wallet type by hanging it on your bag. Have you ever thought it’s inconvenient to take your frequently used transportation card in and out of the bag all the time? Now hang them on the bag for convenient use!  

Card Wallet 002 - Orange

Card Wallet 002 - Orange

 

Match any style!

From casual to formal, our bags are a perfect match for your daily style!

 

Briefcase - Black

 

Briefcase - Navy, Briefcase - Orange

 

Briefcase - Green, Clutch - Green

 

Clutch - Brown

 

Briefcase - Orange, Clutch - Orange

 

Clutch - Green

 

Briefcase - Navy, Briefcase - Orange

 

Briefcase - Mustard

 

Briefcase - Green

 

Briefcase - Grey, Briefcase - Mustard

 

Briefcase - Brown

 

How they’re made :

One-stop production from planning to design, production, and release!!

Our team has been working together for more than 14 years. Given a simple sketch, they can produce exactly the samples you want on the spot. We try out the samples, fix what needs fixing and add various functions. If the end result works, then we move onto production.

 

While factories today are highly automated, bags are still a product that requires a large amount of manual labor.

Each member of our team takes responsibility for the part for which they are most skilled, and the individually crafted parts come together to complete the finished product. Perfection in the individual parts is essential.

 And that’s how we make our natural cowhide briefcases in the US$60 range. 



 

Materials & Sizes 

Upper : 100% cowhide
Lining : Synthetic leather 

 

Briefcase-Laptop pouch 

* fits up to 15-inch MacBook Pro    

* Some models may not fit; pouches may stretch with use due to the material’s properties.

 

Clutch 

* Fits up to 10.5-inch new-generation iPad


 

Perks :

This is a rare chance to get natural cowhide briefcases and clutches at these prices.

We have prepared various combinations so that you can have the experience on your own, as well as with your friends and colleagues. More people mean more benefit! 

This chance won't last forever, so don't miss it! 

 

* Note: The prices in US$ converted from HK$ may vary depending on the daily exchange rates.


 

Timeline

 

About the maker 

Hi there. Stella Jin here, Director of nTRES.

The n of nTRES stands for ‘novelty, not normal’, and TRES is the Spanish word for ‘three’.

nTRES is about a lifestyle oriented toward novelty, but also one which maintains normalcy at the same time : a coexistence of the novel and the normal.

We aim for a point between utility and design. That ideal point somewhere on the border between reasonable pricing and brand value.

That has been our holy grail in the 14 years of designing and producing leather bags.

No product satisfies everyone, and too often compromises lead to an end product we hardly recognize.

Under the new nTRES brand and outside the rigid rules and customs of the conventional market, in partnership with Indiegogo we hope to transform what doesn’t exist in the world into a reality. The aim is to produce goods that are deliberately designed yet still utilitarian. We want our products themselves - not our prices - to boost our brand value.

nTRES bags are practical and modern with immaculate design and detail, working well with all generations regardless of age or gender. Naturally we do this with impressive quality and pricing.

The Indiegogo platform and our strengths in practical design and mass production are sure to make for a truly impressive project. Come and join us!

Let’s go.

 

Return Policy

Indiegogo is an excellent funding platform where creative work and ideas can be offered at discounted prices. The raised fund allows fast production of products and therefore leads to the creation of products that satisfy the backers. If you receive a faulty product, you can contact us at ntres@naver.com any time.

 

Global Shipping

It is our pleasure to provide you with global shipping. When you make a contribution to this campaign, the shipping rate to your country will be shown on the check-out menu.

 

Logistics


We are familiar with mass production and delivery process. We will do our best to make sure that well-made products will reach our supporters as fast as possible. Based on our previous crowdfunding experience, we have made improvements where necessary and in practice decreased several options to ensure fast and accurate delivery. Therefore, this will lead to much faster and more accurate delivery of our products.

 

Risks and challenges

Our team has been designing and distributing leather products for over 14 years, as well as operating our own factory for mass production. Therefore, we are capable of producing our products for a large amount of orders. Depending on the designs, we can produce 100-500 units per day, and on average 10,000 units per month. As we fully understand the risks and challenges of the production process, we conduct strict testing of every product before its launch in the market. Unexpected issues may arise. However, as we raised US$ 333,000 with more than 8,000 supporters through the two encore fundraising campaigns on other foreign markets, we take pride in the fact that no problems related to claims, deliveries, etc. occurred. If any unexpected issues arise, we always consider customer satisfaction to be on the top of our priority list. We promise that we will process those issues through making clear communication, transparency, care and satisfaction of our backers a top priority.

story:
Specifications

We have ensured that our watches have high quality components. So every watch is encased in 316L surgical grade stainless steel, and comes with a Swiss-made quartz movement, sapphire crystal glass with anti-reflective coating, top quality Italian leather strap or Milanese mesh band, etc. See full spec below. 

 

Founders Edition 

Production & Order Fulfillment Timeline

2019 - estimated dates*

May/June: Begin manufacturing

June/July: Quality control

July: Ship to distribution facility

July/August: Ship to backers***

*** This is the estimated delivery date. There may be several factors which may cause delays. However, we will try to minimise this as much as possible! In the event that there are delays, we will inform you and keep you up to date with developments.

About the Founders

We’re two friends, Abdullah Ahmed and Harun Asif, based in London, and we started Miraj Collections in 2018. 

We conceived the idea for Miraj through our travels across the world, our common passion for design and a deep appreciation of the Islamic artistic tradition and cultural heritage.

We want to share this timeless tradition through watches and accessories, so it can be appreciated by everyone, every day. 

This is our first crowdfunding campaign. We are very excited and hope we can offer more fantastic pieces in the near future. We can't thank you all enough for your support!

 

Risks & Challenges

1. Delivery time: In manufacturing, there's always a risk that the component suppliers do not deliver on time. There's also the risk that issues may occur during manufacturing. So, we've added some buffer into our production and delivery timeline to account for this possibility. We will be extremely hands-on with our suppliers to ensure that everything is moving forward smoothly.

2. Customs: Some countries are known for being very slow with customs. So please bear with us while your shipment clears the customs process.

3. Duty/VAT charges: If you live outside of the UK, you may incur duty or VAT charges. As per usual, you will be responsible for any applicable charges.

We'll update you frequently about our progress, and if any issues occur along the way, we'll keep you informed!

Founders Edition 

Production & Order Fulfillment Timeline
2019 - estimated dates*
May/June: Begin manufacturing
June/July: Quality control
July: Ship to distribution facility
July/August: Ship to backers***
*** This is the estimated delivery date. There may be several factors which may cause delays. However, we will try to minimise this as much as possible! In the event that there are delays, we will inform you and keep you up to date with developments.
About the Founders


We’re two friends, Abdullah Ahmed and Harun Asif, based in London, and we started Miraj Collections in 2018. 
We conceived the idea for Miraj through our travels across the world, our common passion for design and a deep appreciation of the Islamic artistic tradition and cultural heritage.
We want to share this timeless tradition through watches and accessories, so it can be appreciated by everyone, every day. 
This is our first crowdfunding campaign. We are very excited and hope we can offer more fantastic pieces in the near future. We can't thank you all enough for your support!

 
Risks & Challenges
1. Delivery time: In manufacturing, there's always a risk that the component suppliers do not deliver on time. There's also the risk that issues may occur during manufacturing. So, we've added some buffer into our production and delivery timeline to account for this possibility. We will be extremely hands-on with our suppliers to ensure that everything is moving forward smoothly.
2. Customs: Some countries are known for being very slow with customs. So please bear with us while your shipment clears the customs process.
3. Duty/VAT charges: If you live outside of the UK, you may incur duty or VAT charges. As per usual, you will be responsible for any applicable charges.
We'll update you frequently about our progress, and if any issues occur along the way, we'll keep you informed!

story:
WHAT WE DID.
WE MADE IT AS PURE AS YOU ARE.

We have created with "The Handnaht Document Sleeve" a pure design and function oriented leather essential which accompanies you back to the original form of quality & pure product design. Just straightforward as purist as your grandfather was used to it.

Nowadays most of the leather goods of famous brands are produced in India, Pakistan or China. But we are different. We have given ourselves the promise to produce it back home, by hand, in lovely Switzerland  and guarantee that the old tradition of leather making can be conserved and brought forward to next generations.

LONG LIFE WARRANTY.
SAME WHAT YOUR GRANDFATHER IS USED TO.

As we are not making any compromises in quality, we can assure personally that each document sleeve will be handcrafted in Switzerland and will accompany you for a lifetime. Due to this fact we are proud to offer to all our handmade products an exclusive lifetime warranty. Again, same as your grandfather was used to.


DOES SIZE MATTERS?
YES IT DOES.

Most of the boring documents sleeves are either too large or too small. Our handcrafted guy is 34 cm large and 27cm wide and carries properly with enough air a wonderful 13 inch laptop, your tablet or any paper documents including plastic cover you want to carry to work or to any other place where it brings you. 

We know, your Handnaht Document sleeve will be your very personal item. But we love to share some more personal information to you.


HOW CAN WE SPOIL YOU EVEN MORE?
WE HAVE AN IDEA.

We have decided to spoil our backer community even more and deliver each ordered leather sleeve nicely packed into a 100% cotton bag. This recyclable cotton bag can be re-used on your travels as dirt bag for shoes, socks and underwear.

We all know that we are doing more or less pretty well in our daily lives and we don't have any fundamental worries like clear drinking water, urgent needed surgeries or starving for food.

As our profit is not our main motivation, we have decided to support 10% of each purchase to Watsi.org and their people in need around the globe.

story:
We need to do something to protect life.

Most of people carry bags when they go out, Would it be helpful if the bag that both can be used as bullet proof protection and bag? A bag that you can take to work , play ,and instantaneously transform as a bullet proof vest to protect the life when shooting happen. We couldnot find this kind of bag, specially the light and convenient bullet proof vest, so we create it, create series of bulletproof bags including messenger bag, backpack,briefcase,tote bag, clutch bags, wallet etc.

The RenAn Bullet Proof messenger bag is created for protect your life , 2 in 1 function. It can be directly used as bullet proof protection .meanwhile assembled to whole one bullet proof vest. moreover it’s one of  the most functional and large capacity messenger bag

The bag’s bullet proof plates(shields) made by above material which  have been passed the test of official and approved by government .

The bag has over 20 features that make it one of the most functional and large capacity messenger bag ever. It has a sleek minimalist design, and made of Original ballistic weave developed for military, strong weather-proof materials , exceptional abrasion, tear and puncture resistance, designed for maximum durability and long-lasting performance.

The RenAn Bullet Proof messenger bag can be used by anyone who want to avoid shooting injured, specially who work at or go to the pulic places.

Here is the detail of  RenAn Bullet Proof messenger bag features.

 

In order to obtain the strongest protection of bullet proof , we use this high-tech ,high strength weather proof material which is used by the military and police department.

This material is one of the best soft and light ballistic material up to now, light and soft but with strong protection avoiding other materials are too heavy.

The material spread rapidly impact energy to larger area, resulting smaller indentation and alleviating non-penetration injury.

The Bullet Proof plates(shildes) made by above material which  have been passed the test and obtain a government certificate. (please see below certificate report).

The bullet proof vest sleeve is made of Original ballistic weave developed for military , strong weather-proof materials , exceptional abrasion, tear and puncture resistance,

        

 

Formed a double protection against actual bullets. 

 

With the better effective protection, we design, on the front and back bullet proof plate are placed separate  inside the front and back pocket of messenger bag. Through this design,You can directly use the messenger bag as defense in case there is shooting.The front and back plate of bullet proof forming a double protection which is more secure and more secure to block the one-way bullet shooting; also it can block the other direction of the bullet shooting.

You can directly use the messenger bag as defense in case there is shooting.

You can directly use the messenger bag as defense in case there is shooting.

 

The bullet proof plates(shield) can be in removable and assemble.

When you need a bullet prooft vest, You can use the shoulder strap and belt, easily assemble the front and back bullet proof plate fixed to be one whole bullet proof vest.Then You can wear this bullet proof vest to protect life.

When you donot need a bullet proof vest,You can removable the bullet proof vest to be separate, easy to put inside the messenger bag to take to anywhere you go to.

You can wear the bullet proof vest inside of your clothes.

You also can wear it on outside of your clothes.

 

According to the human body. we design the suitable size (35x28cm)of bullet proof plates to protect well the most important organ of the human body heart, liver, lungs etc.

 

 

The bulletproof vests provid confortable fit for body movement,it has been passed the official test and obtain a government certificate as follows:

Protection level  :  USA STANDARD NIJ 0101.06 IIIA( .44MAGNUM SJHP)

Protection square meter: One plate: 0.098

The official Certificate report approved that the message bag is:

The messenger bag has more features:

This messenger bag with large capacity to carry your everyday essentials ,easy for you quickly to look and access and visibility for packing. Very convenient for you to use,

The digital space help you to hold your mobile, laptop,two way radio etc.Two side pockets hold your water bottle and umbrella. It’s Stylish.and Functional, designed for maximum durability and long-lasting performance.

Use it in daily life, work,business, travel,sport etc.

In the picture packed with the following items:

Inside the bag, we have designed the Phone/ two way radio pocket, Passport pocket , wallet pocket, Key holder, pen holder, Sunglasses pocket ,Headphone pocket .

also on the bag’s front there is pocket for cables,hard drivers and power adapters .

The digital space can hold comfortably with MACBOOK 13” to 15” , IPAD Mini,  IPAD 9.7”,  IPAD 12.9” or any other digital items of a similar size.

Two side of bag we have designed one water bottle pocket and  one umbrella pocket where you can easily put your umbrella and water bottle .

A strong and quick adjustable shoulder strap with buckle which will make your interactions with the bag as comfortable and enjoyable.    

The interior of RenAn bullet proof bag is made of “CORDURA”Original ballistic weave developed for military, strong weather-proof materials , exceptional abrasion, tear and puncture resistance, designed for maximum durability and long-lasting performance.

We also use the YKK zipper to keep your gear protection.

 

RenAn bullet proof messenger bag size: 16.5X12X5.5 inch ( L x H x W)

 

We also create the bullet proof wallet for you.

Here is the detail of  RenAn Bullet Proof wallet features.

In one side of wallet, we have assembled one bullet proof plate inside.The bullet prooft plate test report which you can see from above.

The wallet with larger opening ,easy for you quickly to look and access items.

Items classification clear, Iconcentrated,orderly. Very convenient for you to use,

At the middle of compartment, a leather pen holder is designed to hold the basics pen or tactical pens.

CREDIT Card and Cash Compartment:  RFID BLOCKING

12 x Credit/I.D.card slots;

Bank note/cash slots; Where you can put 100 bills of large bank notes.(Tested with U.S.Dollars)

The wallet is equipped with an RFID safe shielding layers defend against electronic pickpocketing.

With the security friendly design, It’s easily for you to access your mobile phone from  the phone holders.The phone holders can hold  IPHONE 6 or 7 ,Iphone series,Samsung series,Huawei series etc., it also can be holded the other brand phones in the market.

We use  Italy Premium Genuine Leather as material  which is water proof , good wear resistance and durable.

We use the Geman High Tenacity Serafil Thread and Japan YKK Smooth Zipper to sure the wallet in high quality. 100% hand made with strictly quality control.

ABOUT US

RENAN, We are honest, diligent and hardworking , friendly, enthusiastic to help people.

For the safety of people, we design, develop, create the high quality every day carry(EDC) and survival Essentials. Cooperation with world’s first class material supplier, we focus on producing the high quality products. “Let everyone be safe”.

We very grateful to you and all the people who are helping us in this project.

Thanks also to INDIEGOGO.Thank you! Thanks all of your support!

If there is any further information you need, please feel free to contact us: service@renan.net

story:
What do you know of the people who made your watch?  

The men and women who designed it. The artisans who made it. Their inspirations. Their stories?  

Tempus Faire are here to change that! 

 

For years, watch enthusiasts have had to pay thousands of pounds for beautiful designer watches, not realizing that these timepieces can directly be bought from world-renowned artisans at a fraction of the cost.

Tempus Faire strived to build a network of artisans and watch masters who will create exclusive timepieces, minus the unnecessary markup. 

We don't hide masterminds behind their craft. At Tempus Faire, we put the artists front and center so you can listen to their stories, one wristpiece at a time. 

Meet the creator: Clement Sinibaldi, a master craftsman who has created some of the most coveted watches on the market sold by brands like Fabergé, Garmin, and Audemars Piguet.

 

The French designer is well-known for his eye for the modern and the mechanical. Together, we are happy to introduce our first collection inspired by the 21st-century gentleman: the Comrade collection.

Every single component of your Tempus Faire watch is sourced, manufactured, designed, and assembled carefully and precisely to give you the perfect product.

Watch straps are sourced directly from the finest leather tanneries in Italy. We selected the best combination of colour and texture so you can enjoy a comfortable and beautiful wrist piece.

Tempus Faire watches are made from surgical grade steel offering durability and luxury that will only look better throughout the years.

Nothing has been forgotten, the hands are coated with premium swiss lume so that you can read time in the dark.

 

 

 

The spirit of the modern man is embodied by our very first exclusive collection, the Comrade. Sleek, sophisticated, and suave, the Comrade is designed for the man who has it all - but deserves a little more.

In celebration of the 21st-century man, we're limiting production to 2,100 beautiful watches per style. 

Our collection features two styles:

 

 

A dual-time watch that displays the date and allows for two time zones for gentlemen who are on the go.

 

A skeleton style watch made for rightful watch enthusiasts who appreciate the art of watchmaking. Featuring a complex Japanese automatic movement mechanism that will wow anyone.

A gift, from us to you.

 

 

All Tempus Faire purchases come with a stylish leather gift box, making it the perfect gift for yourself and others.

Case diameter: 42mm

Strap width: 20mm

Movement: Japanese Miyota JP25 (dual timer watch) or 82S0 automatic (skeleton watch)

Water resistant: 5ATM (50 Metres)

Warranty: 5 years against manufacturing faults

 

Want to see one of our watches in action? Check out the Skeleton Style watch below:
