story:
As seen in:

Our assets, the reviews

“I've been putting the bag through its paces and I'm very pleased. Customer service and production time were exceptional as well!”

                                                                     Jonathan Mulhearn, Pennsylvania, USA

“Initial impressions were real quality leather - good, even stitching throughout.

All in all I am extremely happy with the experience. Big thumbs up to the Azzuraa team”

                                                                                    Victor Calanog, New York, USA

“I received the bag last week and have been using it extensively. It has turned out just as I had expected it and I am very happy with it. I was also very pleased with the quick turnaround time”

                                                                                          Joshua Barza, Boston, USA

“The belts are very well made. I would recommend them to others”

                                                                                  Craig Courtie, Victoria, Australia

“The bag is very well made, sturdy. I like the canvas a lot. Overall, good value”

                                                                             Milosz Skrzypczak, Ontario, Canada

“The bag has arrived and looks great. Many thanks”

                                                                                           David Monger, London, UK

                                             

                                     ABOUT AZZURAA “az-zur-aa”:

RAW MATERIALS

We use full grain, vegetable tanned leather from Italy, English Bridle leather from UK and 100% Cotton Canvas from Europe.

 100% Cotton fabric lining, Premium brass YKK zippers, Polyester thread from Gutermann & Solid Brass accessories.

WORKMANSHIP

We have our own small unit where each product is individually hand-crafted by giving maximum attention to detail and thus making a high quality product and providing decades of use.

FAIR PRICES

We wish to grow on customer feedback. Our only source of marketing is mouth publicity. Thereby cutting down the marketing and other overhead expenses, we bring to you the products at fair prices when compared with other luxury RTW brands and bespoke makers.

DESIGN

After a thorough study and market research, we have come up with a few minimalistic designs.  You also have the option to create your own design and we take care of you.

CREATING YOUR OWN DESIGN

Liked the color of a bag, but not the design? Liked the structure but thought a little big/small, a couple of internal pockets would fit my needs. Liked a designer RTW bag, but it’s too expensive.

At Azzuraa, you have the liberty to select from our wide range of options or create your own design that meets your needs at no extra cost.


VEGETABLE TANNED LEATHER

We use 100% vegetable tanned full grain leather to make our products. We work with tannery in Italy who has more 50 years of experience and a UK tannery which has been producing vegetable tanned leather for nearly 2 centuries. These are a few remaining tanneries in the world producing vegetable tanned leather.

Vegetable tanned leather has a beautiful smell to it that develops a rich patina with use & time. We use only 1.8 mm-2 mm thick leather thereby enabling the product to last a lifetime.

ENGLISH BRIDLE LEATHER

Bridle Leather refers to the way that a piece of leather (cow hide) is finished at the tannery. Bridle leather has both the Flesh and Grain side of the leather stuffed with greases and finished with wax. This is generally a labour intensive process, thus expensive! Only the best grades of leather are treated like this, it would be uneconomic to treat poor quality leather in this way. There are only a few tanneries producing good bridle leather.

ITALIAN LEATHER

Italian leather is often considered to be the best kind of leather in the world. Many designer brands use Italian leather to make high end products. Leather from Italy is traditionally known for the quality of its craftsmanship. It is "full grain" leather, which is made from the very best raw hides. As it ages,it gains a beautiful sheen. Most of this leather is of high quality, and stay in beautiful condition much longer than other types of leather. 


                                                                                 PERKS

                                           Single compartment office bag

                          Navy Canvas with British Tan English Bridle Leather

+
                                       Dimensions: 40.5 cm X 30.5 cm X 7 cm
                 One main compartment, padded laptop sleeve, credit card slots,
                                                   iPhone pocket, zip pocket
             ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

                                              Two compartment office bag 

                                                    Marine Italian Leather

                                           Dimensions: 41 cm X 30 cm X 10 cm

                       Two main compartment, One front small zip pocket, 

                     One back zip pocket, laptop sleeve, credit card slots, 

                                  iPhone pocket, slip pocket, zip pocket


             ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

                                              Three compartment office bag 

                                              Havana English Bridle Leather

                                    Dimensions: 41.5 cm X 31.5 cm X 12.5 cm

                             Three main compartments, One back slip pocket,

                 Laptop sleeve, credit card slots, iPhone pocket, slip pocket,

                                one small zip pocket & one full size zip pocket

              ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

                                    Duffel Bag in Oxblood Italian Leather


                                      Dimensions: 50 cm X 28 cm X 24 cm

                One main compartment, credit card slots, small slip pocket,

                                 large slip pocket, full size zip pocket

             ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

                                      Duffel Bag in Navy Cotton Canvas

                                Dimensions: 54.5 cm X 31.5 cm X 27.5 cm

                One main compartment, One back zip pocket, credit card slots, 

                             slip pocket, iPhone pocket, full size zip pocket

         

     ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------



Timeline


Our Story

Hi we are Nikhil, Neha and Megha, creators of Azzuraa.

Whenever we were out in the market shopping for a decent leather bag either for ourselves or gifts for loved ones, we always were at a loss. We could not find one below $1000. Also the ones available in the market always left something unanswered. We were introduced to the world of endless possibilities in the form of bespoke services.

After a bit of research, we found out that we could easily source the best quality raw materials which are at par with the ones used by luxury brands, but at highly reasonable prices. We then thought of starting our own online bespoke services for luxury leather goods. And by directly selling them online to you, we see to it that they do not burn a hole in your pocket.

We have been working on this concept for the past few years and have our suppliers in place. We have set up our own production unit with highly skilled team of experts.

We now need your support & co-operation to make this dream into a reality and help us all have our dream bag in our hands at very affordable prices. Straight from the factory, directly in your hands. No mark up, no middle man, no retailing, no whole-selling, no placing of the products in flimsy lights in malls or stores to push up the prices. Do help in spreading our word out there.

Cheers,

Team Azzuraa

FAQ


1.  How do I select the color of my bag?

     At the end of the campaign we will send you an email to select the color.

2. Can I order Office bag or Duffel bag in any color?

     Yes. You only have to select the relevant perk now. You will receive an                            email at the end of the campaign to select the color. The colors available                        irrespective of the design are:

     a.  Marine Italian Leather

     b.  Oxblood Italian Leather

     c.  Havana English Bridle Leather

     d.  Navy Cotton Canvas

3. What about custom duties, VAT and other taxes?

     You will be responsible for all the duties and taxes as applicable in your country.

4. Will I be charged extra for bespoke services?

     Once the stretch goal is unlocked, the bespoke services will be available                        without any additional cost.

5. Can I modify your designs to suit my requirements?

     Once the stretch goal is unlocked, you can make tweaks to our design to suit              your requirements or even email us your own design.

6. When will the bespoke bags be delivered?

     The delivery of the bespoke bags will begin from January 2016.

7. How do I pay for shipment?

     Please select $25 Perk for Office bag and $50 Perk for Duffel bag for countries          outside US, Canada, Europe, Australia, New Zealand.

If you still have queries, please leave a comment on the COMMENT tab at the top of the page, or email us at mail@azzuraa.com and we will get back to you.

We will regularly update our backers about the production and if there are any delays or unforeseen situations, we will happily communicate it to you.

                                           Thank you for your support!

As seen in:

Our assets, the reviews
“I've been putting the
bag through its paces and I'm very pleased. Customer service and production time
were exceptional as well!”
                                                                     Jonathan Mulhearn, Pennsylvania, USA

“Initial impressions were real quality leather
- good, even stitching throughout. 
All in all I am extremely happy with the
experience. Big thumbs up to the Azzuraa team”
                                                                                    Victor Calanog, New York, USA

“I received the bag last week and have been
using it extensively. It has turned out just as I had expected it and I am very
happy with it. I was also very pleased with the quick turnaround time”
                                                                                          Joshua Barza, Boston, USA


“The belts are very well made. I would recommend
them to others”
                                                                                  Craig Courtie, Victoria, Australia

“The bag is very well made,
sturdy. I like the canvas a lot. Overall, good value”
                                                                             Milosz Skrzypczak, Ontario, Canada
“The bag has arrived
and looks great. Many thanks”
                                                                                           David Monger, London, UK                                                                                   ABOUT
AZZURAA “az-zur-aa”:

RAW
MATERIALS


We
use full grain, vegetable tanned leather from Italy, English Bridle leather
from UK and 100% Cotton Canvas from Europe.
 100% Cotton fabric lining, Premium brass YKK
zippers, Polyester thread from Gutermann & Solid Brass accessories.


WORKMANSHIP


We
have our own small unit where each product is individually hand-crafted by
giving maximum attention to detail and thus making a high quality product and
providing decades of use.
FAIR
PRICES
We
wish to grow on customer feedback. Our only source of marketing is mouth
publicity. Thereby cutting down the marketing and other overhead expenses, we bring
to you the products at fair prices when compared with other luxury RTW brands
and bespoke makers.



DESIGN

After
a thorough study and market research, we have come up with a few minimalistic
designs.  You also have
the option to create your own design and we take care of you. 
CREATING
YOUR OWN DESIGN

Liked
the color of a bag, but not the design? Liked the structure but thought a
little big/small, a couple of internal pockets would fit my needs. Liked a
designer RTW bag, but it’s too expensive.
At
Azzuraa, you have the liberty to select from our wide range of options or create your own design that meets your needs at no extra cost.VEGETABLE TANNED LEATHER 
We use 100% vegetable tanned full grain leather
to make our products. We work with tannery in Italy who has more 50 years of
experience and a UK tannery which has been producing vegetable tanned leather
for nearly 2 centuries. These are a few remaining tanneries in the world producing vegetable tanned leather.
Vegetable tanned leather has a beautiful smell to
it that develops a rich patina with use & time. We use only 1.8 mm-2 mm thick
leather thereby enabling the product to last a lifetime.ENGLISH BRIDLE LEATHER
Bridle Leather refers to the way that a piece
of leather (cow hide) is finished at the tannery. Bridle leather has both the
Flesh and Grain side of the leather stuffed with greases and finished with wax.
This is generally a labour intensive process, thus expensive! Only the best
grades of leather are treated like this, it would be uneconomic to treat poor
quality leather in this way. There are only a few tanneries producing good
bridle leather.ITALIAN LEATHER
Italian leather is often considered to be the
best kind of leather in the world. Many designer brands use Italian leather to
make high end products. Leather from Italy is traditionally known for the
quality of its craftsmanship. It is "full grain" leather,
which is made from the very best raw hides. As it ages,it
gains a beautiful sheen. Most of this leather is of high
quality, and stay in beautiful condition much longer than other types of
leather.                                                                                  PERKS
                                           Single
compartment office bag 
                          Navy Canvas with British Tan English Bridle Leather


+
                                       Dimensions: 40.5 cm X 30.5 cm X 7 cm
                 One main compartment, padded laptop sleeve, credit card slots,                                                   iPhone pocket, zip pocket             ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

                                              Two compartment office bag 
                                                    Marine Italian Leather




                                           Dimensions: 41 cm X 30 cm X 10 cm
                       Two main compartment, One front small zip pocket, 

                     One back zip pocket, laptop sleeve, credit card slots, 


                                  iPhone pocket, slip pocket, zip pocket
             ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

                             Three main compartments, One back slip pocket,

                One main compartment, credit card slots, small slip pocket,

                                Dimensions: 54.5 cm X 31.5 cm X 27.5 cm
                One main compartment, One back zip pocket, credit card slots, 
                             slip pocket, iPhone pocket, full size zip pocket

story:
Dogs of the World have been Barking out for This! 

                 Let your dog be challenged while you're away from home!             

Leaving your dog at home while heading off to work has always been accompanied by a guilty conscience of knowing how bored your best friend is going to be, while you’re gone all day. Maybe even bored enough to take it out on your new shoes or  couch? 

We're introducing Pet-Pocket® as the new brainteaser for your dog to enjoy, while you’re busy elsewhere!


The Dog Education Program








Dogs love having to work for their food - it stems from the time when they had to dig into the forest floor for food and use their brains to get fed. Activating your dog's problem-solving skills develops their intelligence and improves their self-confidence in the process. The best dog activity toys are usually the ones, that needs you as a counterpart; to throw the Frisbee, hold the sock back and so forth. But busy lives doesn't always allow time for such efforts to the extent you and your best buddy may wish for...


                           What makes Pet-Pocket® different is how much fun                                     your dog can have with our toys on it's own!


Our patent pending designs have the advantages of intriguing, while tiring your dog out with mental and physical exercise. The complexity, sturdiness and game-changing paw-closing function in the toys makes for hour-long playtime for your dog - and something fun for you to watch! Our products have been thoroughly tested and are produced with the safest and most durable phthalate-free materials and super-strong seams for continuous usage. When it becomes a bit too sticky - Rinse it out with ease!

 

Don't be surprised, when your dog carries the toy back to you and 'asks' you to "Please refill" - It's a great way of dividing feedings and it's really cute too!
 

Check us on: 

Pet-Pocket.com 
YouTube
Facebook
See our products in action! 

Take a look in our Q&A section, where we describe how strong and durable our products really are! 


 We have consulted with leading animal behavior specialists in regards to mental stimulation

 

Dorthe Odefey, Animal Behavior Specialist

www.odefey.dk 


Pet-Pocket® Products


LETTER

                   Many dogs greatly enjoy the arrival of the postman                     and who ever said mail should only be for people?

Now you can wish dog-loving friends and family 'Happy Holidays' and surprise a friend's dog with a Pet-Pocket® LETTER, that not only contains your yummy treats inside a permanent dog toy, but also a message for either the dog or your loved-ones. It also works as an add-on for some of our up-coming products! LETTER is opened by the dog pulling on the snip and then it's play-time! 
   
                               The Pet-Pocket® LETTER is a permanent toy                                       - with a permanent message! 

                  This way every time your friend refills the Pet-Pocket® LETTER                      - they'll think of you! 

 

         Besides the Red color, that's perfect for Christmas, Pet-Pocket® LETTER             will also later be available in 

                                   

Cyclamen                             Raphia                                 Céladon



TRY

Developing fine motor-skills!


TRY is one of our core introduction products, where you can make the toy more difficult as your dog gets faster at getting the treats out. When the dog gets the treat too fast, simply cut off one end of the toy to make it harder for the dog!

TRY is available in the following colors

     

                Cyclamen               Raphia                  Céladon                  Bleuet

LEARN 

Our all-purpose favorite!


LEARN is also our personal favorite as its just as functional as it is stylish! 

It's is perfect to bring to the park or when your dog just needs to be activated for an hour or so. The product is so soft that your dog bonds with it, just like a teddy bear. Due to the treats inside, dogs show an impressive eagerness to have the product close and loves sleeping next to their new toy.

LEARN is available in colors: Army, Raphia (Beige) and Cyclamen(Pink)



GAME 

The Rubik's Cube for dogs! 

GAME is the absolute favorite toy of our hyper-active dogs, such as beagles, border collies etc. Our test-dogs have had it for months and have completely fallen in love with it. It was our hope that they would, at least, break less of their owners household items, but when the owners came back and told us, that nothing had been broken or chewed up since they got GAME, we knew, we were on to something good!

The Velcro, the floppy ends and that they have to move the toy around and around, is just what these dogs have been craving all along!

With the toy being in soft materials, your dog doesn't have to hold back strength when it grabs, pulls and tucks its way into the treats. Game is a real brain-teaser as the way into the pockets is different - each time, there is a new way in! Just getting the toy opened so it lies flat out is a challenge, where your dog gets to use its intelligence and physique to solve the puzzle. 

Therefore, we recommend that you start out by given your dog GAME in an open state - then you can step up the difficulty later! 


     Color choices coming soon! 



 

Check us on: 

Pet-Pocket.com 

YouTube

Facebook


See our products in action! 

 


Vision

Through openness and honesty, we set out to create a better quality of life for both dogs and owners.

Our goals are simple; we intend to provide dogs the opportunity to learn and develop their skill-set.

We strongly believe, that a learning dog is a happy dog!



Ready for production
We have +30 prototypes at different levels of completion and 4 products ready to go into production. Our manufacturer has supplied us with great samples of our designs and the factory is ready to commence production at any time. 

We have joined forces with companies in other industries, which acquire same materials in their production for much larger products. In collaboration, we have found a way of combining our manufacturing, so Pet-Pocket® uses the absolute best and most durable materials at an affordable cost - and it keeps the environment clean simultaneously! 



The Indiegogo Campaign

Here’s where you come in!

We have tested our prototypes and perfected them, We have sought out only the safest materials and most sustainable production methods to find our perfect match. We are now at a stage where Field Testing is behind us and our basic product portfolio is in place. 

If you support us by proving demand, we promise to market at least  10 new products within a year! 

We're now raising $30.000, which will allow us to produce Pet-Pocket® at a large enough scale to be able to offer it affordable to everyone. 

In return for your early support, you'll be among the first to get the Pet-Pocket® products, get some pretty great perks at a discounted price and support a company trying to redefine the dog toy market and quality of life for dogs!

* We expect to fulfill our crowdfunding orders by November 2015 - January 2016. The packages only including LETTER are the highest of our priorities and will be sent out in the middle of November. We do not expect any delays, but promise to update backers with the exciting steps as we proceed. 
 

Meet the Pet-Pocket® Team

Frank is the crazy inventor, Mark is our designated critic, John makes sure we don't spend too much, Martin makes all of our tech stuff work, Kasia brings great ideas to the table and Helle makes all the ends meet! 


But the most important team-members are our awesome test-dogs!

If Buster, Shaggy, Timber, Ashton, Zeus, Tejs, Ronja, Covo and Bobby love it, we'll bet your dog will too!

Risk & Challenges

If we meet our goal, we feel sure we can deliver on the promised perks. Our next goal is to give every dog-owner on the planet the chance to improve the quality of life for their dog. We hope, that you will help spread the word, so that not only your dog, but many others will get to enjoy this new playmate!

Q&A:

Q: Do the Pet-Pocket® products require a specific level of intelligence from the dog?

No, all dogs can benefit and develop mentally from our product! But, remember that your dog needs time and a little help to understand it in the beginning. Please read our 'How it works' section on our website 


Q: How do you know that this toy can be interesting for all dogs?

We have done extensive testing on dogs of varying species and sizes, from chihuahua to husky. All of them have shown great interest in the products.

Q: Is there a difference between the dog playing with the Pet-pocket while its observed and while it is alone?

Yes. When the dog is home alone, it will spend more time with the toy as it knows that it won't be refilled until you get home and do it, so it wants to make sure it gets all the treats. 


Q: What makes Pet-Pocket® different? 

The Pet-Pocket® products are designed to engage the dog in a game it finds natural. The fact that it is part of its instincts, engages the dog further than just getting the treat. Dogs enjoy using their natural senses and problem-solving skills. 
 
This doesn't just give your dog a happier life - you'll get happier from seeing your dog happy! ;-) 


Q: If Pet-Pocket® gets the funding, am I sure that you can deliver? 

Yes, our manufacturing facility is ready to produce and we are now finalizing our freight arrangements! The interest in the Pet-Pocket® products have been overwhelming and we feel confident in our business model and we can't wait to be able to offer this to every dog-owner! 

Q: How do I clean the product? 

Simply rinse out the product as described in the instruction pamphlet that follows every product. 

 Q: Are shipping fees included in the prices?

No, shipping fees are not included. International backers will be responsible for applicable tariffs and customs fees. But we're are working hard at getting our products into the States and if we reach our expected volume, we'll ship directly from the U.S to your house 


Q: Can I count on the Christmas Package arriving in time for me to send it to a loved one? 

The factory is ready, the materials are in place and as soon as we see real activity here, we'll bet it all and start production! 

Of course, we are mere humans and cannot foresee the future, but we have taken every necessary step to get the job done in time. 


Q: What happens if my dog manages to tear a hole in the toy?

No worries, a hole or two in the material doesn't make a difference. The materials         are super safe for your dog to lick, chew and hug as much as the dog wants to. The inside lining of all of our products are designed to not allow knives to cut through and several of our products are also available in Beavers Nylon (army color) for the real hard-hitters of dogs. For the real 'biters', we recommend GAME  and LEARN in army color.
Please read our materials references on our website!
 

Q: How durable are the Pet-Pocket® toys?

We've done extensive testing with positive feedback. Our materials are among the strongest within soft material, but just as all other dog toys; some manages to tear it up. Our products are lined with the same materials, used for protecting people when they cut with sharp knives in the food-industry. The products in army-color is of Beavers Nylon, that's known for it's sturdiness and increased strength. How you introduce the toy to your dog is key and done right, your dog will have a pal for life. 

More questions? 
We'll be happy to answer any questions, you'll post in the Comments section!

It also works as an add-on for some of our up-coming products! LETTER is opened by the dog pulling on the snip and then it's play-time! 

   

                               The Pet-Pocket® LETTER is a permanent toy                                       - with a permanent message! 



                  This way every time your friend refills the Pet-Pocket® LETTER                      - they'll think of you! 
 
         Besides the Red color, that's perfect for Christmas, Pet-Pocket® LETTER             will also later be available in 

                                   
Cyclamen                             Raphia                                 Céladon




TRY
Developing fine motor-skills!








TRY is one of our core introduction products, where you can make the toy more difficult as your dog gets faster at getting the treats out. When the dog gets the treat too fast, simply cut off one end of the toy to make it harder for the dog!

TRY is available in the following colors

     




                Cyclamen               Raphia                  Céladon                  Bleuet




LEARN 
Our all-purpose favorite!





LEARN is also our personal
favorite as its just as functional as it is stylish! 
It's is perfect to bring to the park or when your dog just needs to be activated for an hour or so. The product is so soft that your dog bonds with it, just like a teddy bear. Due to the treats inside, dogs show an impressive eagerness to have the product close and loves sleeping next to their new toy.


LEARN is available in colors: Army, Raphia (Beige) and Cyclamen(Pink)



GAME 
The Rubik's Cube for dogs! 




GAME is
the absolute favorite toy of our hyper-active dogs, such as beagles, border collies etc. Our
test-dogs have had it for months and have completely fallen in love with it. It
was our hope that they would, at least, break less of their owners household
items, but when the owners came back and told us, that nothing had been broken or chewed up since they got GAME, we knew,
we were on to something good! 
The
Velcro, the floppy ends and that they have to move the toy around and around, is
just what these dogs have been craving all along! 
With
the toy being in soft materials, your dog doesn't have to hold back strength
when it grabs, pulls and tucks its way into the treats. Game is a real
brain-teaser as the way into the pockets is different - each time, there is a new way in! Just getting the toy opened so it lies
flat out is a challenge, where your dog gets to use its intelligence and
physique to solve the puzzle. 
Therefore, we recommend that you start out by given your dog GAME in an open state - then you can step up the difficulty later! 

     Color choices coming soon! 



 
Check us on: 
Pet-Pocket.com 
YouTube
Facebook

See our products in action! 




 


Vision

Through openness and honesty, we set out to create a better quality of life for both dogs and owners.
Our goals are simple; we intend to provide dogs the opportunity to learn and develop their skill-set.
We strongly believe, that a learning dog is a happy dog!



Ready for production



We have +30 prototypes at different levels of completion and 4 products ready to go into production. Our manufacturer has supplied us with great samples of our designs and the factory is ready to commence production at any time. 


We have joined forces with companies in other industries, which acquire same materials in their production for much larger products. In collaboration, we have found a way of combining our manufacturing, so Pet-Pocket® uses the absolute best and most durable materials at an affordable cost - and it keeps the environment clean simultaneously! 








The Indiegogo Campaign


Here’s where you come in!
We have tested our prototypes and perfected them, We have sought out only the safest materials and most sustainable production methods to find our perfect match. We are now at a stage where Field Testing is behind us and our basic product portfolio is in place. 
If you support us by proving demand, we promise to market at least  10 new products within a year! 
We're now raising $30.000, which will allow us to produce Pet-Pocket® at a large enough scale to be able to offer it affordable to everyone. 
In return for your early support, you'll be among the first to get the Pet-Pocket® products, get some pretty great perks at a discounted price and support a company trying to redefine the dog toy market and quality of life for dogs!
* We expect to fulfill our crowdfunding orders by November 2015 - January 2016. The packages only including LETTER are the highest of our priorities and will be sent out in the middle of November. We do not expect any delays, but promise to update backers with the exciting steps as we proceed. 



 

Meet the Pet-Pocket® Team
Frank is the crazy inventor, Mark is our designated critic, John makes sure we don't spend too much, Martin makes all of our tech stuff work, Kasia brings great ideas to the table and Helle makes all the ends meet! 




But the most important team-members are our awesome test-dogs!


If Buster, Shaggy, Timber, Ashton, Zeus, Tejs, Ronja, Covo and Bobby love it, we'll bet your dog will too!


Risk & Challenges
If we meet our goal, we feel sure we can deliver on the promised perks. Our next goal is to give every dog-owner on the planet the chance to improve the quality of life for their dog. We hope, that you will help spread the word, so that not only your dog, but many others will get to enjoy this new playmate!

Q&A:

Q: Do the Pet-Pocket® products require a specific level of intelligence from the dog?


No, all dogs can benefit and develop mentally from our product! But, remember that your dog needs time and a little help to understand it in the beginning. Please read our 'How it works' section on our website 


Q: How do you know that this toy can be interesting for all dogs?
We have done extensive testing on dogs of varying species and sizes, from chihuahua to husky. All of them have shown great interest in the products.


Q: Is there a difference between the dog playing with the Pet-pocket while its observed and while it is alone?
Yes. When the dog is home alone, it will spend more time with the toy as it knows that it won't be refilled until you get home and do it, so it wants to make sure it gets all the treats. 

Q: What makes Pet-Pocket® different? 
The Pet-Pocket® products are designed to engage the dog in a game it finds natural. The fact that it is part of its instincts, engages the dog further than just getting the treat. Dogs enjoy using their natural senses and problem-solving skills. 
 
This doesn't just give your dog a happier life - you'll get happier from seeing your dog happy! ;-) 

Q: If Pet-Pocket® gets the funding, am I sure that you can deliver? 


Yes, our manufacturing facility is ready to produce and we are now finalizing our freight arrangements! The interest in the Pet-Pocket® products have been overwhelming and we feel confident in our business model and we can't wait to be able to offer this to every dog-owner! 

Q: How do I clean the product? 
Simply rinse out the product as described in the instruction pamphlet that follows every product. 

 Q: Are shipping fees included in the prices?

No, shipping fees are not included. International backers will be responsible for applicable tariffs and customs fees. But we're are working hard at getting our products into the States and if we reach our expected volume, we'll ship directly from the U.S to your house 

Q: Can I count on the Christmas Package arriving in time for me to send it to a loved one? 
The factory is ready, the materials are in place and as soon as we see real activity here, we'll bet it all and start production! 

Of course, we are mere humans and cannot foresee the future, but we have taken every necessary step to get the job done in time. 



Q: What happens if my dog manages to tear a hole in the toy?

No worries, a hole or two in the material doesn't make a difference. The materials         are super safe for your dog to lick, chew and hug as much as the dog wants to. The inside lining of all of our products are designed to not allow knives to cut through and several of our products are also available in Beavers Nylon (army color) for the real hard-hitters of dogs. For the real 'biters', we recommend GAME  and LEARN in army color.


Please read our materials references on our website!

 
Q: How durable are the Pet-Pocket® toys?

We've done extensive testing with positive feedback. Our materials are among the strongest within soft material, but just as all other dog toys; some manages to tear it up. Our products are lined with the same materials, used for protecting people when they cut with sharp knives in the food-industry. The products in army-color is of Beavers Nylon, that's known for it's sturdiness and increased strength. How you introduce the toy to your dog is key and done right, your dog will have a pal for life. 

More questions? 
We'll be happy to answer any questions, you'll post in the Comments section!

story:
About The Belt Organizer

The Belt Organizer enables you to organize you belts in new and unique way. By storing your belts rolled up you minimize the storage space. The acrylic clear drawers allow you to have a clear view of all your belts at all times for an easy selection.

It's a great way to showcase your favorite designer belts!


It's very easy to use, this is how it works


It's Unisex, one for you, one for your better half


Store it on your dresser top

It is the only belt organizer that can be stored on your dresser top or vanity, it’s appealing design and high quality makes it look as a decorative item in your bedroom.

It mounts on the wall

Dresser tops and vanities are not the only option; The Belt Organizer can also be installed on the wall.


It's Stackable

You need more storage, no problem; The Belt Organizer is also seamlessly stack-able. Stack it up and double the storage.



PRODUCT DETAILS:


Make The Belt Organizer a part of your Luxury family!


The Belt Organizer Story:

The Belt Organizer idea was born while I was helping my wife organize our bedroom. We were almost done organizing, only thing left was to do something with my messy belts that were sitting on my closet shelf.

 I had a picture in my head of what kind of product I needed to have in order to organize my belts. It should store belts rolled, have them organized and visible, and should be able to be taken out of the closet and placed on your dresser top or vanity top instead.  I started searching online and could not find such a product, so I decided to make one myself and then share it with the world and help make their lives easier and more organized.

This is my start to finish process.


First Prototype - Wafer Can

I started making test samples right away, this is the photo of my first model made from the rolled wafer can I found in my kitchen.


Second Prototype - Plastic Tube 

This bellow is the second model that I made using PVC pipe (I called it tubular belt storage). The plan was to roll your belt and slide it down from the top, the belt buckle would stay outside for easy selection. I found out that it wasn't easy to use, it didn't look that organized, impractical because pulling one belt would pull the others next to it, and it could also damage the belt when pulled.


Third time the charm

 This one was actually made of toilet paper holders, some plastic drawers, handles, hinges and other household items that had the shapes that I could use, made a model shown below that was actually working and of which the final design was born. It helped me determine the door swing, hinge location, drawer size and depths etc.


Voila!

A month later the design was born, which followed with the prototypes. Everything looked perfect. We were so happy that we created something so awesome. From the rolled wafer can to ultimate Belt Organizer. 



Ready to Load & Lock



We'll Deliver In Record Time

Most crowdfunding projects are nothing more than a concept, and it's common for creators to underestimate the development timeline, which can lead to huge delays, or worse, never delivering at all, and unhappy backers. To eliminate this problem, and ensure backers are happy, we've already designed, developed, engineered, and rigorously tested the product on the front end. It's a ton of work, costly, and very time consuming, but now that it's out of the way, we know we can deliver a high quality product on time and on schedule, which removes most of the risk for you. 

Dozens of prototypes have been tested, tooling production had been completed and final samples have been approved.

All we need from our backers right now is the funds to help us fulfill our initial production run, as well as scale up production and finalize logistics with our manufacturing and fulfillment partners.

We promise to be fully transparent throughout the entire process and are committed to providing regular, detailed updates to all of our supporters.

Every project has risks and challenges but as an experienced team of product developers, and small business experts, who have successfully taken a product to market in the past, we’ve eliminated much of the risk by investing heavily in R&D, design and product testing for the ELYPRO™. We also have a great relationship with a top quality manufacturing partner that maintains our high quality standards.

The Belt Organizer is Patent Pending.

We remind all who support this campaign that Indiegogo is not a store, but rather a place to invest in the development and execution of new ideas.

Thank you for supporting ELYPRO™ and for being a part of bringing this product to life!

Get in Touch

Thanks for taking the time to check us out! We'd hugely appreciate you sharing it with your friends.

If you have any questions at all, please feel free to get in touch with us!

Backers: info@elypro.com

Business Enquiries: alekic@elypro.com

Press & Media Enquiries: Adnan Lekic - alekic@elypro.com

Please share our project on Facebook, Instagram and Twitter to let your friends and family know how awesome this project is!

story:
'WE ARE BERSERKERS', a brand forged in Iceland, based on the nordic mythology, nature and the modern warrior. We have designed this collection with an active lifestyle in mind using quality garments and eco-friendly inks. So if you're working out, going out, or just chilling out, you'll always enjoy wearing your Berserker Clothing!

Last year we launched the brand through a similar crowdfunding campaign with great succes! Thanks to all of you, we were able to sell close to a 100 T-Shirts.

Today, we bring to you our second fall/winter collection inspired by the WOLF!
Have a look and see what you like...
Take a look at the gallery (above) for bigger pictures of the clothing!
Orders on the right --------->

See anything u like? Check out the packs on the right!

If we don't have a matching pack for the combo you're looking for, send us an e-mail or p.m. us on Facebook!

SIZE CHARTS
+ WOLF // ORGANIC DENIM SWEATER: MALE - FEMALE
+ WOLF // ORGANIC DENIM LONG SLEEVE TEE: MALE - FEMALE
+ WOLF // ORGANIC ROUND NECK T-SHIRT: MALE
+ WOLF // ORGANIC V-NECK T-SHIRT: MALE
+ WOLF // ORGANIC DENIM MEN TANK TOP: MALE
+ WOLF // FLOWY RACERBACK TANK TOP: FEMALE
+ WOLF // FLOWY TWISTED SCOOP NECK T-SHIRT: FEMALE
+ WOLF // ORGANIC V-NECK T-SHIRT: FEMALE
+ LEADER OF THE PACK: ISH // ORGANIC SCOOP NECK T-SHIRT: MALE
+ LEADER OF THE PACK: ISH // ORGANIC SCOOP NECK T-SHIRT: FEMALE
+ ALPHA MALE & FEMALE // ORGANIC V-NECK T-SHIRT: MALE - FEMALE
+ ALPHA MALE // ORGANIC TANK TOP: MALE
+ LEADER OF THE PACK // ORGANIC SCOOP NECK T-SHIRT: MALE
+ WANDERLUST // FLOWY TWISTED SCOOP NECK T-SHIRT: FEMALE

TIMELINE
+ Crowdfunding ends: 20 September 2015
+ Blank T-Shirts ordered: 21 September 2015
+ Production starts: 30 September 2015
+ Shipping starts:  Between 5 and 12 October 2015 (depending on your order)

FAIR TRADE
We Are Berserkers, and therefor we demand only the best of the best. That's why all our products are fairtrade products manufactured by Stanley & Stella, which is affiliated with the Fair Wear Foundation. Read all about that and more here.

WHY WE NEED YOUR HELP

100 % of Indiegogo funds will cover the costs which include, but are not limited to:
+ First purchase orders of all blanks
+ Production of all items
+ Shipping of the items to customers/backers 
+ Further development of www.berserkers.be. All future purchases will take place on a new version of our website + webshop
+ Marketing our brand

I'VE NEVER HEARD OF INDIEGOGO.
WHAT IS IT?

Indiegogo is a platform for companies to offer rewards in return for pledges (investments) into new/existing products. It works really well when companies such as ourselves are launching a clothing collection.

WHY IS BERSERKERS USING INDIEGOGO?

We are using Indiegogo to fund the release of our second t-shirt collection and be able to produce it in Belgium. We are looking for your support and investment in return for this collection at a lower price than the recommended retail price in euros.

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

EXPERIENCE
We’ve designed t-shirts in the past, but this is our most ambitious and largest clothing project yet. We are convinced, however, that our endless passion and creativity will take us right where we want to be.

MASSIVE DEMAND
There is a chance that we have much more demand than we expected. This is good, because it'll help drive down costs and allow us to offer the stock at lower cost, but many Indiegogo campaigns in the past have struggled to keep up with responses. We have a commitment to reply to our supporters within 24 hours. Accordingly, the team has committed to investing all the time necessary to make this happen.

PAYMENT OPTIONS

No Paypal? No problem!
You can click the Paypal option and pay using your credit card (VISA/MasterCard), without having a Paypal account

If you're still having trouble paying, then contact us at hello@berserkers.be, send us a p.m. on our Facebook Page or send us a text message via: 0032 496 971 972.
I'm sure we'll be able to work something out.

story:
About House Prints


My name is Juan, I'm a product designer and this is my first project on Indiegogo, and hopefully not the last. House prints is about creating a limited edition of serigraph house prints based on animals. Each house is different from the others. After two years watching wild animals, I thought I could link architecture and animals, so I started doing sketches, designing vanguardist houses and this is the final result.



The Houses


I've carefully crafted 7 illustrations, designed to beautifully display 4 views of a house. Each house is inspired by an animal, and we go from the most fierce to the meekest. This similarity has been adapted to modern architecture. 



The Prints


House prints 17"x23" serigraphs, each limited to an edition of 500. Your prints will be stamped and signed on the back, rolled and shipped in a heavy-duty kraft tube. 






STRETCH GOALS

I'd love to create additional prints. So note that if we:

Reach 5000£ I will create a new Modern House Print totally different from others

Reach 7000£ Two more House Prints will be launched

Reach 12.000£ Every baker will receive their print and also the 3D archive


How project will be funded

Here is how the target goal breaks down:



SHIPPING


15% of the costs will go to shipping costs. Prints will be rolled, sealed in a 2 mil polyethylene film bag, and inside a heavy-duty kraft tube. For international backers, please note delivery time will vary as your prints travel through Spain Customs and your local delivery service.


                                                           ''GIVEN THE CHANCE''


Risk and Challenges

If this project goes as I hope, I will be launching Docs design web, where you will find these project and so much more. 

The design for the print series is completed. We are waiting for the bar financing process loads. I have taken into account printing time, we had already talked to packaging distributor and the last thing we need is your help.
